Please select the user requiring a quest: Bokor Master
보코르 마스터
Bokor Master

Please select the user requiring a quest: So you are curious about this stone slate. {nl}If you wish, I shall show you the will of its creator.
이 석판이 어떤 물건인지 궁금하시다고요.{nl}원하신다면 이 석판을 만든 자의 의지를 환영으로 보여드리지요.
Kamu ingin tahu tentang batu slate ini?  {nl} Aku akan memberikan penglihatan dari sang pembuat slate ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Goddess Laima
여신 라이마
Goddess Laima

Please select the user requiring a quest: By the time you get this message, much time will have passed. {nl}I am Laima, the goddess of fate and wisdom.
당신이 이 계시를 보고 있을 땐 이미 오랜 시간이 흐른 뒤이겠지요.{nl}저는 운명과 예지의 여신 라이마 입니다.{nl}
Seiring dengan waktu kamu melihat wahyu ini, akan memakan waktu yang panjang.  {nl} Aku adalah Laima,  Goddess of Fate and Wisdom.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: 600 years ago while creating this revelation, I foresaw a great deal of death and suffering. {nl}If you are seeing this, then I am afraid what I foresaw has come to pass.
600년 전에 이 계시를 만들면서 저는 많은 슬픔과 죽음을 보았습니다.{nl}당신이 이 계시를 보았다는 것은 제가 예지한 모든 일이 현실로 벌어졌겠지요.{nl}
Saat aku membuat wahyu ini sekitar 600 tahun lalu, Aku melihat banyak kesedihan dan kematian.  {nl} Jika kamu sudah melihat wahyu ini berarti semua yang aku ramalkan telah menjadi kenyataan.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The demons have started the first of the cataclysms, and the goddesses have vanished. {nl}I knew all of this would occur and did everything I could to prevent this fate, but my power was not enough.
이미 첫 번째 재앙은 마족에 의해 일어났고 여신들은 모두 자취를 감추었을 것입니다.{nl}저는 이 모든 것을 미리 알았고, 막으려 노력했지만 제 힘은 너무나도 미약했습니다.{nl}
Bencana yang pertama disebabkan oleh Demon, dan semua Goddess menghilang.  {nl}Aku sudah tahu akan semua ini dari awal dan mencoba untuk mencegahnya, namun kekuatanku tidak cukup.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Instead, I wandered through far-seeing dreams for an answer. {nl}You were at the end of them... a Savior.
전 해답을 찾기 위해 기나긴 예지의 꿈 속을 거닐었습니다.{nl}그 꿈의 끝은 바로 당신.. 구원자였습니다.{nl}
Aku melewati banyak mimpi demi mendapatkan jawaban.  {nl} Dan akhirnya aku memimpikan tentang dirimu.. The Savior.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unfortunately, the demons could not stay still, knowing that I possess strength in clairvoyance. {nl}I was forced to hide until the time of your appearance.
하지만 예지의 힘을 가진 절 마족이 가만 둘 리가 없었기에{nl}당신이 나타날 때 까지 어떻게든 몸을 피해야만 했습니다.{nl}
Namun bagaimanapun, mengetahui kekuatanku yang dapat meramal takdir, para Demon tidak akan membiarkanku begitu saja. Jadi aku harus bersembunyi agar dapat bertemu dirimu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I decided to divide my being and remain within many revelations. {nl} Revelations that I continued to create secretly over a millennium.
저는 스스로를 나누어 여러 개의 계시에 깃들기로 결심했습니다.{nl}왕국을 떠돌며 계시를 만들어 감추는 일은 천 년 동안이나 계속되었지요.{nl}
Aku memutuskan untuk membagi diriku menjadi beberapa buah wahyu.  {nl}Menyembunyikan diriku di sekitar area kerajaan selama ribuan tahun. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Savior, if you can help me regain my form, we can stop the demons' sinister plans.{nl}You must recover the revelations that I have hidden throughout every axis of time.
구원자여.{nl}제가 완전한 모습을 되찾고 마족의 흉계를 멈추려면 {nl}모든 시간의 축에 감추어 놓은 계시를 전부 찾아 주셔야 합니다.
Demi dunia dan menghentikan para Demon,  {nl}Kamu harus menemukan seluruh wahyu melewati ruang dan waktu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: This divine task may be a heavy burden, but it is something you must bear. {nl}Perhaps in the muddy midst of your trials and tribulations, something may come about.
그대에게 지워진 신성한 사명의 무게가 어깨를 짓누르겠지요.{nl}어쩌면 수 많은 시련과 고난의 진흙탕 속을 뒹굴게 될지도 모릅니다.{nl}
Beban dari tugas yang suci ini mungkin akan cukup memberatkanmu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Nevertheless, only we can save this world.
하지만 당신만이 저와 이 세계를 구할 수 있어요.{nl}
Namun, hanya kamu dan aku yang bisa menyelamatkan dunia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I have passed the next revelation to the first Paladin. {nl}He will be waiting for you at the highest flower garden.
다음 계시는 초대 팔라딘에게 맡겨 두었습니다.{nl}가장 드높은 화원에서 당신을 기다리겠습니다.
Aku telah memberikan wahyu berikutnya pada Paladin pertama. {nl}Aku akan menunggumu di taman yang berada di bukit.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The dark aura is indeed unpleasant... {nl}But if this message is truly from the Goddess Laima, then I am simply in awe.
사악한 힘이나 의지는 전혀 느껴지지 않는군요.{nl}그렇다면 이 계시가 진짜 라이마 여신의.. 그저 놀랍습니다.
Akan datang pasukan iblis dan aku tidak bisa merasakannya.  {nl}Pasti, ini adalah wahyu asli dari Goddess Laima  .. Sungguh luar biasa.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Well, you should hurry and go find Sir Uska. {nl}He will tell you where to go next. {nl}May the goddess bless your fate...
자, 어서 우스카님께 돌아가세요.{nl}그분이라면 당신이 어디로 가야 할지를 알려줄 겁니다.{nl}당신의 앞날에 여신의 축복이 깃들기를..
Baiklah, cepat pergi temui Sir Uska. {nl}Dia akan memberitahu kemana kamu harus pergi. {nl}Semoga Goddess bless menyertai takdirmu..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please select the preferred Smart Gen.
원하는 스마트젠을 선택하세요.
Silahkan pilih smart gen yang di inginkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: William
윌리엄
William

Please select the user requiring a quest: The fee's 100 silver. {nl}It's cheaper than cutting through monster central.
이용 요금은 100실버입니다.{nl}몬스터 한복판을 헤쳐가느니 차라리 이게 싸죠.
Semua jadi 100 Silver. {nl}Ini sudah cukup murah dibandingkan harus menuju ke sekumpulan monster.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Cyneburg
캔버그
Cyneburg

Please select the user requiring a quest: That'll be 100 silver coins. {nl}That'll cover operations, labor, and other expenses.
이용 요금은 100실버입니다.{nl}운영비, 인건비 등 여러 가지가 포함된 금액이지요.
Totalnya jadi 100 Silver. {nl}Ini semua termasuk biaya operasi, usaha dan biaya lain-lain.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hey, wait a minute. {nl}You know you need more than that...
공짜로는 좀.. 죄송합니다.{nl}아실만한 분이 더 그러시면..
Hey..tunggu dulu. {nl}Kamu butuh lebih dari itu..

Please select the user requiring a quest: That's no good! {nl}I can't work for nothing, even for a Revelator.
공짜로는 안된다니까요. {nl}아무리 계시자님이라도 되는 게 있고 안 되는 게 있는 법이지요.
Ini tidak baik. {nl}Meskipun kamu seorang Savior, Aku tidak bisa bekerja untukmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Wandering Merchant
방랑 상인
Wandering Merchant

Please select the user requiring a quest: Like a dandelion's seeds, I am merely one who follows the wind. {nl}Since we've met in such a curious way, perhaps you could spare a moment to view my curiosities?
이 가련한 몸, 소개하자면 한 줄기 바람에 이끌려 방랑하는 민들레 홀씨이외다.{nl}이렇게 만난 것도 기이한 인연인데 좋은 물건 한 번 구경해 보시겠소?
Aku sangat miskin, wandering merchant. {nl}Baiklah, karena kita sudah bertemu, apakah kamu mau melihat barang daganganku?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Kristina
크리스티나
Christina

Please select the user requiring a quest: Welcome! {nl}You're looking for a travel companion, right? {nl}You won't find a better place for partners than here!
어서 오세요.{nl}마음 맞는 친구를 찾으시나 보네요.{nl}여행엔 요 녀석들만큼 좋은 동반자는 찾기 힘들지요.
Selamat datang kawan.  {nl} Apakah kamu mencari teman untuk bertualang?  {nl} Tidak ada Companion yang lebih baik dari mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You can make your companions watch you fight or train special attributes. {nl}Earn enough affection, and you can even buy some cool equipment!
컴패니언에게 당신이 싸우는 것을 옆에서 지켜 보게 하거나 특성 훈련을 시킬 수도 있어요.{nl}좀 더 애정이 가는 컴패니언이라면 멋진 장비를 사줄 수도 있겠지요.{nl}
Kamu dapat membuat companion membantu pertarunganmu atau melatihnya dengan special Attribute.  {nl} Jika hubungan kamu sudah sangat baik, kamu bisa membelikannya equipment yang keren.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Raising your companion's affection will increase riding stamina and evasion! {nl}So what do you think? Is that enough to make you consider one?
당신의 사랑을 받고 자란 컴패니언은 탑승자의 체력과 회피율을 높여줄 거예요.{nl}어때요. 이만 하면 멋진 당신의 동반자가 아닐까요?
Companion yang tumbuh dengan kasih sayang dari kamu akan memberi bonus stamina dan evasion pada masternya.  {nl} Bagaimana menurutmu? Bukankah Companion baik untukmu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: The box requires a matching key.
상자에 맞는 열쇠가 필요합니다.
Kamu membutuhkan key untuk box.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Knight Titas
기사 티타스
Knight Titas

Please select the user requiring a quest: If so, go see Knight Commander Uska in Klaipeda. {nl}But first, I have an important errand I would like to run by you, so follow me.
맞다면 클라페다의 기사단장 우스카님을 찾아가게.{nl}하지만 그 전에 긴히 할 얘기가 있으니 따라오게.
Jika begitu, temui Knight Commander Uska di Klaipeda.  {nl} Tapi sebelum itu, aku ingin memberitahu sesuatu, ikuti aku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It would be nice if I could find a moment to relax...
잠시 쉴 틈이 있으면 좋겠군..
Semoga aku punya sedikit waktu untuk istirahat..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Sparnas... {nl}is not someone to take lightly...
스파르나스..{nl}만만치 않은 상대..
Sparnas.. {nl}Sangat sulit ditebak..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Soldier Moody
병사 무디
Soldier Moody

Please select the user requiring a quest: Let's deal with this monster before talking.
우선 이 몬스터를 처리하고 이야기하지요.
Kita lanjutkan bicaranya setelah mengalahkan monster.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Joint Investigation Team - Scott
합동조사단 스캇
Bergabung dengan tim investigasi - Scott.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I long for a time when our team is no longer needed... {nl}What a peaceful age that would be...
우리 합동조사단이 필요 없어지는 날이 빨리 왔으면 좋겠는데..{nl}아, 평화로운 세상 말이야. 하하..{nl}
Aku menunggu hari dimana tim kita tidak dibutuhkan lagi.. {nl}Ah, Maksudku adalah hari yang damai. Haha.. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know where to start. {nl}Have you heard anything?
처음부터 시작하려니 감이 잡히는 게 없네.{nl}혹시 넌 뭐 들은 건 없어?
Aku tidak tahu harus berbuat apa. {nl}Apakah kamu sudah mendengar kabar?

Please select the user requiring a quest: By royal orders, we've come to this forest to investigate some strange events. {nl}Witnesses have reported something with a big face and bony fingers. {nl}What in the world could that be?
우린 왕실의 명령으로 이 숲에서 벌어지고 있는 기이한 사건을 조사하러 왔어.{nl}목격자들 말로는 커다란 얼굴과 앙상한 손가락을 보았다는군.{nl}도대체 그게 뭐람?
Kami dikirim oleh kerajaan untuk menginvestigasi kejadian aneh yang ada di hutan.  {nl} Para saksi bilang mereka melihat wajah raksasa dengan jari yang besar  {nl} Kira-kira apa itu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: In the past, pilgrims traveled through this forest. {nl}But now due to the presence of monsters, only soldiers gather here.
과거에는 순례자들이 이 숲을 거쳐 가는 일도 있었죠.{nl}하지만 지금은 몬스터 때문에 병사들만 가득하네요.
Dulu, para peziarah sering melewati hutan ini. {nl}Tetapi, sekarang, yang ada hanya monster.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Up until four years ago, the goddesses often blessed us with signs of their presence. {nl}But now, even our combined prayers don't bring so much as a tremor. {nl}Have they truly abandoned us?
4년 전까지만 해도 여신들께선 종종 모습을 드러내셨죠.{nl}그런데 지금은 아무리 기도를 드려도 미동조차 없으시네요.{nl}정말 우리를 버리신 걸까요?
4 tahun yang lalu, para Goddess sering menampakkan diri mereka dari waktu ke waktu.  {nl} Tapi sekarang, mereka tidak pernah muncul meskipun kita sering berdoa.  {nl} Apakah mereka mengabaikan kita?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Vacenin personally goes to each region to deal with things. {nl}He gets uncomfortable when he stays in the city.
바세닌님께서는 각 지역을 직접 오가면서 일을 처리하십니다.{nl}도시에 계시면 답답하시다면서 말이죠.
Vecenin mengurus banyak tugas dengan pergi dari satu daerah ke daerah lainnya.  {nl} Dia bilang sangat tidak efektif jika hanya tinggal di satu kota.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Do you plan on staying or enlisting? {nl}If you're interested, I'll gladly recommend you to the head commanders.
혹시 여기 계속 머무르시거나 군인이 되실 생각은 없으십니까?{nl}생각이 있다면 제가 상부에 잘 말해보겠습니다.
Apakah kamu pernah berpikir untuk tinggal terus di sini atau menjadi prajurit?  {nl} Dengan senang hati aku akan merekomendasikanmu ke head commander.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Don't let your guard down. Monsters can appear any time, anywhere.
언제 어디서 몬스터가 덤빌지 모르니 방심할 수 없어요.
Tetap siaga. Kamu tidak akan tahu kapan dan dimana monster datang menyerang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Where in the world did Goddess Zemyna go...
제미나 여신께선 도대체 어디로 가셨는지..
Aku membayangkan dimana Goddess Zemyna berada..

Please select the user requiring a quest: What in the world do you call this?
이게 다 도대체 뭐랍니까.
Sebenarnya ini apa ya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I think Zemyna, the goddess of the earth would grieve more than anyone else.
누구보다도 대지의 여신인 제미나님께서 슬퍼하실 겁니다.
Sepertinya The Goddess of Earth - Zemyna akan sangat sedih dibandingkan siapapun.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Pokubu have always been here, but sometimes unfamiliar monsters are spotted as well.
포쿠부는 예전에도 본 적이 있죠.{nl}하지만 이 녀석 말고도 가끔 알 수 없는 몬스터도 나타납니다.
Pokubu sudah berada di sini sejak lama.  {nl} Namun monster yang tidak jelas juga muncul di sekitarnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've thought about it. There's no doubt that the goddesses have abandoned us all. {nl}If that weren't so, then there wouldn't be so many monsters.
제 생각에는요. 여신께서 우리를 버린 게 틀림없어요.{nl}그게 아니라면 몬스터가 저렇게 많을 리 없죠.
Aku berpikir tentang itu. Para Goddess telah mengabaikan kita. {nl}Jika tidak, pasti tidak ada monster sebanyak itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: They say there's a man blessed with the goddess' strength living in the forest.
이 근방 숲에 여신의 힘을 받은 사람이 산다는데..
Aku dengar ada orang yang tinggal di hutan dekat sini yang menerima kekuatan dari Goddess..

Please select the user requiring a quest: I want to go home.
고향으로 돌아가고 싶습니다.
Aku ingin kembali ke kampung halamanku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The number of monsters here doesn't seem to change no matter how many of them we kill.
여기서 아무리 몬스터를 잡아도 도통 줄어들지 않습니다.
Jumlah dari monster sepertinya tidak berkurang walau sudah kita bunuh.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Did Julian send you off, Revelator?
계시자라니, 줄리안이 보낸 거요?
Savior, Apakah Julian yang mengirimmu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm amazed. {nl}You're the first person I've met here in several years.
그럴 리가 없어요.{nl}최근 몇 년간 이 숲에서 만난 사람은 당신이 처음인걸요.{nl}
Tidak mungkin. {nl}Kamu adalah orang pertama yang aku temui setelah beberapa tahun di hutan ini. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'll show you what I saw.
제가 본 것을 보여드릴게요.
Aku akan menunjukkan apa yang aku lihat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please, forget about me and just leave. {nl}The flowers seem to be coming along beautifully.
내 걱정은 말고 그냥 돌아가시오.{nl}아, 예쁜 꽃들이 몰려오는구먼.
Pergilah dan jangan hiraukan diriku. {nl}Ah, bunga-bunga yang indah mulai muncul.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Lena
레나
Lena

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please, tell me your life story. {nl}We follow the will of Vibora and record all that is in this world.
당신의 소중한 경험담을 들려주세요.{nl}저희 교단에서는 바이보라님의 의지에 따라 세상의 모든 것을 기록하고 있답니다.
Ceritakan aku tentang pengalamanmu.  {nl} Seperti kata Vivora, kami mencatat semua yang terjadi didunia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Henrika
헤느리카
Henryka

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hello! {nl}Welcome to the Klaipeda branch of the Magic Association. {nl}We specialize in studying the strange phenomena that occur when special items are combined.
안녕하세요. 마법협회 클라페다 지부입니다.{nl}저희는 특별한 물건들이 모일 때 벌어지는 신비한 현상에 대해 연구하고 있답니다.
Halo. Ini adalah Magical Association's cabang Klaipeda.  {nl} Kami mempelajari hal misterius yang terjadi ketika spesial item dikombinasikan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There's nothing to see here but steam and Vubbes. {nl}Wait, what's that thing with the big face that's approaching?!
여긴 아무리 봐도 습기랑 부베밖에 없는 것 같아.{nl}이런 데에서 커다란 얼굴이라니, 도대체 뭐가 튀어나왔다는 걸까?
Hanya ada uap dan Vubbes di sini.  {nl} Sesosok wajah besar muncul.. Kira-kira apa ya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: The land needs our attention as well. {nl}The world still isn't ruined... right?
나라도 정신 차려야지.{nl}아직 세상이 망한 것은 아니니.. 그렇지?
Aku harus menyadarkan diri. {nl} Dunia belum berakhir.. Bukan begitu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: If we continue to have courtesy, then we still know the way of a righteous life. {nl}We should all consider whether or not this mess is our fault because we relied on the goddesses for everything.
호의가 계속되면 그게 권리인 줄 안다는 말이 있지.{nl}어쩌면 우리가 너무 여신께만 기댄 게 화를 부른 건 아닐까 생각돼.
Saat kebaikan berlanjut, orang percaya akan mendapat kebaikan. {nl}Mungkin fakta yang ada jika kita terlalu bergantung kepada Goddess juga tidak baik bagi kita.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Bulletin Board
알림판
Bulletin Board

Please select the user requiring a quest: Welcome to the mining town of Klaipeda!
천혜의 광산도시 클라페다에 오신 것을 환영합니다!
Selamat datang di kota Tambang Klaipeda!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Indifferent Widow
담담한 미망인
Indifferent Widow

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm not sure I understand it completely, but what I'm sure of is that the goddesses didn't disappear all at once.
이유는 저도 잘 몰라요. {nl}하지만 확실한 건, 여신들께선 한꺼번에 사라지신 게 아니라는 거에요.
Aku tidak tahu alasannya  {nl} Tetapi satu hal yang pasti bahwa para Goddess tidak menghilang secara bersamaan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The first to disappear was the Goddess Gabija. {nl}I heard it was a very long time ago. {nl}One by one, starting with Gabija, they stopped replying.
제일 먼저 자취를 감추신 분은 가비야 여신이라고 해요.{nl}아주 오래 전의 일이라고 들었어요.{nl}가비야 여신을 시작으로 한 분씩 응답이 없으셨다고 해요.{nl}
Goddess pertama yang menghilang adalah Goddess Gabija.  {nl} Aku mendengar hal itu sejak lama.  {nl} Lalu setelah itu, satu per satu Goddess lain mulai tidak merespon.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Goddess Vakarine left us shortly before Medzio Diena. {nl}Both Zemyna and Ausrine disappeared soon after. {nl}It's already been four years since.
바카리네 여신께선 신수의 날 전에 사라지셨다고 하셨고요.{nl}마지막엔 제미나 여신과 아우슈리네 여신을 끝으로 모든 여신께서 사라지시고 말았죠.{nl}그게 벌써 4년 전 일이네요. {nl}
Goddess Vakarine telah menghilang sebelum Divine Day. {nl}Zemyna dan Ausrine adalah yang terakhir namun juga menghilang. {nl}Semua terjadi empat tahun lalu. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: That's right. The strangest one of all was the Goddess Laima. {nl}No one's really sure when she disappeared.
맞아요. 제일 이상한 건 라이마 여신이세요.{nl}언제 사라지신 건지 아무도 모르거든요.{nl}
Itu benar. Goddess Laima itu yang paling ganjil.  {nl} Tidak ada yang tahu kapan dia menghilang.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Besides, isn't Laima the goddess of fate and foresight? {nl}She probably knew all about it.
게다가 라이마께선 운명과 예지의 여신이시잖아요? {nl}아마 전부 알고 계시지 않았을까요?
Bukankah Goddess Laima adalah Goddess dari takdir dan kebijaksanaan?  {nl} Harusnya dia tahu semua yang akan terjadi ya kan?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Resting Soldier
휴식중인 병사
Resting Soldier

Please select the user requiring a quest: I used to be an adventurer like you. Then I took an arrow in the knee...
저도 왕년에는 당신처럼 잘 나가는 모험가였지만 무릎에 화살을 맞아서 그만..{nl}
Dulu aku juga seorang petualang seperti dirimu, namun setelah aku terkena panah itu.. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: It doesn't matter. Come and face me, you monsters!
그래도 상관없습니다. 몬스터따위 나와 보라지요!{nl}
Itu tidak penting. Hadapi aku monster!

Please select the user requiring a quest: A goddess appeared in my dream just now... {nl}She was so enchanting...
저번엔 여신께서 나오는 꿈을 꾸었는데.. {nl}얼마나 황홀하던지..{nl}
Para Goddess ada di dalam mimpiku.. {nl}Itu sangat mempesona..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Still, I have a duty to defend the kingdom. That's why I'm here.
하지만 왕국을 지켜야 하는 의무가 있기 때문에 지금 여기 있는 겁니다.
Aku mempunyai tugas untuk melindungi kerajaan ini. Itulah mengapa aku ada di sini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Uska is an old friend of mine.
우스카라면 제 오랜 친구였지요.{nl}
Uska adalah kawan lamaku.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: We did our tests to become knights together. Uska got to where he is now with my sincere support. {nl}Oh, those were some crazy days... It'd be nice to see him again.
저랑 같이 기사 시험을 봤는데, 제 헌신적인 도움으로 지금의 우스카가 될 수 있었던 거지요.{nl}아아, 그땐 참 재밌었는데.. 보고 싶다, 우스카!
Kami menjalani ujian menjadi knights bersama, dan Uska menjadi seperti sekarang karena bantuanku. {nl}Ha ha, Masa lalu yang menyenangkan..Aku merindukanmu Uska!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Just don't believe everything he says. {nl}He was known for being quite the show-off back home.
저 친구 말 너무 믿지 않는게 좋습니다.{nl}우리 동네 유명한 허풍쟁이였으니까요.{nl}
Jangan terlalu mempercayai perkataannya. {nl}Dia dikenal sebagai penipu ulung di desa kami.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Me? I find it funny, so I just leave him alone.
저요? 그냥 재밌으니까 내버려 두는 거지요.
Aku? Aku hanya meninggalkanya karena itu menyenangkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Uh, wait. I take back what I said about not believing everything he says.
음.. 너무 믿지 말란 말 취소하지요.{nl}
Umm.. Aku tarik perkataanku untuk tidak mempercayainya. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Everything that flies out of his mouth is a lie. Don't trust him.
전부 다 거짓말이니까 저 녀석 입에서 나오는 모든 말은 믿지 마세요.
Semua yang dia katakan adalah bohong, jangan mempercayainya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Siauliai Guard
샤울레이 경비병
Siauliai Guard

Please select the user requiring a quest: There are monsters beyond this point. Be careful.
여기서부턴 몬스터가 나오니 위험한 행동은 자제하시길 바랍니다.
Di luar batas ini terdapat banyak monster, berhati-hatilah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: These woods aren't exactly peaceful, but it's better than other places. {nl}There are forests that have nothing but souls roaming about.
여기 숲도 썩 평화로운 건 아닙니다만, 그래도 다른 지역보단 나을 겁니다.{nl}어떤 숲은 사람은 없고 영혼만 돌아다닌다고 하더라고요.
Tempat ini tidak begitu damai tapi setidaknya lebih baik daripada daerah lain.  {nl} Di hutan lain, tidak ada orang, yang ada hanya spirit berterbangan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This is what people who have seen a goddess in their dreams are being called.
당신처럼 여신께서 나오는 꿈을 꿨다는 사람들을 모두 계시자라고 불러요.{nl}
Orang-orang sepertimu yang bermimpi tentang Goddess, kami menyebutnya Savior.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I thought the Revelators' visions were madness at first. {nl}After all, the goddesses have been gone for a long time.
처음엔 계시자들을 보고 다들 정신이 나갔다고 생각했었어요.{nl}여신께서 자취를 감추신 지 오래되었으니까요.{nl}
Pertama kali aku pikir para Savior itu gila.  {nl} Itu mulai terjadi semenjak para Goddess menghilang.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Isn't it true that the goddesses haven't responded to any of our prayers since Medzio Diena four years ago?
4년 전의 신수의 날에도 우리들의 기도에 아무런 응답이 없으셨잖아요?
Setelah semua itu, mereka tidak pernah menjawab kami sejak 4 tahun lalu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You can find Class Masters all around the kingdom. {nl}Why don't you visit them and learn what you can?
왕국 곳곳에 각 직업의 마스터들이 계십니다.{nl}그분들을 찾아가 가르침을 받는 건 어떨까요?
Master dari tiap class berada diseluruh penjuru kerajaan.  {nl} Kenapa kamu tidak mencoba belajar dari mereka?

Please select the user requiring a quest: You don't know about Medzio Diena? You must have come from really far away. {nl}Four years ago, things went out of control at the capital.
모르세요? 진짜로 외진 곳에서 오셨나 보네요.{nl}4년 전에, 수도의 중앙에서 신수가 솟아오르면서 폭주한 일 말이에요.{nl}
Kamu tidak tahu Medzio Diena? Kamu pasti baru di area ini.  {nl} Itu adalah hari dimana divine monument di kota bagian tengah mulai kacau.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: It was a disaster... Many people were either injured or killed. {nl}Once gentle creatures turned fierce and many new monsters emerged.
그 재앙으로 인해 정말 많은 사람들이 죽거나 다쳤죠.{nl}얌전했던 몬스터들도 흉폭해지고 새로운 몬스터도 많이 생겨났어요.{nl}
Itu adalah bencana yang membuat penduduk terluka dan mati.  {nl} Bahkan monster yang baik menjadi jahat dan muncul monster lainnya.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: If you are still interested about what happened on Medzio Diena four years ago, try visiting Klaipeda. {nl}Many of its survivors took refuge there.
4년 전의 신수의 날이 더 궁금하시다면 클라페다로 가 보세요.{nl}그 때 살아남은 사람들 중에 클라페다로 피난 온 사람들이 꽤 많으니까요.
Pergilah ke Klaipeda jika kamu penasaran yang terjadi dengan Divine Tree 4 tahun lalu.  {nl} Banyak korban selamat pergi ke sana.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Eastern Woods Sentinel
동쪽 숲 경계병
Easter Woods Sentinel

Please select the user requiring a quest: Are you heading to the Eastern Woods? {nl}You mustn't! It's far too dangerous!
동쪽 숲으로 들어가시려는 겁니까? {nl}절대 가지 마세요. 위험합니다!{nl}
Apa kamu mencoba masuk ke Easter Woods? {nl}Jangan pernah ke sana. Terlalu berbahaya! {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Damn, those stubborn things chased us this far!
윽, 이 끈질긴 놈들 여기까지 쫓아오다니..!!
Uh, Mereka sangat keras kepala..!!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Those screams... We're under attack!
이 비명소리는.. 습격입니다!
Teriakan ini... Kita diserang!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Safety Instructions
안전 수칙
Peraturan keamanan

Please select the user requiring a quest: 1. Only authorized personnel may enter. {nl}2. Always follow the directions of the mining supervisor.
1. 허가받은 인원 외엔 절대 출입 금지.{nl}2. 반드시 광산 소장의 인솔 하에 움직일 것.{nl}
1. Hanya personil yang terdaftar yang bisa masuk.  {nl} 2. Hanya boleh melewati jalur yang di berikan Mine Manager.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: 3. Do not approach closed-off areas. {nl}4. Any suspicious individuals should be reported to the knights of Klaipeda.
3. 폐쇄된 구역은 절대 접근 금지. {nl}함부로 접근하려는 자를 발견 시 클라페다 기사단에 신고하시오.
3. Jangan memasuki daerah terlarang.  {nl} 4. Laporkan orang yang mencoba masuk ke Mine tanpa ijin ke Klaipeda Knight Templars.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Supply Base Soldier
보급기지 병사
Supply Base Soldier

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've never been in a real fight before so I'm a bit nervous.
실전에 익숙하지 않아 긴장됩니다.
Aku belum terbiasa dengan pertempuran nyata jadi aku agak sedikit gugup.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Farm Sentinel
농장 경계병
Farm Sentinel

Please select the user requiring a quest: My colleague is in the middle of a battle at the Miners' Village. {nl}I've thought of going to help, but the Eastern Woods is in trouble as well, so all I can do is worry.
제 동료는 광산 마을에서 교전 중입니다.{nl}생각 같아선 지원을 가고 싶지만 동쪽 숲까지 난리이니 그저 걱정입니다.
Temanku sedang bertempur di Miner's Village. {nl}Aku ingin membantunya, tapi East Forest juga sedang dalam masalah sehingga aku khawatir.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I think this mission has shown me enough monsters for a lifetime. {nl}It used to be just groups of Vubbes.
이번 임무로 평생 마주칠 몬스터는 실컷 본 것 같습니다.{nl}기껏해야 부베 정도나 몰려 다녔죠.
Aku pikir aku sudah melihat semua macam monster dalam hidupku.  {nl} Tapi ternyata itu hanya Vubbe.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Chupacabras are fond of the streams and lush vegetation of the northern area.
츄파카브라들은 주로 위쪽의 개울과 수풀이 우거진 곳을 좋아한다고 합니다.
Chupacabra suka tinggal di dekat sungai dan daerah subur di arah utara.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Klaipeda Guard Captain
클라페다 경비병 대장
Klaipeda Guard Captain

Please select the user requiring a quest: You're the...
당신이 바로..
Kamu adalah..

Please select the user requiring a quest: It looks like you can see into the upper forest from here. {nl}Try not to get into trouble.
여기서 숲 위쪽의 깊숙한 곳에서 보았다고 하더군.{nl}혹시 모르니 너무 자극하진 말고.
Aku dengar mereka terlihat di bagian dalam hutan atas.  {nl} Agar lebih aman, jangan mengusik mereka terlebih dahulu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You don't have the required quest item. Are you sure you want to continue?
퀘스트에 필요한 아이템이 없습니다. 생성 후 진행 하시겠습니까?
Kamu tidak memiliki item untuk melanjutkan quest. Apakah kamu ingin melanjutkan setelah membuat item?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Klaipeda Girl
클라페다 소녀
Klaipeda Girl

Please select the user requiring a quest: My neighbor used to be a monster hunter. {nl}He's retired now though. It has gotten extremely dangerous.
저 아저씨는 옆집에 사시는 분인데요, 예전엔 몬스터 사냥꾼이셨대요.{nl}하지만 지금은 그만 두셨대요. 너무 흉폭해서 위험하대요.
Pria itu adalah tetanggaku dan dulunya seorang monster hunter.  {nl} Tapi sekarang sudah berhenti karena monsternya semakin beringas dan berbahaya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It would be nice if all these Revelators being here meant that the goddesses are back.
계시자들이 나타났다는게 여신께서 돌아오신다는 징조라면 참 좋을 텐데요.
Aku harap kemunculan savior adalah pertanda dari kembalinya Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It might be silly to hope for the goddess' return, but it's better than nothing.
여신께만 기대는 건 바보 같은 짓이지만 기댈 곳도 없어지는 것보단 나은 것 같습니다.
Hanya bergantung pada Goddess adalah hal yang bodoh,  {nl}namun lebih baik daripada tidak bergantung pada apapun.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Klaipeda Lady
클라페다 귀부인
Klaipeda Madam

Please select the user requiring a quest: We can still grow from the land, and have a warm hearth at our homes to rest at. {nl}I will always believe the goddesses are somewhere in the world.
아직도 땅에선 작물들이 자라나고 집에선 따뜻하게 불을 피울 수 있어요.{nl}저는 아직도 여신께서 어딘가에 반드시 계실 거라고 믿고 있습니다.
Tanaman masih bisa tumbuh di tanah ini dan kita masih diberikan kehangatan di dalam rumah. {nl}Aku percaya bahwa Goddess masih ada di suatu tempat di dunia ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Keep faith. {nl}The goddesses may still send a Savior to us.
기도하세요.{nl}여신께서 우리를 구원해 줄 누군가를 보내주실 겁니다.
Tetaplah berdoa.  {nl} Agar Goddess mengirimkan seseorang untuk menyelamatkan kita.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hoplite Master
하플라이트 마스터
Hoplite Master

Please select the user requiring a quest: If the sword is a symbol of power, then the spear is that of pure destruction. {nl}Power or destruction - what would you reach for on the battlefield?
검이 권위의 상징이라면 창은 순수한 살상 무기 그 자체입니다.{nl}권위와 무기. 만약 당신이 전쟁터에 있다면 어떤 것을 드시겠습니까?
Jika sword adalah lambang kekuasaan, maka spear adalah senjata untuk menghancurkan.  {nl} Kekuasaan dan senjata. Yang mana pilihanmu jika berada di medan pertempuran?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Machine Worker
기계 제작 장인
Machine Worker

Please select the user requiring a quest: Even with the world as chaotic as it is, we can't stop working. {nl}It's been four years. Isn't it time to make peace with the past and start over?
아무리 세상이 이지경이라도 일을 놓을 순 없소.{nl}이제 4년이나 흘렀으니 마음을 추스리고 다시 시작해야하지 않겠소?
Meskipun dunia sedang kacau, aku tidak bisa bersantai. {nl}Empat tahun telah berlalu, jadi kita harus tenang dan mulai dari awal.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Klaipeda is a town that lives off its mining. {nl}With Medzio Diena, we ought to work on planting trees or cutting them.
클라페다는 광산으로 먹고 사는 도시요.{nl}신수의 날 따위로 우리가 일을 놓는다면 아마 나무나 깎아서 생활해야 할 거요.
Mining adalah mata pencaharian utama di Klaipeda.  {nl} Jika kita berhenti bekerja karena Divine Day, kita harus tetap bekerja dengan mengukir kayu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: My old man did this thing where he checked around corners for anything nice. {nl}Sometimes, he'd get lucky and find a nice treasure chest. I wonder who leaves them there.
아저씨가 그러셨는데요, 할 수만 있다면 구석구석을 잘 살피는 게 좋대요.{nl}가끔 운이 좋으면 보물상자를 발견할 수도 있다네요. 누가 갖다 놨을까?
Pamanku bilang, kamu harus teliti saat bertualang.  {nl} Terkadang, jika kamu beruntung, kamu bisa menemukan treasure chests disekitar. Kira-kira siapa yang membawanya ya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Retired Hunter
은퇴한 사냥꾼
Retired Hunter

Please select the user requiring a quest: I remember this battle in a deep canyon where soldiers fought a huge monster. {nl}Seeing the giant thing fall was amazing, but what was more amazing were the spoils.
일전에 깊은 협곡에서 병사들이 거대한 몬스터와 싸우는 걸 봤소.{nl}그 엄청난 몬스터를 쓰러뜨린 것도 대단하지만 전리품이 어마어마하더군.
Aku melihat para prajurit bertarung melawan monster besar di Deep Canyon. {nl}Aku sangat kaget mereka dapat mengalahkan monster itu, tapi aku lebih terkejut dengan hadiah yang mereka dapatkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Old Potter
도자기 빚는 노인
Old Potter

Please select the user requiring a quest: I put a prayer on my earthenware, one by one. {nl}That way, the pots will one day be filled with the goddess' blessings.
도자기 하나에 소원 하나씩 담는 것일세.{nl}그러다 보면 언젠간 여신의 은총이 이 도자기 전부에 가득 차겠지.
Aku menaruh harapan di setiap tembikar yang aku panggang. {nl}Aku melakukan ini, agar berkat dari Goddess diberikan secara penuh.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Swordsmen should have Strength, but you can also have Dexterity and Constitution. {nl}You'll need to think about what to start with.
검사 계열이라면 역시 힘이죠.{nl}하지만 민첩한 몸놀림이나 강한 체력을 키울수도 있어요.{nl}앞으로 무엇이 될 지 먼저 따져보는게 좋을 겁니다.
Class Swordsman mengutamakan Strength.  {nl} Tapi kamu juga bisa menguasai Agility atau Constitution.  {nl} Kamu harus menitik beratkan pada pilihan yang kamu inginkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Wizards work with Intelligence, but shouldn't forget Spirit for more spell-casting. {nl}You'll have to choose between being balanced or specialized.
마법사 계열이라면 역시 지능이죠.{nl}하지만 마법을 자주 사용하려면 정신력도 잊지 말아야 합니다.{nl}균형과 집중 중에서 잘 선택하셔야 해요.{nl}
ClassWizard mengutamakan Intelligence.  {nl} Namun kamu juga tidak boleh melupakan Spirit jika kamu ingin bisa menggunakan banyak magic.  {nl} Pilihlah dengan bijak antara keseimbangan dan fokus pada serangan.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Archers should have Strength, but Dexterity will prevent problems with movement. {nl}You'll need to think about what to start with.
궁수 계열이라면 역시 힘이죠.{nl}하지만 민첩한 몸놀림을 빼 놓을 순 없겠지만요.{nl}앞으로 무엇이 될 지 먼저 따져보는게 좋을 겁니다.{nl}
Class Archer mengutamakan Strength.  {nl} Namun agility juga sangat penting.  {nl} Pikirkan dengan baik jalan mana yang akan kamu tuju.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Clerics work with Intelligence, but might need a lot of Strength or Spirit. {nl}You should really decide what you want first.
성직자 계열이라면 역시 지능이죠.{nl}하지만 강한 힘이나 정신력이 필요할 수도 있어요.{nl}앞으로 무엇이 될 지 먼저 따져보는게 좋을 거예요.{nl}
Class Cleric mengutamakan Intelligence.  {nl} Tapi kamu juga butuh strength atau juga spirit.  {nl} Perkirakan kamu ingin memilih role yang seperti apa nanti.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Doppelsoeldner Master
도펠죌트너 마스터
Doppelsoldner Master

Please select the user requiring a quest: Worthwhile things always carry a degree of risk. {nl}Naturally, for big rewards, you'll have to put up with lots of danger.
위험한 일일수록 가치 있는 경우가 많지.{nl}높은 보수를 원한다면 당연히 그만한 위험을 감당해야 할 줄도 알아야 하고.
Resiko besar, Keuntungan besar. {nl}Jika kamu menginginkan keuntungan yang besar, berarti kamu harus mengambil resiko yang besar.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Corsair Master
커세어 마스터
Corsair Master

Please select the user requiring a quest: I won't help anyone in trouble if there isn't anything in it for me.
나에게 도움이 되는 일이 없다면 굳이 남을 돕는 고생을 할 필요는 없지.
Aku tidak perlu menolong orang lain jika tidak mendapatkan keuntungan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Boulder
바위
Batu Besar

Please select the user requiring a quest: A large boulder is blocking the way.
커다란 바위로 막혀있다..
Tertutup oleh batu yang besar..

Please select the user requiring a quest: (This needs to be repaired.)
망가져 수리가 필요하다..
Perlu diperbaiki..

Please select the user requiring a quest: A boulder blocks the way.
바위로 막혀있다..
Tertutup oleh batu besar..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Magical Research Material
마법 연구 자료
Magical Research Material

Please select the user requiring a quest: It appears to be someone's research notes from Mage Tower. {nl}Should it be copied?
마법사의 탑에 있던 어느 마법사가 쓴 듯한 연구 자료가 보인다.{nl}베껴갈까?
Sepertinya itu adalah bahan penelitian magic dari magician di Mage Tower. {nl}Haruskah aku salin?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hiding and sneaking won't solve all your problems. {nl}A true Scout must also be ready to fight.
은신과 잠입에만 능하다고 만사가 아냐.{nl}전투기술도 갖추고 있어야 진정한 스카우트지.
Bersembunyi dan menyusup bukanlah segalanya. {nl}Kemampuan bertempur juga dibutuhkan Scouts.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You're gonna need a lot of things when traveling. {nl}Be sure to stock up your provisions in advance.
여행을 하다 보면 사소한 물건들이 아쉬울 때가 많지요. {nl}미리 충분히 사두는 것이 좋답니다.
Kamu membutuhkan berbagai perlengkapan saat bepergian. {nl}Akan lebih baik jika kamu membeli dan mempersiapkannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: If the control magic is dispelled, the divine messages won't be protected.
제어 마법의 주문이 끊긴다면 더 이상 계시를 지킬 수 없다.
Jika spell untuk mengendalikan magic berhenti, wahyu dari Goddess  tidak bisa di lindungi lagi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Forgotten Thief's Monument
이름 모를 도둑의 비석
Unnamed Thief's Gravestone

Please select the user requiring a quest: I, Zubeck, leave this epitaph. {nl}For the honor of being the greatest thief in history, I challenged a powerful sorcerer.
나 즈벡은 이 비문을 남긴다.{nl}최고의 도둑이라는 자부심을 걸고 역사상 가장 강력하다는 마법사에게 도전할 것이다.
Aku akan meninggalkan ukiran pada batu ini. {nl}Dengan segala martabatku sebagai thief yang terhebat aku akan menantang magician terkuat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: But could I, a mere thief, claim victory by merely stealing from her? {nl}Perhaps, if I could rob the greatest archmage blind.
하지만 이 내가 도둑질만 한다고 해서 성공이라 할 수 있을까?{nl}물론 위대한 대마법사를 상대로 그 정돈 훌륭한 성공이랄수도 있겠지.{nl}
Bisakah aku bilang, bahwa aku bisa sukses hanya dengan mencuri? {nl}Sepertinya aku bisa bilang, aku bisa sukses hanya karena mencuri dari magician terhebat. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Yet, I couldn't. {nl}I wanted to be the number one thief in all of history, not just today.
하지만 나는 아니다. {nl}나는 당대 최고가 아니라 역사 제일의 도둑이고자 한다.{nl}
Tapi, Aku tidak ingin seperti itu. {nl}Aku ingin menjadi thief terhebat sepanjang masa, tidak hanya terhebat dalam masa ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I have at last discovered a way to enter the Mage Tower. {nl}To do so one has to concentrate magic power at a specific place. {nl}Now, I only need take one more decisive step.
드디어 마법사의 탑으로 들어갈 방법을 찾았다.{nl}그건 특정 장소에 마력을 응집하는 것.{nl}이제는 결행만이 남았다.
Akhirnya, Aku menemukan cara untuk masuk ke Mage Tower. {nl}Itu adalah memusatkan kekuatan magic ke suatu tempat. {nl}Sekarang, aku hanya butuh menentukan langkah yang tepat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Then, my special device will activate. {nl}If you do as I did, you will be able to enter the tower as well.
이제 곧 나의 특제 장치가 작동할 것이다.{nl}날 따라 한다면 그대도 마법사의 탑으로 들어갈 수는 있겠지.{nl}
Nanti, perangkat khusus milliku akan menyala. {nl}Jika kamu mengikuti aku, kamu juga bisa masuk ke Mage Tower. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: After that, you too can show those dumb magicians a thing or two. Haha!
물론 그 후에 멍청한 마법사들 같은 건 알아서 해야 할 것이다. 하하!
Tentu saja, setelah itu, kamu harus berhadapan dengan magician yang bodoh. Haha!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Commanding Monument
교훈의 비석
Commanding Monument

Please select the user requiring a quest: The thieves who entered this tower were burned alive. {nl}I leave this monument as a warning to other trespassers. {nl}- Agailla Flurry
남의 탑을 침입하고 남의 물건을 손댄 어리석은 도적을 불태워 죽였다.{nl}허나 그의 비석은 침입자에 대한 경고로써 남겨두는 바이다. {nl} -아가일라 플러리-
Aku membunuh thief yang masuk ke tower dan mencuri barang dengan api. {nl}Tapi, Aku meninggalkan batu nissan para thief untuk memperingatkan para penyusup. {nl} -Agailla Flurry-

Please select the user requiring a quest: Demon Queen Gesti
마왕 제스티
Demon Queen Gesti

Please select the user requiring a quest: Insolent humans.
인간 주제에 감히 내게.. {nl}
Beraninya kamu manusia biasa..  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Just you wait. This isn't the end. {nl}Pray with your heart that Laima will save this world.
두고 보아라. 아직 끝나지 않았으니까.{nl}라이마가 이 세계를 구하길 마음껏 빌어 보거라.
Tunggu dan lihatlah. Ini belum selesai. {nl}Berdoa pada Laima agar menyelamatkan dunia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Klaipeda Officer
클라페다 안내병
Klaipeda Officer

Please select the user requiring a quest: Welcome, welcome. {nl}Sir Uska is waiting at Klaipeda's central square. {nl}Oh, did you need anything else first?
어서 오시죠. 우스카님이 클라페다 중앙 광장에서 기다리고 계십니다.{nl}참, 미처 숙지하지 못한 사항이 있으십니까?
Selamat Datang. Uska telah menunggu di Klaipeda middle square. {nl}Adakah sesuatu yang tidak kamu mengerti?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Do you want to head to Klaipeda's gate right away?
클라페다 입구로 바로 이동하고 싶은 건가?{nl}잘 생각해 보게.
Apa kamu ingin segera ke Klaipeda sekarang juga?  {nl} Pikirkan baik-baik.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Temporary Operator
임시운영자
Temporary Operator

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please change this character's status.
이 캐릭터의 상태값을 바꿔주세요

NPC HIDE/UNHIDE설정!
NPC HIDE/UNHIDE Setting!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Follower Algis
추종자 알기스
Follower Algis

Please select the user requiring a quest: The moment that the goddess foretold to the first Paladin has finally arrived. {nl}Come. Ask me anything.
여신께서 초대 팔라딘에게 예견하신 순간이 찾아왔군.{nl}자, 뭐든 물어 보려므나.
Waktunya sudah tiba dimana Goddess meramalkan tentang Paladin pertama. {nl}Oke, silahkan bertanya padaku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: A long, long time ago, there were nomads who suffered from a cursed plague. {nl}The honorable first Paladin removed the curse with a Holy Relic.
아주 먼 옛날에 역병의 저주를 받은 유목민이 떠돌고 있었단다.{nl}초대 팔라딘님께서 그들의 저주를 치유의 성물로 끊어 주셨어.{nl}
Dahulu kala, ada pengembara, yang terkena kutukan dan penyakit, berjalan di sekitar. {nl}Sang Paladin pertama menyembuhkan kutukan mereka dengan Divine Water.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Watchers are the descendants of those nomads. {nl}However, the Holy Relic was not meant for healing those people.
파수꾼들이 바로 그 유목민들의 후예이지.{nl}하지만 성물의 본래 목적은 치유가 아니야.{nl}{nl}
Scouts adalah keturunan para pengembara. {nl}Tapi, fungsi utama dari Divine Water bukanlah untuk menyembuhkan orang itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: One day, the goddess requested the first Paladin to safeguard a divine revelation. {nl}The cursed nomads appeared just as the paladin mulled on how to keep it secret.
어느 날, 여신께선 초대 팔라딘에게 계시를 부탁하셨지.{nl}이걸 어떻게 감출까 고민하던 차에 나타난 게 저주받은 유목민이였어.{nl}
Suatu hari, Sang Goddess meminta kepada Paladin pertama untuk menjaga wahyu. {nl}Saat dia berpikir bagaimana cara menyembunyikannya, para pengembara yang terkutuk mulai muncul. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: They and the first Paladin made three pledges before breaking the curse.
초대 팔라딘님께선 저주를 끊어 주는 조건으로 세 가지 맹약을 내거셨지.{nl}
Sang Paladin pertama berjanji untuk menghentikan kutukan itu kepada ketiga pengembara. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: To build the Tenet Church together. {nl}To conceal the Holy Relic within these grounds and worship its holiness. {nl}To gather and fight together when danger comes close to this location.
테넷 성당을 함께 지을 것. {nl}치유의 성물을 이 땅에 감춰 두고 성스럽게 모실 것.{nl}이 땅에 위험이 닥칠 때 함께 힘을 모아 싸울 것.{nl}
Untuk membangun Tenet Church bersama.  {nl}Untuk menyembunyikan Divine Water di tanah ini dan menyimpannya. {nl}Untuk bertempur bersama saat terjadi krisis di tanah ini. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: All this, was to protect the revelation hidden in the sanctum of the Tenet Church.
이게 다 테넷 성당의 성소에 감춰져 있는 계시를 지키기 위한 거란다.
Semua ini dilakukan untuk melindungi wahyu yang tersimpan di Tenet Cathedral Shrine.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Holy Relic was originally made to protect the revelation as a bait. {nl}With it, we will lure the Demon Queen here and destroy her.
치유의 성물은 본디 계시를 지키려고 만들어진 거란다.{nl}이걸로 마왕을 유인해서 해치우는 것이지.{nl}
Divine Water diciptakan untuk melindungi wahyu. {nl}Dibuat untuk menarik perhatian Demon Queen dan menghancurkannya. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Anything can happen though. {nl}If the plan fails, then the final battle will likely happen in the Tenet Church.
하지만 모든 건 만약이라는 게 있기 마련이거든.{nl}이 작전이 실패한다면 최후의 결전이 벌어질 장소는 아마 테넷 성당이 될 게야.
Selalu ada kata jika. {nl}Jika strategi ini gagal, dan tidak dapat dihindari pertempuran final akan terjadi di Chapel.

Gesti bilang kepada kita untuk melindungi tempat ini.

Explaining

Please select the user requiring a quest: Shared the details of the revelation fragment found in the Crystal Mine.
수정광산에서 얻은 계시의 내용의 일부를 알려주었다
Aku memberitahu bagian dari wahyu yang aku dapatkan di Crystal Mine.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know how great you were in the past nor do I care. {nl}In here, you follow the Royal Army's orders, even you, Knights of Kaliss. {nl}In here, our word is law!
당신의 과거행적이 얼마나 빛나는지 모르겠습니다만 여기선 왕국군의 통제를 따라 주셔야합니다.{nl}칼리스 기사단도 마찬가지 입니다. 여기선 왕령에 따라 우리가 곧 법입니다.
Aku tidak tahu seberapa hebat kamu di luar sana  {nl}tapi di sini, kamu harus mengikuti peraturan dari kerajaan.  {nl}Sama seperti Kalis Knights. Kami adalah hukum di sini

Please select the user requiring a quest: Grave Robber Hubertas
도굴꾼 후베르타스
Grave Thief Juvertas

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hanging around in these ruins is driving me insane. {nl}Why the heck did he come here anyway?
이런 황폐한 곳에서 며칠씩 기다리고 있으려니 내가 미쳐가는 게 느껴져.{nl}형님은 대체 왜 안 오시는 거야!
Sepertinya aku bisa gila jika tinggal di tempat yang hancur ini selama beberapa hari. {nl}Kenapa dia belum juga datang!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Grave Robber Benjaminas
도굴꾼 벤자미나스
Thief Benjaminas

Please select the user requiring a quest: People call us grave robbers, but we prefer to call ourselves... archaeologists, {nl}scavenging and making use of all these items no one uses anymore. {nl}It sure beats leaving them to rot, right?
우린 스스로를 고고학자라고 부르고 싶어하지만 다들 도굴꾼이라고 하지요.{nl}주인없는 물건들이 제가치를 찾을 수 있는 곳으로 옮겨주는 일은 어쩔땐 여신을 대변하기까지 합니다.{nl}누구에게나 여기 이렇게 굳어서 풍화되어 사라져가는 것보단 훨씬 나을 거에요.
Kami ingin menyebut diri kami sebagai archeologists, tapi semua orang menyebut kami pencuri. {nl}Memanfaatkan object yang tidak dimiliki oleh seorangpun adalah sesuatu yang sangat berharga. {nl}Itu lebih baik daripada membiarkannya di sini hingga rusak dan membusuk.

Please select the user requiring a quest: A Citizen's Journal
어느 시민의 일기
A Citizen's Journal

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's been a year since the civil war broke out. Prices in town have risen dramatically. {nl}Commander Ruklys has sent for aid, to restore the town's dwindling supplies. {nl}It's been a while since we've had any good news. There's talk about King Kadumel going after the general. {nl}Mood's not going to change soon.
내전이 발발한 지 1년이란 시간이 지났다. 도시의 물가가 무척 올랐다. 루클리스 장군께서는 병참물자를 내놓아 부족한 도시의 물자를 보충한다고 한다. 그러나 모처럼 좋은 소식에도 카듀멜 국왕이 루클리스 장군을 노리고 친정을 하려 한다는 소문이 돌아서 사람들의 분위기는 그다지 좋지 않다.
Waktu telah berlalu 1 tahun setelah Perang sipil terjadi. harga barang di kota naik sungguh banyak. Jendral Ruklys mengatakan akan mendistribusikan persediaan yang dibutuhkan ke kota yang kekurangan. Tetapi Raja Kardumel yang mendengar berita baik ini, bermaksud mengincar Jendral Ruklys dan beredar kabar bahwa ia bermaksud pulang ke rumah, dan membuat keadaan dari orang-orang di sekitar menjadi tidak baik.

Please select the user requiring a quest: A Sentry's Report
어느 파수병의 일지
A Sentry's Report

Please select the user requiring a quest: The guard posts have been reinforced in response to King Kadumel's forces' movements in the country. {nl}It's been confirmed that the king commands a large army. {nl}But if General Hayatin can muster enough volunteer soldiers, the incompetent king will likely surrender or retreat.
카듀멜 국왕이 친정하면서 전황이 급박해져 초소의 경비가 더 강화되었다. 무능한 카듀멜이 많은 병력을 이끌고 온 것은 사실이지만. 하야틴 장군께서 지원병을 이끌고 오신다면 카듀멜은 항복하거나 도망치게 될 것이다.
Raja Kardumel sambil mengontrol kerajaan, juga memperkuat penjagaan dari Post karena kondisi peperangan semakin kritis. Adalah benar Kardumel yang inkompeten memimpin banyak pasukan datang. Tetapi jika Jendral Hayatin memimpin pasukan bantuan datang, maka Kardumel akan menyerah atau melarikan diri.

Please select the user requiring a quest: A Trader's Log
어느 상인의 일기
A Trader's Log

Please select the user requiring a quest: The city is running out of food and supplies. {nl}(The rest is illegible.)
도시에 식량과 물자가 바닥나고 있다. (이하는 판독불능)
Makanan dan supply di kota hampir habis. (Sisanya tidak dapat dibaca)

Please select the user requiring a quest: Rumor has it that Ruklys has heard about the citizens' harsh conditions {nl}and is negotiating with Kadumel for their amnesty.
시민들이 겪는 고난이 심하다는 보고를 듣고 루클리스 장군께서 시민의 안전을 조건으로 카듀멜과 협상을 한다는 소문이 들린다.
Ada rumor bahwa General Ruklys sedang bernegosiasi dengan King Kadumel demi keamanan penduduk.

Please select the user requiring a quest: An Officer's Record
어느 장교의 기록
An Officer's Record

Please select the user requiring a quest: Premier Eminent is in talks with Commander Ruklys. {nl}We may have to move to the Fortress of the Land and let the royal forces claim the city. {nl}It's good news for the civilians at least. Despite the town being conceded, the Fortress will not be taken as easily.
재상인 프리미어 에미넌트가 루클리스 장군과 협상에 응했다고 한다. 협상에 따라 우리는 대지의 요새로 전부 이동하고 도시는 왕실군에게 내어줄 것이란 말이 들린다. 시민들을 생각하면 어쩌면 잘 된 일일 수도 있다. 도시는 양보했지만, 대지의 요새는 적에게 간단히 내줄 만큼 약한 곳이 아니다.
Perdana menteri Premier Eminenat, katanya telah menanggapi negosiasi dengan Jendral Ruklys. Sesuai dengan negosiasi, maka kami semua bergerak ke Earth Castle, terdengar kabar bahwaKota akan diserahkan kepada pasukan raja. Jika memikirkan penduduk biasa mungkin juga bisa menjadi sesuatu yang baik untuk mereka. Untuk kota mungkin dapat dimengerti, tetapi menyerahkan Earth Castle sepertinya tidak akan terjadi dengan mudah begitu saja.

Please select the user requiring a quest: King Kadumel is keen on persecuting the townspeople. {nl}The premier is pushing Commander Ruklys to negotiate terms ensuring that the civilians are safe from enemy forces. {nl}Despite the royal forces occupying the town, there has yet to be any threatening movement.
카듀멜 국왕이 도시민들을 처벌하라고 고집을 부린다고 한다. 재상인 에미넌트가 그것을 간신히 말리고 루클리스 장군과 협상한 내용대로 도시의 안전을 보장하느라 애쓰고 있다고 한다. 도시를 점령한 왕실군대도 일단은 크게 위협적인 행동을 하지는 않고 있다.
Raja Kardumel sedang bersikeras untuk menghukum warga penduduk kota. Perdana Menteri Eminent dengan mudah menghentikan hal itu, dan sesuai dengan isi negosiasi dengan Jendral Ruklys, bahwa ia berusaha untuk menjamin keamanan kota. Pasukan tentara raja yang menguasai kota pun, tidak melakukan tindakan apapun yang mengancam.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We should wait until Kostas gets here. {nl}We have a lot to do, so it'd be nice if he gets here soon.
코스타스님이 오실 때까지 여기 이러고 있어야 합니다. {nl}안 그래도 할일이 많은데 빨리 좀 돌아오시면 좋겠어요.
Kita harus tetap di sini hingga Kostas datang. {nl}Banyak hal yang harus dilakukan, semoga saja mereka cepat datang ke sini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Cryomancer Kostas
크리오맨서 코스타스
Cryomancer Kostas

Please select the user requiring a quest: Everything will be resolved when the Symbol of Silk is found. {nl}With it, we can revive the city.
실크의 징표만 다시 되찾는다면 모든 걸 해결할 수 있네.{nl}도시를 되돌릴 수 있다는 말이지.
Jika kita dapat menemukan Symbol of Silk, semua akan baik-baik saja. {nl}Kita dapat membangun kota kembali.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Grave Robber Rudolfas
도굴꾼 루돌파스
Graverobber Rudolpas

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Royal Army and the Knights of Kaliss... I think we've struck gold. {nl}No one's around here or calling this place home any more.
왕국군과 칼리스 기사단, 우리 도굴꾼들이 절묘한 균형을 이룬다고 생각해{nl}그나마 사람들이 돌아다닐 수 있는 거지.. 그 전엔 잠시도 있을 곳이 못 됐지.
Pasukan Kerajaan dan Knights of Kaliss...Sepertinya, kita menemukan emas. {nl}Tidak ada seorang pun di sini..kita bisa menyebut daerah ini rumah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: A Royal Officer's Record
왕국군 장교의 기록
A Royal Officer's Record

Please select the user requiring a quest: There has been no progress since Ruklys' group retreated to the Fortress of the Land. {nl}The priests under Maven's direction are reluctant to fight, and the King is hiring mages by paying them a hefty sum. {nl}But we expect little to no progress at all even after their participation.
루클리스 일당이 대지의 요새로 후퇴한 후로 더 이상의 진전이 없는 상황이다. 메이번의 입김을 받은 성직자들이 참전에 소극적이자 국왕께서는 마법사들을 거액을 들여 고용하여 전세를 바꾸려 노력중이나 그들의 참전에도 별다른 진전은 없을 것이란 예감이 든다.
Grup Ruklys setelah mundur dari Earth Castle, berada dalam kondisi tidak ada pergerakan lebih jauh. Para priest yang mendapat pengaruh dari Myvern, bertindak pasif dalam peperangan, sehingga raja mengeluarkan uang banyak untuk merekrut para penyihir,  dan berusaha keras untuk mengubah posisi peperangan, tetapi terasa mereka tidak membawa kemajuan apapun dalam peperangan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Townsperson's Document
도시 주민의 기록
Townsperson's Document

Please select the user requiring a quest: How could this happen?! {nl}Lydia Schaffen is aiding Kadumel's forces!
어떻게 이럴 수가! 리디아 샤펜이 카듀멜 군을 돕고 나섰다고 한다.
Bagaimana ini bisa terjadi! Lydia Schaffen akan membantu prajurit Kadumel.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Army Official's Report
왕국군 행정관의 기록
Army Official's Report

Please select the user requiring a quest: Lydia Schaffen, a person I've only heard of in rumors, came to the city with her followers. {nl}The officers and soldiers expect she'll change the tide of the battle. {nl}}His Majesty ordered us to support her to the best of our ability.
소문으로만 듣던 리디아 샤펜이 그녀의 추종자들을 끌고 도시에 들어왔다. 장교들과 병사들은 그녀의 참전이 고착된 전세를 바꿔줄 것이라 큰 기대를 하고 있다. 국왕 폐하께서도 그녀의 접대에 소흘함이 없도록 하라는 칙령을 수차례 내리셨다.
Lydia Schaffen, nama yang sering aku dengar dalam rumor, datang ke kota bersama pengikutnya. Para petugas dan prajurit mengharapkan bahwa dia dapat merubah situasi pertempuran ini. Dia memerintahkan kita untuk membantu dengan segala kemampuan yang ada.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Citizen's Record
시민의 기록
Citizen's Record

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Fortress of the Land has fallen! It's all over...
대지의 요새가 함락 되다니! 이제 끝났어..
The Great Earth Fortress telah kalah! Sekarang semua sudah berakhir..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Commander Ruklys has fallen in battle, and the Fortress of the Land has been taken. {nl}Some people say the commander died to Lydia Schaffen's arrow, and others say he died to the royal magicians' magic. {nl}It is indeed sad news.
대지의 요새가 함락되고 루클리스 장군께서 전사하셨다고 한다. 리디아 샤펜의 화살에 죽었다고도 하고, 왕실 마법사의 마법에 당했다고도 하고 소문이 여러 가지라 정확한 사실은 모르지만, 돌아가신 것은 확실한 모양이다. 하늘이 무너진 듯하다.
General Ruklys telah mati dan Great Earth Fortress hancur. Beberapa orang bilang dia mati terkena panah dari Lydia Schaffen's, yang lain bilang dia mati karena serangan magic dari royal magicians. Sudah bisa dipastikan dan itu berita yang menyedihkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: To support the Knights of Kaliss, I was dispatched here from the head office. {nl}If you've any concerns, visit the headquarters in the Square of Lamentation.
칼리스 기사단을 지원하기 위해 본부에서 떨어져 나와 이런 곳에 있습니다.{nl}궁금한 것이 있다면 통곡의 광장에 있는 본부 쪽으로 알아보시기 바랍니다.
Untuk membantu Knights of Kaliss, aku berpindah dari headquarters ke sini. {nl}Jika kamu punya pertanyaan, silahkan bertanya ke headquarters di Square of Lamentation.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The higher-ups in the Knights of Kaliss are spending a lot on this place. I'm not sure how to feel about that. {nl}To make matters worse, grave robbers are here, so we're just waiting for support.
상관의 명령으로 칼리스 기사단들 때문에 이런 곳에서 경비를 선다는 게 어떤 기분인지 당신은 모를 겁니다.{nl}엎친 데 덮친 격으로 도굴꾼 녀석들이 활개치는 바람에 본부에서 지원이 나오길 기다리고 있습니다.
Rasanya tidak enak berjaga di sini karena ada Knights of Kaliss. {nl}Dan juga, thieves berlarian di sekitar, jadi kita harus menunggu bantuan dari headquarters.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Up until now, I've only seen the cursed figures of the fallen. Now that I'm here, that's going to change.
지금까진 시간이 모두 사라진 이 저주받은 형상들만 봐왔지만 제가 온 이상 다를 것입니다.
Sampai sekarang, aku hanya melihat ada tanda kutukan yang menyelimuti mereka, namun semua akan berubah semenjak aku datang ke sini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Will lifting this city's curse bring back the dead? {nl}I doubt it, but our lords have put great effort into retaking this area. {nl}They've done all they could for that purpose.
이 도시에 저주가 풀리면 죽은 사람들도 돌아올까요? {nl}아니겠죠. 하지만 우리 영주님들을 대대로 이곳을 다시 되찾고자 많은 노력을 하셨습니다.{nl}그리고 수단과 방법을 가지지 않으셨죠.
Akan mengangkat kutukan kota ini membawa kembali orang mati? {Nl} Aku ragu, tapi tuan kami telah melakukan upaya besar untuk merebut kembali daerah ini. {Nl} Mereka telah melakukan semua yang mereka bisa untuk tujuan itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Grave Robber Stephonas
도굴꾼 스테포나스
Graverobber Stephonas

Please select the user requiring a quest: We're different from those other grave-robbing hooligans. {nl}They've no pride or business sense! {nl}If you help us now, we'll return the favor someday soon.
우린 디코 도굴단 녀석들처럼 상도도 모르는 건달들과는 다르다구{nl}이번에 도와준다면 언젠가 꼭 이 빚은 갚도록 하지.
Kami berbeda dengan grave-robbing hooligans lain.  {nl} Mereka tidak punya kebanggaan atau pun jiwa bisnis.  {nl}Jika kamu menolong kami, akan kami balas suatu hari nanti.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Royal Army Guard Rofdel
왕국군 로프델
Royal Army Guard Rofdel

Please select the user requiring a quest: You can see all sorts of things happening from this watchtower even if it's as if time in the city has stopped. {nl}The dust usually gets in the way, but you can see all the way to Ruklys' paths when it rains.
망루에서 지켜보고 있으면 시간이 멈춘듯한 이 도시에도 온갖 종류의 사건들이 매일 일어나고 있다는 걸 알게됩니다.{nl}평소엔 돌먼지가 흩날려서 보이지 않지만 비라도 한 번 내리면 루클리스 거리까지 훤히 보이죠.
Kamu dapat melihat seluruh kota dari atas tower, bahkan melihat kejadian yang sedang terjadi di kota seakan waktu telah berhenti {nl}Walaupun terhalang debu, kamu bisa melihat jalan menuju Ruklys ketika hujan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We've worked for centuries to revive these ruins. {nl}With your help, we might be able to learn about that day and finally succeed.
우린 이 폐허를 다시 되살리기 위해 수백년 동안 노력했습니다.{nl}당신의 도움이 있다면 분명 그날의 일들을 밝혀내고 이 도시를 회생시킬 수 있을 겁니다.
Sudah ratusan tahun kami mencoba untuk memperbaiki reruntuhan ini. {nl}Jika kamu bisa membantu, kita dapat mencari tahu apa yang terjadi pada waktu itu dan menghidupkan kota ini lagi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Bokor Edita
보코르 에디타
Bokor Edita

Please select the user requiring a quest: There is definitely a curse here. I'm sure of it.
이건 분명 저주에요. 제 모든걸 걸고 밝혀내고야 말겠어요.
Sudah pasti ini adalah kutukan. Dengan segala keyakinanku, aku menemukan kenyataan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Alchemist Saliamonas
알케미스트 살리아모나스
Alchemist Saliamonas

Please select the user requiring a quest: This place is truly intriguing. This city is brimming with things to study and experiment on.
여긴 참 흥미로운 곳이로군. 연구할 것들이 도시 안에 널려있어
Ini tempat yang cukup menarik. Kota ini penuh dengan banyak hal yang bisa di pelajari dan diteliti.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Grave Robber Amanda
도굴꾼 아만다
Graverobber Amanda

Please select the user requiring a quest: Our family's different from those other grave-robbing animals. {nl}We might bend a few rules to make a living, but still...
우리 식구들은 디코 도굴단같은 들짐승들과는 달라.{nl}물론 살기 위해 법을 조금 어기고 있지만
Keluarga kami berbeda dengan para Dico thieves yang lain. {nl}Tentunya, agar kami bisa hidup, kami juga harus melanggar beberapa peraturan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Are the soldiers already dead? {nl}I've never seen the Petrifying Frost as strange as this before. {nl}It's like everyone in the city is trying to hide something by reliving that day.
벌써 죽은 병사들이 있습니까?{nl}이렇게 불규칙한 석화서리는 정말 처음입니다.{nl}도시 전체가 뭔가를 숨기기 위해 그날을 다시 재현하려는 것 같아요.
Apakah ada prajurit yang mati? {nl}Aku belum pernah melihat Frost Stone yang aneh seperti ini sebelumnya. {nl}Semua orang sepertinya ingin mengembalikan kota untuk menyembunyikan sesuatu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: High Speed Movement
쾌속 이동
High Speed Movement

Please select the user requiring a quest: Torn Letter
찢어진 편지
Torn Letter

Please select the user requiring a quest: To my beloved brother in Fedimian...
사랑하는 오빠에게, 페디미안에서..
Untuk saudara laki-lakiku tercinta di Fedimian…

Please select the user requiring a quest: Gesti has sensed it. Stay calm. It is not yet time.
제스티가 알아챘군.{nl}침착하거라. 아직 기회는 있어.
Gesti ditemukan. {nl}Tetap tenang. Ini masih bukan saat yang tepat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Off-duty Supply Trooper
휴가중인 보급병
Off-duty Supply Trooper

Please select the user requiring a quest: I have no idea what the royal household is doing. {nl}I even heard that the nobles have already fled the town.
도대체 이 나라 왕실은 뭘 하는 건지 모르겠네요.{nl}듣자 하니 높으신 분들 먼저 다 도망쳤다던데요?
Aku tidak tahu apa yang dilakukan Royal Family.  {nl} Bahkan yang aku dengar para bangsawan juga telah melarikan diri.

Please select the user requiring a quest: In times like these, it's good to craft and use your own things rather than buying stuff. {nl}I was originally a supply trooper, but that work's not much different from a blacksmith's.
지금같은 때엔 상점에서 물건을 사는 것보다 직접 만들어 쓰는 게 더 낫습니다.{nl}전 원래 보급병입니다만, 하는 일은 대장장이 노릇이나 거의 다를 게 없었죠.
Dalam situasi yang seperti ini, lebih baik kamu membuat barang yang kamu butuhkan daripada membeli di shop.  {nl} Sebenarnya aku adalah seorang supply trooper, tapi hampir sama seperti blacksmith.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Follower Norma
추종자 노마
Follower Norma

Please select the user requiring a quest: I was not aware that you were the one who accepted our request, Revelator. {nl}It is truly an honor.
저희의 의뢰를 받아주신 분이 소문으로만 듣던 계시자님일 줄은 몰랐습니다.{nl}정말 영광입니다!
Aku tidak tahu kalau orang yang menerima permintaan dari kami adalah kamu, sang Savior. {nl}Itu adalah suatu kehormatan bagi kami.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Gesti's demons keep attacking relentlessly. {nl}Their dark influence has reached the Panto that live here.
제스티의 마족들이 계속해서 공격해오고 있습니다.{nl}그런데 이곳에 서식 중인 판토들에게까지 그 마수를 뻗친 모양입니다.{nl}
Demon Gesti  terus menyerang. {nl}Pengaruh jahat mereka telah mempengaruhi Panto yang hidup di sekitar sini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Panto were once docile, but now they charge and attack on sight.
판토는 원래 본성이 선하고 느긋했었는데 지금은 저희를 보기만 해도 죽이려 달려들잖습니까.
Panto dulunya jinak, tapi sekarang mereka akan mencoba membunuh kita saat melihatnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There is a tree here that the Panto worship. {nl}If this is happening, that tree has almost certainly been corrupted by a dark power.
이곳에 판토들이 숭배하는 나무가 있습니다.{nl}아마도 그 나무가 사악한 기운에 오염되어 이런 일이 벌어진 게 분명합니다.{nl}
Ada sebuah pohon yang dipuja oleh para Panto. {nl}Mungkin ini terjadi karena pohon itu terkontaminasi oleh kekuatan jahat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please protect the Romuvan barrier at the top of the valley. {nl}We will take care of the rest when our brothers arrive here.
그들에게서 이 계곡 꼭대기에 있는 로무바 결계를 지켜주세요.{nl}나머지 뒤처리는 형제들이 도착하면 저희가 마무리 짓겠습니다.
Tolong lindungi Romuvan Barrier yang berada di puncak bukit. {nl}Sisanya akan kami urus saat saudara kami telah tiba.

Please select the user requiring a quest: May the goddess bless you.
당신에게 여신의 가호가 있기를..
Semoga Goddess memberkatimu..

Please select the user requiring a quest: I want to get some action. {nl}I haven't seen a fight in a long while.
어디 가서 한바탕 뒹굴고 싶군.{nl}요즘 전투다운 전투를 해본 적이 없어.
Aku ingin terjun dan beraksi di suatu tempat. {nl}Belakangan ini aku tidak pernah terlibat pertempuran.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We're still preparing. {nl}Please wait a little longer.
아직 준비 중입니다.{nl}조금만 기다려주십시오.
Kami masih mempersiapkannya. {nl}Mohon tunggu sejenak.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Antares
안타레스
Antares

Please select the user requiring a quest: What? You still try and disturb my experiments? {nl}I will not allow this!
뭐야. 또 내 실험을 방해하려고?{nl}그렇게 놔둘 순 없지.
Apa. Apa kamu ingin mengganggu eksperimenku lagi? {nl}Aku tidak akan membiarkan hal itu terjadi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Be careful! I'm sure this is Antares' work. It'll explode if you get too close. {nl}You'd better lure the monsters and remove them one at a time.
조심해! 분명 이건 안타라스 짓이 틀림없어.{nl}가까이 다가가면 폭발할 거야.{nl}몬스터를 유인해서 하나하나 제거하는 게 좋겠어.
Waspadalah! Ini pasti ulah Antares. Saat mendekat  {nl}, itu akan meledak.  {nl} Pancing para monster dan ledakkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: When I release this valve, my grand experiment will be complete and you'll see a most spectacular sight!
이 벨브를 다 열어버리면 내 위대한 실험은 완성된다.{nl}아주 멋진 장면을 감상할 수 있을 거다.
Saat aku buka kran ini, eksperimen milikku akan sempurna. {nl}Kamu akan melihat sesuatu yang spektakuler.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Don't interrupt me while I stabilize the Jewels of Prominence.
내가 홍염의 보석을 안정시키는 동안 방해받지 않도록 보호해줘.
Tolong lindungi aku selagi menstabilkan Jewel of Prominence.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You still don't get it? If it weren't for Antares, I'd be spending my life as a human. {nl}That's right. I'm a demon.
뭐야, 아직도 상황 파악이 덜 된건가?{nl}안타레스가 아니였으면 아마 평생 인간으로 살았을 거야.{nl}맞아. 난 마족이야.{nl}
Apa, kamu masih tidak mengerti tentang situasinya? {nl}Jika bukan karena Antares, seharusnya aku masih hidup sebagai manusia. {nl}Benar sekali. Aku seorang demon. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Indeed... the Jewels of Prominence were hard to make, and it would be nice to see the final product for once. {nl}It's naturally my favorite, but I don't know about you. Hahaha...
그래.. 홍염의 보석을 만드느라 수고했으니 결과물을 한번 봐야겠지?{nl}난 정말 마음에 드는데 너는 어떠려나 모르겠네, 후후후..
Ya.. Usaha yang besar telah dikeluarkan untuk membentuk Jewel of Prominence jadi menurutku aku harus memeriksa output? {nl}Aku sangat ingin melakukannya, tapi aku tidak tahu bagaimana kamu akan meresponnya, Huhuhu..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Do you know about the Demon Lord, Helgasercle? {nl}I've read that she attacked the Mage Tower several times in the past.
헬가 세르클이라는 마군주에 대해서 알아?{nl}책에서 봤는데 예전에도 몇 번인가 이 마법사의 탑의 공략에 나섰었대.{nl}
Kamu tahu Demon Lord, Helgacercle?  {nl} Aku pernah membaca dia menyerang Mage Tower beberapa kali di masa lalu.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: She'll continue to grow stronger until her envy wanes. {nl}But she was defeated every time she came, so I wonder if she succeeded this time.
그녀는 계속해서 강해지거든. 질투가 멈출 때까지 말야.{nl}하지만 그때마다 번번이 물리쳤다는데 설마 이번에도 왔을까 싶어.{nl}
Dia akan menjadi semakin kuat kecuali dia bisa mengendalikan amarahnya. {nl}Tapi, biasanya dia bisa mengalahkannya jadi aku penasaran bagaimana hasilnya. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Look out! Behind you!
뒤를 보세요! 바로 뒤에서 오고 있어요!
Lihat ke belakangmu! Sesuatu datang dari belakang!

Please select the user requiring a quest: I hope this revelation will reach you under the blessings of fire... {nl} I'll begin by trying to foresee the disasters that will occur in your time.
이 계시가 불의 가호 아래 당신께 건네질 수 있기를 바라면서..{nl}이제부터 당신의 시대에 일어날 재앙에 대해 예언하려고 합니다.{nl}
Aku harap wahyu ini dapat tersampaikan kepadamu dalam perlindungan api.. {nl}Aku meramalkan akan terjadi bencana pada hidupmu. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Since the dawn of time, the World Tree has grown beneath the earth, breathing life into being. {nl}It is the root of all things.
모든 것의 근원.. {nl}세계수는 땅 속 깊은 곳에서 이 땅에 생명의 힘을 불어넣어주는 태고의 존재이지요.{nl}
Sejak awal..The World Tree tumbuh di bawah permukaan bumi. Membuat nafas kehidupan. {nl}Ini adalah sumber segalanya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Giltine is setting the stage for a disaster by turning the World Tree's essence upon itself.{nl}By reversing the flow of life's energy, the World Tree retakes it and grows to a tremendous scale.
길티네는 재앙을 일으키고자 세계수의 원리를 역전시킵니다.{nl}생명의 힘을 공급하던 세계수는 거꾸로 모든 힘을 빨아들여 폭발적으로 성장하겠지요.{nl}
Giltine, membalikan kemampuan dari World Tree.  {nl} World Tree yang tadinya memberikan sumber kehidupan yang tidak terbatas, menjadi penghisap kehidupan.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The rampaging World Tree will rip through the land, bringing disaster to all. {nl}Indeed, the Divine Tree you see in your time is in fact the World Tree.
폭주하는 세계수는 땅을 뚫고 나와 거대한 재앙을 이 땅에 강림시킵니다.{nl}그렇습니다. 당신의 시대에서 신수라고 불리우는 것이 바로 세계수입니다.{nl}
Kemarahan The World Tree akan menghancurkan tanah ini. Membawa bencana bagi semua. {nl}Ya. Divine Tree yang kamu lihat sebenarnya adalah The World Tree. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The catastrophe will not end there. {nl}You have surely seen the Tree Root Crystals.
재앙은 그것으로 끝나지 않습니다.{nl}이미 뿌리 끝에 달린 결정을 보셨겠지요.{nl}
Malapetaka tidak akan berakhir sampai disini. {nl}Kamu seharusnya sudah melihat crystal yang berada di ujung akar pohon.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The demons transformed them to easily consume the spirits and aid in the Tree's growth. {nl}Because of this, many new monsters will be born, armed with even greater ferocity.
그것은 마족들이 세계수의 생장을 돕기 위해 영혼마저 쉽게 삼킬 수 있도록 변화시킨 것입니다.{nl}이를 위해 많은 몬스터가 새로이 생겨나고 더욱 흉폭해질 것입니다.{nl}
Para Demon mengubahnya agar menelan jiwa-jiwa dan memperkuat pohon itu. {nl}Karena hal itu, banyak monster terlahir dan semakin buas. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: When I learned of it all, my remaining strength could not cope with the great calamity. {nl}The prophecy sent to Zachariel of the capital's demise was forgotten, due to the demons' scheming.
제가 이 모든 것을 알았을 땐 이 재앙에 대처할 힘 조차 남아있지 않았습니다.{nl}자카리엘에게 전해 준 수도 이전의 예언도 마족의 간계에 그만 잊혀지고 말았지요.{nl}
Saat aku mengetahui semuanya, Aku tidak punya cukup kekuatan untuk menahan malapetaka ini. {nl}Sejumlah ramalan yang aku kirimkan pada Zachariel telah terlupakan karena rencana jahat para demon. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The World Tree will continue to grow. {nl}To what end... is beyond my control.
세계수는 지금도 계속해서 성장하고 있습니다.{nl}그 끝은.. 저의 힘으로 가늠할 수 없는 수준에 이르렀습니다.{nl}
The World Tree terus tumbuh. {nl}Hingga akhir nanti..Semua itu sudah diluar kekuatanku. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: However, I doubt the plights I saw were the limits of all that will happen. {nl}I believe the seeds of change will come from you.
하지만 모든 상황이 제가 본 대로만 이루어지지 않을 것이라고 믿어 의심치 않습니다.{nl}또한 그 변화의 씨앗이 당신이 될 것임을 믿고 있습니다.{nl}
Aku percaya semua akan berubah dan menjadi tidak sama seperti yang aku lihat. {nl}Dan semua yang berubah akan dimulai dari dirimu. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I will end my long story here. The wise Maven will hold the next revelation. {nl}I quietly await for the day you reach the Great Cathedral.
여기서 긴 전언을 마치며.. {nl}다음 계시는 현자 메이번에게 맡겨 두었습니다.{nl}대성당에서 당신께 닿을 그날을 조용히 기다리고 있겠습니다.{nl}
Aku sudah berbicara panjang lebar.. {nl}Aku meninggalkan wahyu yang lain pada The Wise Maven. {nl}Aku akan menunggu hingga kamu mencapai The Great Cathedral. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Goddess Gabija
여신 가비야
Goddess Gabija

Please select the user requiring a quest: I thank you, Savior. {nl}If I had listened to Laima, I would not be regretting this day.
감사합니다, 구원자여.{nl}라이마의 말을 들었어야 했는데.. 지난 날이 후회스럽습니다.{nl}
Terima kasih, Savior. Jika saja aku mendengarkan perkataan dari Laima. {nl} Aku tidak akan menyesali hari ini.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thanks to you, I have regained my strength, but it has only just begun. {nl}In return, I shall lure away the demons with a false revelation at the tower.
그대 덕분에 힘을 되찾을 수 있었습니다만, 이제부터 시작일 터.{nl}나는 그대를 보호하기 위해 이 탑에서 거짓 계시로 다른 마족들을 꾀어낼 것입니다.{nl}
Aku mendapatkan kekuatan kembali, tapi ini baru dimulai. {nl}Aku akan memancing para Demon dengan wahyu yang palsu di tower untuk melindungimu. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Before that, I have something to tell you: {nl}Laima's story.
그 전에, 그대에게 남겨줄 것이 있습니다.{nl}라이마의 전언입니다.
Sebelum itu, Aku punya sesuatu yang ingin kukatakan kepadamu. {nl}Kisah Laima.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Auctioneer
경매사
Auctioneer

Please select the user requiring a quest: It ain't easy to get the good stuff. {nl}Merchants have been rethinking their routes thanks to the monsters around Klaipeda.
좋은 물건을 구하기가 쉽지 않아요.{nl}클라페다 밖의 몬스터 때문에 상인들이 엄두를 내지 못하고 있거든요.{nl}
Tidak mudah mencari barang yang bagus.  {nl} Para pedagang tidak berani keluar Klaipeda karena banyak monster.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The auction has started! {nl}We went through a lot of trouble to bring you these listed items. {nl}Let's start the bidding!
경매가 시작되었습니다!{nl}이번에 소개해 드릴 품목은 저희가 어렵게 들여온 것이죠.{nl}자자자, 입찰을 시작하겠습니다!
Lelang telah dimulai! {nl}Dengan susah payah kami mendapatkan item-item ini. {nl}Baiklah, kita mulai penawaran!

Please select the user requiring a quest: These are the West Siauliai Woods. {nl}We should give a certain amount away when the villagers tend to the memorials, right?
샤울레이 서쪽 숲입니다. {nl}주민들이 마련해 주신 공양품이니 그 정도 자비는 베풀어야 하지 않겠습니까?
Inilah West Siauliai Woods.  {nl}Kita harus berada cukup jauh ketika penduduk pergi ke memorial. Bukan begitu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: So the Thaumaturge Master sent you. {nl}One question, first. The center of Fedimian holds a statue designed after which goddess?
쏘마터지 마스터께서 보내셨군요.{nl}그렇다면 일단 문제. 페디미안 중앙에 있는 여신상은 어떤 여신의 석상일까요?
Jadi Thaumaturge Master yang mengirimmu. {nl}Baiklah, sekarang pertanyaannya adalah. Patung yang berada di tengah Fedimian itu patung Goddess siapa?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Here's the quiz, so listen up! {nl}What is the name of the group that Lydia Schaffen formed to retrieve the goddess' revelation?
퀴즈 갈게, 잘 들어!{nl}위대한 전설의 궁수 리디아 샤펜이 여신의 계시를 받들기 위해 만든 조직의 이름은 무엇일까?
Oke. Dengarkan baik-baik. Aku akan memberikanmu Quiz. {nl}The legendary archer, Lydia Schaffen membentuk group untuk mendapatkan wahyu dari Goddess . Apa nama group tersebut?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Did you read any books in the Crystal Mine's 1st Lot, 2nd Floor? {nl}What's the name of the prisoner who wasn't able to escape after sealing Mirtis by caving in the Crystal Mine?
수정광산 1광구 2층에 있는 책들은 좀 읽으셨으려나? {nl}수정광산을 부숴서 미르티스를 봉인하였지만 탈출하지 못했던 죄수의 이름은 무엇일까요?
Apakah kamu telah membaca buku di Crystal Mine 1st district, 2nd floor? {nl}Siapakah nama narapidana yang tidak bisa kabur setelah menjebak Mirtis dengan carving di Crystal Mine?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Take it. I don't need it any more... Ugh... {nl}After I finish this booze, I'll go look for my brother again... Heh...
가져. 그건 이제 필요 없어.. 우욱..{nl}이 술을 다 마시고 나면 다시 형님을 찾으러 가야지.. 에헤헤헤..{nl}
Ambil dan bawalah. Aku tidak membutuhkannya lagi..Ughhh.. {nl}Setelah aku selesai menghabiskan minumanku, Aku akan mencari saudaraku lagi.. hehehe.. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: What? My brother's dead? {nl}What nonsense are you talking 'bout, huh? Get outta here! *sniff*
엉? 우리 형님이 죽어? {nl}그건 또 무슨 말 같지도 않은 소리야, 앙? {nl}빨리 사라져버려.. 끅! 흐윽..
Apa? Saudaraku telah mati?  {nl}Jangan suka berbicara yang tidak masuk akal, mengerti? {nl}Sekarang pergi kamu dari sini.. Sial..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Sensitive Owl
감성적인 부엉이
Sensitive Owl

Please select the user requiring a quest: The owl howls...
부엉 부엉새가..
Suara burung hantu…

Please select the user requiring a quest: The owl howls... It looks very sad, crying alone.
부엉 부엉새가..흑, 너무 슬퍼요. 부엉 춥다고서 혼자 울다니..
Suara burung hantu…..Um, sangat menyedihkan..

Please select the user requiring a quest: That's right. Good job!
맞습니다. 잘하셨어요!
Benar sekali. Kerja Bagus!

Please select the user requiring a quest: That was close. Try your luck again.
이런.. 안타깝습니다. 다시 도전해 보세요.
Oh.. Hampir saja. Coba lagi gan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Excellent. It's right!
오 대단한걸? 맞췄어!
Luar Biasa! Kamu benar!

Please select the user requiring a quest: No. Try again.
아니야. 다시 해 봐.
Tidak. Coba lagi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Good. Very good!
잘했어. 아주 좋아요!
Bagus. Sangat Bagus!

Please select the user requiring a quest: You got that wrong. {nl}Why don't you try again?
틀렸네요. {nl}아까운데 다시 도전해 보는건 어때요?
Yang agan maksud itu salah.  {nl}Kenapa tidak mencobanya lagi gan?

Please select the user requiring a quest: The place upstairs is the divine place where the gigantic Goddess Statue, the symbol of Fedimian, is located. {nl}All believers, tidy yourself and worship quietly.
계단 위쪽은 페디미안의 상징인 거대 여신상이 있는 신성한 곳입니다. {nl}모든 신도들은 의복을 정갈히 하고 조용히 경배 하시기 바랍니다.
Lantai atas adalah tempat suci dimana patung raksasa Goddess, simbol dari Fedimian berada.  {nl} Semua agamawan, persiapkan diri dan beribadah dengan tenang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Fedimian wasn't always like this... {nl}It was once a beautiful and vibrant city. {nl}Fortunately, the divine district, where the central Goddess Statue is located, is still okay.
페디미안은 4년 전 그날에 이 지경이 되었지.. {nl}참 아름답고 활기찬 도시였는데 말이야. {nl}그래도 중앙 여신상이 있는 신성지구라도 남아있으니 얼마나 다행인가.
Fedimian menjadi begini sejak 4 tahun yang lalu.. {nl} Dulu adalah kota yang indah dan hidup. {nl}Setidaknya, mereka beruntung bahwa kawasan suci dimana pusat patung dari Goddess berada masih terjaga.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Fedimian was originally divided into two districts, the commerce district and the divine district. {nl}But an incident four years ago left the commerce district completely destroyed and Fedimian soon changed for the worse...
페디미안은 원래 상업지구와 신성지구, 이 두 구역으로 나누어져 있었지.{nl}하지만 4년 전의 그 일로 상업지구는 완전히 파괴되어 버렸고..{nl}
Fedimian dulunya terbagi menjai 2 kawasan,  kawasan perdagangan dan kawasan suci. {nl}Tetapi, karena kejadian 4 tahun yang lalu, kawasan perdagangan ini musnah total dan Fedimian kian bertambah buruk.. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Mercifully, the divine district still stands today thanks to the blessing of the goddess.
뭐, 그나마 여기 신성지구라도 남아 있는 게 다 여신의 은총 아니겠는가.
Yah, setidaknya masih ada kawasan suci yang tersisa. Itupun semua karena berkat dari Goddess

Please select the user requiring a quest: I am just an ordinary old man in Fedimian. {nl}If you want to know more, then bring me some potato dumplings...
나야 뭐 그저 여기 페디미안에서 늙어가는 평범한 노인 아니겠나. {nl}더 많은 게 알고 싶다면 맛있는 감자만두라도 들고 와서 이야길 하던지..
Aku hanya orang tua biasa di Fedimian. {nl}Jika kamu mau tau lebih banyak, bawakan Aku beberapa bola kentang..

Please select the user requiring a quest: The food at Fedimian is awful. {nl}Before I die, is it going to be possible to try all delicious food in the world?
아닌 게 아니라 페디미안의 음식은 정말 맛이 없어. {nl}내가 죽기 전에 맛있는 음식을 다시 맛보는 날이 올까?
Makanan di Fedimian terlalu mengerikan. {nl}Sebelum Aku mati, apa mungkin Aku mencoba semua makanan lezat di dunia?

Please select the user requiring a quest: This is the Holy District of Fedimian. {nl}May you receive the full blessings of the goddesses.
페디미안 신성지구입니다. 여신의 은총이 가득하길 바랍니다.
Ini adalah kawasan suci di Fedimian. Mungkin Goddess akan memberkatimu di masa depan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Right now, the Market District is closed for reconstruction. {nl}Please do not enter that district.
현재 상업지구는 재건을 위해 폐쇄되어 있습니다.{nl}상기 이유로 출입을 금해주시길 바랍니다.
Untuk sekarang, kawasan perdagangan ditutup untuk direnovasi. {nl}Oleh karena itu, mohon jangan masuk ke kawasan dulu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Fedimian Holy District welcomes you.
페디미안 신성지구는 참배객 여러분들을 환영합니다.
Kawasan suci Fedimian menyambutmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thank you so much for your efforts. We are going to investigate here one more time. {nl}Cheer up!
적극적으로 협조해 줘서 고마웠어. 우린 다시 이곳에서 조사를 계속 할 생각이야. {nl}너도 힘내!
Terima kasih atas penawaran Kamu. Kami akan menyelidiki disini sekali lagi. {nl}Semangat!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Finished already? {nl}Amazing! You'd expect nothing less from a Revelator!
일을 다 끝낸 거야? 너도 정말 대단한걸? 역시 계시자야.
Kamu sudah selesai? Luar biasa! Kamu memang Savior.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It is said that if one receives too much good, he begins to believe it's his right. {nl}Maybe, we relied too much on the goddess.
호의가 계속되면 그게 권리인 줄 안다는 말이 있지.{nl}어쩌면 우리가 너무 여신께만 기댄 것이 화를 부른 건 아니었을까?
Ketika orang menerima kebaikan terlalu banyak, orang percaya itu adalah kebenarannya. {nl} Mungkin, kita terlalu mengandalkan ini kepada Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Soldier Pitt
병사 피트
Soldier Pitt

Please select the user requiring a quest: Are you the Revelator? {nl}It is such an honor to meet you!
계시자님이십니까? {nl}와, 말로만 들었었는데, 이렇게 뵙게 되다니 영광입니다!
Apakah kamu sang Savior?  {nl}Suatu kehormatan bisa bertemu!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Soldier Bran
병사 브란
