Please select the user requiring a quest: Ever since I was a kid, it's been my dream to fight at the front lines!
선두에 서서 적을 휩쓰는 것이 제 꿈이었습니다! {nl}어렸을 적부터 말입니다.
Itu adalah mimpiku bertarung dengan musuh dari depan!  {nl} Bahkan sejak dari kecil.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Training Soldier Malt
훈련병 몰트
Training Soldier Malt

Please select the user requiring a quest: The number of monsters are not declining even after the Revelator tried so hard...
계시자님께서 그렇게 애써 주셨는데도 몬스터놈들은 줄어들지를 않으니..
Jumlah monster itu tidak menurun meskipun para Savior sudah berusaha dengan keras..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Commander Raimondas
지휘관 라이몬다스
Commander Raimondas

Please select the user requiring a quest: Many people who claim to be Revelators come here. {nl}Are you one of them?
계시자랍시고 몰려드는 어중이떠중이들이 하루에도 엄청나게 몰려오지.{nl}자네도 그중 한 명인가?
Banyak dari mereka yang datang kemari mengakui sebagai Savior.  {nl}Apa kamu salah satunya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I have met many Revelators, but I have never seen one quite like you. {nl}Well done. I hope we'll meet again someday.
계시자를 많이 만나봤지만, 자네는 인정할 수밖에 없군. {nl}수고했네. 또 볼 날이 있겠지.
Aku bertemu dengan banyak Savior sebelumnya, tapi Aku belum pernah melihat seseorang seperti kamu. {nl} Well done. Aku berharap akan bertemu denganmu lagi suatu saat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Herb Broker
약초꾼
Herb Broker

Please select the user requiring a quest: Do you need anything?
저에게 무슨 볼일이라도?
Apa kamu perlu sesuatu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: What you see here is not everything I have for sale. Hehe...
눈에 보이는 것이 전부는 아닙죠. 헤헤..
Apa yang kamu lihat belum semuanya. Hehe..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Instructor Nicker
교관 닉커
Instructor Nicker

Please select the user requiring a quest: If one soldier breaks a rule, then it may endanger the entire military. {nl}That's why we have to be very strict.
한 명의 흐트러진 병사가 전 부대원을 위험하게 만든다. {nl}그렇기 때문에 때론 잔혹할 정도의 엄격함을 갖추어야 한다.
Jika satu tentara melanggar sebuah aturan, maka itu akan membahayakan seluruh pasukan. {nl}Maka itu kita harus ketat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I guess I'll admit it now. You, the Revelator, pursue the dream of the goddess. {nl}It's not going to be easy, but I believe you'll do well.
이젠 인정할 수밖에 없겠군. 여신의 꿈을 쫓는 계시자라. {nl}쉽지는 않은 길이겠지만, 잘해낼 거라 믿네.
Mungkin sekarang Aku harus mengakui. Savior mengejar mimpian Goddess. {nl}Itupun tidak akan mudah, tapi Aku percaya kamu akan melakukan dengan baik.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Are you the Revelator? Good work, {nl}but I'm not quite sure I can trust you.
계시자인가? 수고했다는 말은 하겠으나 믿을 수 있는지는.. 글쎄.
Apakah kamu sang Savior? Bagus, bagus sekali, tapi apakah aku bisa mempercayaimu..Hmmm.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Private Personnel
민간 군무원
Private Personnel

Please select the user requiring a quest: To survive in this chaotic world, you'll sometimes need to use some dirty tricks. {nl}You shouldn't feel bad about it.
혼란한 세상에서 살아남기 위해서는 비열한 술수도 필요할 때가 있을 겁니다.{nl}그렇게 나쁘게만 생각할 일은 아니라고 봅니다.
Untuk selamat di dunia yang kacau ini, terkadang kamu harus menggunakan beberapa cara licik. {nl}Kamu tidak harus merasa bawah hal itu buruk.

Please select the user requiring a quest: If you want to get a job done quick, then do it yourself. {nl}That's why I became a soldier.
답답하면 직접 뛰는 게 맞겠지요.{nl}그래서 군인이 되었습니다.
Jika kamu ingin melakukan tugas dengan cepat, maka kerjakan sendiri. {nl}Maka itu aku menjadi seorang prajurit.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've heard many stories of heroes who fought for justice in my childhood, {nl}but I've always thought of them as just stories...{nl}Now I think heroes may exist.
어렸을 때부터 정의의 용사 이야기 같은 것을 듣고 자랐지만, 그냥 동화라고 생각했는데..{nl}지금은 진짜로 그런 게 있겠구나 싶네요.
Aku mendengar beberapa cerita pahlawan yang bertarung untuk keadilan di masa Aku kecil, tetapi Aku tidak pernah berpikir salah satu dari cerita itu nyata.. {nl}Sekarang Aku percaya pahlawan itu ada.

Please select the user requiring a quest: York
요크
York

Please select the user requiring a quest: The goddess may have abandoned us, but we feel safe with the Revelator here with us.

Goddess mungkin telah meninggalkan kita, tetapi kita merasa aman ketika Savior disini dengan kita.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I want to go back to my hometown... {nl}I can't wait for supplies any longer. {nl}There's also no end in sight for this situation. *sigh*
고향으로 돌아가고 싶습니다.. {nl}보급품을 목 빠지게 기다리기만 해야 하는 것도 힘들고요.{nl}언제 끝날지도 알 수 없는 이 상황도 정말 지치고요. 에휴..
Aku ingin kembali ke kampung halamanku.. {nl} Sudah susah untuk menunggu bantuan lagi. {nl}Aku juga tidak tahu kapan situasi ini akan berakhir. Sigh..

Please select the user requiring a quest: There are moments that I just want to go out without the uniform and the boots. {nl}I only do this for my family's safety.
잠시만이라도 갑갑한 전투복과 군화를 벗어 던지고 싶을 때가 나도 있네.{nl}가족의 안전을 생각해서 그냥 참는 거지.{nl}
Ada saat-saat Aku hanya ingin pergi keluar tanpa seragam dan sepatu. {nl}Aku hanya ingin bertahan untuk keselamatan keluarga.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I am not a poet myself so I can't say it for sure... but you seem different. {nl}Anyway, I hope I can hear about you even if you are far away.
나야 시인이 아니고 뼛속까지 군인이니 뭐라고 정확히 짚어서 말은 못하겠는데.. {nl}자넨 좀.. 뭔가 특별하군.{nl}어쨌든 먼 곳에서나마 소식을 전해 들을 수 있다면 좋겠군.
Aku tidak mengarang untuk diriku sendiri jadi Aku tidak bisa bilang dengan pasti.. {nl}Tapi, Kamu terlihat berbeda kelihatannya. {nl}Namun, Aku harap Aku bisa mendengar tentang kamu jika Kamu berada jauh.

안전을 보장 드릴 수 없으니 통행을 삼가 주십시오.{nl}기타 문의 사항은 연락관 닐스를 찾아가십시오.
Aku tidak bisa menanggung keselamatan Kamu jadi tolong jangan masuk. {nl}Untuk pertanyaan lain, silahkan bertemu dengan Liaison Officer Niels.

마군주의 속셈따위 알 수는 없지만.. 저를 이렇게 살려 두고 이 순례자의 길을 지나는 사람들에게서 그녀가 찾고 있는 뭔가의 단서를 얻어보려는 게 아니었을까  싶습니다.아, {nl}너무 어지럽군요..
Aku tidak tahu apa yang Demon Lord pikirkan..tetapi Aku pikir, setelah meninggalkan Aku hidup, dia mencoba mencari petunjuk untuk apa yang dia cari dari orang-orang berziarah. Ah,  {nl}Jadi pusing..

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've heard the sanctuary in Purple Tree Fault Forest is corrupted. {nl}The Masters all know Naktis was behind it. If you take the purifier {nl}I'm selling and burn it in the sanctuary, it'll be purified. {nl}Interested in buying?
적갈나무 단층숲의 그 성소가 오염되었다는 소식은 듣고 있지.{nl}나크티스의 짓이라는 건 마스터들이라면 다 알고 있는 것이고.{nl}내가 파는 정화부를 사서 성소에서 불태운다면 아마 그 성소는 정화가 될 거야. {nl}어때, 사겠는가?
Aku dengar tempat makam di Purple Tree Fault Forest terkontaminasi.  {nl} Para Master tahu bahwa Naktis dibalik semua ini.  {nl}Jika kamu mengambil penyembuhnya Aku akan menjual dan membakarnya di makam. Itu akan menyembuhkannya.  {nl} Apa yang kamu pikir? Apa kamu tertarik untuk membeli?

Please select the user requiring a quest: That's unfortunate.
안타깝군.
Itu menyedihkan.

축복의 성소

Sebutir embun tergelincir dan jatuh ke tanah.

나크티스와 그 무리들은 아마도 대성당에 들어가기 위한 단서를 찾고 있는 것이 아닐까 합니다. {nl}
Naktis dan pengikutnya akan mencari petunjuk untuk masuk ke Great Cathedral

Please select the user requiring a quest: Naktis is loyal to Gesti and will do anything to be recognized. {nl}Maybe the Pilgrim's Way was also a means to get the clues to enter the Cathedral and be recognized by Gesti? {nl}Ahh, then could Naktis have entered the Cathedral already?
나크티스는 제스티의 충직한 부하이고.. 그에게 인정받기 위해 무슨 일이든 할테니.. 순례자의 길을 그렇게 만드는 이유는 아마도, 대성당 진입의 단서를 찾아 제스티의 인정을 받기 위함이 아니겠습니까. 아, 그렇다면 이미 나크티스는 대성당에 진입을 한 것일까요..?
Naktis setia kepada Gesti dan akan melakukan apa pun agar diakuinya.  {nl}Mungkin The Pilgrim Path juga berusaha mendapatkannya dengan masuk ke Catedral agar diakui Gesti.  {nl}Ahh, Apakah Naktis sudah masuk ke Catedral?

Please select the user requiring a quest: It won't budge. {nl}Where's the key?
열리지 않는다. 열쇠가 어디 있을까?
Tidak terbuka.  {nl}Dimana kuncinya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: What's the story behind this? {nl}The entrapped soul simply gave the scriptures and vanished.
도대체 무슨 사연이었을까? {nl}갇혀 있던 영혼은 경전만 주고 사라져 버렸다.
Apa yang bisa menjadi cerita dibalik semua ini?  {nl}Jiwa yang terjebak hanya memberi tulisan dan menghilang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Does the medicine really work?
약효가 정말 있는 건가?
Apa obat ini benar-benar berguna?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Voice
목소리
Voice

Please select the user requiring a quest: (You sense something dubious inside.)
안쪽에서 수상한 낌새가 느껴진다.
(Kamu merasakan sesuatu yang aneh di dalam.)

Please select the user requiring a quest: Worried Wife
걱정 많은 부인
Worried Wife

Please select the user requiring a quest: Have you ever had your fortune told? It is quite accurate, isn't it? {nl}Goddess Laima knows everything. Fate, foresight, and luck. {nl}I think she may have known beforehand about all these disasters coming.
자네 점 본 적 있나? 정말 잘 맞지?{nl}모든 건 라이마 여신께서 알고 계시지. 운명과 예지, 행운도 관장하셔.{nl}어쩌면 이 모든 재앙을 라이마 여신께서도 알고 계셨는지도 몰라.
Apa kamu pernah meramal? Hal ini cukup akurat bukan?  {nl} Goddess Laima tahu semuanya. Takdir, Masa depan, dan Keberuntungan.  {nl} Aku pikir dia sudah tahu sebelumnya soal semua bencana yang datang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I pray to Goddess Gabija everyday. It keeps the house warm. {nl}As you may already know, Goddess Gabija controls fire and since I'm a housewife, I am close to fire as well.
난 가비야 여신께 매일 기도를 드려. 그래야 집이 항상 따뜻하거든.{nl}자네도 알겠지만, 가비야 여신께선 불을 관장하는 여신이시잖수?{nl}난 아무래도 주부니까 불이랑 제일 친하지 않겠어?
Aku berdoa kepada Goddess Gabija setiap hari. Itu akan membuat rumahmu hangat.  {nl} Kanu harus tahu, Goddess Gabija mengontrol api dan sejak aku menjadi seorang istri, aku menjadi dekat dengan api juga.

Please select the user requiring a quest: My husband always prays to Goddess Zemyna. {nl}If you want a good potato harvest, you shouldn't get on her bad side. {nl}Goddess Zemyna is the goddess of the earth. She oversees farms and agriculture.
우리 바깥양반은 제미나 여신께 항상 기도를 올린다우.{nl}감자가 잘 자라려면 제미나께 밉보이면 안 되거든.{nl}제미나 여신께선 대지의 여신이시지. 따라서 농경과 작물도 관여하셔.{nl}
Suamiku selalu berdoa kepada Goddess Zemyna.  {nl} Jika kamu ingin panen kentangmu subur, kamu tidak boleh menaruhnya di tempat yang salah.  {nl} Goddess Zemyna adalah Goddess Of Earth. Dia juga mengawasi peternakan dan pertanian.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Speaking of which. {nl}About the plants overgrowing ever since Medzio Diena four years ago...
그래서 그런데 말이야. {nl}4년 전 신수의 날 때부터 지금까지 주욱 식물들이 폭주하고 있는 거 말이우.{nl}
Berbicara tentang ..  {nl} Tentang proses mutasi tanaman sejak Medzio Diena 4 tahun yang lalu .. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I wonder what Goddess Zemyna will think of it. {nl}Everything will be revealed when the goddess returns but... {nl}Oh, what blasphemous words I speak.
제미나 여신께선 어떤 생각이실지 모르겠어. {nl}모든 건 여신께서 다시 나타나셔야 알겠지만.. 어머, 내가 무슨 불경스런 소리람.
Aku berpikir bagaimana Goddess Zemyna akan memikirkannya.  {nl} Semuanya akan terungkap ketika Goddess kembali tetapi? {nl}Oh, kata hujatan apa yang Aku ucapkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Have you ever seen the stars glittering red in the night sky? {nl}That's the very symbol of Goddess Vakarine. {nl}She leads the evening star and wakes Goddess Ausrine the following day.
자네 밤하늘에 붉게 반짝이는 별을 본 적이 있나?{nl}그게 바로 바카리네 여신의 상징일세. {nl}저녁 별을 이끄시고 다음 날 아우슈리네 여신을 깨우시지.{nl}
Apa kamu pernah melihat bintang berkilap merah di langit malam?  {nl} Itu adalah simbol dari Goddess Vakarine.  {nl} Dia mengarahkan bintang malam dan membangunkan Goddess Ausrine di hari berikutnya  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: She also oversees energy and rest, so she is the guardian of travelers like you. {nl}Shout Goddess Vakarine's name three times when your legs hurt and you'll feel much better.
활력과 휴식도 관장하시니 자네 같은 여행자들의 수호신이시기도 해.{nl}만약 발이 아프면 바카리네 여신의 이름을 세 번 외면 효과가 있을 거야.{nl}
Dia juga mengawasi energi dan sisanya, jadi dia adalah penjaga petualang seperti kamu.  {nl} Panggil nama Goddess Vakarine sebanyak 3x ketika kakimu terluka dan kamu akan merasa baikan.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: What are you doing here? {nl}Did the goddess also tell you to go to Klaipeda in your dreams?
)}여기엔 무슨 일이지?{nl}자네도 꿈에 여신께서 클라페다로 가라 하시던가?{nl}{nl}
)}Apa yang kamu lakukan disini?   {nl} Apakah para Goddess memintamu ke Klaipeda dalam mimpimu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Still following me after all that? {nl}Fine, struggle all you want.
그렇게 당하고도 날 쫓아 오는구나.{nl}그래. 어디 마음껏 발버둥쳐 보아라.
Masih mengikutiku setelah semua itu?  {nl}Baik, teruskan saja mau kalian.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There is a Mage Tower near Fedimian known to have been built by Archmage Agailla Flurry. {nl}The tower has never been revealed and no entrance can be found.
이곳 성도 페디미안 근처에는 대마법사 아가일라 플러리가 세웠다고 하는 마법사의 탑이 있습니다.{nl}그 탑은 단 한 번도 그 모습을 드러낸 적이 없고 입구를 발견한 사람도 없죠. {nl}
Ada sebuah Maze Tower dekat Fedimian yang dulu dibangun oleh Agailla Flurry.  {nl}Tower itu tidak pernah ditemukan dan tidak ada yang tahu pintu masuknya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Well, that's why some say it's just a made up story... {nl}But recently there have been people claiming to have come from there.
뭐, 그 때문에 지어낸 이야기라는 말도 있었습니다만..{nl}최근에 갑자기 마법사의 탑에서 왔다고 주장하는 외지인들이 늘고 있습니다.
Ya, ada yang bilang itu hanya bualan… {nl}Namun belakangan ini banyak orang yang mengaku pernah pergi ke Maze Tower.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The size of Goddess Zemyna's Statue will amaze you. {nl}Even if half of it was buried underground because of the Great Earthquake, {nl}the remaining half would still be too huge for all of it to be seen at once.
성도 페디미아 중앙에 계시는 제미나 여신상의 크기는 무엇을 상상하든 당신의 상상을 초월할 겁니다.{nl}대지진 때문에 하반신이 땅에 묻혀버렸어도 말이죠.{nl}나머지 상반신도 너무 거대해서 한 눈에 보는 건 절대 불가능 할 겁니다.
Ukuran dari patung Goddess Zemyna Statue akan membuatmu tercengang.  {nl}Walaupun sebagian tubuh patung terpendam di tanah karena gempa dashyat.  {nl}Sisanya pun masih terlihat sangat besar untuk dilihat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Welcome. I heard you were coming from Uska. {nl}Don't just stand there. I wish to have a word with you.
어서오게. 우스카에게 대강의 이야기는 들었네.{nl}멀뚱히 서 있지 말고 가까히 오게. 자네와 얘길 좀 나누고 싶거든.
Selamat datang. Aku telah mendengarnya dari Uska.  {nl}Jangan hanya diam disitu. Aku ingin bicara denganmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: So, you're the one who got the revelation from the Crystal Mine, right? {nl}If it's alright with you, I'd like to hear the details.
그래. 수정광산에서 계시를 얻은게 자네라지?{nl}괜찮다면, 그 계시의 내용을 내게 자세히 들려 주었으면 좋겠군.
Jadi, kamu orang yang mendapatkan wahyu di Crystal Mines, hah?  {nl}Jika begitu, Aku ingin mengetahui tentang wahyu itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Amazing. {nl}We also follow the first Paladin's will and came here to guard this place. {nl}Same goes for the Watchers here.
놀랍군.{nl}우리도 초대 팔라딘님의 의지를 이어받아 이 일대를 지키러 온 참이거든.{nl}이 곳의 파수꾼들도 마찬가지이지.{nl}
Luar biasa.  {nl}Kami juga datang kesini untuk berjaga atas perintah Paladin pertama.  {nl}Sama seperti penjaga yang lain.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The first Paladin was told many things by the goddess. {nl}Threats of Gesti, things to abide by, and that a Savior would come.
여신께선 초대 팔라딘에게 여러 가지를 남기셨어.{nl}마군주 제스티의 위협이라던가, 지켜야 할 사명이라던가.{nl}그 중엔 구원자가 올 것이라는 말씀도 있었지.{nl}
Sang Paladin pertama mendapatkan banyak titah dari Goddess.  {nl}Ancaman dari Gesti, tugas suci, dan bahwa Savior akan datang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Anyway, I will go back to battle so please help the guards and my followers. {nl}I'll meet you again in Jade-Filled Cliff.
어쨌든, 나는 전장으로 먼저 가 있을 테니 파수꾼들과 내 추종자들을 잘 도와 주게. {nl}옥빛서린 벼랑에서 만나도록 하지.
Lagipula, Aku akan kembali ke pertempuran, jadi tolong bantu para guards dan pengikutku.  {nl}Kita bertemu lagi di Jade-Filled Cliff.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Disciple of the Elderly
노인의 제자
Disciple of the Elderly

Please select the user requiring a quest: Helping reconstruct Fedimian may be more meaningful than pottery. {nl}But people need something to soothe their hearts.
도자기보단 패디미안을 재건하는데 힘을 쏟는게 더 의미있을 수도 있겠지요.{nl}하지만 사람은 마음이 기댈 곳이 있어야 더 힘이 나는 법이라오.
Membantu kembali pembangunan Fedimian mungkin lebih berguna daripada membuat tembikar,  {nl}tapi orang-orang membutuhkan sesuatu untuk menenangkan hatinya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I have also been placing clay tablets, scribed with people's wishes, inside the spiral of pots. {nl} To search for and read the little wishes from people of ancient times is quite enjoyable.
도자기를 빚고 나선 정성스레 소원을 적은 점토판을 넣어 놓기도 하지요.{nl}옛날 사람들이 적은 소원을 찾아 읽는 재미도 쏠쏠합니다.
Terkadang, Aku membuat piring tembikar dengan tulisan doa dari orang lain.  {nl}Membaca doa-doa mereka cukup menyenangkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Fedimian Old Lady
페디미안 중년 부인
Fedimian Old Lady

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's relieving to see the Holy District intact. {nl} All of this is due to a blessing from Goddess Zemyna.
신성지구라도 남아있어서 얼마나 다행인지.{nl}이게 다 제미나 여신께서 돌보아 주신 거야.
Ini melegakan melihat Kawasan Suci baik-baik saja.  {nl}Ini semua ada berkat dari Goddess Zemyna.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Get the Token of Training from the Training Manager. {nl}I'll let you join our troop if you can pass the training.
그래. 훈련소장에게서 훈련의 증표를 받아 와.{nl}네녀석들이 그 훈련을 무사히 마칠 수 있다면 우리 부대에 흔쾌히 편입시켜 주도록 하지.
Dapatkan Token of Training dari Training Manager.  {nl}Kamu bisa bergabung dengan pasukan kami jika bisa lulus latihan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You should take responsibility for the troop's safety in the Training Camp. {nl}It'd be a bad idea to leave these excited young men without any supervision, right?
자네는 훈련소에서 병사들의 안전을 책임져 줘야겠어.{nl}이 녀석들이 이렇게 흥분하는 데에 전혀 책임이 없다곤 못하겠지?
Kamu harus bertanggung jawab terhadap keselamatan para tentara di pusat pelatihan.  {nl}Ide buruk meninggalkan anak-anak muda yang bersemangat tanpa pegawasan, benar kan?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Uska told me about you. {nl}All the Revelators I've met so far were no better than the Kepas, though.
우스카에게 자네 이야기를 듣긴 했네.{nl}하지만 여태껏 내가 만나 본 계시자들은 죄다 말라빠진 케파만도 못했어.
Uska bercerita tentang kamu.  {nl}Semua pewahyu yang kutemui tidak ada yang lebih baik dari pada Kepas.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Help the herbalists before you get into training. {nl}I need to see if you have what it takes to protect my troops. Training will come after.
그러니 훈련에 앞서 자네는 약초꾼의 일을 돕게.{nl}내 병사의 안전을 책임질 수 있는지 그걸로 확인해봐야 겠어. 훈련은 그다음부터야.
Bantulah Herbalist sebelum masuk ke pelatihan.  {nl}Aku perlu melihat apakah kamu memiliki apa yang diperlukan untuk melindungi pasukanku. Setelah itu kamu bisa ke pelatihan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: My father told me Klaipeda is also becoming a difficult place to live.
우리 아빠가 그랬는데요. {nl}클라페다도 점점 살기 힘들어진대요.{nl}
Ayahku bilang kepadaku sekarang semakin sulit untuk tinggal di Klaipeda.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There are many people who want to buy things but it's not easy to get what they want. {nl}We have enough food supplies for now but it won't last long.
사려는 사람은 많은데 물건을 구하기 쉽지 않으니 큰일이래요.{nl}식량은 아직 넉넉하지만 장담할 수가 없다 그러셨어요.
Orang-orang selalu ingin membeli sesuatu, tetapi sulit untuk mendapatkan yang mereka minta.  {nl}Kami mempunyai stok makanan yang cukup, tapi tidak akan bertahan lama.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I heard the town men can't make their way back because of the monsters. {nl}We have food but it will run out soon...
몬스터 때문에 상인 아저씨들이 들어오질 못하고 있대요.{nl}아직 먹을 건 괜찮다곤 하지만, 빨리 물건이 들어와야 할 텐데..
Aku dengar para pria tidak dapat kembali ke kota karena serangan monster.  {nl} Makanan masih ada namun stok kita semakin menipis..

Please select the user requiring a quest: How will we live if this continues to go on? {nl}Where have all the goddesses gone?
걱정이군. 걱정이야.{nl}앞으로도 계속 이러면 이젠 어떻게 사나 몰라.{nl}여신들께선 도대체 어디로 가신 걸까나?
Bagaimana kita bisa bertahan hidup jika ini terus berlanjut?  {nl} Kemana para Goddess pergi?

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's a good idea to sell the various items you get from killing monsters, {nl}but using them to craft new items isn't such a bad idea either.
몬스터에게서 여러가지 전리품을 얻거든 상점에 파는 것도 좋습니다만.{nl}요즘 같은 때엔 그걸로 물건을 직접 만들어 쓰는 것도 나쁘지 않지요.
Menjual item dari monster adalah ide yang bagus.  {nl}Akan tetapi, menggunakannya untuk bahan craft juga berguna.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Although we need to be self-sufficient, things like recipes are better bought from the merchants. {nl}You need to know how to make it before you actually craft one yourself.
아무리 자급자족해서 먹고 사는 때라지만 제작서 같은 건 상인에게 사는 게 좋습니다.{nl}만드는 방법을 알아야 뭘 만들던가 하겠지요?
Meskipun kita harus berhemat, tapi item seperti recipes lebih baik beli dari merchant.  {nl} Karena kamu harus tau cara membuat item terlebih dahulu sebelum mencoba membuat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Be sure to kill any sparkling monsters you encounter. You might get some great items as trophies. {nl}And what about buying me some drinks for the good information I just gave you?
반짝이는 몬스터를 보게 된다면 꼭 해치우시오. 엄청난 전리품을 얻을 수 있거든.{nl}그리고 나에게 정보료로 한 턱 쏘면 서로 기분좋지 않겠소?
Jika kamu melihat monster yang bersinar, pastikan untuk mengalahkannya.  {nl} Kamu mungkin mendapatkan item langka sebagai hadiah.  {nl} Dan jangan lupa untuk mentraktirku minuman karena sudah memberitahu kamu ya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: If you have any questions, head over to the Pyromancer Master's Laboratory. {nl}Thankfully, you can read a lot of books there for free.
뭔가 궁금한 게 있으시다면 파이로맨서 마스터님의 연구실로 가보세요.{nl}감사하게도 많은 책을 공짜로 열람할 수 있지요.
Jika kamu punya pertanyaan, pergilah ke Pyromancer Master's Laboratory.  {nl} Sangat menarik, disana kamu bisa membaca banyak buku secara gratis.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Each Goddess Statue is known to have different abilities depending on which goddess it depicts. {nl}Strangely, though that Statue is not of Goddess Vakarine, it can still send you to your desired location.
여신상마다 어떤 여신인지에 따라 특별한 능력이 있다고 전해지는데요.{nl}이상하게 저 여신상은 바카리네 여신도 아닌데 원하는 곳으로 보내줄 수 있다고 하는군요.
Tiap patung Goddess mempunyai kekuatan tergantung dari Goddess mana itu.  {nl} Anehnya, itu bukanlah patung Goddess Vakarine tapi bisa memindahkanmu ke tempat lain.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Adventurer Varkis' Spirit
탐험가 바키스의 영혼
Soul of Explorer Varkis

Please select the user requiring a quest: If only I had a little more time... {nl}The data I've collected near the Dykyne Fork... I can't leave it...
나에게 조금만 더 시간이 있었더라면..{nl}디키네 갈림길 근처에 모아 놓은 나의 자료들.. 놓고 갈 수 없어..
Jika saja aku punya waktu sedikit lagi..  {nl}Data yang Aku kumpulkan dekat Dykyne crossroad..Aku tidak bisa meninggalkannya..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Now I can leave without any regrets. {nl}Goodbye. Be careful of that man...
이제 미련 없이 떠날 수 있겠어.{nl}안녕. 그 남자를 조심해..
Sekarang Aku bisa pergi tanpa penyesalan.  {nl} Selamat tinggal dan hati-hati dengan orang itu..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Use this scroll to open a niche of space and find the Key of the Great King. {nl}You'll never know what will pop out, so be careful.
이 스크롤로 공간 틈새를 열어서 대왕의 열쇠를 찾아.{nl}뭐가 튀어나올지 모르니 조심하는 게 좋아.
Gunakan scroll ini untuk membuka beberapa ruang dan menemukan Key Of Great King. {nl}Kamu tidak akan pernah tahu apa yang akan terjadi jadi lebih baik hati-hati.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Crumbled Chapel
무너진 공소
Crumbled Chapel

Please select the user requiring a quest: This is where a small chapel was once located. {nl}A Statue of Goddess Vakarine appears here once a day.
과거 작은 공소가 있던 곳이다.{nl}하루에 한 번 잠시 여신의 힘으로 여신 바카리네의 상이 나타났다 사라진다.
Di sinilah tempat dimana sebuah Chapel kecil pernah berada. {nl}Sebuah patung dari Goddess Vakarine muncul di sini sehari sekali.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Stamina can be recovered by destroying Tree Root Crystals.{nl}They are an abnormality that began to appear after Medzio Diena. {nl}But rest assured, because the research results have shown it's perfectly safe.
나무뿌리 수정은 파괴 시 스태미나를 회복할 수 있습니다.{nl}신수의 날 이후 대량으로 발생한 이상현상입니다만,{nl}연구 결과 안전하다는 판정을 받았으므로 안심하시길 바랍니다.
Stamina dapat dipulihkan dengan menghancurkan Tree Root Crystals.  {nl}Hal-hal aneh mulai muncul sejak Divine Day,  {nl} Namun penelitian mengatakan hal itu cukup aman.

Please select the user requiring a quest: So Degil sent you... Here... Here it is.
대길이가 보내서 오셨군요.. 드.. 드리겠습니다.
Jadi kamu dikirim oleh Degil .. Ini .. Ini dia..

Please select the user requiring a quest: The goddess taught us to help others. {nl}I'm just abiding by her teachings.
여신께선 언제나 주변을 도우라고 가르치셨습니다.{nl}저는 단지 그 가르침을 실천할 뿐입니다.
Goddess mengajarkan kita untuk menolong sesama.  {nl}Aku hanya mengikuti ajarannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'd have just stood there if not for your help. {nl}My arms still hurt... {nl}I understand that the situation is not normal.
당신이 아니었으면 꼼짝 없이 계속 그러고 있었을 거요.{nl}아직도 팔이 얼얼하고..{nl}하여간 지금 이 상황이 정상이 아니라는 것은 알겠소.
Aku akan berdiri disana jika tidak membantu kamu.  {nl}Tanganku masih sakit…  {nl}Yaa, aku sadar bahwa situasi ini cukup sulit.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The morning comes after the night goes. {nl}Goddess Ausrine is the one who leads the morning. {nl}Not only that, but she is also the one we meet after we die.
밤이 가면 아침이 오지? 아우슈리네 여신께선 그 아침을 이끄는 여신이셔.{nl}뿐만 아니라 우리가 죽으면 아우슈리네 여신께로 가지.
Cahaya mentari pagi bersinar setelah malam usai. {nl}Goddess Ausrine adalah Goddess yang melambangkan cahaya pagi.  {nl}Bukan hanya itu, kita juga menemuinya ketika kita meninggal.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Strange Goddess Statue
이상한 여신상
Strange Statue of Goddess

Please select the user requiring a quest: Come, angry resentful souls.
분노하고 억울한 영혼이여. 내게 오라.
Datanglah, Jiwa yang penuh amarah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Soldier Recruit Bran
훈련병 브란
Soldier Recruit Bran

Please select the user requiring a quest: You're the one who helped us a while ago.
당신은 아까 우리를 도와준 분이군요.
Kamulah yang telah menolong kami dulu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Training Manager Alius
훈련소장 알류스
Training Manager Alius

Please select the user requiring a quest: Stop!
그만!!
Berhenti!

Please select the user requiring a quest: That's terrible. {nl}You'd be dead before you could be of any help on the battlefield.
형편없군. 이대로는 전투력에 보탬은커녕 몬스터에게 목숨을 갖다 바치겠어.
Itu buruk.  {nl}Kamu bisa mati sebelum membantu di pertempuran.

Please select the user requiring a quest: If I meet the sculptor again, {nl}I'll ask him to decorate it with purple and green feathers!
만약에 제가 조각가님을 다시 만난다면요.{nl}보라색이랑 초록색 깃털로 꾸며달라고 말하고 싶어요!{nl}
Jika aku bertemu sculptor lagi  {nl}Aku akan memintanya menghias dengan Bulu Ungu dan Hijau!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Don't you think it would look great? {nl}Purple and green... Hehe.
생각만 해도 멋지지 않나요?{nl}보라색이랑, 초록색이랑.. 헤헤..
Bukankah itu terlihat keren?  {nl}Ungu dan Hijau… hehe.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The sculptor created us. And we received the goddess' revelation. Yep! He made us. {nl}We follow the sculptor's will to comfort the souls.
조각가님은 우릴 만들었어. 여신의 계시를 받아서. 응. 만들었어.{nl}우린 조각가님의 뜻을 받아 영혼을 위로하고 있어. {nl}
Sang sculptor membentuk kita, dan kita menerima wahyu goddes.  {nl}Kami menghibur jiwa-jiwa seperti yang dia inginkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The souls are great. They're like fireflies or beetles. {nl}It's wonderful just watching it. Like where the sculptor is.
영혼은 정말 대단해. 마치 반딧불이처럼. 비단벌레처럼.{nl}보고 있으면 황홀해져. 조각가님이 계신 곳처럼.
Jiwa-jiwa itu sangat luar biasa. Seperti kunang-kunang atau kumbang.  {nl}Sangat indah untuk dilihat. Sama seperti seorang sculptor.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We can no longer be approve of Sequoia's actions. {nl}We owls will be destroyed if we leave him be. {nl}Who then will lead all the souls?
세콰이아는 이젠 더 이상 용납할 수 없는 적입니다.{nl}세콰이아를 그냥 놔두었다간 우리 부엉이들은 그의 손에 전부 다 부서지게 되겠죠.{nl}그럼 이 많은 영혼들은 누가 인도하나요?
Tindakan Sequoia tidak bisa diterima.  {nl}Semua burung hantu bisa hancur jika kita tidak berbuat apa-apa.  {nl}Kalau itu terjadi siapa yang akan membimbing jiwa-jiwa itu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I have been watching the abyssal darkness of this holy forest: things like the hatred and greed of humans.
저는 항상 이 신성한 숲의 깊은 어둠을 보고 있습니다. {nl}인간들의 원한, 버리지 못한 욕심 같은 것들 말이지요.
Aku selalu melihat kegelapan di hutan yang suci ini.  {nl}Hal-hal seperti kebencian dan keserakahan manusia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's regrettable that we have to get rid of an old friend... {nl}But we can't just stand by and watch it do evil.
오랜 친구를 없애야 한다는 건 참으로 슬픈 일이지만..{nl}더 이상 죄를 짓게 하는 걸 두고 볼 수만은 없어요.
Sangat sedih jika kita harus menyingkirkan sahabat lama…  {nl}Tapi kita tidak bisa diam saja melihat dia melakukan hal buruk.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I was almost destroyed by Sequoia but I can't just stop guiding the poor souls. {nl}When will this tragedy end?
하마터면 세콰이아에게 부서질 뻔했지만 그렇다고 가여운 영혼을 인도하는 일을 그만둘 순 없어요.{nl}언제쯤이면 이 모든 슬픔이 사라질 수 있을까요?
Aku hampir terkena masalah karena Sequoia tapi aku tidak bisa berhenti membimbing jiwa-jiwa yang malang itu.  {nl}Kapankah ini akan berakhir?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I shall leave when the time comes. {nl}But until then, I will protect this place.
가야 할 때가 온다면 떠나겠지요.{nl}하지만 그때까지는 이곳을 지키려 합니다.
Jika saatnya tiba aku akan pergi.  {nl}Namun sebelum itu terjadi, Aku akan melindungi tempat ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There's still so many more things to research...
아직 연구할 게 많이 남아 있는데..
Masih banyak yang harus diteliti…

Please select the user requiring a quest: Where are the others? {nl}The merchants? {nl}The soldiers? {nl}Where are the teachers?
다른 사람들은 어디 갔죠?{nl}상인 아저씨는요? 제 병사는? 선생님은 또 어디 가신 거지..
Kemana perginya orang-orang?  {nl} Para Merchant? Para Prajurit? Juga dimana Para Guru?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've never seen a Sequoia go crazy like that. {nl}We'll all be destroyed. We will become dust!
저렇게 미쳐 날뛰는 세콰이아는 처음 봐.{nl}우린 아마 다 부서져 버릴거야. 전부 먼지가 될 거라고!
Aku tidak pernah melihat Sequoia mengamuk seperti itu.  {nl}Kita semua akan hancur. Akan menjadi debu!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Long ago, I befriended many humans. {nl}It's not a pleasant thing to meet your friends again as souls.
옛날엔, 많은 인간들과 친구가 되었었지요.{nl}한번 친해진 인간이 영혼이 되어 다시 만난다는 건 별로 달가운 일이 아닙니다.
Dulu kala, Aku berteman dengan para manusia.  {nl}Rasanya sangat tidak nyaman bertemu teman lama dalam bentuk jiwa.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Isn't it cute? {nl}I was nervous when I first saw it, but it approached and cuddled me. {nl}It's so cute. I'm gonna have to take it home with me some day.
요놈 참 귀엽지 않나요?{nl}처음 보는 몬스터라 긴장했는데, 먼저 다가와선 애교를 부리더라고요.{nl}어찌나 북슬거리고 귀여운지.. 언젠간 집에 데려다가 키울 겁니다.
Bukankah ini sangat menggemaskan?  {nl}Aku merasa gugup saat pertama kali melihatnya, tapi dia menghampiriku langsung dan terlihat sangat manja.  {nl}Sangat menggemaskan. Suatu hari aku akan membawanya pulang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's not easy working in the woods, but it's better than the dried and weathered valley. {nl}I heard the wind there is hot. I don't want to go there.
숲에서 일하는 것은 힘들지만, 바싹 마른 협곡보다는 숲이 좋지요.{nl}거기는 뜨거운 바람이 분다고 하던데.. 가고 싶지 않습니다.
Tidak mudah bekerja di hutan, tapi lebih baik daripada di bukit dengan iklim yang aneh.  {nl}Aku dengar disana anginnya cukup panas. Aku tidak ingin pergi kesana.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We always lack soldiers, but thankfully not eager, young men.
병사는 언제나 부족하고 혈기 넘치는 젊은이들은 넘쳐 나지.{nl}
Kita kekurangan tenaga prajurit, tapi banyak generasi muda yang bersemangat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Then what's the problem? {nl}We make soldiers, not coffins. {nl}You need strength to join the war, mere passion will just lead to defeat.
그럼 대체 뭐가 문제냐고?{nl}우리는 병사를 훈련하는 일을 하는 거지 관 짜는 사람들이 아니야.{nl}전쟁은 기세로 하는 거지만 혈기는 패배로 가는 길이지.
Lalu apa masalahnya?  {nl}Kita melatih prajurit, bukan peti mati.  {nl}Kamu butuh kekuatan dalam peperangan, semangat tidak bisa menjamin kemenangan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The goddess is also indifferent... {nl}I still have a many things I want to do... But I was killed by the monster... {nl}Many others have also died, their belongings scattered around the forest.
생각해보면 여신께서도 무심하십니다..{nl}아직 하고 싶은 일이 많았는데.. 몬스터에게 죽다니..{nl}저 말고 죽은 사람이 얼마나 많은지, 숲 속에 그들의 물건이 흩어져 있을 정도입니다.
Para Goddess juga acuh tak acuh…  {nl}Aku masih memiliki banyak hal yang ingin dikerjakan… Tapi aku terbunuh oleh monster…  {nl}Masih banyak lagi yang mati. Barang-barang milik mereka tersebar di penjuru hutan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't have much memory of when I was alive. {nl}The monsters raided when the Owl Statue was about to guide me and then I was left alone. {nl}I hope there won't be other souls like me any more.
살아 있었을 때의 기억은 잘 나지 않습니다.{nl}부엉이 조각상이 저를 인도하려 했을 때 몬스터가 조각상을 습격했고, 저만 남았지요.{nl}가능하다면 저 같은 영혼이 더 늘지 않았으면 좋겠습니다.
Aku tidak ingat banyak hal saat masih hidup.  {nl}Monster menyerang kesini saat Owl Statue sedang membimbingku lalu aku tertinggal sendiri.  {nl}Aku harap tidak ada lagi jiwa-jiwa yang tersesat sepertiku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You are the chosen one. {nl}Do not forget that. {nl}The revelation is prepared for you. {nl}You need to get the revelation and carry on the will of goddess.
당신은 선택받은 존재입니다.{nl}항상 그 사실을 잊지 마세요.{nl}계시는 당신을 위해 준비되어 있습니다.{nl}계시를 얻어 여신의 뜻을 품으셔야 합니다.
Kamu adalah orang terpilih.  {nl}Jangan lupakan itu.  {nl}Wahyu telah disiapkan untukmu.  {nl}Kamu harus mendapatkan wahyu itu dan menjalankan titah dari Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: May the blessings of goddess be with you in your journey.
당신의 길에 여신의 축복이 함께하기를 빌겠습니다.
Semoga berkat dari Goddess menyertaimu dalam perjalanan ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You can get stamina by destroying Tree Root Crystals. {nl}It grows back after you destroy it. Weird, huh?
나무뿌리 수정을 파괴하면 스태미나를 얻을 수 있습니다.{nl}파괴하면 또 자라난다고 하니 참 기괴하죠?{nl}
Kamu bisa mendapatkan stamina dengan menghancurkan Tree Root Crystals.  {nl}Mereka tumbuh lagi setelah kau hancurkan. Misterius bukan?

Please select the user requiring a quest: When the Divine Beast raged in the capital, I was born.
수도에서 신수가 솟아오를 때, 같이 생겨났다네요.
Saat Divine Beast mengamuk di capital, aku terlahir.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We are willing to accept additional requests but... {nl}If something like this were to happen without notice then... Phew...
추가적인 요청은 저희도 어느 정도 융통성 있게 받아 주고 있습니다만..{nl}말도 없다가 갑자기 이런 큰일이 닥치면.. 후우우우우..
Kami cukup fleksibel menerima permintaan lain tapi…  {nl}Jika sesuatu seperti ini terjadi tanpa pemberitahuan… Phew……

Please select the user requiring a quest: Isn't Vacenin really nice? {nl}I really want to enlist in his unit but I can't find the right opportunity.
바세닌님 정말 멋지지 않습니까?{nl}어떻게든 바세닌님의 부대에 들어가고 싶은데.. 어째 쉽게 기회가 오질 않는군요.
Vacenin sangat baik bukan?  {nl}Aku ingin mendaftar sebagai unit Vacenin, tapi aku berpikir mengapa sangat sulit mendapatkan kesempatan itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Well... It is better to meet people when they're alive than dead, you know?
뭐.. 아무래도 영혼 보다는 살아있는 사람을 만나는 게 더 기쁘지 않겠어요?
Yah… Lebih baik bertemu orang yang masih hidup daripada bertemu jiwa nya, kamu tahu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I was waiting for the Owl Statue to guide me. {nl}But I saw a strong monster swallow a soul, so I hid. {nl}I barely saved myself but you must kill that monster to save the captured soul.
저는 부엉이 조각상이 저를 이끌어 줄 순간을 기다리고 있었습니다.{nl}그 사이에 강해 보이는 몬스터가 영혼을 끌어들여 삼키는 것을 보고 숨었습니다.{nl}저는 간신히 피했지만, 사로잡힌 영혼을 구하려면 몬스터를 처치해야 할 것 같더군요.
Aku menunggu Owl Statue untuk membimbingku.  {nl}Namun aku melihat monster menelan jiwa-jiwa lalu bersembunyi.  {nl}Aku berhasil bersembunyi, namun kamu harus mengalahkan monster tersebut untuk melepaskan jiwa yang terjebak di dalam.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know about the other owls, but I still have hope. {nl}The goddess will not abandon us. {nl}Looking at the revelations left in the world, I'm sure she has plans for us. {nl}Please gather the scattered revelations.
다른 부엉이들은 몰라도, 저는 희망을 버리지 않고 있습니다.{nl}여신께서 세상을 버릴 리 없으니 말입니다.{nl}세상에 남겨진 계시를 생각해보면 뭔가 깊은 뜻을 가지고 계신 게 틀림없습니다.{nl}흩어진 계시를 어서 모아 주세요.
Aku tidak tahu tentang Owl yang lainnya, namun aku masih punya harapan.  {nl}Goddess tidak akan mengabaikan kita.  {nl}Melihat wahyu-wahyu yang ditinggalkan mereka di dunia, Aku yakin dia punya rencana untuk kita.  {nl}Tolong kumpulkan wahyu yang tersebar.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Bramble's subordinates are still going wild. {nl}More people will die if this goes on. {nl}Please help the humans fighting against monsters.
브람블의 부하들은 아직도 날뛰고 있습니다.{nl}이대로라면 더 많은 인간이 희생될 게 분명합니다.{nl}계시자님께서 몬스터와 맞서는 인간들을 도와주세요.
Anak buah Bramble masih mengamuk.  {nl}Akan banyak korban bila tidak dihentikan.  {nl}Tolong bantu melawan monster itu demi umat manusia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Well... Why am I still here? {nl}Maybe it's not yet my time to leave. {nl}No one knows, not the Owl Statue nor other souls. {nl}Unless it was the goddess who can see the future. No one knows their fate anyway, right?
글쎄요.. 제가 왜 여기에 계속 있을까요?{nl}아마 저는 아직 떠날 때가 되지 않아서가 아닐까요?{nl}부엉이 조각상들도 모르고, 다른 영혼들도 모르죠.{nl}미래를 보는 여신이라면 모를까, 어차피 자신의 미래를 알 수는 없잖아요?
Yaa… Mengapa aku masih disini?  {nl}Mungkin bukan saatnya untuk pergi?  {nl}Tidak ada yang tahu, tidak satupun.  {nl}Hanya Goddess yang bisa melihat masa depan. Tidak ada orang yang tahu akan takdir mereka, bukan?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Have you not met other Revelators yet?
아직 다른 계시자들을 만난 적이 없으신가 보지요?{nl}
Apakah kamu sudah bertemu Savior lainnya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know much about the Dream of goddess or the revelation... {nl}But one thing for sure is that there are a lot of people like you.
여신의 꿈이나 계시에 대해서 잘 아는 건 아닙니다만..{nl}확실한 건 당신과 같은 사람들이 한둘이 아니라는 겁니다.{nl}
Aku tidak tahu banyak tentang mimpi Goddess ataupun wahyunya…  {nl}Tapi satu hal yang pasti bahwa ada banyak orang sepertimu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I named it Spion. {nl}Why I named it that is... Well... Doesn't it sound cool?
얘 이름은 스피온이라고 지었죠.{nl}왜 이렇게 지었느냐면 음.. 그냥 멋져 보이잖아요?
Aku memberi nama Spion.  {nl}Kenapa aku memberi nama itu… yaa… bukankah itu terdengar keren?

Please select the user requiring a quest: That guy who's playing with a furry friend is Pitt, my long time friend. {nl}We've been friends since we were young and emotional. We really wanted to be heroes.
저기서 털북숭이랑 놀고 있는 피트랑 전, 어릴 적부터 친구였어요.{nl}한창 감수성이 폭풍 같았던 사춘기 때 말이죠, 멋진 영웅이 정말 되고 싶었어요.{nl}
Orang yang bermain bersama teman berbulu ini adalah Pitt, teman lamaku.  {nl}Kami sudah berteman sejak masih kecil dan emosional. Kami ingin sekali menjadi pahlawan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: And while listening to stories about Vacenin, we just entered the army. {nl}But isn't it cool? One day, I will enter Vacenin's troops and be a hero.
그러다 동네에 가끔 들려오는 바세닌님의 무용담을 듣다가 말이죠, 그만.. 그 길로 입대해버렸죠. {nl}그래도 멋지잖아요? 언젠간 바세닌님의 부대에 들어가서 꼭 공을 세우고 말 겁니다.
Dan saat mendengar cerita tentang Vacenin, kami baru masuk dunia militer.  {nl}Tapi bukankah itu terdengar keren? Suatu hari, Aku akan bergabung dengan pasukan Vacenin dan menjadi pahlawan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Your abilities prove your competence. {nl}If you have something to say, do it with results!
능력은 실력으로 입증하는 거다.{nl}할 말이 있다면, 결과로 가져오는 거다!
Kemampuanmu membuktikan prestasimu.  {nl}Jika kamu ingin menyampaikan sesuatu, buktikan dengan suatu hasil!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Only the best soldiers are accepted to Vacenin's troops. {nl}It's important to prove that you are the best.
바세닌님의 부대에 들어가는 병사는 최고가 아니면 안 돼.{nl}어떻게든 네가 최고라는 걸 증명하는 것이 가장 중요하다.
Hanya prajurit terbaik yang terpilih masuk ke Vacenin's troops.  {nl}Buktikan bahwa kamu yang terbaik.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oh... That's weird. I had it all here a while ago...
아.. 이상하다. 분명히 아까 잔뜩 구해 놨는데..
Oh… Itu cukup aneh. Beberapa saat lalu aku masih punya semuanya…

Please select the user requiring a quest: About half of the supplies are transferred from each town and the rest are old ones that are repaired or self-supported. {nl}You can't expect their morale to be high when the situation is like this.
물자의 반 정도는 각 도시에서 차출되고 나머지는 전부 없는 대로 고쳐 쓰거나 자급자족입니다.{nl}상황이 이런데 사기가 높길 바라는 건 말도 안 되죠.
Setengah dari supply dikirimkan dari tiap kota, dan sisanya sudah tua dan harus diperbaiki atau dibantu.  {nl}Kamu tidak bisa mengharapkan mereka memiliki semangat yang membara dalam situasi seperti ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I sell equipment to soldiers who lack supplies. {nl}Can't give them away though. I have a family to feed...
물자가 부족한 병사들을 상태로 장비들을 팔고 있습니다.{nl}어째서 무상지원이 아니냐고 하셔도 어쩔 수 없습니다. 저도 처자식이 있는 걸요..
Aku menjual perlengkapan kepada prajurit yang kekurangan suplai.  {nl}Kamu tidak bisa meminta itu secara cuma-cuma. Aku punya keluarga untuk diberi makan…

Please select the user requiring a quest: I can't rest even for a little while because of the Vubbes.
부베들 때문에 이곳에선 잠시도 쉴 틈이 없습니다.
Aku tidak bisa istirahat bahkan untuk beberapa saat karena Vubbes.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You never know when monsters will appear in trails like these.
이렇게 오솔길이 많은 곳에선 몬스터들이 어디서 튀어나올지 모릅니다.
Kamu tidak bisa menerka kapan monster akan muncul dalam situasi ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've got some antidotes left. {nl}Take as many as you want.
해독제라면 남은 게 있지.{nl}얼마든지 가져가게.
Aku punya antidotes yang tersisa.  {nl}Bawalah sebanyak yang kamu mau.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Sorry I can't be of much help.
도움이 되질 못 해서 미안허이.
Maaf jika aku tidak bisa membantu banyak.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Antidote? {nl}Of course I have some.
해독제요?{nl}아 물론 가지고 있죠.
Antidote?  {nl} Oh, tentu aku punya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I used up what I had... {nl}But the people across may have some.
제가 가지고 있는 건 예전에 다 써 버렸는데..{nl}건너편의 다른 사람들이라면 가지고 있을지도 모르겠군요.
Aku sudah menggunakannya. Mungkin ada orang lain disekitar yang masih punya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You came here without antidotes? {nl}Here, take this.
해독제도 없이 이 동넬 왔답니까?{nl}빨리 가져가세요.
Kamu datang kesini tanpa antidotes?  {nl}Ini, ambilah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I ran out. {nl}Maybe others have some.
제 건 다 떨어졌는데요.{nl}다른 사람들이 가지고 있을 겁니다.
Aku sudah kehabisan.  {nl}Mungkin orang lain ada yang punya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I have antidotes. {nl}I'll wish for Dezek's well being.
해독제라면, 가지고 있지요.{nl}데지크 선생의 완쾌를 빌겠습니다.
Aku punya Antidote.  {nl}Semoga Dezek's cepat sembuh.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Dezek's lucky. {nl}Usually, he'd been eaten.
그래도 데지크 선생은 운이 좋은 겁니다.{nl}보통은 잡아먹혀 버리니까요.
Dezek masih beruntung.  {nl}Biasanya, mereka tidak selamat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You must be out of your mind going around the gorge without antidotes. {nl}Here, take this.
협곡 지역에서 해독제 없이 돌아다니다니, 제정신이 아니군.{nl}자. 여기 받게.
Kamu pasti sudah gila, berkeliaran disini namun tidak punya antidote.  {nl}Ini, bawalah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I used up all I had a few days ago. {nl}Maybe some other people have it.
내가 가진 건 며칠 전에 이미 다 써버렸어.{nl}다른 사람이라면 가지고 있을 지도.
Sudah aku habiskan beberapa hari lalu.  {nl}Sepertinya ada orang lain yang punya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's a good day for Scorpio to show up. {nl}Damp and dark.
스콜피오가 나타나기 딱 좋은 날씨네요.{nl}눅눅하고, 어둡고.
Hari yang cocok untuk Scorpion keluar.  {nl}Gelap dan lembab.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There are many scorpions here. {nl}I get chills on my neck whenever something cracks underfoot.
여긴 참 전갈이 많아요.{nl}어쩌다 발에서 와그작 소리가 나면 뒷목이 서늘하다니까요.
Banyak Scorpion disini  {nl}Aku merasa merinding saat mendengar bunyi aneh dibawah kakiku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Be careful during rainy dusks like these. {nl}Scorpio tend to show up around these times.
지금처럼 비 오는 어스름한 때를 조심하게.{nl}스콜피오가 나타나기 좋거든.{nl}
Berhati-hatilah saat hujan dikala senja.  {nl}Scorpion biasanya muncul pada saat seperti ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Scorpio are venomous nowadays. {nl}You have to be careful.
요새 스콜피오가 독이 바짝 오를 시기입니다.{nl}조심하셔야 할 겁니다.
Scorpion memiliki bisa yang berbahaya.  {nl}Kamu harus berhati-hati.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Rain again. {nl}The Scorpio must be moving around now.
또 비야.{nl}스콜피오가 슬슬 돌아다니겠어.
Hujan lagi.  {nl}Scorpion mungkin sudah mulai bergerak disekitar.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Carved Writings
새겨진 글
Carved Writings

Please select the user requiring a quest: I have prepared five dilemmas so that our enemy can't get their hands on it. {nl}But neither of you can pass it if you are not prepared.
우리의 적이 감히 손댈 수 없도록 짐은 5개의 난제를 준비 해 두었다.{nl}허나 그대가 준비되어 있지 않다면 그대 또한 넘을 수 없다.{nl}
Aku sudah menyiapkan lima jebakan agar musuh tidak bisa mengambilnya.  {nl}Namun kamu juga tidak bisa lewat jika belum siap.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Find it. The road will open when it has been proven that you are the true Revelator.
찾아라. 진정한 구원자임이 증명 될 때 길이 열릴 것이다.{nl}
Carilah. Jalan itu akan terbuka jika terbukti bahwa kamu adalah sang Savior.

Please select the user requiring a quest: What makes you walk towards the light in a place full of darkness?
어둠으로 가득 찬 장소에서 빛을 향해 걸을 수 있게 만드는 것은 무엇인가.
Apa yang membuatmu berjalan lurus mengikuti cahaya di tengah ruang yang penuh kegelapan?

Please select the user requiring a quest: The harder you seek it, the stronger you become, but if you refuse to seek it, you will become weak. {nl}What is it?
이것을 찾기 위해 노력할수록 강해질 것이나 찾지 않으면 약해질 것이다.{nl}이것은 무엇인가.
Semakin kamu berusaha untuk menemukan ini, maka kamu akan semakin kuat, jika kamu tidak menemukannya, kamu akan menjadi lemah.  {nl}Apakah itu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Aide de Camp Selina
부관 셀리나
Aide de Camp Selina

Please select the user requiring a quest: The number of days where squads like us have to stay self-sufficient is growing. {nl}We sometimes joke about plowing a farm for ourselves, {nl}but nowadays we're actually considering it.
부대 내에서 자급자족으로 버텨야 하는 기간이 점점 늘어나고 있습니다. {nl}예전엔 이러다 밭이라도 갈겠다며 농담조로 말했지만, 지금은 다들 그럴 법하다는 분위깁니다.
Kami harus semakin mandiri.  {nl}Kami bahkan menganggap itu sebagai lelucon,   {nl}tapi sekarang itu bukan lelucon lagi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Beholder
주시자
Beholder

Please select the user requiring a quest: If it isn't you, the one who released Goddess Saule. {nl}Why are you putting your life on the line?
사울레 여신을 해방시켜 주었다는 이가 바로 너로구나.{nl}하지만 무엇을 위해 목숨을 거는 거지?{nl}
Bukankah itu kamu, seseorang yang melepaskan Goddess Saule.  {nl}Mengapa kamu mempertaruhkan nyawamu untuknya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: There's no need for all these troubles. {nl}You should follow the others' example and immerse yourself in peace. {nl}And pray that the goddess will grant you your wishes.
더 이상 애쓸 필요가 없다.{nl}다른 이들처럼 여신이 기도를 들어주길 바라며 평화에 젖어 있는 게 네가 할 일이다.
Kamu tidak perlu menyusahkan dirimu.{nl}Kamu seharusnya mengikuti yang lain dengan mendamaikan dirimu  sendiri{nl}dan meminta pada Goddess untuk mengabulkan permintaanmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I warned you, but you just wouldn't listen.
그렇게 충고했는데 도무지 말을 듣질 않는군.
Aku telah mengingatkanmu, tapi kamu tidak mendengarkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You shall pay the price for your choice.
선택의 대가를 치르게 될 것이다.
Kamu harus membayar pilihanmu sendiri.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I have underestimated you.
내가 너를 과소평가했다.{nl}
Aku telah meremehkan kamu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This isn't over! {nl}I'll be watching from the Fallen Worry Forest.
허나 이걸로 절대 끝났다고 생각하지 마라.{nl}낙우림에서 지켜볼 테니까.
Ini belum berakhir.  {nl}Aku akan mengawasimu dari Fallen Worry Forest.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Warning
경고판
Peringatan

Please select the user requiring a quest: Tainted. Do not use!
오염으로 사용 금지!!
Jangan digunakan. Sudah terkontaminasi!

Please select the user requiring a quest: This is the first revelation I made.{nl}For you, it will be the third.
이 계시는 제가 처음으로 만든 계시입니다.{nl}당신에게 있어선 세 번째 계시이겠지요.{nl}
Ini adalah wahyu pertama yang aku buat.  {nl}Untukmu, mungkin ini adalah yang ketiga.

Please select the user requiring a quest: My strength will weaken every time I put a part of myself into a revelation.{nl}More than a thousand years will have passed by the time this revelation reaches you, {nl}and even my consciousness will have ceased to exist.
계시에 제 일부를 담을 때마다 저의 힘은 점점 줄어들 것입니다.{nl}이 계시가 천 년 하고도 더 오랜 뒤에 당신에게 닿았을 때는 이미 의식조차 사라진 뒤일 테지요.{nl}
Kekuatanku melemah setiap aku memasukkan bagian dari diriku kepada wahyu-wahyu ini.  {nl}Saat wahyu ini telah sampai kepada tanganmu, lebih dari ribuan tahun sudah dilalui,  {nl}dan sampai saai itu juga kesadaranku belum pulih.

Please select the user requiring a quest: That is why I needed to find a guardian to protect the revelation.{nl}Unfortunately, my sisters and I did not come to an agreement on my revelation, {nl}and I was not able to leave the revelation to most of them.
그렇기에 계시를 지킬 수호자를 반드시 찾아야 했습니다.{nl}하지만 안타깝게도 저와 저의 자매들은 뜻을 달리 했기에 계시를 맡길 수 없었습니다.{nl}
Karena itu aku harus bertemu dengan guardian untuk melindungi wahyu ini.  {nl}Sayangnya, aku dan saudariku tidak menyetujuinya  {nl}dan kami tidak meninggalkan wahyu itu kepada siapapun.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Only Saule supported my revelation so I left her with this revelation.{nl}And for a very long time, I went on a journey in search of a guardian.
오직 사울레만이 저의 뜻을 따라 주었기에 이 계시를 맡길 수 있을 것입니다.{nl}그리고 나선 아주 오랜 세월동안 수호자를 찾는 여행을 떠나게 되겠지요.{nl}
Hanya Saule yang mengikutiku sehingga aku bisa meninggalkan wahyu ini.  {nl}Dan dalam waktu yang sangat panjang, Aku bepergian untuk mencari seorang guardian.

Please select the user requiring a quest: When I thought about humans like you, a promising idea came up.{nl}The demons look down on humans so, {nl}they could not even imagine that I would leave the revelation to you.
저는 당신과 같은 인간이라는 존재를 떠올렸을 땐 밝은 빛을 보았습니다.{nl}마족들은 인간을 하찮게 여기기에 계시를 맡길 거라곤 생각치 못하겠지요.{nl}
Saat aku berpikir tentang manusia seperti dirimu, Aku melihat cahaya.  {nl}Para demon juga memandang rendah manusia  {nl}mereka juga tidak akan menyangka bahwa wahyu itu kuberikan kepada manusia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: But most of all, I trusted humans.{nl}You must have seen it yourself by now.{nl}Despite going through disasters such as the Tree of Despair, {nl}humans don't lose hope easily.
하지만 그 무엇보다도 전 인간을 믿었습니다.{nl}그대들이 절망의 나무라 부르는 재앙에도 인간은 쉽게 꺾이지 않음을 당신도 보았을 것입니다.{nl}
Tapi yang terpenting, Aku mempercayai manusia.  {nl}Kamu juga harus melihat bahwa  {nl}meskipun terjadi bencana seperti Tree of Despair,  {nl}manusia tetap tidak kehilangan harapan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The guardian of the next revelation will be one who unites the kingdom. {nl}You can find my next revelation in the deepest part of the Royal Mausoleum where he rests.
다음 계시의 수호자는 왕국 통일의 위업을 이룬 인간에게 맡기겠습니다.{nl}그가 잠들어 있는 왕릉의 가장 깊은 곳에서 저의 다음 계시를 얻을 수 있을 것입니다.
Sang Guardian dari wahyu berikutnya adalah orang yang akan menyatukan kerajaan.  {nl}Kamu bisa menemukan wahyu berikutnya di bagian terdalam pada Royal Tomb tempat dimana dia beristirahat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The mausoleum is in the valley area. {nl}I will open the portal for you.
다음 계시가 있다는 왕릉은 협곡지대에 있습니다.{nl}제가 포탈을 열어 드리지요.
The Mausoleum berada di area berbukit.  {nl}Aku akan membuka portal untukmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Trapped Soul of Soldier
속박된 병사 영혼
Trapped Soul of Soldier

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please help.
도와주십시오.
Tolong bantu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Take me to the goddess.
여신께 보내줘.
Bawa aku ke Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's so painful
고통스럽습니다.
Ini sangat menyakitkan

Please select the user requiring a quest: It seems to be asleep.
잠들어 있는 것 같다.
Sepertinya tertidur

Please select the user requiring a quest: Enraged Owl Statue
분노한 부엉이 조각상
Enraged Owl Statue

Please select the user requiring a quest: No responses.
반응이 없다.
Tidak ada respon.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Regretful Merchant's Soul
미련많은 상인 영혼
Regretful Merchant's Soul

Please select the user requiring a quest: If you don't have money, you're no different from a dead man.
돈이 없으면 송장이랑 다를 바가 뭐야.
Jika kamu tidak mempunyai uang, kamu tidak berbeda dengan orang mati.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I should've listened to my wife. {nl}She said it's bad luck to be friends with scholars... {nl}I'm really going out of business!
아내 말을 들을걸.{nl}학자 나부랭이들과 가까이 지내면 망한다고 했는데.. 정말 망할 것 같다고!
Seharusnya aku mendengarkan kata-kata istriku.  {nl}Dia bilang aku akan bernasib buruk jika berteman dengan scholars…  {nl}Sepertinya aku harus pergi dari hal seperti ini!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Perhaps I can make up for the loss if I can somehow retrieve the items...
물건만 어떻게 회수하면 어떻게든 큰 손해는 면할 것 같은데..{nl}
Sepertinya aku bisa mengganti rugi jika aku mendapatkan item itu…

Please select the user requiring a quest: Sleeping Owl Statue
잠든 부엉이 조각상
Sleeping Owl Statue

Please select the user requiring a quest: (It seems to be in very deep sleep.)
깊게 잠든 것 같다
Sepertinya sedang tertidur pulas

Please select the user requiring a quest: (There is no response at all.)

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm the pirate who lost his ship last! {nl}Hmm... I like the sound of that.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Haha, thank you. {nl}Remember, it must be the tree in the central square.
껄껄, 고맙네그려. {nl}중심 시가에 있는 그 나무가 아니면 절대 안 되니 꼭 명심하게.
Haha, terima kasih.  {nl} Ingat, itu pasti pohon yang ada di central square.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Blaster Luina
폭파병 루이나
Blaster Luina

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Hogmas are breaking in through an entrance they found. {nl}We were asked to destroy that entrance to block their invasions.
이번에 발견된 왕릉 입구로 호그마녀석들이 침입하고 있습니다. 의뢰인들은 입구를 파괴하여 호그마들이 더 이상 침입하지 못하게 해달라고 하셨죠.
Hogmas telah menerobos masuk ke celah yang mereka temukan.  {nl}Kita diminta untuk menghancurkan celah tempat mereka masuk.

Please select the user requiring a quest: But after being attacked, I am out of bombs.
하지만 습격당한 탓에 제겐 더 이상 폭탄이 없습니다.
Tapi setelah terkena serangan, Aku tidak punya bomb lagi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The box contains bombs that are good for one-time use. {nl}Use it to destroy the barricade they made.
상자에 한 번 쓸 분량의 폭탄이 들어있습니다. 그걸 사용해서 호그마 녀석들이 만들어둔 바리케이트를 부수세요.
Ada bomb yang cukup bagus untuk satu-kali penggunaan di box.  {nl}Gunakan itu untuk menghancurkan barikade yang mereka buat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: And get something from them that can be used as explosives.
그리고 녀석들에게서 폭발할만한 물건들을 찾아와 주십시오.

어서 오세요!{nl}잘 둘러보시면 좋은 물건을 싼값에 구할 수 있을지도 모르죠.{nl}그 반대도 물론 가능하답니다.
Selamat Datang!  {nl}Kamu bisa membeli item yang bagus dengan harga murah jika teliti.  {nl}Tentu saja, itu juga mungkin mengeluarkan jumlah besar pada sesuatu yang seharusnya menjadi murah …

Bunga-bunga mawar masih memiliki aroma. Akan menjadi layu seiring dengan waktu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Benevolent Old Man
인자한 할아버지
Benevolent Old Man

Please select the user requiring a quest: When I was a kid, I heard that the demons were sealed in the Crystal Mine. {nl}If that's true, then we're in trouble.
어렸을 때, 수정광산에 위험한 마족을 봉인했다는 옛날 이야기를 들은 적이 있네.{nl}그게 만약 진짜라면 지금 굉장히 위험한 상황이 아닐까 싶어.
Saat aku masih kecil, aku dengar ada demon yang di segel dalam Crystal Mines.  {nl}Jika hal itu benar, berarti kita dalam bahaya besar sekarang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm not sure if the mine should be operating at a dangerous time like this. {nl}Even if mining is our livelihood, our lives are still more important.
이렇게 위험한 때에 광산을 운영해도 되는가 모르겠어.{nl}아무리 클라페다가 광산 때문에 먹고 산다지만 사람 목숨이 더 중요할 텐데.
Aku tidak yakin Mine harus beroperasi dalam situasi berbahaya seperti sekarang.  {nl} Meskipun mining adalah pekerjaan pokok, namun nyawa seseorang itu lebih penting tahu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I used to be a miner myself. {nl}I didn't see many monsters back then, but I heard it's very different nowadays.
나도 예전엔 광부였지.{nl}그 땐 몬스터라곤 거의 본 적이 없었는데 지금은 말도 못한다 그러더군.
Dulu aku juga seorang Miner.  {nl}Aku sangat jarang melihat monster pada saat itu namun sekarang keadaannya berbeda.

Please select the user requiring a quest: They say there are many holy relics hidden in the Tenet Church. {nl}Some of them are said to transport people to a place where no one can go... {nl}Amazing, isn't it?
테넷 성당엔 여러가지 성스러운 유물들을 숨겨 놓았다고 그러더군요.{nl}어떤 물건은 아무도 갈 수 없는 곳으로 이동시켜 준다고 하던데.. 신기하죠?
Mereka berkata bahwa banyak peninggalan suci tersembunyi di Tenet Church.  {nl} Aku mendengar beberapa hal untuk memindahkan orang-orang ke tempat dimana orang tidak bisa pergi.. {nl}Greget bukan?

Please select the user requiring a quest: One day, I will find out. {nl}Even if that entails my meeting the goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know what to do if you are like that...

별도의 조치 시까지 수정광산 제2광구는 안전상의 이유로 폐쇄합니다.{nl}- 클라페다 광산 조합

어서 오세요! 광부 휴게소입니다.{nl}따뜻하게 데운 술과 맛 좋은 감자만두가 준비되어 있습니다.{nl}{nl}영업시간 : 광산 가동 시간과 동일 - 동절기, 하절기에 따라 변화가 있을 수 있습니다.
Selamat datang! Ini adalah Mine Worker's Resting Place.  {nl}Kentang hangat dan minuman yang enak sudah tersedia.  {nl}{nl} Waktu operasi : sama seperti waktu mining, mungkin berubah seiring dengan musim.

Ini adalah Crystal Mine.  {nl} Sanksi akan diberikan dan kamu akan dipaksa untuk pergi jika kamu tidak mengikuti peraturan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: 1. Always wear a helmet and protective gear. {nl}2. Do not enter restricted areas. {nl}3. Never carry flammable objects. {nl}4. If you see any monsters, do not fight them and file a report immediately.
1. 반드시 보호장비와 안전모 착용{nl}2. 허용된 구역 외 출입 금지{nl}3. 화기 소지 절대 불허{nl}4. 몬스터 발견 시 혼자 상대하지 말고 즉각 보고 할 것.
1. Selalu gunakan perlengkapan dan helm  {nl}2. Jangan memasuki area yang dilarang  {nl}3. Jangan pernah membawa barang mudah meledak  {nl}4. Ketika kamu melihat monster, jangan menyerang dan laporkan secepatnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Also, we are hiring young men and families who wish to migrate. {nl} - Safe workplace, healthy happiness! Crystal Mine Youth Association
그 외 건강한 청년 구직 희망자 및 이주 희망 가정을 모집하고 있습니다.{nl}- 안전한 일터, 건강한 행복! 수정광산 청년회 일동

Please select the user requiring a quest: Warning! Keep out! {nl}Stay away if you value your life.

Banyak sekali barang yang hilang disini.  {nl}Mungkin para monster yang mengambilnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It would seem the other monsters have what remains.
나머진 몬스터들이 가지고 있지 않을까 싶습니다.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thank you.
감사합니다.
Terima kasih kawan.

순례자
Pilgrim

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm so hungry. {nl}Please give me something to eat.
너무 배가 고파요. 제게 먹을 걸 주세요.
Aku sangat lapar. Tolong beri Aku sesuatu untuk makan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: That's not enough. {nl}Give him some more meat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: He says he feels dizzy. {nl}Is the medicine not working?

Dia bilang dia merasa pusing.  {nl}Apakah obatnya tidak bekerja?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Are you still hungry...?
허기가 사라진건가..?
Apa kamu masih lapar?

Please select the user requiring a quest: He sounds troubled. {nl}These pots are sometimes sold to pilgrims who come to pray. {nl}The profits are all used as donations for restoring Fedimian.
저 양반은 무슨 큰일날 소릴 한담.{nl}이 도자기들은 다른 도시에서 기도하러 온 순례객들에게 팔기도 한다우.{nl}그 수익금은 전부 페디미안 복구 성금으로 들어가지.

페디미안 일꾼

Aku hanya mengetahui silver craft, jadi hanya ini yang bisa aku bantu.  {nl}Tentu saja, Aku akan membantu memperbaiki wilayah market jika aku sanggup.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Old Potter
늙은 도공
Old Potter

난 원래 은공예를 하면서 먹고 살았는데 지금은 특기를 살려서 도자기 장식을 만들고 있네.{nl}왕국 각지에서 사람들이 소원을 빌기 위해 모여들거든.
Biasanya aku mengerjakan silver craft, namun sekarang aku menggunakan kemampuanku untuk menghias tembikar.  {nl}Orang-orang dari penjuru kerajaan datang kesini untuk berdoa dan memohon dengan tembikar itu.

Wagon Carrier

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's a pot to put your wishes in. {nl}Look inside and you'll see clay tablets with wishes written on them. {nl}Some of them are pretty funny.
아무래도 소원을 담는 도자기다 보니 도자기 안에 소원을 적은 점토판을 넣기도 하지.{nl}잘 찾아보면 재미있는 소원을 읽어 볼 수도 있을거야.
Itu adalah sebuah pot untuk menaruh doa.  {nl}Lihatlah di dalamnya ada lempengan tanah yang tertulis doa.  {nl}Beberapa diantaranya, banyak doa yang lucu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thankfully, workers from different areas are gathering to help restore Fedimian. {nl}Look at where we've come since Medzio Diena. {nl}I really thought the world would end that day.

Syukurlah, Para pekerja berkumpul dari berbagai wilayah untuk membantu memperbaiki Fedimian.  {nl}Saat itu ketika Divine Day. {nl}Aku berpikir bahwa dunia akan segera berakhir .

찬란히 빛나는 영원한 왕국이여.{nl}자카리엘은 이 땅을 하나의 강력한 왕국으로 통일시키는데 성공했다.{nl}

천년제 이야기

Please select the user requiring a quest: Everyone's drinking honey mead, dancing to the goddesses, and laughing their hearts out.
많은 사람들은 벌꿀술을 들이켰고 여신께 올리는 춤을 추었으며 곳곳에서 웃음소리가 끊이지 않았다.

자카리엘이 왕국을 건국할 때 신수라고 불리는 나무를 중심으로 수도를 정했다.{nl}
Saat Zachariel mendirikan kerajaan, dia membuat kota besar di sekitar pohon yang disebut Divine Tree.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Emperor, together with priests, blessed this Divine Tree every year.
매년 국왕은 많은 사제들과 함께 이 성스러운 나무를 축복하였다.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Records of Medzio Diena
신수의 날의 기록

Please select the user requiring a quest: In the year 1091, less than 100 years after the celebration of Millenary, {nl}the Divine Tree suddenly surged from the ground and damaged many cities in its wake.
왕국 건국 1091년, 천년제를 치른 뒤 백년도 채 안되었을 때의 일이다.{nl}신수가 갑자기 솟구쳐 오르면서 수도와 많은 도시가 피해를 입었다.{nl}
Di tahun 1091, sebelum sampai 100 tahun setelah perayaan itu.  {nl}Divine Tree tiba-tiba keluar dari tanah dan menghancurkan beberapa bagian dari kota.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The tree was so tall that it touched the sky and none could measure its dimensions.
그 나무의 높이는 하늘을 찌를 정도이고 그 둘레는 누구도 잴 수 없었다.

Please select the user requiring a quest: If you could understand the nature of the changes, reversing it may be possible.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Declaration of Klaipeda Priest-Bishop
클라페다 주교령 포고문

Please select the user requiring a quest: On Medzio Diena, the Klaipeda Market disappeared and the king passed away. {nl}Most ministers and officials of the kingdom perished as well, so we cannot expect support from the Capital.
신수의 날에 클라페다 시장은 실종되었고 국왕 또한 승하하셨다.{nl}여러 대신들과 왕실의 고관들 역시 대부분 사망하였기 때문에 중앙의 지원도 바랄 수 없다.{nl}
Saat Divine Day, Market di Klaipeda menghilang dan sang raja meninggal.  {nl}Banyak pejabat dan perdana mentri menghilang, jadi kita tidak bisa berharap banyak pada kerajaan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hence, under the circumstances, I declare my autonomy as the bishop of Klaipeda. {nl} - Bishop Baek
이에 어쩔 수 없이 클라페다는 주교에 의한 비상 자치권을 행사한다.{nl}{nl}-클라페다 주교 백.
Pemerintahan darurat di bangun oleh bishop hanya itulah cara terakhir.  {nl}  {nl} - Klaipeda Bishop Baek.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hero Biography
영웅전
Hero Biography

Please select the user requiring a quest: If it wasn't for the four heroes, most cities would have probably been destroyed. {nl}Their holy weapons were a sight to behold during Medzio Diena.
위대한 4명의 영웅이 아니었다면 아마 대부분의 도시는 전부 파괴되었을지도 모릅니다.{nl}그들이 지니고 있는 성스러운 무기는 신수의 날에 많은 활약을 하였습니다.{nl}
Jika bukan karena empat pahlawan tersebut, kota ini mungkin sudah hancur.  {nl}Holy weapon milik mereka sangat luar biasa pada Divine Day.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Among them, the Paladin Master was a hero who saved many lives in the capital. {nl}Currently, he has gone to Silverstream Gorge to fight a great evil.
그 중 팔라딘 마스터는 수도에서 많은 이들을 구한 영웅입니다.{nl}현재 그는 거대한 악에 맞서기 위해 은수 협곡으로..
Diantara mereka, Paladin Master adalah salah satu yang banyak menyelamatkan nyawa di capital.  {nl}Saat ini, dia pergi ke Silver Stream Gorge untuk melawan iblis yang kuat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: History of the Rebellion
반란의 역사
Sejarah Pemberontakan

Please select the user requiring a quest: When the great swordsman, Ruklys, completed the Fortress of the Land, {nl}many who admired him gathered under him.
당대 최고의 검사 루클리스가 대지의 요새를 완공하자 그의 밑으로 그를 흠모하는 많은 이들이 몰려들었다.{nl}
Saat Swordsman Ruklys selesai membangun fortress,  {nl}banyak orang yang kagum kepadanya dan mengikuti dia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Their power grew to that of a city-state over time,{nl}and it is suspected that Ruklys' ambition grew as well.
그 세력은 점점 커져 급기야는 작은 도시국가의 모습을 띄었고 루클리스의 야망 또한 커지게 되었을 것이라 추측한다.{nl}
Kekuatan mereka bertambah seiring dengan waktu  {nl}begitu pula dengan ambisi Ruklys yang terus meningkat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ruklys' influence grew so much that he eventually revolted against King Kadumel.
엄청나게 불어버린 루클리스의 세력은 결국 국왕 카듀멜에게 반란을 일으키게 되었다.{nl}
Karena kekuatan Ruklys yang terus bertambah hingga dia memberontak pada King Kadumel.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It was a huge rebellion. The entire city took part. {nl}That's why some record it as a civil war.
일반적인 반란과 달리 많은 세력과 도시 하나가 가담한 대규모의 사건이었기 때문에 내전이라고도 기록하는 역사가도 있었다.{nl}
Itu adalah pemberontakan yang sangat besar, sebagian dari kota terlibat. {nl}Dan itu sempat dianggap perang sipil.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The rebellion initially favored Ruklys, but the tides turned {nl}when the great Premier Eminent and marksman Lydia Schaffen joined the war.
반란은 처음엔 루클리스의 승리로 기울어지는 듯 했지만 위대한 재상으로 칭송받는 프리미어 에미넌트와 명사수로 불리는 리디아 샤펜이 참전하면서 그 양상은 바뀌게 되었다.{nl}
Pemberontakan membuat Ruklys merasa menang, namun semua terbalik{nl}saat great Premier Eminent dan marksman Lydia Schaffen ikut bertempur.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It all ended two years later, when Ruklys died at the hands of Lydia Schaffen.
결국 루클리스가 리디아 샤펜의 손에 사망하게 되면서 만 2년에 걸친 반란은 진압되었다.{nl}
Setelah 2 tahun perang berakhir, saat Ruklys mati di tangan Lydia Schaffen.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Because of the revolt, Ruklys' city lost its name and fell under an everlasting curse. {nl}Even now, that curse turns everything into stone.
극악무도한 루클리스를 따르던 이들의 도시는 이름이 지워진 채 영원한 저주를 받았다.{nl}현재까지도 유효한 그 저주는 모든 것을 돌로 만들어 버린다.
Sebagai akibat dari kekejamannya, kota Ruklys dihapuskan dan menjadi terkutuk.  {nl}Hingga hari ini, semua yang ada di sana berubah menjadi batu.

Kamu adalah companion ku yang lucu.  {nl}Punya gigi yang tajam, dan cakar yang tajam,  {nl}tapi aku tidak takut!  {nl}Karena kamu companion ku yang lucu!

Hanya Dievdirbys dan Modestas yang tahu akan identitas dari Statue of Goddess di Klaipeda Central Plaza.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Many challenged Modestas for a wager but he never lost until he died.
많은 이들이 여신상이 누구인지 알기 위해 모데스타스에게 내기를 걸었지만 모데스타스가 죽을 때 까지 지는 일은 결코 없었다.
Banyak yang menantang Modestas dan dia tidak pernah kalah sampai dia mati.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Guardian of Zachariel's Royal Mausoleum
자카리엘 왕릉의 수호자

Please select the user requiring a quest: Aside from the guardians who watch over Zachariel's Royal Mausoleum,{nl}there are stone statues guarding the Royal Mausoleum.
자카리엘 왕릉을 대대로 모시는 수호자 가문 외에도 왕릉 내부를 지키는 석상들이 있다.{nl}
Selain guardian yang menjaga Zachariel's Mausoleum,  {nl}ada juga patung-patung batu penjaga di Mausoleum.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Activated with flowing mana, {nl}the guardian statues move as if they were alive. Some can even talk.
왕릉을 흐르는 마나로 작동하는 이 수호자 석상들은 마치 살아있는 듯이 움직이며 어떤 석상은 대화도 가능하다고 한다.
Aktif dengan energi mana,  {nl}guardian statue bergerak sama seperti saat dia hidup dan ada pula yang bisa berbicara.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Maven's Opinion
성자 메이번의 견해
Pendapat Maven

Please select the user requiring a quest: The easiest way to tell clerics and wizards apart is to see how they use the grace of the goddesses. {nl}They can turn the grace of the goddesses to different forms.
성직자와 마법사를 구분하는 가장 쉬운 방법은 여신의 은총을 어떤 방법으로 사용하느냐는 것이다.{nl}여신의 은총을 그대로 사용하는 성직자와 마법사는 사용하는 이의 의지에 따라 여러 모습으로 환원될 수 있다.{nl}
Cara mudah untuk membedakan Cleric dan Wizard adalah cara mereka menggunakan berkat dari Goddess.  {nl}Cleric dan Wizard dapat mengubah berkat dari Goddess dalam wujud yang berbeda.

Please select the user requiring a quest: And that power of changing grace is called mana.
환원하는 힘을 어떤 특정한 단위로 규정할 때 그것을 마나라고 한다.
Dan kekuatan untuk mengubah berkat dari Goddess disebut Mana.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Goddess Gabija of Fire
불의 여신 가비야
Goddess Gabija of Fire

Please select the user requiring a quest: Pyromancers use the blessings of Gabija, the goddess of fire, as their main force.
파이로맨서는 불의 여신 가비야의 은총을 주력으로 사용한다.{nl}
Pyromancers menggunakan berkat dari Gabija, Goddess of Fire, sebagai kekuatan utama mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It differs on the type of element, and depends on the grace of Goddess Gabija, {nl}but some elements may ignore oxidation.
산화는 대상이 되는 원소마다 차이가 있지만 가비야의 은총에 따라 그것을 무시하는 경우도 발생한다.{nl}
Berbeda-beda tipe element, dan tergantung dari berkat Goddess Gabija,  {nl}tapi sebagian elemen tidak dapat teroksidasi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: For this, you will need great academic standards as well as faith in Goddess Gabija.
이를 위해선 높은 학문적 성취에 불의 여신 가비야에 대한 신앙의지를 병행해야 할 것이다.
Untuk hal ini, kamu butuh pelatihan akademis standar dan juga kepercayaan pada Goddess Gabija.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Will of All Things
만물의 의지

Please select the user requiring a quest: The base forms of all things are water, earth, wind, and fire, {nl}and these are controlled by the goddesses.
만물을 표현하는 가장 간단한 형태는 물, 땅, 바람, 불로써 이 근원물질은 여신의 권능으로 조절된다.
Bentuk dasar dari semua wujud adalah Air, Tanah, Angin, dan Api,  {nl}dan semua ini dikendalikan oleh Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Elementary Fire Magic
쉽게 배우는 발화 마법
