1. Area yang kering  {nl}2. Sesuatu yang bisa terbakar.  {nl}3. Mana yang cukup  {nl}4. Berkat dari Goddess Gabija.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Agailla Flurry's Diary
아가일라 플러리의 일기
Diary dari Agailla Flurry

Please select the user requiring a quest: Lord Helgasercle is still going after my tower, {nl}and I can't find a successor to continue my mission.
군주 헬가 세르클은 여전히 나의 탑을 노리고 있건만 나의 사명을 넘겨받을 후계자는 찾을 수 없었다.{nl}
Lord Helgasercle masih berlanjut setelah menghancurkan towerku,  {nl}tapi aku tidak dapat menemukan suksesor yang dapat melanjutkan tugasku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: My life feels like that of a waning fire. {nl}Even so, I shall light up the last bit of my life to find one.
나의 생명은 이제 꺼져가는 불꽃이나 다름 없음을 느끼고 있다.{nl}그렇다면 나의 마지막 생명을 불태워 그 분을 불러보리라.{nl}
Aku merasa hidupku seperti api yang akan padam.  {nl}Jika seperti itu, Aku akan menyalakan titip api terakhir dalam hidupku untuk memanggilnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Because of Helgasercle, a great chaos will come down on this world. {nl}It's a desperate gamble to leave the tower to a goddess who should be taking care of the world's flame.
그로 인해 분명 세상에 가져다 줄 혼란도 있을 것이다.{nl}세상의 불꽃을 관장해야 할 여신께 탑을 맞긴다는 것 자체가 무모한 도전일 수도 있다.{nl}
Karena Helgasercle, kekacauan besar terjadi di dunia ini.  {nl}Ada keputusasaan dan tantangan untuk meninggalkan tower kepada Goddess  yang seharusnya menjaga api  dunia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: But my mission must not fall under the hands of the demons, {nl}so I am counting on the future Goddess Laima foretold.
그러나 나의 사명이 절대로 마족의 손에 넘어가는 일은 있어선 아니될 일이기에 나는 라이마 여신께서 예지한 미래에 걸어보려 한다.{nl}
Tapi, tugas ini tidak boleh jatuh ke tangan para demon,  {nl}jadi aku berharap pada masa depan yang telah Goddess Laima ramalkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It was such a long journey. {nl}We'll know whether or not it was the right life or decision when the time comes.
참으로 기나 긴 세월이었다. 그게 옳은 삶이자 선택이었는지는 먼 미래가 되어야 알 수 있으리라.
Itu adalah perjalanan yang cukup panjang.  {nl}Kita akan tahu apakah pilihan yang di ambil tepat atau tidak saat waktu mulai berjalan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Jane's Diary, the Wizard Apprentice
수습 마법사 제인의 일기
Diary dari Wizard Pemula, Jane

Please select the user requiring a quest: I came to Agailla Flurry's room to pick up cleaning materials, {nl}and I saw Flurry talking to a woman with giant flames swaying around her body.
아가일라 플러리님의 방에 놓고 온 청소도구를 다시 가질러 갔다가 플러리님께서 몸 주위에 엄청난 불꽃이 일렁이는 여자와 대화하시는것을 보았다.{nl}
Aku datang ke ruangan Agailla Flurry untuk mengambil barang-barang yang harus dibersihkan,  {nl}dan aku melihat Flurry berbicara dengan seorang wanita yang mengeluarkan api yang besar.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The ambiance terrified me, so I hid behind a wall and watched. {nl}Then suddenly, a scary demon rushed in.
왠지 분위기가 너무 무서워서 벽 뒤에서 몰래 지켜 보았다.{nl}갑자기, 무시무시한 마족이 들이닥쳤다.{nl}
Itu sangat menakutkan sehingga aku bersembunyi dibalik tembok untuk mengintip.  {nl}Tiba-tiba, ada demon yang menyeramkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Flurry... turned into a handful of ashes by illuminating a great light. {nl}Did that demon do something? {nl}I had no idea, even as a wizard apprentice.
플러리님은.. 빛을 내뿜으시더니 한 줌의 재가 되셔서 사라지셨다.{nl}그 마족이이 무슨 짓이라도 한 걸까? {nl}수습 마법사인 난 알 도리가 없다.{nl}
Flurry… Dia menghilang menjadi abu setelah terkena cahaya yang menyilaukan.  {nl}Apakah demon itu itu melakukan sesuatu?  {nl}Aku tidak mengerti, meskipun aku seorang wizard pemula.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The demon somehow disappeared behind the flaming woman... {nl}There was nothing I could do, so I ran away.
어쨌든 그 마족은 불꽃의 여자를 뒤로한 채 사라졌고.. 나 같은게 뭘 할수나 있을까 싶어서 나도 그 자리를 도망쳐 나왔다.{nl}
Lalu, demon itu menghilang, meninggalkan wanita dengan api itu…  {nl}Tidak ada yang bisa aku lakukan, jadi aku lari dari tempat itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: After a few days, my seniors told me that Gabija would be the new owner of the tower. {nl}When the goddesses disappeared from the world, I was told to keep quiet.
며칠 뒤, 선배들은 가비야님께서 이 탑의 주인으로 계실 거라고 하셨다.{nl}그리고 세간엔 여신께서 사라진 걸로 되어 있을 것이라며 철저히 입단속도 당부받았다.{nl}
Setelah beberapa hari, orang bilang bahwa Gabija akan menjadi pemilik baru dari tower ini.  {nl}Orang lain didunia ini percaya bahwa Goddess telah menghilang, jadi mereka menyuruhku untuk diam.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Are things really going to be okay? {nl}Well... those people were never wrong about anything before so I guess it will be.
정말 괜찮은 걸까? {nl}뭐.. 선배들이 딱히 틀린 말은 한 적이 없으니 괜찮을 것이다.
Apakah semua akan baik-baik saja?  {nl}Yaa… kata orang-orang sih begitu, mungkin semua akan baik-baik saja.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Chronomancer Ron
시간 마법론 주석
Chronomancer Ron

Please select the user requiring a quest: Archmage Agailla Flurry, owner of the Mage Tower, {nl}made many contributions to magic.
마법사의 탑의 주인인 대마법사 아가일라 플러리는 마법학에 무수한 기여를 하게 된다.{nl}
Arch Mage Agailla Flurry, pemilik Mage Tower,  {nl}memberikan banyak kontribusi pada ilmu magic.

Please select the user requiring a quest: She learned many spells and even created a new category of skills.
그녀는 모든 계열의 모든 주문을 익히고 새로운 주문을 창안하였으며 심지어 새로운 계열을 창조하기도 한다.{nl}
Dia belajar banyak spell dan bahkan dia membuat kategori skill baru.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The most prominent example of which was Chronomancy - time magic. {nl}With it, Agailla Flurry lived a long life.
그 중 대표적인 분야는 크로노맨서라는 시간 마법으로 이를 이용하여 아가일라 플러리는 오랜 수명을 누릴 수 있게 되었다.{nl}
Salah satunya yang paling menonjol adalah Chronomancy - sihir waktu.  {nl}Dengan itu, Agailla Flurry bisa hidup panjang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There were many others in the past who lived longer than you might expect, {nl}but Agailla Flurry is the first to have lived a long life by her own design.
그 이전에도 여신의 은총을 입고 인간의 수명 이상을 누린 이는 있었으나 아가일라 플러리는 인간의 의지로 장수한 첫 번째 사례로 기록될 것이다.
Banyak orang dijaman dulu yang hidup cukup lama dibanding orang lain,  {nl}tapi Agailla Flurry adalah orang pertama yang hidup sangat lama sesuai dengan keinginannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Pedigree of Magic
마법의 계보
Silsilah Magic

Please select the user requiring a quest: Magic, at the beginning, began from the investigation of mana {nl}and the review of basic elements.
초기 마법은 마나 그 자체를 연구하거나 기초 원소로 환원하는 것에서 시작하였다.{nl}
Pada awalnya, Magic dimulai dari penggunaan mana {nl}dan element dasar.

Please select the user requiring a quest: After that, the basic senses, religious belief of the goddesses, {nl}and mathematical approaches were mixed to find areas for expansion.
그 후 선천적인 자각이나 여신의 신앙, 수학적 접근이 가미되어 마법학은 새로운 확장을 꾀하기 시작했다.{nl}
Setelah itu, dasar pembelajarannya, kepercayaan pada Goddess ,  {nl}dan sedikit ilmu matematika untuk pengembangannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The research twisted previous notions of time and space, {nl}which were beyond the changes of the body, {nl}and the rules of physics and the elements progressed significantly.
이로 인해 신체나 원소 변화 등 물리법칙을 넘어서서 시간과 공간의 관념 등을 뒤트는 연구가 활발하게 진행되었다.
Sebagai hasilnya, penelitian mendapatkan inti dari ilmu ruang dan waktu,  {nl}dimana itu dapat mengubah tubuh,  {nl}dan juga hukum fisika serta campuran elemen turut mempengaruhinya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Report of the High Barrier Magic
고위 결계 마법 조사 보고서
Laporan tentang High Barrier Magic

Please select the user requiring a quest: The barrier in this tower could not have possibly been created by the Demon Lord alone.
이 탑에 걸려 있는 감금 결계는 마군주 혼자선 절대로 만들어 낼 수 없는 것이다.{nl}
Barrier yang ada di tower ini bahkan tidak dapat dibuat oleh Demon Lord itu sendiri.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It acts like a tight-knit net. {nl}Someone with a normal level of divine power cannot escape from it.
마치 얼기설기 엮은 그물과도 같아 일정 이상의 신성한 힘을 가진 것만은 결계 밖으로 나갈 수 없게 만들어져 있다.{nl}
Seperti jaring yang terhubung erat.  {nl}Jadi seseorang dengan divine power biasa tidak dapat menembusnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: For what reason was this barrier created?{nl}Is it related to the fact that the goddess who controls the flames of this world is staying here?
도대체 어떤 이유로, 이런 결계를 만들었을까.{nl}세계의 불꽃을 관장하시는 여신 가비야께서 굳이 이 탑에 머물러 있는 이유가 이 결계와 관련된 것일까.{nl}
Mengapa barrier ini diciptakan?  {nl}Apakah itu berhubungan dengan Goddess yang mengendalikan api di dunia ini tinggal disini?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Agailla Flurry called Gabija to this tower, so this barrier is not meant to lock Gabija in. {nl}To find out the reason for this, we first have to understand the composition of the barrier.
아가일라 플러리님이 가비야님을 이 탑에 능히 불러낸 것을 보아 이 결계는 굳이 가비야님을 가두려는 건 아닐 것이다.{nl}그 이유를 알려면 먼저 결계의 구성부터 알아낼 필요가 있었다.{nl}
Agailla Flurry memanggil Gabija ke dalam tower, jadi barrier ini bukan untuk mengunci Gabija didalam.  {nl}Untuk mengetahui alasannya, pertama kita harus mengerti komposisi dari barrier ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: After a long investigation, we've found that this barrier was {nl}not only created with the power of Helgasercle, but rather blended with mana of different wavelengths.
오랜 연구 끝에 이 결계는 헬가 세르클의 힘만으로 만든 것이 아니라 다른 파장의 마나가 섞여있다는 것을 알게 되었다.{nl}
Setelah investigasi yang panjang, kita telah menemukan bahwa barrier ini  {nl}tidak hanya diciptakan dari kekuatan Helgasercle, namun juga campuran dari energi mana.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We've also found that mana was composed by aligning the foundation stones in a certain position.
또한 그 마나는 마법의 주춧돌들을 진의 형태로 늘어놓아 구성된 것으로 파악되었다.{nl}
Dan kita juga menemukan bahwa mana tersebut terbentuk dari foundation stones yang diarahkan ke posisi tertentu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We were able to retrieve some of those foundation stones from various areas in the kingdom. {nl}The new information that we learned from them was astonishing.
우리는 왕국의 각지에서 그 주춧돌들의 일부를 회수할 수 있었다.{nl}여기서 새롭게 알게 된 사실은 가히 충격적이였다.{nl}
Jika kita bisa mendapatkan beberapa foundation stones dari berbagai area di sekitar kerajaan.  {nl}Kita bisa mendapatkan informasi yang menakjubkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The mana provided to use barrier magic wasn't voluntary. {nl}We theorize that the levels of the Demon Lords were divided and sealed into the foundation stones and aligned into a position.
결계 마법에 쓰인 마나의 제공은 결코 자발적인 것이 아니었다.{nl}마군주 급의 존재를 나누어 이 주춧돌에 봉인한 뒤 진의 형태로 구성한 것이라고밖에 추측할 수 없었다.{nl}
Mana yang digunakan untuk barrier tidak didapatkan begitu saja.  {nl}Sepertinya Demon Lords dibagi menjadi beberapa bagian dan disegel pada foundation stones kemudian energinya diarahkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The key to unlock this barrier is in the foundation. {nl}We'll continue to search for the answer after we block Helgasercle's invasion.
결국 결계를 푸는 열쇠는 이 주춧돌에 달려있다고밖에 할 수 없다.{nl}이번 헬가 세르클의 침공을 막아내고 난 뒤에 그 해답을 찾을 수 있을 것이다.
Kunci untuk membuka barrier ini adalah foundation stone.  {nl}Kita akan menemukan jawabannya setelah memblokir invasi dari Helgasercle.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Understanding of Mana
마나의 이해
Pengertian Energi Mana

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unlike priests who control the blessing of the goddess directly, {nl}the wizard is defined as a person who releases various magic information or the blessing of the goddess.
여신의 은총을 직접 다루는 성직자와는 달리, 마법사는 마나에 여신의 은총이나 여러가지 마법학적 지식을 섞어 방출하는 것이라고 정의를 내릴 수 있다.{nl}
Tidak seperti priest yang mengontrol berkat dari Goddess secara langsung,  {nl}Wizard adalah seseorang yang mampu mengeluarkan berbagai bentuk magic atau berkat dari Goddess .

Please select the user requiring a quest: Okay so, what is mana? {nl}We can say the true quality of mana is the life force on this land. {nl}The life force of nature. It doesn't just imply the length of lives.
그렇다면 도대체 마나란 무엇인가.{nl}마나의 본질은 이 땅의 생명력이라고 말할 수 있다.{nl}자연의 생명력. 그것은 단지 수명 따위를 말하는 것이 아니다.{nl}
Kalau begitu, Apa itu Mana?  {nl}Bisa dibilang bahwa kualitas dari Mana adalah energi kehidupan di dataran ini.  {nl}Energi kehidupan dari alam. Bukan hanya sekedar jangka waktu hidup.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The life force is a form of energy that composes this world and it spreads like branches to various places in the world. {nl}If you could find the source of that energy, you may obtain astonishing power.
생명력은 이 세계의 근간을 이루는 에너지의 형태로 마치 뿌리처럼 세계의 구석구석에 흐르고 있다.{nl}그 에너지를 내뿜는 근원을 찾아낸다면 엄청난 힘을 얻을 수도 있을 것이다.{nl}
Energi kehidupan adalah energi yang membentuk dunia ini dan menyebar layaknya ranting pohon ke seluruh penjuru dunia.  {nl}Jika kamu mampu menemukan sumber dari kekuatan itu, kamu bisa memiliki kekuatan yang luar biasa.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Diary of Antares' Investigation
안타레스의 연구 일지 1권
Diary dari Investigasi Antares

Please select the user requiring a quest: As I was investigating mana, I discovered one important fact: {nl}The mana which flows steadily in the Mage Tower behaves strangely on the top of the tower
마나에 관한 연구를 계속하던 중 나는 한 가지 중대한 사실을 발견하게 되었다.{nl}마법사의 탑을 일정하게 흐르고 있는 마나가 마법사의 탑 상층부에서만큼은 이상한 움직임을 보이고 있는 것이다.{nl}
Aku mempelajari tentang Mana, dan menemukan satu fakta penting :  {nl}Mana yang mengalir secara tetap pada Mage Tower memiliki reaksi yang aneh pada bagian atas tower.

Please select the user requiring a quest: After lengthy research, I found out that there is a third type of energy which is {nl}different from the types of mana we know of, and it has a shape of a specific object.
나는 오랜 연구 끝에 마법사의 탑 상층부에는 우리가 알고 있는 마나의 질 과는 다른 제 3의 에너지가 있으며 그것이 특정한 사물의 형태를 지니고 있다는 것을 알게 되었다.{nl}
Setelah penelitian panjang, Aku menemukan ada jenis ketiga dari energi  {nl}tipe yang berbeda dari energi yang kita ketahui, dan memiliki bentuk objek tertentu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This object must be from the era of Agailla Flurry as no one knows the existence of this object.
아무도 이 물건의 존재를 모르는 것으로 보아 분명 아가일라 플러리 시대의 것으로 추측된다.{nl}
Bentuk ini pasti berasal dari Agailla Flurry karena tidak ada orang yang tahu keberadaannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I am sure that this object will bring a new beginning of magic, {nl}but since it is separated at the highest place atop the tower, we have no way to reach it.
나는 그 물건이 마법의 신기원을 열 것이라고 믿어 의심치 않지만 탑의 상층부 깊은 곳에 따로 격리되어 있기 때문에 도저히 접근할 방법이 없다.{nl}
Aku yakin bahwa objek ini akan membawa perubahan baru pada magic,  {nl}namun karena itu terpisah pada bagian tertinggi di tower, kita tidak dapat mencapainya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We can't demolish the tower nor destroy part of it just to get it.
하지만 그렇다고 해서 탑을 폭파한다거나 일부를 파괴하는 건 있을 수 없는 일이다.{nl}
Kita tidak bisa meledakkan tower atau menghancurkannya untuk mendapatkan bagian itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I will end my writing by stating that this object has more to be investigated.
좀 더 이 물건에 대해 자세히 연구해 볼 필요가 있다고 생각하며 이 글을 마친다.
Aku akan mengakhiri tulisanku ini karena objek tersebut masih harus diteliti lagi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Potter's Clay Tablet
도공의 점토판
Potter's Clay Tablet

Please select the user requiring a quest: I hope Fedimian is restored to its previous state before I die. {nl}At least, I hope I can make thousands of potteries with a wish in each of them.
내가 죽기 전에 페디미안이 완전히 복구되기를. {nl}하나못해 소원이 담긴 도자기를 천 개라도 빚을 수 있기를.
Aku harap Fedimian bisa direstorasi dan kembali seperti dulu sebelum aku mati.  {nl}Setidaknya, Aku berharap bisa membuat ribuan tembikar penuh dengan doa-doa dan harapan didalamnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Girl's Clay Tablet
어느 소녀의 점토판
Girl's Clay Tablet

Please select the user requiring a quest: I hope you find your lost brother at the Goddess' Ancient Garden.
여신의 옛뜰에서 잃어버린 오빠를 찾을 수 있기를 빕니다.
Aku harap kamu bisa menemukan saudaramu yang hilang di Ancient Garden of the Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Commander Willis' Clay Tablet
지휘관 윌리스의 점토판
Commander Willis' Clay Tablet

Please select the user requiring a quest: I pray to the goddess that I can continue my work as an administration officer in the city. {nl}I don't like the work as a dispatched worker.
도시에서 행정장교 일을 계속하길 여신께 간절히 부탁합니다.{nl}파견 근무는 너무 싫습니다.
Aku berdoa pada Goddess agar aku bisa bekerja menjadi administration officer di kota. {nl}Aku tidak suka menjadi pekerja kasar.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Klaipeda Farmer's Clay Tablet
클라페다 농부의 점토판
Klaipeda Farmer's Clay Tablet

Please select the user requiring a quest: I want to take back my farm and experience the challenge of potato farming again.
내 농장을 다시 되찾아 감자 농사에 도전해 보고 싶다.
Aku ingin mendapatkan kembali lahanku dan merasakan kembali semangat menanam kentang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Soldier's Clay Tablet
어느 병사의 점토판
Soldier's Clay Tablet

Please select the user requiring a quest: I hope Ryudas gets called up to the military. {nl}I hope the supplies come in time at the battlefield!
류다스님의 부대로 전출되기를. {nl}이번 출정지에선 보급이 제대로 이루어지기를!
Aku berharap Ryudas bisa masuk militer. {nl}Dan semoga supply bisa tiba tepat waktu di medan pertempuran!

Please select the user requiring a quest: I hope we can recapture Kateen Forest. {nl}I hope we never encounter Deadborn.
카틴 숲을 되찾을 수 있기를. {nl}데드본과는 절대 마주치지 말기를.
Semoga kami bisa merebut Kateen Forest. {nl}Aku harap kami tidak bertemu Deadborn.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ranger Master's Clay Tablet
레인저 마스터의 점토판
Ranger Master's Clay Tablet

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't like Fiona and wonder why she's the Hunter Master. {nl}But, if we need her to defeat Evoniphon, I'm fine with allying with her.
피오나는 정말 싫어. 그런 주제에 헌터 마스터나 하고 있고.{nl}하지만 에보니폰을 처치하기 위해서라면 피오나와 손을 잡아도 상관 없어.
Aku tidak suka Fiona. Aku bingung mengapa dia menjadi Hunter Master. {nl}Tapi, untuk mengalahkan Evoniphon, Aku tidak masalah bertempur bersama Fiona.

아우스테야 여신

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thank you again in the name of the goddess. {nl}Now I will follow the stars in search of Goddess Ausrine.
여신의 이름으로 다시 한 번 감사드립니다.{nl}저는 이제부터 벌들을 따라 아우슈리네 여신을 찾으려고 합니다.{nl}
Atas nama Goddess aku mengucapkan terima kasih.  {nl}Sekarang aku akan mengikuti bintang untuk mencari Goddess Ausrine.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It may be better for me to just guard the seal. {nl}But I believe finding all my lost sisters will be the solution to all of this.
어쩌면 봉인을 지키고 있는 것이 나을지도 모르겠습니다만.{nl}사라진 자매들을 찾는 것이 이 모든 일의 해결책이라 믿고 있습니다.{nl}
Mungkin menjaga segel adalah hal yang baik.  {nl}Tapi aku yakin jika mencari saudariku yang hilang adalah solusi dari masalah ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I wish you well... {nl}And may you and this land be blessed.
부디 건강하길 바라며.. {nl}당신과, 이 땅에 축복을 기원합니다.
Semoga kamu baik-baik saja…  {nl}Dan semoga kamu dan tanah ini terberkati.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Right. I think so too. {nl}The monsters are definitely preying on our honey. {nl}But it is better to have evidence on hand, so bring a piece of beehive {nl}from Saltus Bee Farm.
맞네. 나도 같은 생각이야.{nl}몬스터들이 우리의 꿀을 노리는 건 틀림 없네.{nl}하지만 증거는 확실할 수록 좋으니 먼저 살투스 양봉장에서 벌통 조각을 가져 오게.
Betul. Aku juga berpikir begitu.  {nl}Monster itu mengincar madu-madu itu.  {nl}Tapi sebaiknya kita mencari bukti, bawakan sepotong sarang lebah  {nl}dari Saltus Bee Farm.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Coward
겁쟁이 청년
Penakut

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm called a coward but I can't do anything. I'm really scared.
겁쟁이라고 불리기도 하지만 어쩔 수 없어요.{nl}무서운건 무서운거니까요.
Mereka memanggilku penakut, aku tidak sanggup berbuat apa-apa.  {nl}Karena aku sangat ketakutan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I see, you're the one the bees have been whispering about. {nl}I am Austeja, the goddess of destiny.
벌들이 속삭이던 분이 당신이군요.{nl}저는 인연의 여신 아우스테야입니다.{nl}
Kamu adalah orang yang diberitakan para lebah itu.  {nl}Aku adalah Goddess of Fate, Austeja.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The seal of this farmland has stabilized, thanks to you. {nl}But the other Revelators have lost themselves due to the evil force flowing from the Spring Light Woods.
당신 덕분에 이 흔들리는 경작지의 봉인은 안정되었습니다만.{nl}다른 계시자들이 봄볕나무 숲의 봉인에서 새어나온 사악한 기운에 의해 자아를 잃어버렸습니다.{nl}
Segel dari pertanian telah stabil kembali, terima kasih.  {nl}Namun savior lainnya hilang dan tersesat karena kekuatan jahat yang ada di Spring Light Woods.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I will be using all of my powers to prevent this from happening any more... {nl}Thus, I cannot move away from here, let alone save them.
하지만 전 봉인이 더 이상 벌어지지 않도록 모든 힘을 쏟고 있기에..{nl}그들을 구하기는 커녕 함부로 나설 수도 없는 상태입니다.{nl}
Aku menggunakan seluruh kekuatanku untuk mengunci seal agar tidak terbuka…  {nl}Jadi aku tidak dapat pergi dari sini, apalagi menyelamatkan mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please save them and the Spring Light Woods.
그러니.. 그들과 봄볕나무 숲을 부탁합니다.
Kalau begitu… Tolong selamatkan mereka dan Spring Light Woods.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Investigation Unit
조사단원
Unit Investigasi

Please select the user requiring a quest: Why have so many more monsters appeared?
대체 몬스터가 왜 이렇게 늘어난 걸까?
Mengapa jumlah monster terus meningkat?

Please select the user requiring a quest: The monsters have ruined the entire harvest.
몬스터들 때문에 농사고 뭐고 다 망해버렸어.
Para monster telah menghancurkan hasil panen.

Please select the user requiring a quest: As you may already know, our kingdom has five major goddesses and other goddesses who{nl}assist them. But nobody knows where all of them are now.
자네도 알겠지만, 우리 왕국은 다섯 분의 여신과 그분들을 보필하는 많은 여신들이 계시지.{nl}하지만 지금은 모두 어디 계신지 아무도 몰라.
Seperti yang kamu tahu, kerajaan kita dulu dilindungi oleh lima Goddess dan Goddesses lain yang membantu mereka. {nl} Tapi sekarang tidak ada yang tahu kemana mereka pergi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Flower Shop Lady
꽃 파는 아주머니
Flower Shop Lady

Please select the user requiring a quest: People don't buy flowers anymore. {nl}The only flowers they buy are the ones to offer for the goddesses' return. {nl}It's really depressing in many ways.
요즘은 꽃을 잘 안 사가.{nl}그나마도 여신께서 돌아오길 바라는 뜻으로 바치는 꽃만 팔린다우.{nl}꽃을 파는 나도 우울할 지경이야..
Sekarang jarang sekali orang membeli bunga.  {nl}Bunga yang mereka beli hanyalah untuk berdoa agar para Goddesses kembali.  {nl}Aku sangat pusing memikirkan hal itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I hope Klaipeda becomes lively like it used to be... {nl}With the fragrance of flowers in the air and people dancing in spring to worship Goddess Zemyna, {nl}the goddess of the Earth...
클라페다가 예전처럼 다시 활기를 되찾았으면 좋겠어..{nl}꽃향기가 가득하고, 사람들은 대지의 여신이신 제미나 여신께 바치는 봄의 춤을 추고..
Aku harap Klaipeda menjadi lebih ramai seperti dulu..  {nl}Aroma dari bunga dan para penduduk menari di musim semi  {nl}untuk memuja Goddess Zemyna, Goddess of Earth..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Warning
경고문
Peringatan

Please select the user requiring a quest: Beware of Leaf Bugs! They are different from Beetles. {nl}It is hard to fight them when they come in flocks so be careful.
전방 잎방개 주의!{nl}물방개와는 다릅니다. {nl}여러마리가 덤벼들면 상대하기 어려우니 주의하세요.
Peringatan untuk berhati-hati terhadap Leaf Bugs!{nl}Bentuk serangga mirip dengan daun.  {nl}Sulit melawannya ketika mereka berkelompok.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Notice: Large Kepa is not an onion!{nl}Wearing goggles is useless against Large Kepa. {nl}Watch out for powerful attacks that shake the ground.
대형 케파 주의 : 양파 아님!!{nl}대형 케파는 물안경을 써도 소용없습니다.{nl}지축을 흔드는 강력한 공격을 조심하세요.{nl}
Notice: Large Kepa itu bukan bawang!!  {nl}Memakai goggles tidak ada gunanya ke Large Kepa.  {nl}Waspada terhadap serangan kuat yang mengguncang tanah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please worship the Goddess Statue with a pious mind. You will grow stronger with {nl}the Goddess Zemyna's power, blessed by the Overseer of the Earth herself.
경건한 마음으로 여신상에 경배드리십시오.{nl}대지의 주관자이신 제미나 여신의 권능으로 그대를 더욱 강하게 하리니.{nl}
Mohon jadikan doa sebagai kewajiban. Supaya kamu mendapatkan blessing dari  {nl} Goddess Zemynas yang memberikan kekuatan bagi orang baik di muka bumi.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Statue of Goddess Zemyna lies at the end of this road.
제미나 여신상은 이 길의 끝에 있습니다.
Goddess Zemyna Statue berada di ujung jalan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Warning! Hanaming-infested area. {nl}Do not be fooled by their cute appearance. {nl}They attack in groups and...{nl}(Red marks are covering the rest.)
경고! 하나밍 출현지역. {nl}귀여운 얼굴에 속지 마십시오.{nl}무리를 지어 공격하..{nl}(시뻘건 꽃물 비슷한 것이 묻어 글씨가 잘 보이지 않는다.)
Peringatan! Wilayah berbahaya. Jangan terkecoh dengan wajah yang lucu. {nl}Mereka menyerang secara berkelompok dan...  {nl} (Tulisannya tampaknya rusak karena serangan monster sehingga sulit untuk dibaca.)

Please select the user requiring a quest: Caution! What happens to you beyond this point is your responsibility! {nl}Golems are rumored to appear in this area. Do not go any further.
위험! 사고 발생 시 본인 책임!{nl}골렘이 출몰한다는 소문이 돌고 있으니 더 이상 깊게 들어가지 마십시오. {nl}
Berbahaya! Kami tidak bertanggung jawab jika terjadi sesuatu!  {nl}Ada rumor tentang golem di sekitar sini. Mohon untuk tidak masuk area ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: P.S. It is better to run away than to pray to the goddess when you encounter Golems.
추신. 골렘과 맞닥뜨렸을시, 여신께 기도하기보단 빨리 도망치는 것이 좋습니다.
Catatan. Jika melihat golem, kami sarankan untuk berlari secepat mungkin dan berdoa pada Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The goddesses have disappeared. {nl}But if we fight bravely against the demons, perhaps the goddesses will return someday. {nl} - Laimonas
현재 여신께서는 모습을 감추셨습니다. {nl}하지만 우리가 악에 맞서 용감히 싸운다면 언젠가는 여신께서 다시 돌아오실 것입니다. {nl}{nl}-라이모나스
Para Goddesses telah menghilang.  {nl}Namun jika kita bersama melawan kejahatan, Goddesses akan kembali.  {nl} -Laimonas

Please select the user requiring a quest: Attention to those who come to Klaipeda after having a dream about the revelation. {nl}Knight Commander Uska is waiting for you in the Central Plaza.
계시의 꿈을 꾸고 클라페다로 오시는 분들께 알려드립니다.{nl}기사단장 우스카님께서는 중앙 광장에서 여러분을 기다리고 계십니다.
Perhatian kepada semua yang datang ke Klaipeda karena bermimpi tentang Goddess.  {nl}Knight Uska telah menunggu kalian di Central Plaza.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Welcome to Klaipeda Shopping Center. {nl}You can shop for a variety of accessories, tools, equipment, and other items.
어서오세요. 클라페다 상점가입니다.{nl}각종 장신구와 도구, 장비를 판매 중입니다.
Selamat datang di Klaipeda Shopping Center.  {nl}Kamu bisa membeli berbagai accessories, peralatan, equipment, dan item lain.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Use the stairs on the right to go to the Klaipeda Central Plaza.
클라페다 중앙광장으로 가실 분은 우측 계단을 이용하세요.
Gunakan tangga di sebelah kanan untuk menuju Klaipeda Central Plaza.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Klaipeda Central Plaza
클라페다 중앙광장
Klaipeda Central Plaza

Please select the user requiring a quest: Signboard
표지판
Papan Pengumuman

Please select the user requiring a quest: East Siauliai Woods
샤울레이 동쪽 숲
East Siauliai Woods

Please select the user requiring a quest: It is unknown who the statue honors or how old it is. {nl}But it certainly has mysterious powers that move selected people to other areas.
이 여신상이 기리는 대상과 정확한 연대는 불확실합니다. {nl}그러나 신비한 권능으로 선택받은 자를 다른 지역으로 이동시키는 것은 확실합니다.
Tidak diketahui siapa yang membuat dan berapa umur patung ini.  {nl}Tapi yang pasti itu memiliki kekuatan misterius yang bisa membuat orang berpindah ke tempat lain.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Good job. {nl}I have done my task. {nl}It is my time now.
잘하셨습니다.{nl}제가 할 일은 더 없습니다.{nl}제게 정해진 시간이로군요.
Bagus sekali.  {nl}Aku sudah mengerjakan tugasku.  {nl}Ini adalah saatnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Go forward. {nl}The Sculptor is waiting for you. {nl}I was glad to have guided you.
앞으로 나아가십시오.{nl}조각가님께서 기다리고 계십니다.{nl}당신을 이끌어 드릴 수 있어서 행복했습니다.
Pergilah.  {nl}Sang Sculptor telah menunggumu.  {nl}Aku sangat senang dapat membimbingmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ah...
Oh ..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Danger! The vacant lot below these crossroads {nl}has regularly seen dangerous monsters. Entrance is forbidden! {nl} - The Fedimian Market
위험!{nl}아래 갈림길 공터는 주기적으로 위험한 몬스터가 출현하니 출입을 금합니다!{nl}-페디미안 시장
Berbahaya! Celah di sekitar jalanan  {nl} terdapat banyak monster berbahaya. Ini adalah kawasan terlarang!  {nl} - The Fedimian Market

Please select the user requiring a quest: People are now praying less and less to the goddesses. {nl}They're losing hope...
이젠 여신께 바치는 기도 소리도 점점 줄어들고 있습니다.{nl}다들 지친 걸까..
Sekarang semakin sedikit orang yang berdoa pada Goddess.  {nl}Mungkin mereka kehilangan harapan..

Please select the user requiring a quest: How could I have forgotten you... {nl}Please do not roam around this cursed land {nl}and go to the arms of the goddess.
내 어찌 당신을 잊으리까..{nl}부디 이 저주받은 대지를 떠돌지 마시고{nl}편히 여신품으로 가시옵소서..
Bagaimana aku bisa melupakanmu…  {nl}Jangan pergi ke sekitar tempat terkutuk ini lagi  {nl}dan pergilah ke tangan Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Holiday Notice
휴무 공지
Pengumuman

Please select the user requiring a quest: I have been enlisted to the army to save the kingdom. {nl}Therefore, the restaurant will be closed in the meantime. {nl} - Owner of Klaipeda's Specialty Restaurant, Vulinya
주인장이 왕국을 지키기 위해 병력으로 차출된 관계로{nl}식당은 당분간 운영하지 않습니다.{nl}- 클라페다 명물 불뤼냐 식당 주인
Pemilik tempat ini telah pergi untuk bergabung dengan militer.  {nl}Jadi, Sementara ini restoran akan ditutup.  {nl}- Pemilik Klaipeda specialty restaurant, Vulinya

Please select the user requiring a quest: Don't blow out the candles. {nl}They guide the souls so they don't lose their way.
촛불을 끄지 마세요.{nl}영혼들이 길을 잃지 않도록 돕는 불빛입니다.
Jangan matikan lilinnya.  {nl} Para jiwa tersebut membutuhkan cahaya agar tidak tersesat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: As you know, the King died on Medzio Diena and the fate of other royalty and nobility were no different. {nl}The kingdom is holding together somehow but... now we can only pray.
아시다시피 신수의 날에 국왕께선 승하하시고 많은 왕족과 귀족들도 같은 운명을 맞이했소.{nl}어떻게든 왕국은 유지되곤 있지만.. 이젠 정말 기도밖에 없소.
Seperti yang kamu tahu, sang Raja meninggal pada Divine Day dan begitu juga takdir bangsawan kerajaan.  {nl}Kerajaan sedang tidak dalam kondisi yang baik tapi.. Sekarang kita masih bisa berdoa.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Now we can only pray...
이제 정말 기도밖에 없습니다.
Untuk saat ini kita hanya bisa berdoa...

Please select the user requiring a quest: When the spire is bathed with a red light the... door... to fantasy shall be opened.
첨탑에 붉은 빛이 돌 때 환상......로 가는 마......문이 열리리라.
Saat puncak menara dipenuhi cahaya merah… pintu… ke dunia fantasi… akan segera terbuka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: King Zachariel's Will
자카리엘 왕의 의지
Tekad dari King Zachariel

Please select the user requiring a quest: Dear Revelator. {nl}Listen to the interpretations of the revelation.
구원자여.{nl}그대는 계시의 해석을 들으라.
Savior. {nl}Dengarkanlah wahyu yang nanti akan datang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hmpf... {nl}Who would've thought that I would be challenged by humans...
큭.. {nl}내가 인간에게 휘둘릴 줄이야..
Argh… {nl}Aku tidak menyangka bisa goyah karena manusia…

Please select the user requiring a quest: Your death shall be utmost painful!
최대한 고통스럽게 죽여주마!
Aku akan membunuhmu dengan cara paling menyakitkan!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Soldier Recruitment Notice
병사 모집 알림
Pengumuman Soldier Recruitment

Please select the user requiring a quest: We want you! {nl}Protect your family and your kingdom. {nl} - Klaipeda Recruiting Station
당신을 원합니다.{nl}함께 가족과 왕국을 지키십시오.{nl}{nl}-클라페다 모병소
Kami membutuhkan kalian. {nl}Lindungi keluargamu dan kerajaanmu. {nl}  {nl} -Klaipeda Recruiting Station

Please select the user requiring a quest: We are seeking brave young men and women who will bring order to these chaotic times. {nl}The world needs you! {nl} - Klaipeda Recruiting Station
혼란한 시기를 바로 잡을 용감한 청년을 모집합니다.{nl}세상은 바로 당신을 원하고 있습니다.{nl}{nl}-클라페다 모병소
Kami mencari pemuda dan pemudi pemberani dalam masa kekacauan ini.  {nl} Kamulah yang dibutuhkan dunia.  {nl} -Klaipeda Recruiting Station

Please select the user requiring a quest: Honor. {nl}That is what your uniform will be made of. {nl} - Klaipeda Recruiting Station
명예.{nl}당신에게 지급될 이 군복은 이것으로 만들어질 것입니다.{nl}{nl}-클라페다 모병소{nl}
Kehormatan. {nl}Itu adalah bahan utama dari seragam kita.  {nl}  {nl} -Klaipeda Recruiting Station

Please select the user requiring a quest: Warning! Civilians prohibited.
경고! 민간인은 출입을 통제합니다.
Perhatian! Warga sipil dilarang masuk.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Only authorized personnel are allowed inside.
관계자 외 출입을 금합니다.
Hanya petugas dan prajurit yang boleh masuk.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Impossible.
어림없다.
Mustahil

Please select the user requiring a quest: Completing this spell will help the soldiers. {nl}Will I be able to make it?
이 주문만 완성되면 병사들을 도울 수 있어.{nl}내가 해낼 수 있을까?
Menyelesaikan spell ini bisa membantu para prajurit.  {nl}Apakah aku bisa melakukannya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: The soldiers will die if I don't make it. {nl}I have to be strong.
내가 제대로 해내지 못하면 병사들은 아마 다 죽을 거야.{nl}힘낼 거야.
Para prajurit akan mati jika aku tidak melakukannya.  {nl}Aku harus tetap kuat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I can do it. {nl}This time, I will kill Gaigalas.
할 수 있어.{nl}이번엔 가이갈라스를 반드시 처치할 수 있어.
Aku pasti bisa.  {nl}Aku akan mengalahkan Gaigalas kali ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unfortunately, I cannot solve it for you. It is the will of Maven. {nl}However, I am able to give some words of advice.
아쉽게도 메이번님의 뜻이기에 제가 직접 해결해 드릴 순 없습니다. {nl}하지만 도움이 될 만한 말씀은 드릴 수 있겠지요.
Sayangnya, aku tidak bisa membantumu atas permintaan Maven.  {nl}Tapi aku bisa memberikan beberapa nasehat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Great Cathedral was built by Silvestro Maven 660 years ago.
대성당은 660년전 실베스트로 메이번님의 주도로 건설됐습니다.
Cathedral dibangun oleh Silvestro Maven 660 tahun lalu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The curse of Naktis... Only curses remain where she treads. {nl}And she is now invading the Great Cathedral in search of the revelation.
나크티스는 저주.. 그녀가 지나간 자리엔 저주의 말귀만 남습니다.{nl}바로 그녀가 계시를 찾기 위해 대성당을 점거하고 있지요.
Kutukan dari Naktis… Hanya berada di sekitar tempat dia berada. {nl}Sekarang dia pergi ke Great Cathedral untuk mencari wahyu Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We tried our best to impede them until your arrival. {nl}But as you can see, we've reached our limit.
계시자님을 기다리는 동안 어떻게든 그들을 방해해왔습니다만.{nl}보시다시피 이런 몸인지라 한계에 다다른 상황입니다.
Kami sudah berusaha sekuat tenaga menahan dia saat menunggumu datang.  {nl}Tapi seperti yang kamu lihat, kami sudah tidak kuat lagi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Chapel Table
성당 책상
Meja Chapel

Please select the user requiring a quest: ...Only after three years since Ruklys learned from my teachings...
...루크리스가 대성당에서 나의 가르침을 받은지 3년이라는 시간이 흘러서야...
…Tiga tahun sejak Ruklys mengerti ajaranku…

Please select the user requiring a quest: ...two years after the war, my first disciple ended up dead...
...내전이 발발한지 2년만에 나의 첫번째 제자 루클리스는 사망하고 만...
…Dua tahun setelah perang, murid pertamaku mati…

Please select the user requiring a quest: ...year after Lydia Schaffen left the Great Cathedral...
...리디아 샤펜이 대성당을 떠난진 1년이 지나...
…Satu tahun setelah Lydia Schaffen meninggalkan Great Cathedral…

Please select the user requiring a quest: ...One of the three disciples, Agailla Flurry...
...3명의 제자 중 아가일라 플러리는...
…Salah satu dari tiga murid, Agailla Flurry…

Please select the user requiring a quest: It has been an old tradition of this town to make pots with wishes inside,{nl}and offer it to the goddess. {nl}Wouldn't this disaster end when the goddess returns?
예로부터 이 도시에선 여신께 올리는 소원을 담아 도자기를 빚어왔지.{nl}실종된 여신들께서 돌아오신다면 이 재난도 끝나지 않을까..
Sudah tradisi turun temurun di tempat ini membuat pot dari tembikar dan di isi dengan doa juga harapan untuk Goddess.  {nl}Akankah bencana ini berakhir ketika Goddess kembali?

Please select the user requiring a quest: The writing on the platform as I recall went like this... {nl}Remember the holy number with your two eyes. {nl}The light of the candles drives away the evil dark.
단상에 쓰여진 글귀는 아마 이런 내용이었지요.{nl}두 눈으로 성스러운 숫자를 기억하라.{nl}촛불의 빛은 사악한 어둠을 쫓을지니.. {nl}
Tulisan itu kira-kira seperti ini…  {nl}Ingatlah angka-angka suci dengan mata milikmu.  {nl}Cahaya dari lilin akan mengusir kegelapan… {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Remember the number written on the candle holder. {nl}And light that many candles to solve it.
촛대에 쓰여진 숫자를 기억해 두세요.{nl}그리고 그 숫자만큼 초에 불을 밝히시면 해결될 듯 합니다.
Ingatlah angka yang tertulis pada gagang lilin.  {nl}Dan banyaknya cahaya pada lilin untuk memecahkannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The relics have fallen into the demons' hands because of my weakness. {nl}But they shouldn't have reached Naktis yet.
제 힘이 부족하여 구원의 성유물은 이미 마족들의 손에 넘어갔습니다만.{nl}아직 나크티스에게 전달되지 못했을 것입니다.{nl}
Relic itu telah jatuh ke tangan demon karena kelemahanku.  {nl}Tapi sepertinya mereka belum sampai ke Naktis.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The other relics and keys are also in danger, so you better move quickly.
다른 성유물과 열쇠들도 안전을 장담할 수 없으니 빨리 움직이시는게 좋겠습니다.
Relic yang lain juga dalam bahaya, sebaiknya kamu cepat bertindak.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Writings on the Altar
제단에 새겨진 글귀
Tulisan pada Altar

Please select the user requiring a quest: Everlasting goddess. {nl}May we praise your infinite mercy.
영원한 여신이시여.{nl}당신의 무한한 자비를 끝없이 찬양할 수 있기를.
Goddess yang abadi.  {nl}Kami memohon pengampunanmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Life withers and the soul has nowhere to go. {nl}Only the goddess can save us.
생명은 시들고 영혼은 갈 곳이 없다.{nl}오직 여신께서만 구원해 주실 수 있다.
Kehidupan akan memudar dan jiwa tidak punya tempat untuk pergi.  {nl}Hanya Goddess yang dapat menyelamatkan kita.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I have sent the bishop there.
주교님을 모셔드렸습니다.
Aku telah mengirim seorang uskup ke sana.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Monsters! Run!
몬스터들입니다. 도망치십시오.
Ada Monster. Lari!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Maven's Device
메이번의 장치
Maven's Device

Please select the user requiring a quest: Maven's Device that the bishop talked about. {nl}There is a small keyhole.
주교가 말한 메이번의 장치.{nl}작은 열쇠구멍이 보인다.
Maven's Device yang dibicarakan oleh uskup.  {nl}Ada sebuah lubang kunci kecil.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Blue Pawndel
푸른 폰델
Blue Pawndel

Black Pawnd

왜 그래?{nl}너 수상한대?
Ada apa?  {nl} Apa kamu merasakan sesuatu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Can I trust you?
네 말 믿어도 돼?
Apakah aku bisa mempercayaimu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Naktis
나크티스
Naktis

Please select the user requiring a quest: I won't hand over the revelation to petty humans!
인간 따위에게 계시를 넘길 순 없다!
Aku tidak bisa memberikan wahyu ini kepada manusia yang picik!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Cathedral revelation
대성당 계시
Wahyu Cathedral

Please select the user requiring a quest: Interpretation of the revelation
계시 해석 내용.
Kemunculan Wahyu

Please select the user requiring a quest: A thousand years ago, before your generation... {nl}This is the story of the time before I left the revelation with the Great King Zachariel.
당신의 시대에서 천 년 전.{nl}제가 이 계시를 자카리엘에게 맡기기 전의 이야기입니다.{nl}
Ribuan tahun lalu sebelum kamu ada.  {nl}Ini adalah cerita sebelum aku meninggalkan wahyu pada Raja Agung Zachariel.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This land was full of chaos when the Great King Zachariel tried to raise a new kingdom. {nl}Only one place seemed filled with life, and Zachariel wanted that place.
자카리엘이 새 왕국을 세우려 했을 때, 이 땅은 혼돈뿐이였습니다.{nl}단 한 곳만이 생명력으로 가득했기에 자카리엘은 그 땅을 원했습니다.{nl}
Tempat ini penuh dengan kekacauan saat Raja Agung Zachariel mencoba mendirikan kerajaan baru.  {nl}Hanya ada satu tempat yang penuh kehidupan dan Zachariel menginginkan tempat itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: But the future I saw in that land had only death and regret. {nl}Thus, I left a prophecy that moved the capital elsewhere {nl}when the kingdom reached a thousand years of age.
하지만 그 곳에서 제가 본 미래는 많은 한탄과 죽음이였지요.{nl}때문에 건국 천년제를 맞이하면, 반드시 수도를 이전하라는 예언을 남겼습니다.{nl}
Tapi masa depan yang aku lihat pada tempat itu hanyalah penyesalan dan kematian.  {nl}Maka dari itu, Aku meninggalkan ramalan agar capital segera berpindah tempat saat kerajaan sudah berumur ribuan tahun.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It is now up to the humans to fulfill that prophecy. {nl}The end lies beyond the fog.
그러나 예언을 이행하는 것은 결국 인간의 몫. {nl}어떠한 결말을 가져올지는 안개속에 가려져 있습니다.{nl}
Namun itu semua bergantung pada tekad dan kemauan manusia.  {nl}Akhir dari ini masih belum terlihat jelas.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I plan to leave the end of this story in the next revelation. {nl}Find my next revelation in the Mage Tower.
다음 계시에서 그 결말의 끝을 남기려 합니다.{nl}마법사의 탑에서 저의 계시를 찾아 주세요.
Aku akan memberitahu akhir dari semua ini pada wahyu berikutnya.  {nl}Temukan wahyu itu pada Mage Tower.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Laima
라이마
Laima

Please select the user requiring a quest: There are still more keys left to find. {nl}It's a relief that they are all secretly guarded by Maven's plan.
찾아야 할 열쇠가 아직 많이 남아 있습니다.{nl}메이번님께서 고안하신 비밀에 온전히 지켜지고 있기만 해도 다행이겠지요.{nl}{nl}
Masih ada kunci lain yang harus di cari.  {nl}Itu akan melegakan jika dijaga secara diam-diam oleh rencana dari Maven.

Please select the user requiring a quest: What once housed the goddesses is now filled with demons. {nl}Maven, the first bishop, would be very sad about this.
여신을 모시던 곳이 이젠 마족들로 넘처나다니 대성당 초대 주교인 메이번님이 슬퍼하실 겁니다.
Tempat yang dulu ditinggali oleh Goddess sekarang dipenuhi demon.  {nl}Maven, sang uskup pertama, pasti akan sangat sedih.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Insert the Relics that match each altar. {nl}Then you will be able to get Maven's first key.
소회당의 제단에 각각 맞는 성유물을 끼워넣으세요. {nl}메이번님의 첫 번째 열쇠를 얻을 수 있을 겁니다.
Masukkan relic sesuai dengan altarnya.  {nl}Dan setelah itu kamu bisa mendapatkan Maven's first key.

Please select the user requiring a quest: First, prepare. {nl}The Wood Goblins will be attacking soon.
일단 준비하시오. 우드고블린이 공격해올 거요.
Ayo, bersiaplah.  {nl}Para Wood Goblin akan datang menyerang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Great Cathedral used to be where we worshiped the goddess. {nl}Now it's turned to a nest of demons...
여신을 모시는 대성당이 이젠 마족의 소굴로 변해버렸다니...
Cathedral dulunya adalah tempat berdoa kepada Goddess.  {nl}Sekarang berubah menjadi sarang demon…

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's the key. Go to the Veiniky Altar. {nl}Maven's device can be found there.
열쇠군요. 베이니키 제단으로 이동하십시오. 베이니키 제단에 메이번님의 장치가 있습니다.
Itu dia key nya. Pergilah ke Veiniky Altar.  {nl}Maven's device ada di sana.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Naktis' servants have become disoriented.
나크티스의 부하들이 움직임이 분주해졌습니다.
Anak buah Naktis' menjadi tidak berdaya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I presume this is the key that releases the device at the Veiniky Altar.
베이니카 제단에 있는 장치를 푸는 열쇠가 아닐까 싶습니다.
Sepertinya ini adalah key untuk device pada Veiniky Altar.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The next device is at the Veiniky Altar.
다음 장치는 베이니카 제단에 있습니다.
Device berikutnya ada di Veiniky Altar.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This drug really better work...
약이 제발 효과가 있어야 하는데..
Semoga obat ini bekerja dengan baik…

Please select the user requiring a quest: This drug better work...
게발 약효가 있어야 할텐데
Sepertinya obat ini bekerja..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Food... Did you bring food?
음식.. 음식을 가지고 오셨나요?
Makanan… Apakah kamu membawa makanan?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Did you see the pilgrim with never-ending hunger? {nl}He's also under Naktis' curse. {nl}That's why his hunger can't be filled, no matter how much he eats.
음식을 먹어도 먹어도 배고픈 순례자를 보셨다고요?{nl}그 순례자도 나크티스의 저주 때문에 먹어도 먹어도 허기를 채워지지 못하는 겁니다.
Apakah kamu melihat pilgrim yang selalu kelaparan?  {nl}Pilgrim itu terkena kutukan Naktis.  {nl}Itu dia mengapa dia selalu lapar, tidak peduli seberapa banyak dia makan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ugghh... What did I eat? {nl}I feel sick.
으으.. 제가 뭘 먹은거죠?{nl}속이 울렁거립니다.
Ugghh… Apa itu yang tadi aku makan?  {nl}Aku merasa mual.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The drug better work...
약효가 있어야 할텐데..
Obat itu bereaksi…

Please select the user requiring a quest: They're feeling nauseous? {nl}I can't tell if the drug is working just by looking at their reactions.
속이 울렁거린다고요?{nl}순례자들의 반응을 보면 정말 약효가 있는지 없는지 모르겠군요.
Mereka merasa mual? {nl}Aku tidak tau apakah obat ini bekerja hanya dengan melihat reaksi mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'll give you the drug. {nl}Give it to the pilgrims.
약을 드리겠습니다.{nl}이 약을 순례자에게 사용하십시오.
Aku akan memberikanmu obat.  {nl}Berikan kepada para pilgrim.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Now I better go and bury the bishop.
이제 주교님의 시신을 묻으러 가야겠습니다.
Sekarang aku lebih baik pergi dan menguburkan sang uskup.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thank you for helping me bury the bishop.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Maven's device will not be destroyed easily but that doesn't mean it's indestructible.
메이번님의 장치는 쉽게 파괴되지 않을 겁니다. 그렇다고 영원히 파괴되지 않다고 말 할수 있는 상황이 아닙니다.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Naktis' servants are showing strong obsession {nl}over the things inside Maven's device.

Please select the user requiring a quest: If Naktis' servants took it, then the last key must be in the hands of Naktis.
나크티스의 부하들이 가지고 갔다면 마지막 열쇠는 나크티스의 손에 있을 겁니다.
Jika pengikut Naktis mengambilnya, maka kunci terakhir ada di tangan Naktis.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Naktis' servants have reported to her that we have the key.
우리가 열쇠를 가지고 있다는 걸 나크티스의 부하들이 나크티스에게 보고를 했습니다.
Pengikut Naktis melaporkan kepada Naktis bahwa kita telat mempunyai kunci.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The shining keys and marbles...
빛을 내는 구슬과 열쇠들..
The shining keys and marbles..

Please select the user requiring a quest: The color of the shining keys and marbles... {nl}they seem to match each other and are related.
빛을 내는 구슬과 열쇠들의 색.. 서로 연관관계가 있어 보입니다.
Warna shining keys and marbles.. Mereka terlihat sama.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It seems something reacted.
뭔가 반응이 있는 것 같다.
Sepertinya terlihat suatu reaksi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We are the priests sent to undo Naktis' curse at Pilgrim's Way. {nl}We are looking for the many documents about the demons and their curse in the Cathedral.
저흰 순례자의 길에 퍼진 나크티스의 저주를 풀기 위해서 파견된 사제들입니다.{nl}대성당엔 마족과 마족들의 저주에 대한 문서가 많습니다. 현재 저흰 대성당에서 문서를 찾고 있었습니다.
Pendeta ini dikirim untuk memecahkan kutukan Nokutisu yang telah menyebar ke jalan Join pilgrims. {nl} Ada sebuah dokumen tentang kutukan katedral lingkaran Asmodian dan Elyos. Aku sedang mencari dokumen Katedral Joaquin saat ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The device will be released when all the floor plates are pressed down.
발판 모두를 눌러놓고 있어야 장치가 해제됩니다.
Perangkat ini akan dirilis ketika semua jejak ditekan ke bawah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Take the bombs from the chest. You must destroy the entrance of the Royal Mausoleum.
상자에 담겨있는 폭탄을 가져가십시오. 왕릉 입구를 꼭 파괴해야합니다.
Tolong bawa bom beserta kotaknya. Aku selalu ingin menghancurkan pintu masuk makam raja.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Help!
사람 살려!
Mengambil kesempatan orang-orang!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Warning
경고
Peringatan

Please select the user requiring a quest: Stop! You cannot go beyond this point without permission!
멈춰! 허가 없이는 이 앞을 지날 수 없다!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Cunningham took pity on the girl and cared for her. Soon they became best friends.

Warna musim semi kadang-kadang berwarna safir dan kadang-kadang berwarna batu giok. {nl} Melihat warna mereka yang mendalam dan misterius membuat Kamu bertanya-tanya apakah ini adalah karya Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: But it will give me the chance to look back at my life. {nl}And in the long run, it could help a Revelator who shows up in the future.
작게는 나의 삶을 되돌아 볼 수 있는 계기가 될 것이며 {nl}멀리 보면 후대에 찾아올 계시의 주인에게도 도움이 되지 않을까 하는 기대를 품고 있다.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I might not know for what reason people would come all the way out here, {nl} but after Medzio Diena, it feels great to be in such a cheerful town. {nl} I might skip work tomorrow and party along. {nl} {nl}

Tanggal 5 bulan X{nl} - {nl} Aku ingin menjadi teman dari tetangga baruku sesegera mungkin, jadi aku membawakan beberapa potato dumplings kesana. {nl}Di pintu, aku bisa mendengar suara rumah berderik. Lalu kemudian tetanggaku muncul, tanpa ekspresi, {nl}tetapi ia mendadak menampakkan ekspresi senang ketika melihat potato dumplings. {Nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: He apologized for his lack of spirit before, as he and his son were putting up wallpaper. {nl} What a harmonious family, I wonder if I could create something like that?

Dia mnta maaf atas kurang semangatnya, saat ia dan putranya memasang wallpaper. {nl} Keluarga yang harmonis, aku bertanya-tanya jika Aku bisa membuat sesuatu seperti itu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: The 10th of X {nl} - {nl} Mr. Raman, who lived at the bank of the creek opposite from us, went on leave. His wife said he was off to get firewood. {nl} Well, for a long time he was gone in Klaipeda. {nl}I've heard that you can find a lot of beautiful girls in Klaipeda. {nl}
X월 10일{nl}-{nl}건너편 개울가에 살던 라만 아저씨가 며칠 째 부재중이시다.{nl}부인께서는 라만씨가 나무하러 가셨다곤 하는데..{nl}뭐, 간만에 클라페다라도 나가신 모양이겠지. {nl}클라페다에는 이쁜 아가씨들이 많다고 가끔 나에게 귀띔해 주셨거든.{nl}
Tanggal 10 bulan X{nl} - {nl}Raman, yang tinggal di bank yang berada di tepi sungai yang berlawanan dari tempat kami, Pergi keluar. Istrinya berkata ia pergi untuk mencari kayu bakar. {nl} Untuk waktu ya lama ia telah pergi ke Klaipeda. {nl}Aku telah mendengar bahwa kau dapat menemukan wanita-wanita cantik di Klaipeda. {Nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The 13th of X {nl} - {nl} Today was Goddess Origin Day, but somehow everyone in town had stomach pains, and could not celebrate. Why this happened specifically on this day I do not know. {nl}Well, illnesses will be illnesses. After all that, we had to make potato porridge. {nl}
X월 13일{nl}-{nl}여신께 기원을 올리는 날인데 이웃집 사람들은 또 모두 배탈이 났다며 참여하지 않았다.{nl}왜 기원을 올리는 날만 오면 아프다는건진 모르겠다만 뭐. 아프다는데 어쩔 수 없지.{nl}나중에 감자죽이라도 쑤어서 가져다 줘야겠다.{nl}
Tanggal 13 bulan X {nl} - {nl} Hari ini adalah hari memanjatkan permintaan kepada Goddess, tetapi entah kenapa semua orang di kota mengalami sakit perut, dan tidak dapat merayakannya. Entah kenapa ini terjadi secara spesifik di hari ini. {Nl}Hmm, Sakit akan tetap menjadi sakit. Setelah semua itu, kami harus membuat  potato porridge. {Nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The 14th of X {nl} - {nl} Last night I had an argument with my little sister. {nl}Writing down what you really think isn't that embarrassing. After what happened, {nl}I made a necklace as a present to her, and she came back to me. {nl}Well, I had to give in eventually. Even so, on one morning, she disappeared to somewhere. {nl}
X월 14일{nl}-{nl}어젯밤 여동생과 크게 다퉜다.{nl}사실 여기다 쓰기에도 민망할 정도로 별 거 아닌 일이라..{nl}나중에 선물해 주려고 만든 목걸이가 있는데 여동생이 돌아오거든 그냥 줘야겠다.{nl}그런데 아침 댓바람부터 어딜 나갔길래 돌아오질 않는 걸까.{nl}
Tanggal 14 bulan X {nl} - {nl} Semalam aku berdebat dengan adik kecilku. {nl}Menuliskan apa yang kau benar pikirkan adalah bukan sesuatu yang memalukan. Setelah apa yang terjadi, {nl}Aku membuat kalung untuk menghadiahkan kepadanya, dan ia kembali kepadaku. {nl}Yah, terkadang aku harus memberikan sesuatu. Walau begitu, dia menghilang entah kemana suatu pagi. {Nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ah, just now my neighbor made me some delicious porridge. {nl} In return I made them some warm soup. I can cook too, you know? {nl}Tonight will be another feast so I'm going to make sure to eat and drink plenty.
참, 이웃집에서 저번에 쑤어준 죽이 맛있었다면서 답례로 따뜻한 수프를 가져다 주셨다.{nl}내가 한 요리 하긴 하지. 엣헴.{nl}오늘은 밤이 깊었으니 두었다 다음에 데워먹어야겠다.
Ah, sekarang tetangga Aku membuatkan Aku bubur lezat. {nl} imbalannya Aku membuat mereka beberapa sup hangat. Aku bisa memasak juga, kamu tahu? {nl} Malam ini akan menjadi pesta lain jadi Aku akan memastikan untuk makan dan minum banyak.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The 16th of X {nl} - {nl} I got a stomachache drinking soup that I didn't know already went bad. {nl} I double-checked the smell before eating it, but there was no bad odor. {nl}I felt horrible inside so I went to the well for water. Even with the water, I continued to feel horrible. {nl}
X월 16일{nl}-{nl}수프가 상한 줄도 모르고 입에 넣었다가 다 게워냈다.{nl}먹기 전에 냄새라도 좀 맡아 볼껄. 하지만 쉰 냄새는 맡지 못했는데..{nl}속이 계속 좋지 않아서 우물가로 달려갔지만 {nl}된통 잘못 먹었는지 우물물도 메슥거리는 것 처럼 느껴진다.{nl}
Tanggal 16 bulan X {nl} - {nl} Aku mengalami sakit perut akibat meminum sup yang ternyata sudah basi. {Nl} Padahal aku memeriksa dua kali dengan mencium baunya, sebelum memakannya, tetapi tidak ada bau mencurigakan. {Nl}Aku merasa tidak enak di perutku, jadi aku pergi ke sumur untuk mengambil air. Walaupun telah meminum air, perutku tetap terasa tidak enak. {Nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've been throwing up a lot lately but it seems to be getting better now. {nl}Tomorrow I'm going to go see Mr. Gordon to get some medicinal herbs. {nl} My little sister still hasn't come back yet. When I go to her room, I find no clothes. Even Mr. Man is getting worried.
억지로 계속 토해냈더니 그나마 좀 괜찮아 진 것 같다.{nl}내일 일찍 고든 아저씨네 집에 약초를 좀 얻어야 겠다.{nl}여동생은 아직도 돌아오질 않았다.{nl}방에 들어 가 보니 몇몇 옷가지가 없다.{nl}라만 아저씨 일도 있고 해서 걱정이 된다.{nl}
Aku sering muntah belakangan ini, tetapi sekarang sudah lebih membaik. {Nl}Besok aku akan menemui Gordon to get some medicinal herbs. {Nl} Adik kecilku masih juga belum kembali. Ketika aku pergi ke kamarnya, tidak ada baju yang tersisa. Bahkan sekarang Man juga menjadi khawatir.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The 17th of X {nl} - {nl} The village was eerily quiet today. {nl}There are no signs of the people who went earlier to get herbs from Mr. Gordon.
X월 17일{nl}-{nl}오늘따라 마을이 너무 조용하다.{nl}고든씨네 집에 약초를 얻으러 갔는데 인기척이 없어서 그냥 돌아 왔다.
The 17th of X {nl} - {nl}Desa hari ini sepi. {nl} Tidak ada tanda-tanda dari orang-orang yang pergi lebih awal untuk mendapatkan herbal dari Mr Gordon.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The 23rd of X {nl} - {nl} This might be the last time I get to write in this diary. {nl} Lyliana, you are the only family I have left in this world... {nl} Please be alive somewhere... {nl}
X월 23일{nl}-{nl}어쩌면 이 일기가 마지막이 될 수도 아닐 수도 있을 것 같다.{nl}세상에 하나밖에 없는 나의 가족 리리아나.. {nl}너만은 제발 어딘가에서라도 살아 있어 주길.{nl}
The 23rd of X {nl} - {nl} Ini mungkin menjadi yang terakhir kalinya aku menulis dalam buku harian ini. {nl} Lyliana, Kamu adalah satu-satunya keluarga yang tersisa di dunia ini ... {nl} Tolong bertahan hidup di suatu tempat ... {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: {nl}(There is something written, but it's all jumbled up and has ceased to be legible.)
{nl}(무언가를 썼다가 황급히 지운 흔적만 남아 있다.){nl}
{nl}(Ada sesuatu yang tertulis, tapi itu semua campur aduk dan tidak terbaca.)

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unknown Date {nl} - {nl}Several days must've passed. {nl}I've been on the run for around two days now without food or sleep. {nl}The people who fled to Klaipeda were all caught and killed. {nl}I don't even know how many are still alive and can walk. {nl}Everything is as quiet as the shadows, yet moving at a quick pace. We are all tense from fear of attack.
날짜 모르겠음.{nl}-{nl}며칠이 지났는지도 모르겠다.{nl}이틀 정도 먹지도 자지도 못하고 계속 달린 것 같다.{nl}클라페다쪽으로 도망치던 사람들은 모두 잡혀 죽었다.{nl}어쩌면, 나 말고도 살아있는 사람들이 있는지 없는지 조차도 모르겠다.{nl}모든 건 그림자처럼 아주 조용히, 빠르게.. 미쳐버릴 것 같은 공포가 옥죄어 오는 것 같다.{nl}
Tanggal tidak diketahui {nl}- {nl}Beberapa hari telah berlalu. {nl}Aku telah berlari kira-kira dua hari lamanya, tanpa makan dan minum. {nl}Orang-orang yang lari ke Klaipeda semua ditangkap dan dibunuh. {nl}Aku bahkan tidak tahu berapa banyak yang masih hidup dan dapat berjalan. {nl}Semua sama tenang seperti bayangan, tetapi bergerak dengan irama yang cepat. Kita semua dibayangi dengan ketakutan akan serangan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: They did not wish for any uproar or disorder. {nl}They are not people. {nl}We must somehow notify Klaipeda. {nl}A last resort would be to abandon everything we can't use and move out.
그들은 어떠한 소란이나 혼란을 원하지 않았다. {nl}그들은 사람이 아니다.{nl}어떻게든 클라페다로 알려야한다.. {nl}그것만이 내 이웃의 더러운 인두껍을 벗겨버리는 마지막 수단이 될 것이다.
Mereka tidak berharap keributan atau gangguan. {nl} Mereka bukan orang-orang. {nl} Kita harus memberitahu Klaipeda entah bagaimana caranya. {nl} Yang terakhir akan meninggalkan yang tidak dapat kita gunakan dan berpindah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oh. It's you. {nl}This is our army base camp, so feel free to relax.
아. 자네로군. {nl}여긴 우리 군의 집결지이니 편히 있도록 하게.
Oh. Kamu. {Nl}Ini markas tentara kami, jadi silahkan beristirahat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Have you already met the other soldiers? {nl}Hmm... What's your name?
벌써 우리 병사들과 통성명이라도 한 건가?{nl}흠.. 자네들 이름은 뭐지?
Apakah Kamu bertemu dengan prajurit lain sudah? {nl} Hmm ... Siapa namamu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Alright, thanks. You guys are working hard. {nl}I want to talk to my aides. Where are they?
그래, 고맙네. 자네들도 열심이로군.{nl}내 부관들과 이야기하고 싶은데 다들 어디 있지?
Baiklah, terima kasih. Kalian telah bekerja keras. {nl} Aku ingin berbicara dengan pembantu Aku. Di mana mereka?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Do you have something to say?
그래. 하고 싶은 말은 뭔가.
Jadi. Ada sesuatu yang ingin kamu katakan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Send the two from the entrance to the front lines? {nl}Ha, that's nonsense. Did they ask you for that?
입구의 두 녀석을 전선으로 보내달라고?{nl}하, 말도 안 되는 소리. 그 녀석들이 자네에게 그렇게 부탁하던가?
Mengirim dua dari pintu masuk ke garis depan? {nl} Ha, itu omong kosong. Apakah mereka meminta Kamu untuk melakukan itu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's you? That would bother me. {nl}Hmm... I'm thankful that you are willing to join the front lines even when you can have it easier here...
자네들인가? 나도 참 당황스럽군.{nl} 음.. 이런 편한 보직을 놔두고 굳이 전선에 나가겠다니 마음은 고맙지만..
Itu kamu? Hal itu akan mengganggu Aku. {nl} Hmm ... Aku bersyukur bahwa Kamu bersedia bergabung dengan garis depan bahkan ketika Kamu dapat memiliki lebih mudah di sini

Please select the user requiring a quest: I hate people who lack responsibility. {nl}Are there people who can take over your positions?
난 책임감 없는 사람은 질색이네.{nl} 자네들이 수행하던 임무를 대신할 자는 있는 건가?
Aku benci orang yang tidak bertanggungjawab. {nl}Adakah orang yang dapat menggantikan posisimu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I like your spirit. {nl}But that doesn't mean I can take you in without question.
그 패기 하난 맘에 드는군. {nl}하지만 그렇다고 해서 자네들을 무턱대고 데려갈 순 없어.
Aku suka dengan semngatmu.{nl}Tetapi bukan berarti aku dapat mebgambilmu tanpa pertanyaan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We are the undefeated unit of Raimondas. {nl}I only accept the best soldiers I can find.
이 라이몬다스의 부대는 무패의 부대로 이름나 있다. {nl}그만큼 내 부대의 병사들은 내가 인정하는 정예병으로만 구성되어 있지.
Kami adalah unit tidak terkalahkan dari Laimondas. {nl} Hanya menerima para prajurit terbaik yang dapat Aku temukan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: By the way, are you going to take this guy as well?
그런데 이 녀석도 데려갈 건가?
Apakah kamu akan mangajak orang ini juga?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know what he does, but please keep this in mind: {nl}War is not a joke. I'll let you take him if you're willing to work with him in battle.
이 녀석이 뭘 하는 녀석인지는 모르겠지만, 명심해두게. 전쟁은 장난이 아니야.{nl}전투에서 잘 써먹을 자신이 있다면 허락하지.
Aku tidak tahu apa yang dia lakukan, tetapi ingatlah ini. peperangan bukanlah lelucon. {nl}aku akan menerima dia jika kamu dapat menggukanan dia dengan baik dalam pertempuran.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Damn, I thought it would die after getting its throat cut. {nl}I hope it can just behave and die slowly now.
어휴, 기다리느라 목이 빠져 죽는 줄 알았네.{nl}그러니까 이번엔 좀 얌전히 죽어 줬으면 좋겠어.
Sial, aku menunggu terlalu lama. {nl} Aku harap dia terbunuh secara diam-diam.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oops. I was late this time. Well, it doesn't matter that much. {nl}Soon my masterpiece will be complete. I hope you guys like it.
어이고야. 이번엔 내가 늦었네. 아무렴 뭐 어때. {nl}조금 있으면 내 초유의 걸작이 완성되는데 자네들 마음에 들었으면 좋겠군.
Aku terlambat kali ini. Ya, ini tidak terlalu berarti. {nl}Sebentar lagi karyaku akan selesai dan aku harap kalian menyukainya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unknown Demon
이름모를 마족
Iblis yang tidak diketahui

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ah... I almost forgot. I'll be taking this guy along!
아차차.. 깜빡했군. 이 녀석은 가져가야지!
Ah.. Aku hampir lupa. Aku akan membawa orang ini bersamaku!

Please select the user requiring a quest: I can feel Laima's power.
라이마의 기운이 느껴지는군.
Aku bisa merasakan kekuatan Laima

Please select the user requiring a quest: This pain I haven't felt for a long time...
오랜만에 느껴 보는 고통..{nl}
Rasa sakit yang sudah lama tidak kurasakan...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Even so, I will not waste my power on you.
그렇다고 해서 너희들에게 힘을 낭비할 필욘 없지.{nl}
Meskipun begitu, Aku tidak akan menyia-nyiakan kekuatanku untuk melawan kalian.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I guess the real revelation is in the chapel? {nl}That Laima could only prepare this much. Such a pity.
진짜 계시는 성당에 있는 모양이지?{nl}라이마가 기껏 준비했다는 게 이 정도라니, 참으로 가소로와.
Sepertinya penyelamat yang asli berada di cathedral?{nl}Apakah hanya ini persiapan Laima, sungguh menyedihkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This is the Seal of Space...{nl}
이것이 공간의 문장..{nl}
Ini adalah Seal of Space .. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: We will need the Revelator.
계시자가 필요하겠어.
Kita akan membutuhkan Savior.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Revelator has came here alone. {nl}Exactly what I wanted.
계시자께서 제 발로 나타나셨군.{nl}원하던 바다.
Savior datang ke sini sendiri.{nl}Seperti apa yang aku inginkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: For what purpose did you come to this cursed city? {nl}Please go back if you have nothing in particular to attend to.
무슨일로 이 저주받은 도시를 방문한 겁니까?{nl}특별한 볼일이 없다면 돌아가 주십시오.
Untuk apa kalian mengunjungi kota terkutuk ini? {nl}Mohon kembali saja jika kamu tidak mempunyai tujuan khusus.

Please select the user requiring a quest: So you are the famous Revelator. The Knights of Kaliss are looking for competent people like you. {nl}If you're here to help them, I'll temporarily permit your entrance.
당신이 그 유명한 계시자시군요. 마침 칼리스 기사단에서 당신같은 유능한 사람들을 찾고 있더군요.{nl}칼리스 기사단을 도울 요량이라면 출입을 잠시동안 허가하겠습니다.
Jadi kamu Savior yang terkenal itu. Caliss Knightage sedang mencari orang-orang sepertimu. {nl}Jika kamu akan menolong mereka, aku akan mengijinkanmu masuk sebentar.

Please select the user requiring a quest: But please don't forget. The right to enter here belongs to our soldiers. {nl}We hope you don't create unnecessary trouble.
하지만 잊지마십시오. 이곳의 모든 통행권은 우리 왕국군에게 있습니다.{nl}우리와 불필요한 마찰을 일으키지 않길 바랍니다.
Kumohon jangan lupa. Untuk memasuki tempat ini hanya diperbolehkan untuk prajurit kami. {nl}kami harap kamu tidak menimbulkan masalah bagi kami.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Salister... What are you even talking about? {nl}That's absurd...
살티스터라니.. 그게 무슨 소립니까?{nl}말도 안 되는 소리를..
Salister.. Apa yang kamu katakan? {nl}itu konyol..

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Symbol of Silt is in my hands thanks to you.{nl}If I pass this symbol to the dumb Royal Army or the Knights of Kaliss, they're going to give me more shifts on watch.
당신 덕에 실트의 징표가 내 손에 들어왔습니다.{nl}이 버려진 징표를 멍청한 왕국군이나 칼리스 기사단에게 넘겨봐야 보초서는 횟수만 늘어나겠죠.
Tanda Schilt ada di tanganku, terima kasih. {n} Jika Aku dapat melewati tentara kerajaan yang bodoh atau Knights of Kaliss dengan tanda ini, mereka akan lebih mengawasiku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Only an ambitious and clever man such as I could unleash this object's true potential.
이 물건은 저같은 야욕있고 영리한 자에게 있어야만 그 진가를 발휘합니다.
Benda ini akan lebih efektif jika dimiliki oleh orang yang memiliki ambisi dan kepintaran sepertiku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I will now use the power of Petrification and Ice to awaken this centuries-old power. {nl} Please stay there and observe.
이제 제가 석화의 힘과 얼음을 다뤄서 수백년 전 고대의 힘을 불러내겠습니다.{nl}당신은 이제 거기서 지켜보기나 하십시오.
Aku akan mengontrol kekuatan Petrification dan Ice untuk membangunkan kekuatan Ancient yang ada pada ratusan tahun lalu. {nl}Diam disitu dan lihatlah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I will help keep the Spirits of Time off of you!
시간의 망령들이 당신을 괴롭히지 못 하도록 제가 도와 드릴게요!
Aku akan membantumu agar Spirits of Time tidak menyerangmu!

Please select the user requiring a quest: What's happening? {nl}It's coming this way! Watch out!
어떻게 된거죠? 저녀석이 여기로 넘어오고 있어요!{nl}조심하세요!
Apa yang terjadi? Benda itu datang kesini! {nl}Hati - hati!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Are you headed to the Great Cathedral, Revelator? {nl}Be careful! The demons have surrounded us!
계시자님, 성당으로 가십니까? 조심하십시오!{nl}사방에 마족들이 쫙 깔렸습니다!
Savior, apakah kamu akan pergi ke cathedral? Hati - hati! {nl}Banyak monster disana!

Please select the user requiring a quest: The barrier is up and running. {nl}Please deal with Gesti while I activate the Divine Sphere.
결계가 작동되는구나.{nl}내가 성구를 발동시킬 동안 제스티를 부탁한다.
Barrier bekerja. {nl}saat aku mengaktifkan Lection, tolong urus Gesti.

Please select the user requiring a quest: If she's not on the first floor, then she must be on the second. {nl}I hope we're not too late.
1층에 없다면 벌써 2층으로 올라간 게로군.{nl}우리가 너무 늦은 게 아니라면 좋겠구나.{nl}
Jika tidak ada di 1st floor, pasti itu ada di 2nd floor. {nl}Aku harap kita tidak belum terlambat. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: This is my friend, Donatas. {nl}I will go up first to figure out Gesti's movements, so come up once you're ready.
이쪽은 도나타스라는 친구다. {nl}난 먼저 올라가서 제스티의 동태를 살필 테니 준비가 되면 올라오거라.
Dia dipanggil Donatas.  {nl}Aku akan keatas untuk melihat bagaimana pekerjaan Gesti, pergilah keatas jika kamu sudah siap.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hey! You shouldn't come here!
이봐 여기 들어오면 안 돼!
Hey kamu tidak seharusnya datang kesini!

Please select the user requiring a quest: So the Peltasta Master sent it... Ah, so this is what those cowardly miners were talking about.
펠타스터 마스터가 보냈다니.. 아, 겁쟁이 광부 녀석들이 소란 떨던 그거였군.
Jadi Peltasta Master mengirimkannya ... Ah, jadi ini adalah apa yang para penambang pengecut bicarakan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: No worries at all. I'm not scared. They're all fake rumors. {nl}It's no surprise the mine is shaking.
걱정할 것 없어, 난 하나도 무섭지 않다고 그리고 그건 다 헛소문이야.{nl}갱도가 흔들리는 게 어디 하루 이틀인가
Jangan khawatir, aku tidak takut. Itu semua hanya rumor palsu. {nl}hal yang biasa jika mine tersebut bergetar.

Aku akan menunjukkan permintaan yang terdaftar sejauh ini. {nl} Kamu tahu bahwa Kamu bisa mendapatkan memohon lagi setelah satu hari berlalu, bahkan jika Kamu menyerah, kan?

행정관

Please select the user requiring a quest: I will guide you to where I believe your abilities are most needed.
여러분들의 능력에 따라 도움이 필요한 곳을 안내해 드리고 있습니다.
Aku akan membimbingmu kepada orang-orang yang membutuhkan bantuan  {nl} tergantung dari kemampuanmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There was a sudden increase of monsters in West Siauliai Woods. {nl}We need your help, urgently.
샤울레이 서쪽 숲에 몬스터가 급격히 불어났다고 합니다.{nl}빠른 지원을 부탁드리겠습니다.
Ada peningkatan monster mendadak di West Siauliai Woods.  {nl} Kami membutuhkan bantuanmu secepatnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Vubbes are pouring out of the Crystal Mine. {nl}The Miner's Village needs your help.
수정광산에서 부베들이 쏟아져 나오고 있다고 합니다.{nl}광산 마을을 안전하게 지켜내기 위해선 당신의 도움이 필요합니다.
Vubbes mengalir keluar dari Tambang Kristal. {nl} Warga Miner membutuhkan bantuanmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: A wicked aura has descended upon Silverstream Gorge, signaling an invasion by demons. {nl}Scouts and Paladin followers have been blocking their advance, but desperately need your help.
은수협곡이 사악한 기운으로 물들고, 마족들이 침공을 시작했다고 합니다.{nl}파수꾼과 팔라딘 추종자들이 막아내고 있지만, 당신의 도움이 절실한 상황입니다.
Sebuah aura jahat telah turun ke atas Silverstream Gorge, menandakan invasi oleh setan. {nl} Pengikut Scouts and Paladin telah memblokir maju, tetapi sangat membutuhkan bantuan Kamu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Monsters are attacking the Tenet Church. {nl}Paladin followers are blocking their attacks, but they will soon fall without any help.
테넷 성당에 마족들이 공격을 감행하고 있습니다.{nl}팔라딘 추종자들이 막아내곤 있지만, 도움 없이는 버티기 힘들 것입니다.
Monster menyerang Tenet Cathedral. {nl}Pengikut Paladin sedang menghadang serangan mereka, tapi mereka akan kalah jika tidak ada bantuan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Strange things are happening at Grass Brookside. {nl}All the villagers have gone missing and monsters now occupy the village.
풀가람 터에 괴이한 사건들이 벌어지고 있습니다.{nl}마을 사람들이 전부 실종되고, 몬스터들이 그 자리를 차지하고 있다는군요.
Hal aneh terjadi di Grass Brook Side. {nl}semua penghuni desa menghilang dan terdapat monster di desa tersebut.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There's a dark aura forming at Gate Route. {nl}If we don't get rid of that aura, thorny vines will cover the forest.
관문로에서 사악한 기운이 또아리를 틀고 있습니다.{nl}만약 사악한 기운을 없애지 못한다면, 가시덩굴이 온 숲을 뒤덮을 것입니다.
Ada aura gelap yang terbentuk di Gate Route. {nl} Jika kita tidak menyingkirkan aura itu, tanaman duri merambat akan menyelimuti hutan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please help the historians at Gateway of Great King. {nl}Monsters are chasing them since they've found a clue about Medzio Diena.
대왕의 관문에 있는 사학자들을 도와 주십시오.{nl}신수의 날의 실마리를 찾는 그들을 몬스터들이 노리고 있습니다.
Harap membantu para sejarawan di Gateway of Great King. {nl} Monster yang mengejar mereka sejak mereka menemukan petunjuk tentang Medzio Diena.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Zachariel, the Great King's tomb is being ruined by a horde. {nl}The tomb will be destroyed by the demons if you don't fight them.
자카리엘 대왕의 왕릉이 사악한 무리에 의해 더럽혀지고 있습니다.{nl}당신의 지원이 없다면, 왕릉은 곧 마족에게 함락될 것입니다.
Zachariel, makam besar Raja dirusak oleh para gerombolan. {nl} makam tersebut akan hancur oleh iblis jika Kamu tidak melawan mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Monsters are obstructing the entrance at High Crooked Road. {nl}If these monsters are not taken care of, then the cities and villages will be isolated.
높이굽은 길에 몬스터들이 들어앉아 통행을 방해하고 있습니다.{nl}몬스터들을 처리하지 못한다면 모든 도시와 마을은 고립될 것입니다.
Monster menghalangi pintu masuk di High Crooked Road. {nl} Jika monster ini tidak diurus, maka kota dan desa akan terisolasi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Demons have invaded Mage Tower. {nl}We need your help quickly.
마법사의 탑에 마족의 침공이 시작되었다고 합니다.{nl}빠른 지원을 부탁드립니다.
Iblis telah menginvasi Mage Tower. {nl} Kami membutuhkan bantuan Kamu secepatnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We need help at the entrance of Kateen Forest. {nl}We should be able to take the forest back from the monsters, but we'll need more support and manpower.
카틴 숲 입구에 지원이 필요합니다.{nl}몬스터에게서 숲을 되찾으려 하지만 보급과 병력이 많이 부족한 상황입니다.
Kami memerlukan bantuan di Entrance of Kateen Forest. {nl}kami mencoba untuk mengambil alih kembali hutan tersebut dari para monster, tapi kami memerlukan bantuan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We need support to clear a path from Soul Peak to Gateway of Great King. {nl}Please assist us.
영혼고개에서 대왕의 관문으로 길을 뚫는 데 지원이 필요합니다.{nl}지원을 부탁드립니다.
Kami memerlukan bantuan untuk berjalan menuju Gateway of Great King dari Soul Peak. {nl}Tolong bantu kami.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There's been a disaster at the Starving Demon's Way. {nl}Please send assistance quickly.
큰아귀 길에 재앙이 휩쓸고 지나갔다고 합니다.{nl}신속한 지원을 부탁드립니다.
Sudah ada bencana di Jalan Starving Demon's Way ini. {nl} Silakan kirim bantuan secepatnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Great Cathedral is being ruined by a menacing horde. {nl}The Cathedral will soon collapse without your support.
대성당이 사악한 무리에 의해 더럽혀지고 있습니다.{nl}당신의 지원이 없다면, 대성당은 곧 마족에게 함락될 것입니다.
Cathedral sedang diserang. {nl}Cathedral ada hancur tanpa bantuanmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Monsters are advancing toward the cursed limestone city. {nl}The dispatched troops are doing whatever they can to resist, but the curse is making the situation dire.
과거에 석화의 저주를 받은 도시에 몬스터들이 밀려들어오고 있습니다.{nl}파견된 병사들이 어떻게든 막아내고 있지만 저주 때문에 힘든 상황입니다.
Monster maju menuju kota kapur terkutuk. {nl} pasukan dikirim melakukan apa pun yang mereka bisa untuk menolak tapi kutukan membuat situasi menjadi mengerikan.
