Please select the user requiring a quest: Now go to Gintara Highway in Sirdgela Forest. {nl}Spray this potion on the Matsum dolls I placed there and tell me what happens.
이제 시르드겔라 숲의 긴타라 가도로 가게.{nl}내가 설치해 놓은 실험용 메슘 인형에 이 물약을 뿌리고 결과를 내게 알려 주게.
Kini pergilah ke Gintara Road di Sirdgela Forest.  {nl} Semprotkan potion ini pada matsum dolls yang aku pasang dan laporkan padaku hasilnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Four scouts were sent to Sirdgela Forest not too long ago but all of them went missing. {nl}Maybe they took the Thorn Forest too lightly... {nl}Please find their whereabouts.
얼마 전에 시르드겔라 숲에 4명의 정찰병을 보냈습니다만, 전부 실종되었습니다.{nl}어쩌면 가시 숲을 만만히 보다 변을 당한 게 아닌지.. 그들의 행방을 찾아 주십시오.
Empat scout dikirim ke Sirdgela Forest belum lama ini namun mereka semua hilang.  {nl}Mungkin mereka pergi ke Thorn Forest tanpa pikir panjang.. Tolong cari keberadaannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I no longer have the strength to carry on, but will write this for anyone who has made it past this area. {nl}Naktis... it's funny that I yearn for a curse on the Monarch of Curses.
손가락을 꿈쩍할 기력도 없다만 이 땅을 지나게 될 누군가를 위해 이 글을 남긴다.{nl}나크티스.. 저주의 군주에게 저주를 바란다는 것도 참 웃긴 일이겠지.{nl}
Aku tidak memiliki kekuatan namun aku menulis ini untuk seseorang yang mungkin lewat daerah ini.  {nl}Naktis.. Kutukan yang menggelikan untuk diminta dari Monarch of Curse.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Naktis scattered cursed Tree Root Crystals in the area. {nl}To stop the curse, they must be destroyed.
나크티스는 이 땅에 나태의 저주를 받은 나무뿌리 수정을 흩뿌려 놓았다.{nl}그 저주를 뿌리뽑기 위해서는 그 나무뿌리 수정을 전부 없애야 한다. {nl}
Naktis menyebarkan cursed Tree Root Crystal di area ini.  {nl} Untuk menghentikan kutukannya, semua Tree Root Crystal harus dihancurkan.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Perhaps I shall soon lose my breath. {nl}Pilgrims, may the blessings of the goddess be with you!
아마 나는 곧 죽게 되겠지.{nl}순례자들이여. 여신의 축복이 함께 하기를!
Mungkin aku akan kehabisa nafas.  {nl} Pilgrim. Semoga engkau selalu diberkahi oleh para Goddes!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please be sure to find the scripture! {nl}One of the pilgrim souls entrapped in here must have it.
경전 말입니다. 꼭 찾아 주셔야 해요!{nl}여기 어딘가 갇혀 있던 순례자의 영혼 중 하나가 가지고 있을 겁니다.
Tolong temukan naskahnya!  {nl} Salah satu jiwa pilgrim yang terjebak disini pasti memilikinya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: All pilgrims should offer different amounts.
순례자마다 각자 다른 금액만큼만 헌금할 수 있습니다.
Semua pilgrim harus mengajukan jumlah yang berbeda.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This is not a reasonable amount.
적당한 헌금액이 아닌 것 같다.
Jumlahnya masih belum tepat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Worship the Goddess Statue to receive blessings or move on to another area.
여신상에 경배하여 축복을 받거나 다른 지역으로 이동할 수 있습니다.
Worship the Statue of Goddess untuk mendapatkan blessing atau pindah ke area lain.

Please select the user requiring a quest: What a nasty curse. {nl}Let's see which is stronger. Naktis' curse or the goddess' purifier.
그 저주 한 번 참 고약하군.{nl}어디. 나크티스의 저주가 더 강한지 여신의 정화부가 더 강한지 두고 보자고.{nl}
Curse yang bagus juga.  {nl} Sekarang kita lihat mana yang lebih kuat. Curse of Naktis atau purifier of the Goddess.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Of course I have the purifier. {nl}But I'm not giving it to you unless you offer me money.
물론 그 정화부는 내가 가지고 있지.{nl}하지만 약간의 돈을 헌금하지 않으면 내 줄수 없어.
Tentu aku memiliki purifier.  {nl}Namun aku tidak akan memberikannya kecuali ada tawaran uang di dalamnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It could be the one who stole the gypsum carving of the Goddess Statue, so get rid of the monsters there. {nl}If my hunch is right, then Naktis must be behind it. {nl} It might be far away, but I just heard that.
여신상의 석고 조각을 뜯어간 것일 수도 있으니, 그 곳의 몬스터들을 처치 해 보게. {nl}내 예상이 맞다면 나크티스의 소행일 거야. {nl}멀리 떨어져 있어도 소식은 듣고 있던 참이네. {nl}
Mungkin ini adalah pleseter yang rusak dari Statue of Goddess jadi singkirkan monster di sana. {nl} Jika aku benar maka itu pasti ulah Naktis. {nl}Walau jauh, aku juga mendengar ceritanya. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Naktis is looking for a clue to enter the Cathedral. {nl}If I'm right, not only has the Forest of Prayer been affected, but all of the Pilgrim's Way. {nl}Revelator, if you reach the Cathedral, please defeat Naktis. {nl}You must stop the goddess' revelation from falling into demon hands.
나크티스는 대성당 진입의 단서를 찾고 있었겠지요.{nl}제 예상이 맞다면, 기원의 숲 뿐이 아니라 순례자의 길 모든 곳이 그 지경일 겁니다. {nl}계시자님의 발길이 대성당까지 닿는다면, 나크티스를 꼭 없애 주십시오. {nl}여신의 계시가 마족의 손에 들어가는 일은 꼭 막아야 합니다.
Naktis sedang mencari petunjuk untuk memasuki Cathedral. {nl} Jika aku benar, bukan hanya Forest of Prayer, namun semua Pilgrim's Way akan seperti itu.  {nl}Jika perjalananmu mencapai Cathedral, singkirkan Naktis.  {nl}Kamu harus menghentikan wahyu jatuh ke tangan para iblis.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This place is dying. {nl}All the Tree Root Crystals have mutated.
여긴 이제 끝이야.{nl}나무뿌리 수정들이 모두 변질되었다.{nl}
Tempat ini sekarat. {nl}Semua Tree Root Crystals telah bermutasi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Some Tree Root Crystals are useless unless burned. {nl}Some even fume at the core.
어떤 나무뿌리 수정은 불로 태우지 않으면 소용 없어.{nl}심지어 어떤 건 핵을 멀리 뿜어버리지.{nl}
Beberapa Tree Root Crystal tidak berguna tanpa dibakar.  {nl}Beberapa memngaspi core.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: We must do whatever it takes to turn it back but... {nl}It's all so tiring now...
무슨 수를 써서라도 되돌려야 하지만.. 이젠.. 다 귀찮군..{nl}
Kita harus melakukan apapun untuk mengembalikannya tapi.. Semua sunggu melelahkan.. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I feel like I'm drowning. {nl}The Tree Root Crystal is slowly killing me.
마치 깊은 물 속에 잠기고 있는 느낌이다.{nl}나무뿌리 수정이 날 천천히 죽이고 있어.{nl}
Seperti tenggelam ke dalam air.  {nl}Tree Root Crystal perlahan membunuhku.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Do whatever it takes to destroy it... {nl}Please help.
어떻게든 없애지 않으면.. {nl}제발 살려줘.
Harus melakukan apapun untuk menghancurkannya.. {nl}Tolong selamatkanku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've lost all desire. Am I dying now? {nl}Eating and even breathing feels meaningless.
의욕이 없다. 나는 이제 죽는 것인가.{nl}먹는 것도, 숨 쉬는 것 조차도 의미가 없다.{nl}
Aku tak bersemangat. Apa aku masih hidup?  {nl}Makan dan bernafas seperti tak ada artinya.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: But it must go on. {nl}Unless that cursed Tree Root Crystal is destroyed...
하지만 움직여야해. {nl}저 저주받은 나무뿌리 수정을 어떻게든 파괴하지 않으면..
Namun ini harus pergi. {nl}Kecuali Tree Root Crystal terkutuk itu dihancurkan..

Please select the user requiring a quest: There are things that Witas cares about. {nl}Won't he get his mind back if you show him those?
위타스가 소중히 여기는 물건들이 있어요.{nl}그걸 찾아서 보여주면 정신이 돌아오지 않을까요?
Ada beberapa hal yang Witas sayangi.  {nl}Tidakkah ia akan mendapatkan kembali ingatannya jika kamu menunjukan itu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Somebody's Diary
누군가의 일기장
Somebody's Diary

Please select the user requiring a quest: Those brothers are crazy. They must be completely nuts. {nl}When did it start? When Dora attacked Gracius? {nl}When they saw the demons marching?
형제들은 다들 미쳤다. 완전히 미친 게 틀림없다.{nl}언제부터였을까. 몬스터에게 습격받을 때 도라가 그라치우스를 공격했을 때?{nl}마족들의 행렬을 보았을 때?{nl}
Para saudara sudah gila. Mereka sudah pasti gila.  {nl}Sejak kapan ini terjadi? Ketika Dora menyerang Gracious? {nl}Kapan mereka melihat para iblis datang?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Things have gone to hell since Gracius was incapacitated. {nl}From the very beginning, while I kept my mouth shut, everyone lusted for bloodshed. {nl}The town was like a volcano waiting to erupt. {nl}I thought it was an educational experience until then.
그라치우스가 부상으로 낙오되고나서 예민함은 더욱 심해졌다.{nl}나는 언제부턴가 아예 입을 다물었고 모두의 눈에선 살기가 번뜩였다.{nl}터지기 일보 직전의 화산처럼 간신히 화를 참고 있는 것 같았다.{nl}그 때 까진 가르침일 거라고 생각했었지.{nl}
Keadaan memburuk sejak Gracius ditinggalkan karena cedera. {nl}Aku kunci mulutku dan semua mata berubah keji.  {nl}Ini seperti gunung berapi yang akan meledak.  {nl} Aku pikir itu hanya sebuah pelajaran.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Then something snapped. {nl}A fellow clergyman, I can't remember who, had murdered Dion in his sleep with a mace and I... {nl}Everyone... {nl}No one could remember why they wanted to become a priest anymore.
그리고 방아쇠는 당겨졌다.{nl}기억 안나는 형제가 메이스를 들어 잠든 디온을 내려치고 내가..{nl}모두가.. {nl}반드시 사제가 될 거라며 눈을 빛내던 모습이라곤 더 이상 찾아볼 수가 없었지.{nl}
Dan pelatuk dilepas.  {nl}Saudara yang tidak bisa kuingat menghantam Dion dengan mace ketika sedang tidur dan aku.. {nl}Semua orang.. {nl}Tidak ada yang mau menjadi priest sejak itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This surely is not a teaching of Sir Maven. {nl}Greed? Laziness? How can we call killing one another, 'teaching a lesson'? {nl}I even envy Dion for dying first.
분명 이건 메이번님의 가르침과는 다른 것이다.{nl}탐식? 나태? 서로가 서로를 해치는 것을 어떻게 가르침이라고 부를 수 있는 거지?{nl}먼저 죽은 디온이 오히려 부럽기까지 하다.{nl}
Ini tentu bukan ajaran sir Mayvern. {nl}Serakah? Malas? Bagaiamana bisa kamu bilang saling membunuh adalah pelajaran?  {nl}Aku bahkan sirik pada Dion untuk sekarat duluan.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I can hear snickering somewhere. {nl}It could be the sound of Dora deceiving me. {nl}It doesn't really matter any more.
어디선가 낄낄대는 소리가 들리는 듯 싶다.{nl}도라가 날 기만하는 소리일지도 모른다.{nl}이 상황에 무슨 소린지 상관이겠냐마는.
Aku mendengar suara terkekek.  {nl}Itu pasti suara Dora yang ingin menipuku.  {nl}Sudah tidak jadi masalah lagi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The trapped spirit gave you a scripture and disappeared.
갇혀 있던 영혼은 경전만 주고 사라져 버렸다.
Jiwa yang terjebak memberikan naskah dan menghilang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You endured Witas' curse thanks to the medicine.
약효 때문에 위타스가 거는 저주가 걸리지 않는다.
Berkat medicine, Witas's curse menjadi tidak bekerja.

Please select the user requiring a quest: If you ever see the Devout Tree, please bring it back to life. {nl}I've heard that tree can block the power of the curse.
혹시 신심의 나무를 보시거든 꼭 되살려 주세요.{nl}그 나무는 저주의 기운을 막아준다고 들었습니다.
Jika kamu melihat Devout Tree, tolong hidupkan kembali.  {nl}Aku dengan pohon itu menghalang kekuatan kutukan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I believe that the evil will eventually fall and the goddess will be victorious. {nl}The mark of victory is right in front of me.
악은 곧 저물고 여신이 승리할 것이라 굳게 믿고 있습니다.{nl}승리의 징표가 바로 제 앞에 있지 않습니까.
Aku percaya bahwa demon nanti akan kalah dan Goddess menang.  {nl}Tanda kemenangan ada di depan mataku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Anyway, I will go to the battlegrounds first, so please help the Watchers and my followers. {nl}I will see you at Nefritas Cliff.
어쨌든, 나는 전장으로 먼저 가 있을 테니 파수꾼들과 내 추종자들을 잘 도와 주게. {nl}네프리타스 벼랑에서 만나도록 하지.
Omong-omong, aku akan pergi ke pertempuran dahulu jadi tolong bantu para guard dan pengikutku.  {nl}Aku akan menemuimu di Nefritas Cliff.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This isn't over yet. {nl}I'll be watching you from Kvailas Forest.
허나 이걸로 절대 끝났다고 생각하지 마라.{nl}크바일라스 숲에서 지켜볼 테니까.
Jangan kau pikir ini berakhir.  {nl}Aku akan mengawasi dari Kvailas Forest.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Catacomb 1F Interior Warp
카타콤 1층 내부 워프
Catacomb 1st Floor internal warp

Please select the user requiring a quest: It needs to be purified more...
조금 더 정화해야 할 것 같다...
Ini butuh disucikan lagi?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Blurry Spirit of Catacomb 1F
카타콤 1층 흐릿한 영체
Blurry spirit of Catacomb 1st Floor

Please select the user requiring a quest: Something murky is lurking around...
주변에서 무언가 흐릿한 존재가 느껴진다...
Keberadaan yang blur terasa di sekitar..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Something once invisible is appearing...
여태까지 보이지 않던 것들이 보이기 시작한다...
Hal-hal tak terlihat mulai tampak?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Letter Someone Left Behind
누군가가 남긴 쪽지
Surat yang seseorang tinggalkan

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Tree Root Crystals of Pilgrim's Way are cursed by Naktis, {nl}as if to mock Sir Maven's teachings against laziness.
필그림 들길의 나무뿌리 수정은 나크티스에 의해 저주받았다.{nl}마치 게으름을 조심하라는 메이번님의 가르침을 비웃듯이.{nl}
Tree Root Crystals of Pilgrim Path sudah dikutuk oleh Naktis.  {nl}Seperti untuk mengejek ajaran sir Mayvern tentang berhati-hati dengan kemalasan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It should be destroyed before the curse spreads. {nl}However, I cannot handle the Tree Root Crystals alone.
저주가 더 퍼지기 전에 어떻게든 전부 파괴해야 한다.{nl}하지만 이 나무뿌리 수정만은 나 혼자선 도저히 어찌할 수가 없다.{nl}
Ini harus dihancurkan sebelum kutukan menyebar.  {nl}Namun aku tidak bisa mengatas Tree Root Crystal sendiri.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Souls of Pilgrims swallowed by the monsters can destroy the Tree Root Crystal. {nl}Maybe I, too, will be one of them soon.
몬스터들이 삼킨 순례자의 영혼이라면 나무뿌리 수정을 파괴할 수 있다.{nl}나도 곧 그 영혼들 중 하나가 되겠지.
Soul of Pilgrim yang ditelah oleh monster bisa menghancurkan Tree Root Crystal.  {nl}Mungkin aku akan jadi salah satu dari mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Notice for Pilgrims
순례자 알림
Notice for Pilgrims

Please select the user requiring a quest: This is the Pilgrim's Way that leads to the Great Cathedral. {nl}Maven, the first Archbishop of the Great Cathedral, left teachings on each of the five Pilgrim's Ways.
여기서부턴 대성당까지 이어지는 순례의 길입니다.{nl}대성당의 초대 대주교 메이번님께서는 5개의 순례의 길마다 가르침을 내리셨습니다.{nl}
Ini adalah Pilgrim Path menuju ke Cathedral. {nl}Archbishop pertama, Mayvern meninggalkan ajaran pada setiap 5 Pilgrim Path.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: They warn against the five deadly sins of mankind. {nl}Pilgrims heading to the Great Cathedral should reflect on these teachings.
인간의 가장 큰 죄악인 5대 죄악에 경종을 울리는 가르침.{nl}대성당을 찾는 순례자들은 이 가르침의 의미에 대해 깊이 생각해 보십시오.
Ajaran yang memperingatkan tentang 5 dosa mematikan manusia. {nl} Pilgrim pergi menuju Cathedral harus berpikir matang-matang tentang ajaran ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Starving Demon's Way is for Gluttony. {nl}Throw away your obsession for food and start your pilgrimage with reverence.
큰아귀 길의 가르침은 탐식입니다.{nl}음식에 대한 과도한 집착을 버리고 경건한 마음으로 순례를 시작하십시오.
Starving Demon's Way untuk orang rakus.  {nl}Buanglah obsesimu akan makanan dan mulai ziarah dengan penghormatan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Pilgrim's Way is for Sloth. {nl}You mustn't be indolent during the long journey to Cathedral.
필그림 들길의 가르침은 나태입니다.{nl}성당으로 향하는 머나먼 여정에 나태함이 자리하지 않도록 노력해야 할 것입니다.
Pilgrim Path untuk Sloth.  {nl}Kamu tidak boleh menjadi malas dalam perjalanan panjang menuju Cathedral.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Altar Way is for Wrath. {nl}Excessive rage impoverishes the soul.
제단로의 가르침은 분노입니다.{nl}지나친 분노는 순결한 영혼을 피폐하게 만듭니다.
Altar Way untuk Wrath.  {nl}Kemurkaan yang berlebih membusukan jiwa.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Forest of Prayer is for Deceit. {nl}You cannot reach the goddess with a deceitful heart.
기원의 숲의 화두는 거짓입니다.{nl}거짓된 신심으로는 여신께 닿을 수 없습니다.
Forest of Prayers untuk Deceit.  {nl}Kamu tidak bisa mencapai Goddess dengan hati pendusta.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Apsimesti Crossroads is for Envy. {nl}Compose yourself so that you won't fall into bewilderment.
압시메스티 교차로의 화두는 탐욕입니다.{nl}어리석은 미혹에 빠지는 일이 없도록 마음을 가다듬어 봅시다.
Apsimesti Crossroad untuk Envy.  {nl} Tenangkan dirimu agar tak jatuh dari rasa kebingungan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Tree of Faith
신심의 나무
Tree of Faith

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Tree of Faith. {nl}Like the power of the goddess, its branches block evil curses.
신심의 나무. {nl}여신의 권능과도 같아 곧게 드리워진 가지는 사악한 저주를 막는다.
Tree of Faith.  {nl}Seperti kekuatan Goddess, ranting-ranting menghalang kutukan iblis.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Pilgrims who pass by this road, {nl}if ever the pond is corrupted, pour sap from the Tree of Brothers.
{nl}이 곳을 지나는 순례자여.{nl}만약 샘이 더럽혀지거든 형제 나무의 수액을 부어라.
{nl}Pilgrom yang melewati jalan ini.  {nl}Jika kolam ini terkontaminasi, tuangkan karet dari Tree of Brothers.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Tree of Brothers Notice
형제의 나무 안내
Notice of Tree of Brothers

Please select the user requiring a quest: First Tree of the Brothers. {nl}Guard the Tree of Faith with the name of the goddess.
형제 나무의 첫 번째 나무.{nl}여신의 이름으로 신심의 나무를 수호한다.
First Tree of Brothers  {nl}Lindungi Tree of Faith atas nama para Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Second Tree of the Brothers. {nl}Purify the evil force with the power of the goddess.
형제 나무의 두 번째 나무.{nl}여신의 권능으로 사악한 기운을 정화한다.
Second Tree of Brothers  {nl}Purify kekuatan jahat dengan kekuatan Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Third Tree of the Brothers. {nl}Live a full life with the grace of the goddess.
형제 나무의 세 번째 나무.{nl}여신의 은총으로 충만한 생명을 가져다 준다.
Third Tree of Brothers.  {nl}Bawa kehidupanmu dengan penuh rahmat para Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Spoiled already? Here, take this.
그새 상했나? 자, 새로 줌세.
Sudah berantakan? Ini, ambillah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The magic circle is shaking.
마법진이 진동하고 있다.
Magic circle bergetar.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Baron Allerno
남작 아렐르노
Baron Allerno

Please select the user requiring a quest: Wait, I came to see if the device is working well, but isn't my territory quiet and great to live in? There aren't that many people though.
잠깐, 이 기계가 잘 작동하는 지 보러 나와 봤네만, 역시 내 영지는 조용하고 살기 좋은 곳 아닌가? 비록 사람은 적어도 말일세.
Tunggu, aku datang untuk melihat apakah device itu bekerja dengan baik namun bukankah kawasanku seharusnya tenang dan nyaman? Walaupun sebenarnya tidak ada terlalu banyak orang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I wonder when the explorers will return from the Closed Area...
통제구역 안으로 들여보낸 탐사대는 언제 올지 원..
Aku penasaran kira-kira kapan para explorer kembail dari Closed Area..

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's just one thing that the old man wants.
늙은이가 원하는 거야 딱 한 가지지.
Ini hanya sesuatu yang pria tua itu inginkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This machine takes too many crops. You can say it was kept because of my prestige and morality.
이 동력기는 곡식을 먹어도 너무 먹어. 내가 덕망 있고 권위가 있어서 지금까지 유지해 왔다고 해야겠지.
Mesin ini mengambil terlalu banyak tanaman. Kamu bilang kalau ini disimpan karena prestise dan moralku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Haven't you heard the saying that not even the king can save poverty? What do they expect me to do?
가난 구제는 나랏님도 못한다고 하는 말 못 들었나? 지들이 가난 한 걸 날더러 어쩌라고?
Tahukah kau bahwa rajapun tidak akan bisa menyelamatkan kemiskinan? Lalu apa yang mereka harapkan dariku?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I have a talented wizard for the deity. But he's busy right now, so I can't bring him here.
내 가신으로 저런 풋내기 말고 유능한 마법사가 있지. 지금은 좀 바빠서 여기 데려 올 수는 없지만.
Aku memiliki wizard yang lihat sebagai guru. Namun ia terlalu sibuk jadi aku tidak bisa membawanya ke sini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hmm, goddess? You mean the goddess?
음, 여신? 여신이라?
Hmm.. Goddess? Maksudmu Goddess?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I wonder if the tenant farmers know that it is all thanks to me that they can eat and live like this.
이렇게라도 먹고 살 수 있는 건 다 이 몸 덕분이라는 걸 여기 소작농들은 알까 몰라.
Aku penasaran apakah penyewa farmer di sini tau bahwa berkat diriku mereka bisa makan dan hidup seperti ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Youngsters nowadays don't have enough spirit in them. {nl}When I was their age, people would volunteer to go into these mysterious places ahead of others! {nl}Now they won't do anything unless something is offered in return. They just don't have passion.
으이그.. 하여간 요즘 젊은 것들은 패기가 없어. 예전 그 때만 해도 말이지.  내가 그 나이였으면 그 신기한 곳에 먼저 들어가겠다고 손을 번쩍번쩍 들었을 텐데! 꼭 사람 귀찮게 뭘 제시해야 일을 한대. 열정이 없어 열정이!
Anak muda jaman sekarang sangat tidak bersemangat. Dahulu ketika aku seumuran dengan mereka, orang-orang mengajukan diri untuk pergi ke tempat misterius! Sekarang mereka tidak ingin mencobanya kecuali mendapatkan imbalan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Everlasting thing... everlasting beauty...
영원한 것.. 영원한 아름다움..
Sesuatu yang kekal.. Kecantikan yang kekal..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Something that looks like the head of a statue is buried.
석상의 머리 같은 것이 묻혀 있다.
Sesuatu seperti kepala sebuah patung terkubur.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Better check out this liquor barrel.
이 술통을 살펴 보는 것이 좋겠어.
Sebaiknya periksa barrel liquor ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Something that looks like the wing of a statue is buried.
날개 같은 것이 땅에 묻혀 있다.
Sesuatu seperti sayap sebuah patung terkubur.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Farmer
농민
Farmer

Please select the user requiring a quest: Okay, that'll be only 1,000 silver coins then.
알겠소. 1000실버만 내슈 그럼.
Ok, Bayar 1000 silver saja.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Great! It's a deal!
좋소! 거래 성공이오!
Baik! Kesepakatan bagus!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Then don't. Pfft.

아직 긴장을 늦추지 마십시오.{nl}마지막 열쇠를 얻는 비밀이라 해도 아직 마족들의 눈은 계시자님을 주시하고 있습니다.
Tetaplah waspada.  {nl}Ini adalah rahasia menuju kunci terakhir tetapi setan sedang mengawasimu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You will enter a special room once you get all five keys of Maven. {nl}In there, you will be tested to see if you're eligible for the revelation.
메이번님의 다섯 개의 열쇠를 전부 얻고 나면 특별한 방으로 들어가게 됩니다.{nl}그 방에서 계시를 얻을 자격이 있는지 시험이 치뤄지지요.
Kamu akan masuk ke ruang khusus ketika kamu mendapatkan 5 kunci mayvern. {nl}Di sana, kamu akan diuji untuk melihat jika kamu memenuhi syarat untuk menjadi Savior.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The number of candles is important. But for this secret, you must remember the order of the candles as well. {nl}It is similar to the first secret.
초의 갯수도 중요하지만 이번 비밀은 순서도 기억하셔야 합니다.{nl}제일 처음 풀었던 비밀과 비슷하지요.
Jumlah lilin adalah penting tetapi untuk rahasia ini, kamu harus mengingat urutan rahasia itu juga.  {nl}Ini miri dengan rahasia pertama.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The device is operating.
장치가 작동 중이다.
Alat telah bekerja

Please select the user requiring a quest: A few manic farmers assaulted the people.
농장 인부들 중 몇 몇명 독에 중독돼 사람들을 폭행한 일이 발생했습니다.
Beberapa petani yang kecanduan menyerang orang-orang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Guards are working hard to protect the farm. {nl}Help them.
밭을 지키기 위해 병사들이 고생 중입니다.{nl}그들을 도와주십시오.
Penjaga bekerja keras menjaga pertanian. {nl}Tolong mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I thank you again in the name of fate. {nl}From here on, I will follow the stars to find Goddess Ausrine.
모든 인연의 이름으로 다시 한 번 감사드립니다.{nl}저는 이제부터 벌들을 따라 아우슈리네 여신을 찾으려고 합니다.{nl}
Aku berterimakasih padamu lagi dalam nasib. {nl}Dari sini, aku akan mengikuti bintang-bintang untuk menemukan Goddess Ausrine.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thanks to you, the seal of Uskis Arable Land is now stable. {nl}However, many other Revelators have lost their consciousness to the evil energy at the Spring Light Woods.
당신 덕분에 이 우키스 경작지의 봉인은 안정되었습니다만.{nl}다른 계시자들이 봄볕나무 숲의 봉인에서 새어나온 사악한 기운에 의해 자아를 잃어버렸습니다.{nl}
Terima kasih kepada Kamu, segel Uskis Arable Land sekarang stabil. {nl} Namun, banyak Savior lainnya yang kehilangan kesadaran oleh energi jahat di Spring Light Woods.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This most glorious Great Cathedral was built 660 years ago under the guide of Archbishop Silvestro Maven.
이 성당이 완공된 지 벌써 660년이란 세월이 흘렀군요.{nl}실베스트로 메이번 대주교님의 지휘 하에 왕국에서 가장 영광스러운 성당으로 건설되었었지요.{nl}
Gereja ini dibangun 660 tahun yang lalu.  {nl}Dibangun sebagai gereja paling mulia di bawah naungan Uskup Agung Silvestro Maven. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I can still hear it. {nl}The priests' prayers filling the kingdom. {nl}The endless march of pilgrims coming for the grace of the goddess.
아직도 귓가에 울리는 듯 합니다.{nl}성당에서 수행하는 사제들의 기도소리는 왕국을 울렸었지요.{nl}여신께 은총을 갈구하는 순례의 행렬도 그 끝을 쉬이 찾을 수 없었습니다.{nl}
Itu seperti aku masih bisa mendengarnya. {nl}Doa-doa para pendeta memenuhi kerajaan.  {nl}Iringan peziarah datang demiberkat para Goddess. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: It was like that until four years ago. {nl}Before the curse surrounded the Great Cathedral on Medzio Diena...
4년 전 까지는 그랬었지요.{nl}신수의 날로 저주가 이 성당을 맴돌기 전 까지는요..
Itu seperti itu sampai empat tahun lalu. {nl}Sebelum kutukan mengepung gereja pada Divine day..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Candlestick
촛대
Batang lilin

Please select the user requiring a quest: No candlesticks are lit.
촛대의 불이 모두 꺼져 있다.
Tidak ada batang lilin yang menyala.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I buried Dallas. {nl}His death pains me so much.
달러스를 묻어주었어요.{nl}마음이.. 너무 아프네요.
Aku menguburkan Dallas. {nl}Itu sangat menyakitkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: More monsters! Run!
또 몬스터가.. 도망치세요!
Monster lagi.. Lari!

Please select the user requiring a quest: You were running so hard for me. {nl}Why don't you give me the key, kid?
날 위해 열심히도 뛰더구나.{nl}꼬마야. 이제 그 열쇠를 내게 주지 않으련?
Kamu telah berlari sangat kencang untukku. {nl}Sekarang mengapa kamu tidak memberikan kunci itu padaku, nak?

Please select the user requiring a quest: The breach of corruption, once open, will continue to expand. {nl}Revelator, please help Vakarine as soon as possible.
한 번 벌어진 전이의 틈새는 계속해서 확장될 것입니다.{nl}구원자여. 한시라도 빨리 바카리네에게 힘이 되어 주세요.
Sekali celah yang terkontaminasi terbuka makan akan membesar. {nl}Savior, bantu Vakarine secepatnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There seems to be some reaction in the platform of benevolence.
자애의 단상에서 무언가 반응이 있는 것 같다.
Nampaknya ada suatu reaksi di platform of benevolence.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Bishop Ilam
주교 일람
Bishop Ilam

Please select the user requiring a quest: Bishop Aurelius, who was ordained at a young age, soon took ill and lost his life.
젊은 나이에 서품을 받은 주교 아우렐리우스는 얼마 가지 않아 불치의 병으로 죽게 된다.{nl}
Bishop Aurelius, yang ditahbiskan di usia muda segera menjadi sakit dan kehilangan nyawanya. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: His last request was for the Divine Mission for Maven to be fulfilled even after his death and the Church accepted.
유언으로 메이번을 대신하여 죽어서라도 신성한 사명을 수행하고 싶다고 간청했고 교단에서는 그의 바램을 승인하였다.
Keinginan terakhirnya adalah meminta terpenuhinya misi Divine untuk Mayvern bahkan di kematiannya dan gereja menerima permintaannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Nature of the Curse
저주의 본질
Kutukan alam.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Gluttony, Wrath, Sloth...{nl}The nature of all curses that affect{nl}mankind is obsession.{nl}It makes the spirits of the dead prefer staying behind as opposed to going to the goddess.
탐식, 분노, 나태 등등..{nl}인간에게 행위나 사고에 영향을 끼치는 모든 저주의 본질은 집착이라고 할 수 있다.{nl}죽은 이가 여신께 가지 못하고 영혼으로 남아있는 것과 비슷한 맥락으로 이해할 수 있다.{nl}
Gluttony, Wrath, Sloth, etc. {nl}Segala kutukan yang mempengaruhi umat manusia adalah obsesi. {nl} Ini seperti semangat orang mati yang tertinggal dan tidak akan datang ke Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The difference is that it is the will of the dead that keeps the spirit behind {nl}while curses are forced upon by others onto you.
하지만 죽은 이의 영혼은 자신의 바램이 강한 염으로 발현된 것이라면 {nl}저주는 타인의 의지가 반영된 것임을 분명히 구분해야 한다.{nl}
Perbedaannya adalah keinginan orang mati yang menjaga jiwa {nl}sementara kutukan dari orang lain akan melawan kepadamu. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Naturally, priests learning the teachings of the goddess are not permitted to use it unless it's for experiments.
때문에 여신의 가르침을 모시는 사제라면 연구 목적 이외의 목적으로 인간에게 사용을 허락치 아니한다.
Oleh karena itu, jika kamu adalah pendeta yang mempelajari ajaran Goddess, kamu tidak diijinkan menggunakannya ke orang lain kecuali untuk percobaan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: My Mission 1
나의 사명 1
Misiku 1

Please select the user requiring a quest: Even if the Revelator gets the revelation in his hands, {nl}it's useless if it can't be protected.
계시자가 계시를 얻었다고 한들 그것을 지킬 능력이 없으면 아무런 소용이 없다.{nl}
Meskipun Savior mendapatkan penerangan di tangannya, {nl}itu sia-sia jika kamu tidak dapat menjaganya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The purpose of my secret is not only to protect the revelation from evil but also to prevent the greed of weak Revelators.
나의 비밀들은 사악한 무리들로부터 계시를 수호하기 위함이기도 하지만 나약한 계시자의 과욕을 미리 방지하는 의미도 있다.{nl}
Tujuan rahasiaku tidak hanya untuk melindungi Savior dari kejahatan tetapi juga untuk mencegah keserakahan Savior yang lemah.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: May you wander in the everlasting fog of the unknown if you recklessly approach without realizing my intentions.
계시자가 나의 뜻을 깨닫지 못하고 함부로 다가가려 한다면 영원한 비밀의 안개 속을 헤메리라.
Mungkin Kamu berjalan dalam kabut abadi yang tidak diketahui jika Kamu sembarangan mendekat tanpa menyadari niat Aku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: My Mission 2
나의 사명 2
Misiku 2

Please select the user requiring a quest: Those who challenge the Holy Mission won't just try to gently unravel the secret. {nl}Because of that, I had to plan many secrets and take measures against such barbaric actions.
내가 지켜온 신성한 사명에 도전하는 무리들이 얌전히 비밀을 풀려고만 하지는 않을 것이다.{nl}때문에 많은 비밀들을 설계함과 동시에 야만적인 행위에 대한 대책도 세워야 했다.{nl}
Mereka yang menantang Misi Kudus tidak akan hanya mencoba untuk mengungkap rahasia secara lembut. {nl} Karena itu, Aku harus merencanakan banyak rahasia dan mengambil tindakan terhadap tindakan barbar tersebut.

Please select the user requiring a quest: To obey my secret. {nl}That is the only way to earn the legacy of the goddess.
나의 비밀에 순종하는 것.{nl}여신의 유산을 얻을 방법은 오직 그것뿐이다.
Untuk mematuhi rahasia Aku. {nl} Itulah satu-satunya cara untuk mendapatkan warisan dari Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Sign Commemorating the Completion of the Great Cathedral
대성단 완공 기념 서명
Memperingati Penyelesaian Katedral

Please select the user requiring a quest: The goddess of this land will build a church. {nl}The forces of evil can never invade this sanctuary. {nl} - Est. Year 434, Silvestro Maven
이 대지에 여신의 성당을 세우리라. {nl}사악한 세력은 이 성역을 절대 침범할 수 없다.{nl}- 건국년 434년, 실베스트로 메이번
Goddess negeri ini akan membangun sebuah gereja. {nl} Kekuatan jahat tidak pernah dapat menyerang tempat kudus ini. {nl} - Est. Tahun 434, Silvestro Maven

Please select the user requiring a quest: Memo Someone Left Behind
누군가 남긴 쪽지
Seseorang tertinggal di belakang

Please select the user requiring a quest: The highest steeple of the church also fell on Medzio Diena. {nl}The grief and sorrow of the evacuation march was indescribable.
신수의 날은 왕국에서 가장 드높았던 성당의 첨탑까지도 무너뜨려버리기에 충분했다.{nl}피난의 물결 속에서 흐르는 그 비통함이야 이루 말할 수 있겠는가.{nl}
Menara tertinggi gereja jatuh pada Medzio Diena. {nl} Kesedihan dan dukacita rombongan evakuasi tak terlukiskan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: On the day we prayed to the goddess that we would return, everyone cried tears of outrage. {nl}Our church will never succumb to the evil curse.
여신께 다시 돌아오겠다고 기도드리던 날. 모두가 분노의 눈물을 흘렸다.{nl}우리 교단은 더러운 저주에 절대 무릎꿇지 않을 것이다.{nl}
Pada hari kami berdoa kepada Goddess bahwa kami akan kembali, semua orang menangis air mata kemarahan. {nl} gereja kami tidak akan pernah menyerah pada kutukan jahat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: (There are many books left on the shelf. Which one shall we read?)
독서대에 여러 권의 책이 남아 있다. 어떤 책을 읽어 볼까?
Banyak buku di rak. Manakah yang akan kita baca?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Dusty Book
먼지 쌓인 책
Buku berdebu

Please select the user requiring a quest: (There is a dusty book with a memo on the chair. Which one shall we read?)
의자 위에 쪽지가 끼워져 있는 먼지 쌓인 책 한권이 놓여져 있다. 무엇을 읽어 볼까?
(Terdapat buku berdebu dengan catatan di kursi. Manakah yang akan kita baca?)

Please select the user requiring a quest: It was really dangerous a while ago. {nl}If you were any later, we would never have seen the third key.
아까는 정말 위험했습니다.{nl}계시자님께서 조금만 늦었더라면 세 번째 열쇠는 영영 볼 수 없었겠지요,
Itu sangat berbahaya beberapa saat lalu. {nl} Jika Kamu terlambat, kita tidak akan pernah melihat kunci ketiga.

Please select the user requiring a quest: If you use the symbol of spirits, you can see the area where spirits will be absorbed. {nl}Defeat the demons there and their evil force will be absorbed into the symbol.
영력의 신표를 사용하시면 신표가 마력을 받아들일 수 있는 영역이 보이실 겁니다.{nl}그 영역 내에서 마족을 처치하시면 마력이 영력의 신표로 흡수되지요.
Jika Kamu menggunakan simbol roh, Kamu dapat melihat daerah di mana roh akan diserap. {nl} Kalahkan setan di sana dan kekuatan jahat mereka akan diserap ke dalam simbol.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Once the Symbol of Spiritual Power is charged, go to Veinika Altar. {nl}Insert the symbol in the Veinika altar and you will receive the third key of Maven.
영력의 신표를 완전히 충전하셨다면 베이니카 제단으로 가세요.{nl}베이니카 제단에 신표를 끼워넣으시면 메이번님의 세 번째 열쇠를 얻을 수 있습니다.
Setelah Simbol Kekuatan Spiritual terisi, pergi ke Veinika Altar. {nl} Masukkan simbol di altar Veinika dan Kamu akan menerima kunci ketiga Maven.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The medicine should work.
제발 약효가 있어야 할텐데
Obat-obatan akan bekerja

Please select the user requiring a quest: The key is at Gaule Altar. {nl}I think you should leak that much information to Naktis' servants.
가울레의 제단에 열쇠가 있다. {nl}나크티스의 수하들에게 이 정도만 귀띔해 주시면 될 것 같습니다.{nl}
Kuncinya adalah di Gaule Altar. {nl} Aku pikir Kamu harus membocorkan banyak informasi kepada pengikut Naktis.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Of course, you'll need to use the transformation scroll before doing so.
물론 마족 변신 스크롤을 사용하신 뒤에 정보를 흘려야 겠지요.
Tentu saja, Kamu harus menggunakan scroll transformasi sebelum melakukannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The secret supposedly unveils upon application of a holy force, {nl}but the trap will activate regardless if it detects an evil force.
원래대로라면 신성한 힘을 가해야만 풀 수 있는 비밀입니다.{nl}사악한 기운을 감지하면 함정이 발동되지요.{nl}
Rahasianya seharusnya menyingkap kekuatan suci, {nl} tapi perangkap akan aktif jika mendeteksi kekuatan jahat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The plan is to get the key after exhausting that trap using Naktis' servants.
나크티스의 수하들을 이용해 비밀에 담긴 마력을 한 차례 소진한 뒤에 열쇠를 얻을 생각입니다.
Rencananya adalah mendapatkan kunci setelah menggunakan jebakan itu ke pengikut Naktis

Please select the user requiring a quest: Naktis' servants will be punished for prying on Maven's secret. {nl}Use that opportunity to get the key.
나크티스의 수하들은 메이번님의 비밀을 노린 벌을 받을 것입니다.{nl}그리고 그걸 이용해서 열쇠를 얻을 생각이지요.{nl}
pengikut Naktis akan dihukum karena berdoa untuk rahasia Maven. {nl} Gunakan kesempatan itu untuk mendapatkan kunci.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Even if the goddess condemns me for this... I will hold my head high,{nl} because it was for the protection of the revelation.
이 일로 인해 여신께서 저에게 죄를 물으신다 한들..{nl}저는 계시를 수호하기 위함이었노라고 떳떳하게 고개를 들 것입니다.{nl}
Bahkan jika Goddess mengutuk Aku untuk ini ... Aku akan tetap teguh, {nl} karena itu untuk perlindungan Savior.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Did you find the last key?
마지막 열쇠는 찾으셨습니까?
Apakah kamu menemukan kunci terakhir?

Please select the user requiring a quest: This sanctuary is a treasure house of knowledge. {nl}You need to master the fundamentals of everything to protect the kingdom,{nl}and the revelation in the name of the goddess.
이 지성소는 잡학의 보물창고나 다름 없습니다.{nl}세상의 모든 원리를 깨우쳐야 왕국과 계시를 여신의 이름으로 수호할 수 있으니까요.{nl}
Tempat kudus ini adalah rumah harta karun bagi pengetahuan. {nl} Kamu perlu menguasai segala sesuatunya untuk melindungi kerajaan dan Savior dalam nama Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Studying the demons is no exception.
때문에 마족에 관한 연구도 당연한 겁니다.
Mempelajari setan tanpa terkecuali.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The monarch of curses, Naktis... {nl}She has not shown herself yet, but I'm sure she's somewhere inside the sanctuary.
저주의 마군주 나크티스..{nl}실체는 드러낸 적은 없다만 이 지성소 어딘가에 있는 것만은 확실합니다.{nl}
The Monarch of Curses, Naktis… {nl}He has not shown himself yet but I'm sure he's somewhere inside the sanctuary.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Perhaps she's waiting for us to get all the keys.
어쩌면 우리가 모든 열쇠를 얻기만을 기다리고 있는 지도 모르지요.
Mungkin dia menunggu kita untuk mendapatkan semua kunci.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I am honored to be able to now guide you to the hidden room.
당신을 숨겨진 방으로 안내할 수 있게 되어서 정말 영광입니다.
Aku merasa terhormat dapat membimbingmu sampai ke ruang rahasia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Focus on the colors of the orbs. {nl}You should insert the key in orbs of the same color.
색에 집중하세요.{nl}열쇠와 같은 색의 구슬을 찾아 열쇠를 꽂는 겁니다.{nl}
Fokus kepada warna dari orb. {nl}Kamu harus memasukkan kunci ke dalam orb yang berwarna sama.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Of course it is impossible to press down both footrests alone. {nl}You can use the wood chunks the demons scattered around... or ask colleagues for help.
두 개의 발판을 혼자 동시에 누르는 건 당연히 불가능하겠지요.{nl}마족들이 어질러놓은 나무통이라던가.. 동료에게 도움을 요청할 수도 있겠군요.
Tentu saja ini tidak mungkin untuk menekan kedua pijakan bersamaan seorang diri. {nl}Kamu bisa menggunakan potongan kayu yang disebarkan oleh demon…..atau kamu dapat meminta bantuan seorang rekan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Coincidentally, I heard an eyewitness account from a refugee from this area. {nl}He asked for the safety of his family when I was being sent here... {nl}But I can't see any member of the Greene family, just refugees and monsters.
그러다가 얼마 전 우연찮게 이곳 출신 피난민으로부터 목격담을 전해 들으셨습니다.{nl}소녀의 조사를 위해 저를 파견하시면서 가족의 안위를 물으셨는데...{nl}그린가의 일원은 보이지 않고 피난민과 몬스터만 가득 차 있더군요.
Kebetulan, aku mendengar kesaksian dari penduduk daerah sini. {nl} Dia meminta perlindungan untuk keluarganya ketika aku dikirim kesini...{nl}Tetapi aku tidak melihat anggota dari keluarga Greene,hanya penduduk dan monster-monster.

Please select the user requiring a quest: And I found this mysterious seedling. {nl}Unlike others, we can feel a mysterious force from these. {nl}I can't identify this force in detail... {nl}But I'm sure it can purify evil.
그리고 이 수수께끼의 묘목을 발견할 수 있었습니다.{nl}보통사람들은 느끼지 못하겠지만 저희는 묘목에 서린 신비한 기운이 느껴집니다.{nl}제 능력으로 이 기운의 정체를 알 수는 없지만...{nl}부정한 것을 정화하기에 적당한 힘인 것만큼은 틀림없어 보입니다.
Dan aku menemukan bibit misterius ini. {nl}Tidak seperti yang lain,kita dapat merasakan kekuatan misterius dari benda ini. {nl}Aku tidak dapat mengenali dengan detail kekuatan ini. {nl}Tetapi aku yakin ini bisa memurnikan kekuatan jahat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We would have known better if Master was here. {nl}At any rate, we have to test if this seedling actually has the power to purify. {nl}I will do a simple purifying ritual. {nl}Get me some Ellom Leaves to grasp the pollution status of this area.
마스터께서 오셨다면 더 명확히 알 수 있었을텐데 아쉽네요.{nl}어쨌든 이 묘목이 실제로 정화의 힘을 지니고 있는지 시험해야겠어요.{nl}간단한 대지의 정화 의식을 해 보겠습니다.{nl}이 땅의 오염상황을 파악하기 위해서, 엘롬의 잎사귀를 구해다 주세요.
Kita akan memiliki pengetahuan lebih jika Master disini. {nl}Pokoknya, kita harus memeriksa apakah bibit ini sebenarnya punya kekuatan untuk memurnikan.  {nl}Aku akan melakukan ritual pemurnian sederhana {nl}Bawakan aku beberapa Ellom Leaves untuk memahami status polusi di area ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Now, let's start. {nl}Please watch together.
자. 이제 시작합니다.{nl}계시자님도 함께 지켜봐 주세요.
Sekarang, mari kita mulai. {nl}Tolong lihat bersama-sama.

Please select the user requiring a quest: But he is a druid who has accomplished as much as I have. {nl}I think he can find out what the secret of this seedling is.
하지만 저 못지 않은 수행을 쌓은 드루이드랍니다.{nl}그라면 이 묘목의 비밀을 알아낼 수 있을지도 모르겠어요.
Tapi dia adalah druid yang telah menyelesaikan sebanyak yang aku miliki. {nl}Aku pikir dia bisa menemukan apa rahasia dari bibit ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Also, you may experience something unusual if you have this twig. {nl}If you do, please tell him about it too.
또, 이 가지를 지니고 있으면 무언가 특이한 일을 겪으실지도 모릅니다.{nl}그렇다면 그것도 같이 그녀석에게 이야기해 주시길 바랍니다.
Dan juga, kamu mungkin mengalami sesuatu yang tidak biasa jika kamu memiliki ranting ini. {nl}Jika kamu mengalaminya, tolong beritahu dia juga tentang hal ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please find my colleague in Shaton Farm.
샤튼 농장에 있는 제 동문 조엘을 찾아 주세요.
Tolong temukan rekanku di Shaton Farm.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Aren't the dandelions around pretty? {nl}They disservice me, however, by sucking nutrients from the ground. {nl}If this continues, we won't be having a wheat harvest next season. {nl}Please remove the dandelions from the farm.
사방에 핀 민들레가 예쁘지요?{nl}저는 아주 이가 갈립니다. 녀석들이 사방에 뿌리내려 양분을 빨아먹기 때문이지요.{nl}이래서는 다음 밀 농사는 가망이 없습니다.{nl}밭 위에 민들레만이라도 뽑아주십시오.
Tidakkah dandelion disekitar sini cantik?{nl}Mereka membuatku rugi, bagaimanapun, dengan menyerap nutrisi dari tanah. {nl}Jika ini terus berlanjut, kita tidak akan bisa panen gandum musim depan.{nl}Tolong singkirkan dandelion dari ladang ku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Huh?
엥?
Huh?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Huh?
잉?
Huh?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Huh?
엉?
Huh?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Huh?
응?
Huh?

Please select the user requiring a quest: We're fighting hard. {nl}My mens' injuries are far more urgent than the farmers, wouldn't you agree? {nl}But some druid provided medicine only to the farmers which they then hid away. {nl}I have no words...
이래뵈도 우린 열심히 싸우고 있단 말이지.{nl}농민들보다도 부상 입은 내 부하들 쪽이 더 시급하다고 생각지 않나?{nl}그런데 이 드루이드란 작자는 농민들에게만 특제 치료약을 남겨줬다는 거 아닌가.{nl}게다가 농민들은 농민들대로 그걸 꼭꼭 숨겨놨다니깐? 내 참 기가 막혀서...
Kita bertarung dengan susah payah.{nl}Cidera pasukanku lebih penting dibandingkan para petani, apa kau setuju?{nl}Tetapi beberapa druid menyediakan obat hanya untuk para petani,yang setelahnya mereka sembunyikan. {nl}Aku tidak bisa berkata apa-apa...

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's simple. I will look out for my men first. {nl}Bring me the medicine that they've hidden. It shouldn't be hard to find. {nl}Probably in some wooden box or grape wagon, possibly an empty house... Somewhere there.
간단한 얘기야. 나도 내 부하들부터 챙겨야겠다는 말이지.{nl}농부들이 숨긴 그 치료약을 가져와.{nl}농부들이 생각할 곳이야 뻔하지.{nl}나무상자나 포도수레나 빈집이나... 뭐 그런데 있지 않겠어?
Ini sederhana, aku akan mencari pasukanku terlebih dahulu.{nl}Bawakan aku obat yang mereka sembunyikan, ini seharusnya tidak terlalu sulit.{nl}Mungkin ada di beberapa kotak kayu atau kereta anggur, bisa juga di rumah kosong... entah dimana diluar sana.

Please select the user requiring a quest: But be careful. {nl}If this bowl fills with water, the spell will fume a special force. {nl}Then the monsters attracted to that force might attack.
단, 조심하실 것이 있습니다.{nl}이 그릇에 물이 담기면 주술의 영향으로 특정한 기운을 뿜게 됩니다.{nl}그러면 그 기운에 이끌린 몬스터들이 공격을 할 수도 있으니 조심하십시오.
Tetapi Hati-hati.{nl}Jika mangkok ini terisi dengan air,mantra akan mengeluarkan kekuatan istimewa.{nl}Lalu para monster yang terkena ledakan istimewa itu mungkin akan menyerang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It was successful. {nl}Did you know these seeds are the same type as the mysterious seedlings? {nl}Seems like a wide range of land can be purified if it's grown well enough.
성공입니다.{nl}이 씨앗들은 신비한 묘목과 같은 품종이라는건 알고 계시죠?{nl}잘 심고 가꾸면 아주 광범위한 땅을 한번에 정화할 수 있겠어요.
Ini berhasil.{nl}Apa kamu tahu bibit-bibit ini sama seperti bibit misterius?{nl}Sepertinya jangkauan area yang lebar dari pulau dapat di murnikan jika ini tumbuh dengan cukup baik.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Growing these will use up parts of the cultivated farm however. {nl}The landlord of the farm in the reservoir area, Shaton, {nl}is here just in time so I should try persuading him while I can.
하지만 이걸 심으려면 경작 중인 밭을 어느 정도는 포기해야 할 텐데요.{nl}마침 저수구역에 농장 주인인 샤튼씨가 와 있다고 하니 설득을 해 봐야겠네요.{nl}
Bagaimanapun juga,menumbuhkannya akan menggunakan bagian ladang yang telah di budidayakan.{nl}Pemilik ladang di reservoir area,Shaton,akan tiba beberapa saat lagi jadi aku harus membujuknya selagi bisa.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'll meet you in the reservoir area.
그럼, 샤튼 저수구역에서 뵙겠습니다.
Aku akan menemuimu di reservoir area.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Soldier Mike
사병 마이크
Tentara Mike

Please select the user requiring a quest: My parent passed away on Medzio Diena because of them. {nl}I applied as a soldier here for my parents' revenge. {nl}But... it's a shame. I can't even so much as look at them. {nl}Please, do me a favor and kill them for me!
신수의 날에 제 부모님은 저 녀석들로 인해 돌아가셨지요.{nl}절치부심하며 복수하고자 이 곳의 사병으로 지원까지 한 것까진 좋았습니다.{nl}헌데... 부끄러운 일입니다만 저 녀석들을 제대로 쳐다 볼 수도 없군요...{nl}부탁입니다! 제 대신 원한을 풀어 주십시오!
Orangtuaku meninggal di Medzio Diena karena mereka.{nl}Aku melamar menjadi prajurit disini untuk dendam orangtuaku.{nl}Tetapi..ini memalukan.Aku bahkan tidak bisa begitu banyak seperti melihat mereka.{nl}Tolong,kabulkan permintaanku dan bunuh mereka untukku!

Please select the user requiring a quest: They'll jump out when you approach the bush and more'll come out if you shake it. {nl}You're partly responsible for it so you should help.
덤불 근처에 가면 놈들이 튀어 나올거유.{nl}덤불을 흔들어 보면 더 많이 튀어 나오겠지.{nl}여행자 양반도 어느정도 책임이 있으니 꼭 손써줘야 하는 거 알쥬?
Mereka akan melompat keluar ketika kamu mencapai semak dan akan muncul lebih banyak lagi jika kamu menggoyangkannya.{nl}Kamu sebagian bertanggung jawab untuk ini, jadi kamu harus membantu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There was a young couple that used to work here. They were very diligent. {nl}Everyone here did not work hard because they hated Shaton but they were different.
예전에 여기서 일하던 젊은 부부가 있었다네. 참 성실한 내외였지.{nl}다들 샤튼이 꼴보기 싫어서 열심히 일하지 않았지만 그 부부는 달랐다네.
Ada pasangan muda yang bekerja disini. Mereka sangat rajin.{nl}Semuanya disini tidak bekerja keras karena mereka membenci Shaton, tetapi mereka lain.

Please select the user requiring a quest: But that Shaton abused and exploited them. {nl}They ended up dying of overwork. I have some of their keepsakes... {nl}I promised to bury it near the grave but I lost the bag I kept them in in the chaos of Medzio Diena. {nl}If you find an old bag, please check if there's a ring inside.
그런데 샤튼 이 인간은 그걸 악용해서 그 부부를 혹사시켰어.{nl}결국 과로로 죽어버리고 말았다네. 내가 부부로부터 받아놓은 유품이 있었는데...{nl}무덤가에 묻어주기로 하고는 신수의 날 난리통에 유품이 담긴 가방을 잃어버렸다네.{nl}낡은 가방을 발견하거든 안에 반지가 있나 꼭 확인해 주면 고맙겠네.
Tetapi Shaton menyalahgunakan dan memanfaatkan mereka.{nl}Mereka berakhir sekarat karena bekerja berlebihan.Aku punya beberapa kenangan dari mereka...{nl}Aku berjanji untuk menguburnya di dekat kuburan mereka,tetapi aku kehilangan tas yang berisi benda itu di the chaos of Medzio Diena.{nl}Jika kamu menemukan sebuah tas tua, tolong periksa apakah di dalamnya ada cincin.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Good. This potion cost me a fortune at the Fedimian Black Market. {nl}It was from an elementalist who seemed trustworthy, unlike those druids. {nl}According to him, this potion contains the essence of alchemy.
좋아. 이 약물로 말할 것 같으면 페디미안 암시장에서 거금을 주고 구입한 것이지.{nl}뺀질뺀질하게 생긴 드루이드들과 달리 신뢰가 가는 얼굴의 알케미스트였어.{nl}그의 말에 따르면 이 약물은 연금술의 정수가 녹아있는 약물이라더군.
Bagus. Jika dengan obat ini dapat membuatnya berbicara, maka membelinya di Fedimian Black Market dengan biaya yang mahal juga tak apa kan.{nl}Berbeda dengan para druid yang terlihat lemah lunglai, Alchemist memiliki tampilan wajah yang lebih terpercaya.{nl}Jika mengikuti perkataannya obat ini adalah obat yang terlarut dari Alchemy Essence.

Please select the user requiring a quest: He said if I pour this on the ground, a powerful obedient monster will appear. {nl}I'll use it to wipe out all the monsters in my farm!
이 약물을 땅 위에 부으면 내 명령만 듣는 강력한 몬스터가 태어난다고 했지.{nl}그 녀석을 이용해서 내 농장의 다른 몬스터를 한 놈도 남김없이 없애버리겠다!
Dia bilang jika aku menuangkan ini di atas tanah,monster patuh yang sangat kuat akan muncul.{nl}Aku akan menggunakan ini untuk membersihkan semua monster di ladang ku!!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Well, I've made some mistakes here and there but who doesn't? {nl}I mean, just look at grapes. How can you use water without wine mixed as drinking water? {nl}Even if the world is ending, you can't just drink plain water. That's barbaric! {nl}Hmm! Anyway, I appreciate the help. I'll listen to your story.
뭐, 내가 그간 이런저런 실수를 했던 것은 사실이지만 그 정도는 누구나 하는걸!{nl}게다가 포도만 해도 그래. 어디 포도주 섞지 않은 물을 식수로 쓸 수 있겠는가 말이야.{nl}아무리 세상이 이모양이라도 맹물을 마시다니, 야만인이나 할 짓이지!{nl}...흠! 어쨌든 도움받은 것은 받은 것이니 얘기는 들어보겠네.
Baik,Aku melakukan kesalahan disini dan disana tetapi siapa yang tidak?{nl}IMaksudku,coba lihat anggur itu. bagaimana kamu bisa menggunakan air tanpa campuran wine sebagai air minum?{nl}Walaupun jika dunia berakhir,kamu tidak bisa hanya minum air polos, itu sangat barbar!{nl}Hmm! bagaimanapun juga aku menghargai bantuanmu, aku akan mendengarkan ceritamu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm just listening! I'm not going to do what you say! {nl}I don't think wheat will grow here no matter what kind of magic you use. {nl}I need to look for my son's body, so you better keep it short!
어디까지나 얘기만 듣는 거야! 그대로 따를 생각은 추호도 없어.{nl}무슨 신묘한 주술을 쓰던 여기서 밀이 자랄 것이라고는 생각지 않으니까.{nl}난 아들녀석 시체라도 확인하러 떠나야겠으니 짧게 끝내는게 좋을거야!
Sampai dimana cerita itu terdengar! Pikiran yang keluar begitu saja apa adanya.{nl}Entah ilmu sihir ajaib apa yang dipakai, padahal tidak terpikir bahwa gandum dapat tumbuh di sini.{nl}Karena aku harus pergi memeriksa mayat anak lelaki, maka dari itu sebaiknya ini diakhiri sampai sini saja!

Please select the user requiring a quest: The wandering girl the farmers mentioned sounds suspicious. {nl}Elly agrees with me too. {nl}Looking at the facts together with her actions, we can't just dismiss her as an ordinary girl. {nl}Won't people in the Shaton family do anything about it?
의심가는 것은 농부들이 자주 언급하는 떠돌이 소녀입니다.{nl}엘리 역시 저와 같은 의견인 듯 합니다.{nl}행적이나 남긴 경고들로 미루어 생각컨데 보통 소녀는 아닌 듯 싶군요.{nl}혹시 샤튼가쪽 분들이 뭔가 알고 계시지 않을까요?
Wandering girl yang dimaksud para petani terdengar mencurigakan.{nl}Elly juga setuju denganku.{nl}Mencari fakta bersama tentang apa yang dia lakukan, kita tidak bisa menghiraukan dia sebagai gadis biasa.{nl}Tidakkah orang-orang di keluarga Shaton bertindak sesuatu tentang ini?

Please select the user requiring a quest: And Medzio Diena came a few years after. {nl}My family barely made it out alive and this is what happened to the farm. {nl}That's not all. {nl}It was mentioned that a blue disaster will follow the great disaster.
그리고 몇해 지나지 않아 신수의 날이 찾아왔습니다.{nl}저희 가족은 간신히 살아남았지만 농장은 이렇게 되었죠.{nl}그뿐만이 아닙니다.{nl}거대한 재앙 뒤에 은총으로 위장한 푸른 재앙이 연이을 것이라는 이야기도 했었죠.
Dan Medzio Diena datang beberapa tahun kemudian.{nl}Keluargaku baru saja membuatnya hidup dan ini adalah apa yang terjadi dengan ladang.{nl}Dan bukan itu saja.{nl}Itu sudah dimaksudkan kalau Blue disaster akan mengikuti The great disaster.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Think about it, it may have been a warning about those poisonous grapes. {nl}The true gold blessing will come after the blue disaster passes. I don't know what that means. {nl}I wanted to talk to her more but her father kicked her out saying she felt ominous. {nl}Where could she be wandering now...
돌이켜 생각하니 아무래도 저 독포도들에 대한 경고가 아니었을까 싶어요.{nl}푸른 재앙이 지나야 진정한 금색 축복이 올거라는 말은 무슨 뜻인지 모르겠군요.{nl}그 아이와는 좀 더 이야기를 나누고 싶었건만 아버님이 불길하다며 내쫓으셨죠.{nl}그녀는 지금 어느 곳을 떠돌고 있을까요...
Pikirkan hal ini, ini mungkin sudah jadi peringatan tentang anggur beracun itu.{nl}gold blessing yang sebenarnya akan muncul setelah Blue disaster terlewati.Aku tidak tahu apa maksudnya.{nl}Aku ingin berbicara lebih banyak dengannya tetapi ayahnya menendangnya dan berbicara dia merasa buruk. {nl}Dimana keberadaannya sekarang...

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thank you. {nl}Maybe we earned some of the master's trust. {nl}If so, then it's all thanks to you. {nl}Good luck...
감사합니다.{nl}어쩌면 저희는 마스터로부터 큰 신임을 얻을 수 있을지도 모릅니다.{nl}만약 그렇게 된다면 그건 모두 계시자님 덕택이겠죠.{nl}행운이 함께 하시길...
Terima kasih.{nl}Bagaimanapun entah apakah kami dapat menerima kepercayaan besar sejak dari Master.{nl}Misalkan hal itu terjadi, itu semua adalah karena berkat bantuan dari para Savior.{nl}Semoga keberuntungan besertamu…

Please select the user requiring a quest: I heard things went well at the Shaton Farm. {nl}That's a relief. I will discuss with the master about the large-scale purification and how to make it successful.
샤튼 농장의 일을 잘 해결하셨다고 들었어요.{nl}정말 다행이에요. 대규모 정화는 마스터님과 잘 상의해서 꼭 성공시키겠어요.
Aku mendengar sesuatu yang berjalan baik di ladang Shaton. {nl}Itu adalah bantuan. Aku akan berdiskusi dengan master tentang pemurnian skala besar dan bagaimana cara untuk membuatnya sukses.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thank you. This will help many people recover.
감사합니다. 많은 분들이 회복에 도움을 받으실 수 있겠네요.
Terima kasih. Ini akan membantu penyembuhan banyak orang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's a task of getting rid of the Lauzinutes across the underground tunnel. {nl}The owner's son disappeared in the underground tunnel long ago. It's creepy and I don't ever want to go in there.
땅굴 너머의 라우지누테를 싹 다 잡아 없애주면 되는 일이야.{nl}옛날에 주인 아들이 땅굴에서 사라졌었거든. 오싹해서 절대 가고싶지 않아.
Ini adalah tugas untuk menghancurkan Lauzinutes sampai Underground tunnel. {nl}Anak sang pemilik sudah lama menghilang di underground tunnel. Menyeramkan dan aku tidak pernah mau pergi kesana.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Good. My men need to defend this area. {nl}It was spotted in the upper area. I'll mark the map for you. {nl}You might have to go through some underground tunnels.
다행이군. 내 부하들은 여기를 방어해야 되서 말이야.{nl}녀석은 이 윗쪽 지대에서 목격되었다네. 내 지도에 표시해 주지.{nl}아마 땅굴을 몇 번 걸쳐서 가야 될 걸세.
Bagus.Pasukanku perlu mempertahankan area ini. {nl}Itu bertempat di area atas. Aku akan menandai pada Map untukmu. {nl}Kamu mungkin perlu melewati beberapa terowongan bawah tanah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Underground Tunnel
땅굴
Underground Tunnel

Please select the user requiring a quest: (I can't seem to go the opposite way.)
거꾸로 되돌아갈 수 없을 것 같다.
(Nampaknya aku tidak dapat menuju jalan sebaliknya.)

Please select the user requiring a quest: Is Vietos Gorge a masterpiece of the goddess or a marvel of nature? {nl}The limestone stairway in the southern area is shining with spring water and looks fantastic.
비에타 계곡은 여신의 위대한 작품인가. 자연의 경이인가.{nl}남쪽 대지에 펼쳐져 있는 새하얀 석회석 계단은 각각 솟아나는 샘물로 가득 차 환상적으로 빛난다.
Apakah Vieta Gorge adalah hasil karya dari Goddess atau keajaiban alam? {nl}Limestone stairway berada di area bagian selatan yang bersinar dengan mata air dan terlihat fantastis.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You shouldn't trust anyone in here. Not the goddess and not even yourself.
이 곳에선 아무도 믿어선 안 된다. 여신도 네 자신도 믿지말거라.
Kamu tidak boleh percaya pada siapapun disini. Tidak pada Goddess atau bahkan pada dirimu sendiri.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hauberk, the goddess has no intentions of fighting against you. {nl}Cease your hostility.
하우벅, 여신께선 당신과 대립할 의사가 전혀 없으십니다.{nl}여신을 향한 적대적인 행위는 멈춰 주십시오.
Hauberk, Goddess tidak ada niat untuk bertarung denganmu. {nl}Hentikan kebencianmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Valtrus...
발트러스..
Valtrus…

Please select the user requiring a quest: Go back there!
그곳으로 돌아가라!
Kembali ke sana!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Prepare to make the Evening Star Key. {nl}Hurry, we don't have much time. I'll be sending the Revelator soon.
너흰 저녁별 열쇠를 만들 준비를 하거라.{nl}시간이 없으니 서둘러라 계시자를 곧 보내겠다.
Persiapan untuk membuat Evening Star Key.{nl} Cepat, kita tidak punya banyak waktu. Aku akan mengirim Saviorsegera.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I will not let my soul be tricked by you any more!
더는 내 영혼을 너희에게 놀아나게 하지 않겠다!
Aku tidak akan membiarkan jiwaku kau curangi lagi!

Please select the user requiring a quest: What is this... {nl}What are you trying to do with my soul!?
이게 대체 무슨 수작이지..{nl}네놈들 내 영혼으로 무슨짓을 하려는 게냐!
Apa ini…. {nl}Apa yang akan kau lakukan dengan jiwaku?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Srautas Canyon is filled with evil forces and the demons have begun to attack. {nl}Guards and Paladin followers are defending against them but they desperately need your help.
스라우타스 협곡이 사악한 기운으로 물들고, 마족들이 침공을 시작했다고 합니다.{nl}파수꾼과 팔라딘 추종자들이 막아내고 있지만, 당신의 도움이 절실한 상황입니다.
Srautas Gorge telah dipenuhi oleh kekuatan jahat dan para demon sudah memulai penyerangan. {nl}Penjaga dan pengikut paladin bertahan dari mereka tetapi mereka mati-matian membutuhkan bantuanmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Strange things are happening in Vejo Ravine. {nl}All the villagers disappeared and monsters took their place.
베야 골짜기에 괴이한 사건들이 벌어지고 있습니다.{nl}마을 사람들이 전부 실종되고, 몬스터들이 그 자리를 차지하고 있다는군요.
Hal aneh telah terjadi di Vejo Ravine.{nl}Semua penduduk desa menghilang dan para monster mengambil tempat mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Monsters entered the Stele Road and are blocking the way. {nl}All towns and villages will be isolated if we don't get rid of the monsters.
비석로에 몬스터들이 들어앉아 통행을 방해하고 있습니다.{nl}몬스터들을 처리하지 못한다면 모든 도시와 마을은 고립될 것입니다.
Para monster memasuki Stele Road dan mem-blokir jalan. {nl}Semua kota dan desa akan terisolasi jika kita tidak menghancurkan para monster.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We need support to make our way from the Dvaisa Ridge to Gateway of Great King. {nl}Please help.
드바시아 고개에서 대왕의 관문으로 길을 뚫는 데 지원이 필요합니다.{nl}지원을 부탁드립니다.
Kita butuh bantuan untuk dapat membuka jalan dari Dvaisa Ridge ke Gateway of Great King. {nl}Tolong bantu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I remember hiding some in the grass so that I could eat it later on. {nl}Please bring it to me.
나중에 꺼내 먹으려고 풀 숲에 여러 개 숨겨 뒀던 기억이 나요.{nl}어서 그걸 가져다 주세요.
Aku menyembunyikan beberapa di rerumputan agar dapat memakannya nanti.  {nl}Tolong bawa benda itu kepadaku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's spoiled. {nl}Take it again.
역시 상했군.{nl}어쩔 수 없지. 다시 가져가.
Ini rusak. {nl}Ambil ini kembali.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oh, that stench. Throw it away first then come back.
아이고 썩은 내야. 그거 버리고 다시 와.
Baunya yang sangat menyengat. Buang itu lalu kembalilah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ugh. How can you eat that? You should bring the fresh one.
읍 그걸 어떻게 먹으라는 거야? 안 썩은 걸로 가져 와야지.
Ugh. Bagaimana kamu bisa memakan itu? Kamu harus membawa yang masih baru.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The sealing magic circle must be enhanced to suppress the strange force surrounding this area.
봉인 마법진을 강화해야만 이 지역을 감싸는 이상한 기운을 잠재울 수 있어.
Magic circle harus diperkuat untuk menekan kekuatan aneh yang menyelimuti area ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I must join in doing the righteous thing.
의로운 일에는 당연히 참여 해야지요.
Aku harus ikut melakukan tindakan kebenaran.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I just gave it a while ago...
좀 전에 드렸는데..
Aku baru saja memberikan benda tersebut..

Please select the user requiring a quest: He seems dizzy. Is the medicine working?
머리가 어지럽다고 한다. 약효가 있는걸까?
Aku merasa pusing. Apakah obatnya bekerja?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Seems like the hunger went away.
허기가 가신듯 하다.
Aku tidak merasa lapar lagi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You must be full of questions right now. Ask away, Revelator...
궁금한게 많겠지. 질문하라. 계시자여..
Kamu pasti memiliki banyak pertanyaan. silahkan, Savior.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Vakarine is fighting Valtrus in the Demon Prison across the portal. {nl}She won't be able hold it for much longer unless someone helps.
바카리네는 이 포탈 너머의 마족 수감소에서 발트러스와 대치 중이다.{nl}누군가 도와주지 않는다면 오래 버티진 못 하겠지.
Vakarine sedang melawan Valtruss di dekat portal yang berada di Demon Prison.  {nl}dia tidak akan bertahan lama jika tidak ada yang membantunya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Men under the command of the Baron have been here though they weren't able to make it back. {nl}I watched everything with the wizard's eyes. {nl}Even the screams of Vakarine and her Kupoles.
남작의 수하들이 이 안에 들어갔지, 물론 돌아오지 못했지만.{nl}저 마법사의 몸 속에서 모든 걸 지켜봐 왔다.{nl}바카리네와 그녀의 큐폴들이 지르는 비명소리도 함께 말이다.
Pria-pria dibawah komando Baron telah datang ke sana. Meskipun mereka tidak pernah datang kembali. {nl}Aku telah melihat semuanya ketika berada di dalam wizard.  {nl}Bahkan teriakan Vakarine and pasangannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: That depends on whether or not you have the will to save the goddess. {nl}We can take time to talk about it.
그건 이제 이야기 해보자꾸나. {nl}네가 여신을 구할 마음이 있는지 말이야.
Sekarang mari bicarakan hal itu. Apakah Kamu bersedia untuk menyelamatkan Goddess atau tidak.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I hear the demons that crossed the corruption breach are gathered in Ausros Chapel. {nl}I wish you luck in the name of the goddess.
전이 틈새를 넘어온 마족들은 아우슈라 예배소에 집결해 있다고 들었습니다.{nl}여신의 이름으로 건승을 빌겠습니다.
Bagian tubuh Nuaele semua terpotong. {nl} Sekarang carilah Aldona. {nl} Dia akan membawa Kamu dan Hauberk ke wilayah Nuaele.

Siapa yang menjaga martabat King Zachariel dan keturunannya dikuburkan disini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You have been running around hard in my land. {nl}Sorry kid, but my name calls for the curse.
내 땅에서 열심히도 뛰더구나.{nl}안타깝지만 꼬마야. 내 이름은 곧 저주를 부른단다.
Kamu telah berlari sangat keras di lahanku. {nl}Maaf nak, tetapi namaku akan menyebabkan kutukan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: What is this...? {nl}What are you doing with my soul?!
이게 대체 무슨 수작이지..{nl}네놈들. 내 영혼으로 무슨 짓을 하려는 게냐!
Apa ini.. {nl}Apa yang kamu lakukan dengan jiwaku!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Reconstruction of Blessings
축복의 재건
Reconstruction of the Blessing

Please select the user requiring a quest: You think so too, huh? {nl}Please collect some leather. You can get some from the monsters.
계시자님께서도 그리 생각하시는군요.{nl}가죽을 부탁드립니다. 몬스터에게서 구할 수 있을 겁니다.
Kamu juga berpikir seperti itu, huh. {nl}Silahkan mengumpulkan kulit.  Kamu bisa mendapatkannya dari monster.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Then give me 1,000 silver coins. I'm in a tight spot here too.
그럼 1000 실버만 주시오. 나도 사정이 여의치 않아서.
Kalau begitu berikan aku 1000 silvers. Aku juga berada di posisi yang sulit.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm very sorry but I do hope you understand.
정말 미안하군. 하지만 이해했길 바라네.
Aku sangat minta maaf namun aku harap kamu mengerti.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Then I have no business with you
그럼 일 없소.
Kalau begitu aku tidak punya urusan denganmu

Please select the user requiring a quest: You're even worse than me.
나보다 더 힘든 게로구먼.
Kamu bahkan lebih buruk dariku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Even more pathetic than I am... Take it.
나보다 더 불쌍한 사람이라니.. 가져가시오.
Bahkan lebih menyedihkan daripadaku.. Ambil ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: What is it?
무슨 일이시오?
Apa ini?

Please select the user requiring a quest: But you're a new face. {nl}Do you have anything to prove that you're Horacius' colleague?
하지만 자넨 처음 보는 얼굴이군.{nl}호라치우스의 동료라는 증거라도 있다면 모를까.
Tetapi wajahmu masih asing {nl}Kecuali kamu mempunya bukti kalau kamu adalah rekan Horacius.

Please select the user requiring a quest: No wonder! Here it is.
과연 그렇군! 여기 있어.
Tidak mengherankan! Ini dia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I can't just give my precious farming tools to someone so suspicious!
의심스러운 사람한테 소중한 농기구를 줄 수는 없어.
Aku tidak bisa memberi barang pertanian berhargaku ke seseorang yang mencurigakan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Huh? Why should I trust you?
그럼 뭘로 당신을 믿으라는 거지?
Huh? Mengapa aku harus mempercayaimu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: You're very persistent. Here.
거 참 끈질기군. 가져가시오.
Itu suatu ketekunan. Kemari.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Is Horacius really okay?
호라치우스는 정말 괜찮은 건가..
Aku ingin tahu jika persiapannya berjalan lancar..

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know who you are but I am very busy.

Aku tidak tahu siapa kamu tapi aku sangat sibuk.

Please select the user requiring a quest: What happens if it fails?
만약 실패하면 어떻게 되는거지?
Apa yang terjadi jika itu gagal?

Please select the user requiring a quest: If it's just that then I'll cooperate. {nl}Will farming tools be enough?
그 정도라면 협조하도록 하지.{nl}농기구만이면 되는가?
Jika hanya itu saja maka Aku akan bekerja sama. {nl} Akankah alat-alat pertanian cukup?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Of course I should give them. {nl}It'll be successful.
그렇다면 당연히 드려야죠.{nl}꼭 성공할 거예요.
Tentu saja aku harus memberi. {nl}Itu akan sukses.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Is that not enough?
역시 그걸론 부족한가?
Apakah itu tidak cukup?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Necklace of Shaton
샤튼의 목걸이
Kalung Sharon

Please select the user requiring a quest: I found an old, blood stained necklace. Could this be Shaton's son's necklace?
피 묻은 낡은 목걸이를 발견했다. 혹시 샤튼의 아들 것이 아닐까?
Ditemukan kalung tua bernoda darah. Mungkinkah ini adalah kalung milik anak Sharon?

Please select the user requiring a quest: This machine can process crystal fragments. {nl}Which item would you like to process?
수정 조각을 모아 가공시킬 수 있는 기계입니다.{nl}무슨 아이템으로 가공하겠습니까?
Mesin ini dapat memproses fragmen kristal. {nl} Manakah item yang Kamu ingin proses?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Memo
쪽지
Catatan

Please select the user requiring a quest: If you resonate the crystals a bit, you'll hear a beautiful melody.
약간의 수정 조각을 공명시키면 아름다운 선율이 흘러나옵니다.
Jika kamu sedikit meresonasi crystals, makan kamu akan mendengar musik yang indah

Please select the user requiring a quest: Caution: This area is a rockslide zone!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Machine of Riddles
수수께끼의 기계장치
Mesin teka-teki

Please select the user requiring a quest: There are red, blue, and yellow circles on the old surface.
낡은 표면에는 빨강, 파랑, 노랑의 세 원이 그려져 있다.
Ada red, blue, and yellow circles pada permukaan lama.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's the reverting chain that shredded my soul... I collected my soul with it.
내 영혼을 찢어발긴 환원의 사슬이로군..덕분에 내 영혼이 모을 수 있었다.
Ini adalah rantai yang menyobek-nyobek jiwaku. Aku mengumpulkan jiwaku dengan ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Seems the plan was to block the corruption breach with my soul. {nl}Good thing I knew about it before it was too late.
보아하니 내 영혼의 힘으로 전이틈새를 막을 작정이었군.{nl}더 늦기 전에 알아차려서 다행이야.
Sepertinya rencana tadi adalah memblok celah kontaminasi dengan jiwaku.{nl}Untungnya aku sudah tahu sebeum terlambat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Did you really think you could fool me that easily? {nl}Send my regards to Vakarine.
내가 그렇게 쉽게 당할 줄 알았나?{nl}바카리네에게 안부나 전해줘라.
Apakah Kamu pikir Kamu bisa membawa Aku semudah itu?{nl}Sampaikan salamku pada Vakarine.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hand it over, Revelator. {nl}The goddess will take care of it.
계시자여 그걸 제게 넘겨주십시오.{nl}여신께서 처리해주실 겁니다.
Berikan itu, Savior. {nl}Goddess akan menjaganya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Forgotten Magic Circle
잊어버린 마법진
The Forgotten Magic Circle

Please select the user requiring a quest: What do you want to know?

Apa yang ingin kamu ketahui?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Receptionist Ramda
접수원 람다
Receptionist Ramda

Please select the user requiring a quest: The commission can start once all party members have gathered.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You are not eligible to receive commissions yet.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Star commission?

Please select the user requiring a quest: That's right. {nl}The altar will move again.
정답이다.{nl}제단은 다시 움직일 것이다.
Betul sekali {nl}Altar akan berpindah lagi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Box of Legwyn Family
르귄가문의 상자
Box of Legwyin Family

Please select the user requiring a quest: Nothing can be found now...

Tidak ada yang bisa ditemukan..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Tesla's Dedication
테슬라 헌정
Tesla Government

Please select the user requiring a quest: I offer the Goddess Statue of Soul my honor and light.
큰 영광이자 빛인 여신께 나의 모든 영혼을 담은 여신상을 바칩니다.
Aku mempersembahkan Statue of Goddess yang dibuat dengan kehormatan dan harapan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ugh. How can you eat that? You should bring ones that aren't spoiled.
