Huek, bagaimana bisa kamu memakan itu? Kamu harus membawakan yang masih utuh.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Good, good. The purification is going well. {nl}Welcome to my territory, Revelator.
좋군. 좋아. 정화는 순조롭군.{nl}내 영지에 온걸 환영하네, 계시자여.
Bagus, bagus. Purification berjalan dengan baik. {nl}Selamat datang di daerahku, Savior.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The purification? Ah... yes, it's ongoing. {nl}This is all for the farmers as long as that engine works well.
정화? 아아.. 그래. 하고 있지.{nl}이게 다 농민들을 위한 일이네. 저 동력원이 잘 움직여 준다면야.
Purification? Ah.. ya, itu sedang berjalan. {nl}Semua ini untuk para farmer. Selama mesin itu masik bekerja dengan baik.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This old man wants just one thing: {nl}beauty, everlasting beauty...
늙은이가 원하는 거야 딱 한 가지지.{nl}영원한 것. 영원한 아름다움..{nl}
Hanya ada satu hal yang dinginkan orang tua. {nl}Kecantikan. Kecantikan yang abadi..{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ah, I'm referring to the engine and purification.
아아. 동력원과 정화 얘길세.
Ah, Aku hanya mengacu pada mesin dan purification.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This machine takes too many crops. {nl}You can say it was kept because of my prestige and morality.
이 동력원은 곡식을 먹어도 너무 먹어. {nl}내가 덕망 있고 권위가 있어서 지금까지 유지해 왔다고 해야겠지.
Mesin ini terlalu banyak mengerjakan hasil panen. {nl}Kamu bisa bilang mesin itu masih ada karena prestige dan moral dariku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Haven't you seen the weird aura around the farm? {nl}That's what's corrupting the farm.
농장 구석구석에 이상한 기운을 보지 못했나?{nl}그게 바로 농장을 오염시키고 있는 주범일세.{nl}
Apakah kamu melihat aura aneh disekitar farm? {nl}Itu adalah hal yang mengkontaminasi farm. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The spell device is used to suppress the aura by using the magic circles to purify the farm. {nl}It's all the genius of Rimas.
마법진으로 그 기운을 눌러 마력 동력원으로 이 농장을 정화하려고 하지.{nl}다 옆에 있는 리마스 덕분이야.
Spell device ini berfungsi untuk mengurangi aura tersebut dengan magic circle dan menjaga farm. {nl}Terima kasih untuk Rimas.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Anyway, when will the search team be back from the restricted area?
그나저나 통제구역으로 보낸 탐사대는 언제 돌아오는 거야?{nl}
Omong-omong, kapan tim pencari kembali dari area yang terlarang itu? {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ah, you're still here. {nl}Take your time and look around.
아, 아직 있었군.{nl}천천히 구경하다 가시게.
Ah, kamu masih disini. {nl}Silahkan lihat-lihat sekitar terlebih dahulu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: If we fail... Then what will happen to us?
혹시나 실패한다면.. 그 땐 우린 어떻게 되는 걸까.
Jika kita gagal.. Apa yang terjadi pada kita?

Please select the user requiring a quest: The farm rent has become a problem. People aren't generous any more.
어느 순간부터 소작료가 너무 무거워져서.. 인심마저 보통 사나운게 아닙니다.
Menyewa lahan cukup menjadi beban… Sekarang tidak ada lagi orang yang dermawan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's no joke.
장난도 아니고..
Itu bukan lelucon..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Someone's Memo
누군가의 쪽지
Memo dari seseorang

Please select the user requiring a quest: This place is insane. {nl}The only way to get rid of this cursed Tree Root Crystal is to burn the place down. {nl}It should all be burned.
이 곳은 미쳤다. 이 저주 받은 나무뿌리 수정을 없애기 위해서는 불을 지르는 수 밖에 없어. 불을 질러야 돼.
Tempat ini sudah gila. Satu satunya cara untuk menghilangkan kutukan dari Tree Root Crystal{nl}adalah dengan membakarnya. Harus dibakar sampai habis.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Baron's greed had him send his men into this area. {nl}None of them made it back.
남작은 욕심에 눈이 멀어 수하들을 이 안으로 들여보냈었지. {nl}물론 돌아오진 못했다만.{nl}
Ketamakan dari baron yang mengirim orang-orang itu kesini. {nl}Tentu saja mereka tidak ada yang berhasil kembali.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I watched everything through the eyes of this wizard. {nl}Even the screams of Vakarine and her Kupoles.
이 마법사의 눈으로 모든 걸 지켜봐 왔다.{nl}바카리네와 그녀의 큐폴들이 지르는 비명소리도 함께 말이다.
Aku menyaksikan semuanya dengan Wizards's eyes. {nl}Bahkan jeritan Vakarine dan Cupols miliknya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: That depends on whether or not you have the will to save the goddess. {nl}We can take time later to talk about it.
그건 네가 여신을 구할 마음이 있는지에 달린 일이다.{nl}앞으로 천천히 이야기를 해도 좋겠지..
Itu tergantung dari seberapa besar keinginanmu untuk menyelamatkan Goddess. {nl}Kita bisa mencari waktu untuk membicarakan hal itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Isn't there a more effective way to block the monsters?
몬스터를 좀 더 효과적으로 막을 방법은 없는 걸까..
Bukankah ada cara yang lebih efektif untuk memblokir monster..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Freshly cultivating the farm isn't easy though,{nl}at least there are less monsters than before.
농장을 새로 개간한다는 것도 참 힘든 일이군요.{nl}그나마 몬스터가 적어서 참 다행이지요.
Tidak mudah untuk mengolah tanaman di farm. {nl}Setidaknya monster disana sudah berkurang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: They were once gentle monsters that suddenly grew vicious. {nl}Have you heard of anything else like that?
원래 순한 몬스터들이였는데 갑자기 난폭해지다니..{nl}계시자님도 이런 일을 들어본 적이 있습니까?
Sebelumnya mereka tidak pernah menyerang, namun sekarang menjadi liar dan buas. {nl}Apakah kamu pernah mendengar hal ini sebelumnya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Many loved ones would have been lost if not for you. {nl}Why would someone do such a thing?
계시자님이 아니었으면 여럿 사람 목숨을 잃을 뻔 했습니다.{nl}도대체 누가 무슨 생각으로 그런 짓을 저질렀을까요?
Banyak cinta dan kasih sayang yang hilang jika bukan untukmu. {nl}Mengapa seseorang tega melakukan hal itu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm sure it's a monster behind that man's mask. {nl}Spreading poison? Evoniphon? I'll remember that.
그런 짓을 저지른 사람은 분명 사람의 탈을 쓴 몬스터일 겁니다.{nl}독을 퍼뜨리다니요. 에보니폰? 기억해둬야겠습니다.
Aku yakin ada seseorang yang membuat semua ini terjadi. {nl}Menyebarkan poison? Ebonpipon? Aku akan mengingatnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Weird things happen when you try to cultivate a new farm. {nl}Though nowadays it's even weirder if nothing happens.
새로 농장으로 개간하려니 별 일이 다 벌어지네요.{nl}하긴 요즘 세상에 이상한 일이 없는 게 더 이상하지요.
Banyak hal aneh terjadi saat mencoba bercocok tanam di farm. {nl}Yaa, tapi lebih aneh lagi jika tidak terjadi apa-apa pada saat ini bukan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I didn't think we'd lack manpower since we're close to Klaipeda. {nl}I guess that was a mistake on my part. {nl}Well, at least we have enough soldiers to fight the large monsters.
클라페다와 가까워서 일손이 모자르지 않을 줄 알았는데 착각이었나 봅니다.{nl}하긴, 대형 몬스터가 나와도 대치할 수 있는 병력이 있는 게 어디입니까.
Aku kira kita tidak akan kekurangan tenaga pekerja karena dekat dengan Klaipeda. Sepertinya itu salahku. {nl}Yaa setidaknya kita punya prajurit untuk melawan monster-monster yang besar.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Guarding the farm is tiring enough. {nl}How much time do the soldiers need to explore the Thorn Forest?
농장을 지키는 것도 이렇게 힘든데 가시숲을 개척하는 병사들은 얼마나 힘들까요?
Menjaga farm cukup melelahkan. {nl}Berapa banyak lagi prajurit yang akan menjelajah Thorn Forest?

Please select the user requiring a quest: One or two monsters I can handle just fine. {nl}But, I don't think I can handle an entire flock though.
몬스터 한 두 마리 쯤은 괜찮습니다만.{nl}만약에 떼로 덮쳐오면 저 혼자 버텨낼 수 있을지 걱정입니다.
Satu atau dua monster tidak masalah. {nl}Tapi aku khawatir jika segerombolan datang bersamaan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm standing guard here. {nl}It's better than the Eastern Woods since there are less monsters{nl}but it isn't exactly easy.
여기서 경계를 서고 있습니다.{nl}동쪽 숲 보단 몬스터가 적어서 좀 낫지만 그래도 자기 일이 제일 힘든 것 아니겠습니까.
Aku menjaga post disini. {nl}Lebih baik daripada Eastern Forest karena monster disini lebih sedikit{nl}tapi tidak ada pekerjaan yang mudah bukan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: My colleagues' faces turned pale and they ran away. What's going on?
동료들이 얼굴이 새파래져서 도망치던데, 도대체 무슨 일이죠?
Wajah rekanku menjadi pucat dan dia melarikan diri. Apa yang terjadi?

Please select the user requiring a quest: A Gorgon? Holy... I think I've seen one.
고르곤인가요? 이런.. 그러게 내가 봤다니까.
Gorgon? Ya ampun.. Lihat, Aku melihatnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: A tremendous monster was sighted here. Have you seen it?
여기서 엄청난 몬스터가 목격되었다는데 혹시 본 적 있나?
Monster besar terlihat disekitar sini. Apakah kamu melihatnya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's a bit dubious, a monster hiding in a dead end like this. {nl}I can't just ignore the report though...
이상하군. 이렇게 막다른 곳에 그렇게 큰 몬스터가 숨어있다니, 원.{nl}보고를 무시할 수도 없고..
Aneh. Monster bersembunyi dijalan buntu seperti ini. {nl}Aku harus membuat laporan untuk hal ini..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Crops from here will be brought to Klaipeda. {nl}I heard the farm has been corrupted with an evil energy.
여기서 수확한 작물들은 클라페다로 갈 거야.{nl}듣자하니 많은 농장들이 사악한 기운에 오염되어 버렸다는군.
Hasil panen dari sini akan dibawa ke Klaipeda. {nl}Aku dengar farm telah terkontaminasi oleh kekuatan jahat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The farm's cultivation just started so I'm the only one who received farmland. {nl}I wonder when they'll cultivate the whole area like this.
이제 갓 개간을 시작한 농장이라 농지를 받은 사람은 아직 나밖에 없어.{nl}이래가지곤 언제 전부 개간하겠다는 건지.
Lahan ini baru saja mau digunakan jadi hanya aku yang bekerja disini. {nl}Aku bingung kapan mereka akan memanen di area seperti ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You defeated the Gorgon? {nl}Wow, Revelators must be some sort of superhuman.
그 고르곤을 해치웠다고?{nl}계시자라고 하는 사람들은 전부 초인이라도 되는가 보구먼.
Kamu mengalahkan Gorgon? {nl}Savior pasti sekuat pejuang legenda.

Please select the user requiring a quest: One wrong move and we could've been wiped out. {nl}It feels like the goddess has returned and is keeping us safe.
까딱하면 전멸할 뻔했어.{nl}전부 안다치고 돌아온게 여신이라도 돌아온 것 같아.
Satu tindakan yang salah maka kita akan musnah. {nl}Kami bisa kembali dengan selamat rasanya seperti Goddess telah kembali.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I could have fought more but my colleagues ran away. {nl}I can take those monsters anytime...
전 더 싸울 수 있었는데 동료들이 먼저 도망쳤어요.{nl}그런 몬스터따위 얼마든지..
Aku bisa saja melawan tapi semua rekanku kabur. {nl}Aku bisa menghadapi monster itu kapan saja..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Next time, I'll fight at the front line. {nl}I'm sure I can take it down.
다음엔 무조건 최전방에서 싸울 겁니다.{nl}분명히 쓰러뜨릴 자신 있었다구요.
Lain waktu, Aku akan bertempur di garis depan. {nl}Aku yakin bisa mengalahkannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It would have been dangerous if you weren't around. {nl}Such a big monster near Klaipeda...
계시자님이 없었으면 정말 큰일날 뻔 했습니다.{nl}클라페다 주변에서 저렇게 큰 몬스터라뇨.
Mungkin akan menjadi berbahaya jika kamu tidak ada disini. {nl}Ada monster yang besar dekat Klaipeda.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Gatus, he was the first to run away but he loves to bluff... {nl}
가투스 녀석, 제일 먼저 도망친 주제에 언제나 말은 번지르르..{nl}
Gatus, dia suka menggertak tapi pasti kabur duluan.. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: How could Gytis lie to us? {nl}He said there were only gentle monsters.
기티스님이 어떻게 우리에게 거짓말을 할 수 있죠?{nl}다 순한 몬스터들밖에 없다더니만.
Bagaimana Gitis bisa berbohong pada kita? {nl}Dia bilang hanya ada monster yang jinak.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Alan's worse. {nl}He should have correctly said it was Gorgon.
앨런이 더 나빠요.{nl}고르곤이라고 똑바로 말을 했어야지.
Alan lebih parah lagi. {nl}Seharusnya dia bilang kalau itu adalah Gorgon.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I saw your fight as I ran away and it was spectacular. {nl}Do you fight these kinds of monsters often?
도망치면서 계시자님께서 싸우는 모습을 봤는데 정말 엄청났습니다.{nl}저런 몬스터를 상대해 본 경험이 많으신가보지요?
Aku melihat pertarunganmu saat aku berlari dan itu sangat hebat. {nl}Apakah kamu sering bertarung dengan monster sekuat itu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I really envy you. {nl}I could be a good soldier too if I had your abilities.
계시자님이 정말 부럽습니다.{nl}저도 그만한 실력을 가졌다면 남부끄럽지 않은 병사가 됐을 텐데요.
Aku iri padamu. {nl}andai saja aku punya kemampuan sepertimu pasti aku sudah menjadi prajurit yang hebat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I feel sick... Ugh...
속이 너무 안좋아.. 윽..
Aku merasa sakit.. Ughhh..

Please select the user requiring a quest: I still feel sick but it's getting better. {nl}Thank you very much.
아직도 속이 안 좋지만 그래도 전보단 나은 것 같아요.{nl}정말 감사합니다.
Aku masih merasa tidak enak tapi sekarang sudah lebih baik. {nl}Terima kasih banyak.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You brought the medicine for us? {nl}Thank you. The goddess will surely bless you.
계시자님이 저희들을 위해서 약을 구해 주셨다죠?{nl}여신께서 계시자님께 축복을 내려주실겁니다.
Kamu membawa obat-obatan untuk kami? {nl}Goddess pasti akan memberkatimu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hm... Is the antidote ready yet...?
우욱.. 해독제는 아직인가..
Hmm.. Apakah antidotenya sudah siap..?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Save me...
살려줘..
Selamatkan aku..

Please select the user requiring a quest: If it weren't for you, I'd be meeting the goddess right now. {nl}Thank you very much.
당신이 아니였으면 벌써 여신을 만나고 있었겠지.{nl}정말 고맙소.
Jika bukan karenamu, Mungkin aku sudah mati dan bertemu Goddess. {nl}Terima kasih banyak

Please select the user requiring a quest: I lost consciousness on something weird that I then knew was poison. {nl}That pain... I don't ever want to think about it again.
뭔가 이상한 기운에 정신을 잃었다가 독에 당했다는걸 알게 되었지.{nl}정말 그 고통은 생각하기도 싫소.
Aku kehilangan kesadaran saat aku tahu itu adalah poison. {nl}Rasa sakit itu.. Aku tidak ingin memikirkannya lagi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Help... I feel like dying...
도와줘.. 죽을 것 같아..
Tolong.. Rasanya aku seperti orang yang sekarat..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thank you for saving us. {nl}I was sure we were dead.
계시자님, 구해주셔서 정말 감사합니다.{nl}아까는 차라리 죽었으면 했다니까요.
Terima kasih karena telah menyelamatkan kami. {nl}Rasanya tadi aku hampir mati.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I suddenly felt hot and... I don't remember anything after that. {nl}Evoniphon? Never heard of it.
갑자기 더운 기운이 확 덮쳤고.. 그 이후는 기억이 나질 않아요.{nl}에보니폰? 전 처음 듣는 이름이네요.
Tiba-tiba aku merasa kepanasan.. Setelah itu aku tidak ingat apa-apa lagi. {nl}Evoniphon? Aku tidak pernah mendengar hal itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: My stomach's burning...
뱃속이 타들어가는 것 같아..
Perutku rasanya seperti terbakar..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Go back. {nl}Humans shouldn't enter this place.
돌아가세요.{nl}이 곳은 인간이 절대 들어오면 안 될 곳입니다.
Pergilah. {nl}Manusia tidak boleh masuk ke tempat ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We cannot protect you. Go back.
저희로선 그대를 지켜드릴 방도가 없습니다. 돌아가세요.
Kami tidak ada maksud untuk melindungimu. Kembalilah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Nuaele's subordinates are all gone. {nl}Go find Aladona. She'll take you to Nuaele's territory.
누아엘레의 수족들이 모두 잘려나갔군요.{nl}이제 알도나님을 찾아가세요. 누아엘레의 영역으로 데려가 주실 겁니다.
Anak buah dari Nuaelle semua menghilang. {nl}Pergi dan temui Aladona. Dia akan membawamu ke Nuaelle territory.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Aside from the corruption breach, our biggest problem was Nuaele. {nl}Now we can focus on the corruption breach. {nl}Go to Prison District 3. The goddess awaits your support.
전이 틈새를 제외하곤 우리의 가장 큰 골칫거리는 누아엘레였습니다.{nl}이제 전이 틈새에 집중할 수 있을 것입니다.{nl}수감소 3 구역으로 향하십시오. 여신께서 당신의 도움을 기다립니다.
Selain masalah kontaminasi, masalah terbesar kami adalah Nuaelle. {nl}Sekarang kami bisa fokus menangani masalah kontaminasi. {nl}Pergilah ke prison district 3. Goddess menunggu bantuanmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Be prepared. We are establishing a new base.
준비하라. 새로운 근거지를 만든다.
Bersiap untuk membuat markas baru.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We will make a home here, a world where both demons and humans meet.
마계와 인간세계가 이어지는 이 곳을 고향으로 삼는다.
Tempat dimana Demon dan Manusia bertemu, ini adalah rumahku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We shall break the wings of the goddess and destroy all the barriers.
여신의 날개를 꺾어 모든 결계를 부수어라.
Patahkan Sayap Goddess dan hancurkan semua barrier.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Let us expand our forces starting from here.
이 곳을 시작으로 세력을 넓히자.
Kita perluas daerah pasukan mulai dari sini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This will be our land.
이 곳은 우리들의 땅이 될 것이다.
Ini akan menjadi daerah kita.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Come find me if you have anything to ask.
궁금한 정보가 있으면 언제든 찾아오세요.
Temui aku jika ada yang ingin kamu tanyakan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Among them, the Paladin Master was a hero who saved many lives in the capital. {nl}Currently, he has gone to Silverstream Gorge to fight a great evil.
그 중 팔라딘 마스터는 수도에서 많은 이들을 구한 영웅입니다.{nl}현재 그는 거대한 악에 맞서기 위해 스라우타스 협곡으로..
Diantara mereka, Paladin Master adalah pahlawan yang menyelamatkan banyak nyawa di capital. {nl}Sekarang dia pergi ke Srautas Gorge untuk bertarung melawan kejahatan..

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't like Fiona and wonder why she's the Hunter Master. {nl}But, if we need her to defeat Evoniphon, I'm fine with allying with her.
피오나는 정말 싫어. 그런 주제에 헌터 마스터나 하고 있고.{nl}하지만 에보니폰을 추적하기 위해서라면 피오나와 손을 잡아도 상관 없어.
Aku sangat benci Fiona. Menjadi Hunter Master seperti itu. {nl}Tapi aku tidak keberatan jika harus bekerja sama melawan Evoniphon.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Cured Tenant Farmer
치료된 소작인
Cured Farmer

Please select the user requiring a quest: You saved my life. I still feel sick... I am very grateful to you!
덕분에 살았습니다. 속은 아직 안좋지만.. 정말 고맙습니다!
Kamu menyelamatkan nyawaku. Aku belum begitu sehat.. Tapi terima kasih banyak!

Please select the user requiring a quest: If the grapes keep turning out this way, I'm leaving Shaton Farm. {nl}I don't want to feel this kind of pain any more.
포도가 계속 이 모양이라면 샤튼 농장을 떠날거예요.{nl}이런 고통은 더는 싫다고요.
Jika anggur itu tetap seperti ini, Aku akan pergi meninggalkan Sharon Farm. {nl}Aku sudah tidak tahan lagi seperti ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I thought the poison would burn my body. {nl}Thank you very much for saving me.
독 때문에 온 몸이 타들어가는줄 알았어요.{nl}구해주셔서 정말 감사합니다..
Aku kira poison itu akan membakar seluruh tubuhku. {nl}Terima kasih banyak telah menyelamatkanku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Storage Keeper Rita
창고지기 리타
Warehouse Keeper Rita

Please select the user requiring a quest: Welcome! {nl}How can I help you?
어서오세요!{nl}무엇을 맡아드릴까요?
Halo Kawan!{nl}Ada yang bisa aku bantu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: You shouldn't trust anyone here. Not the goddess and not even yourself.
이 곳에선 아무도 믿지 말아라. 여신도 네 자신도 말이다.
Jangan percayai siapapun. Goddess, atau dirimu sendiri.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Demon Lord Hauberk, the goddess does not wish to fight you. {nl}Cease your hostile actions at once.
마군주 하우벅. 여신께선 당신과 대립할 의사가 전혀 없으십니다.{nl}여신을 향한 적대적인 행위는 멈춰 주십시오.
Hauberk, Goddess tidak punya niat untuk bertarung denganmu. {nl}Hentikanlah permusuhanmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Prepare to make the Evening Star Key. {nl}Hurry, we don't have much time. I'll be sending the Revelator soon.
너흰 저녁별 열쇠를 만들 준비를 하거라.{nl}시간이 없으니 서둘러라. 곧 계시자를 보내겠다.
Kalian persiapkan Evening Star Key. {nl}Cepatlah, waktunya tidak banyak. Aku akan mengirim Savior secepatnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: My soul is mine, only mine!
내 영혼은 오직 나만의 것이다!
Jiwa ini milikku, hanya untukku!

Please select the user requiring a quest: I was able to gather my soul thanks to you. {nl}But this... Isn't this the reverting chain that shredded my soul?
덕분에 나의 영혼을 모을 수 있었다.{nl}그런데 이건.. 내 영혼을 찢어발긴 환원의 사슬 아닌가.{nl}
Aku telah mengumpulkan jiwaku terima kasih untukmu. {nl}Tapi ini.. Bukankah ini rantai yang menyobek jiwaku. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Right. Now I understand... {nl}The plan was to close the dimensional crack with the power of my soul?
그렇군. 이제야 알겠어..{nl}내 영혼의 힘으로 전이 틈새를 막을 작정이었나보지?{nl}
Benar. Sekarang aku mengerti..{nl}Rencananya adalah memblokir kontaminasi itu dengan kekuatan dari jiwaku?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Give me the power, Revelator. {nl}It is power that only the goddess should take care of.
그 힘을 제게 넘겨주세요.{nl}여신께서 거두셔야 할 힘입니다.
Berikan aku kekuatan itu. {nl}Itu adalah kekuatan yang harus di jaga oleh Goddess.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Receptionist Brandon
접수원 브렌든
Receptionish Brandon

Please select the user requiring a quest: The information to share with you is not getting gathered.
알려드릴 정보가 모이지 않았습니다.
Informasi yang seharusnya diberikan padamu belum dikumpulkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's better to use the cable car than heading straight into the monsters.
몬스터 한복판을 헤쳐가느니 차라리 케이블카를 이용하는게 훨씬 좋지요.
Lebih baik jika kita menggunakan cable car daripada harus berhadapan dengan monster-monster itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You can get to the other end by using the cable car.
케이블카를 이용하면 반대편으로 한 번에 갈 수 있습니다.
Kamu bisa pindah ke seberang sana dengan cable car.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Careful! This must be Antares' doing. {nl}It will explode if you go near it. {nl}It's better to get rid of them by luring each of them one by one.
조심해요! 분명 이건 안타라스 짓이 틀림없어요.{nl}가까이 다가가면 폭발할 거예요.{nl}몬스터를 유인해서 하나하나 제거하는 게 좋겠어요.
Berhati-hatilah! Ini pasti ulah Antares.{nl}Itu akan meledak jika kamu mendekatinya.{nl}Sebaiknya kamu pancing satu per satu dan menghabisinya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please protect me as I stabilize the Jewels of Prominence. I need to concentrate.
제가 홍염의 보석을 안정시키는 동안 방해받지 않도록 보호해 주세요.
Aku akan menstabilkan Jewel of prominence, tolong lindungi aku agar prosesnya tidak terganggu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Okay... Let me see the completed jewel you put so much effort into making. {nl}I don't know about you but I really like it, huhuhu...
그래.. 홍염의 보석을 만드느라 수고했으니 결과물을 한번 봐야겠지?{nl}난 정말 마음에 드는데 너는 어떠려나 모르겠네, 후후후..
Oke.. Karena kamu telah berusaha keras untuk jewel ini, kita lihat apakah aku mampu menyelesaikan jewel ini.{nl}Aku sangat menyukainya, tapi aku tidak tahu bagaimana perasaanmu akan hal itu, huhuhu..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Torn Letter
바스러져 가는 쪽지
Surat yang terobek-robek

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ripped Diary
찢어진 일기
Torn Letter

Please select the user requiring a quest: Last Record
마지막 기록
Catatan Terakhir

Please select the user requiring a quest: Abandoned Diary
버려진 일기장
Diary yang terabaikan

Please select the user requiring a quest: The goddess left many things to the first Paladin: {nl}The threat of the Demon Queen, Gesti, and the mission to protect. {nl}She also mentioned that the Savior would come.
여신께선 초대 팔라딘에게 여러 가지를 남기셨어.{nl}마왕 제스티의 위협이라던가, 지켜야 할 사명이라던가.{nl}그 중엔 구원자가 올 것이라는 말씀도 있었지.{nl}
Goddess meninggalkan banyak hal untuk sang first Paladin.{nl}Ancaman dari demon Queen, Gesti dan tugas untuk melindungi.{nl}Dan diantara itu semua, dia juga diberitahu bahwa savior akan datang.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Royal Mausoleum that was mentioned in the revelation is located too far away from you.{nl}I'll open the portal for you.
계시에서 말하는 왕릉은 그대의 발걸음으론 너무나 먼 곳에 있습니다.{nl}제가 포탈을 열어 드리지요.
Royal tomb yang diberitahukan dalam wahyu itu berada sangat jauh dari sini.{nl}Aku akan membukakan portal untukmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: (You can feel the fading existence around.)
주변에서 무언가 흐릿한 존재가 느껴진다.
Kamu bisa merasakan semua yang disekitar mulai menghilang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Beings that were once invisible are starting to appear...
여태까지 보이지 않던 것들이 보이기 시작한다.
Hal-hal yang tidak terlihat sekarang bisa terlihat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: No responses now.
지금은 아무런 반응이 없다.
Tidak ada respon untuk saat ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The altar is already activating.
이미 제단이 작동중이다.
Altar sudah aktif.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The candlestick is already lit.
이미 촛대에 불이 켜져있다.
Cahaya sudah menyala pada candlestick.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You will need something to light it with...
불을 켤 수 있을 만한 게 필요해 보인다.
Memerlukan sesuatu untuk menyalakannya...

Please select the user requiring a quest: It seems that it is reacting to something lightly.
무언가에 약하게 반응하고 있는 것 같다.
Sepertinya itu bereaksi kepada sesuatu yang bercahaya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The altar is missing something to activate.
제단을 작동하기엔 무언가 부족한거 같다.
Sepertinya ada sesuatu yang kurang untuk mengaktifkan altar.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You feel a great energy coming from the altar.
제단에서 강력한 기운이 느껴진다.
Kekuatan yang besar diarasakan dari altar...

Please select the user requiring a quest: You feel an unknown force.
