Please select the user requiring a quest: Disciple Hones' Memo
제자 호네스의 메모
Memo dari disciple, Hones

Please select the user requiring a quest: If you want to find the master's research, you have to find three spatial magic stones {nl}and activate the fusion device.
스승님의 연구를 찾으려면 세 개의 공간마석을 찾아 마석 융합기를 작동시켜야 해.{nl}
Jika kamu ingin mencari hasil penelitian sang master, kamu harus mencari tiga spatial magic stones dan mengaktifkan fusion device.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Spatial Magic Gem of Contract is at the reception room. {nl}The monsters probably have the fragments. {nl}Collect all the fragments of the magical stones and go to the{nl}preserved magic circle in the Grave of the Saints to restore them.
계약의 공간마석은 접견실에 안치되어 있었는데 최근에 파괴되어 있더군.{nl}아마 몬스터들이 그 파편을 가지고 있을 거야.{nl}마석의 파편을 전부 수거한 뒤 잊혀진 성인의 무덤에 있는 보존 마법진에서 마석을 복원할 수 있어.{nl}
Spatial magic stone of the contract ada di reception room.{nl}Kemungkinan para monster memiliki fragment itu.{nl}Kumpulkan semua fragments of magical stones dan pergilah ke preserved magic field di Grave of the Saints untuk mengembalikan magic stones.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Spatial Magic Gem of Offer is with the Templeshooter. {nl}The Wisdom Guiding Stone will help you find the hidden Templeshooter.
제물의 공간마석은 기억의 신당에 있는 템플슈터 위치가 가지고 있어.{nl}지혜의 인도석이 숨어 있는 템플슈터를 찾을 수 있도록 도울 수 있을 거야.{nl}
Temple Shooter Witches memiliki spatial magic stones of sacrifices.{nl}Guiding stone of wisdom bisa membantu kamu menemukan hidden Temple Shooter.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Spatial Magic Gem of Promise can be found in Siaura Mine. {nl}Use the Soul Crystal on the monsters first to collect their Condensed Spite. {nl}With that, destroy the stones in Siaura Mine. {nl}Black Chasers will pursue from behind, avoid them and go to the end of the mine{nl}to find the magic gem.
약속의 공간마석은 시아우라 갱도에서 찾을 수 있지.{nl}먼저 몬스터에게 영혼의 결정을 사용해서 응축된 원한을 모아.{nl}그걸 가지고 시아우라 갱도에 있는 결계석을 부숴버려.{nl}뒤에서 검은 추적자가 쫓아오겠지만 그걸 피해서 갱도의 끝으로 가면 약속의 공간 마석을 찾을 수 있어.{nl}
Spatial magic stones of the promise dapat ditemukan pada Siaura Mine.{nl}Gunakan essence of the spirit kepada monsters untuk mengumpulkan condensed resentment.{nl}Dengan itu, hancurkan stones di Siaura Mine.{nl}Black chasers mungkin akan mengejar dari belakang, hindari mereka dan pergi ke ujung mine untuk mencari spatial magic stones of the promise.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: When you find all three spatial magic gems, go to the fusion device again,{nl}and place the magic gems there. {nl}The path to the master's research will then open at the Laudi Tower.
이 세 개의 공간 마석을 모두 찾거든 다시 마석 융합기로 돌아가. {nl}모든 마석을 넣으면 라우디 누각에 스승님의 연구를 찾을 수 있는 길이 열릴 거야.
Bila Kamu menemukan semua tiga spatial magic gem, pergi ke fusion device lagi, {nl} dan menempatkan magic gem di sana. {nl} Jalan untuk penelitian master maka akan membuka di Laudi Tower.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Spirit
영혼
Spirit

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please... save us from this horrible contract... {nl}Remove us from this... Contract of Enunciation...
우릴.. 이 끔찍한 계약에서 구해 주..{nl}언명의 계약에서.. 벗어 날..
Tolong...selamatkan kami dari contract yang kejam ini…{nl}Lepaskan...kami dari contract of declaration…

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Contract of Enunciation... {nl} we'll vanish if we speak... I have no regrets...
언명의 계약.. {nl}말을 하면 소멸하고 말아.. 여한은 없어..
Contract of declaration...{nl}itu akan kadaluarsa saat kita bicara...Aku tidak menyesal…

Please select the user requiring a quest: Eternal imprisonment... from the restraints of the contract... {nl}Break... the Pot of Silence...
영원히 벗어날 수 없어.. 계약의 굴레에서..{nl}침묵의 항아리를 어서.. 깨뜨려..
Tidak bisa keluar selamanya… dari jeratan contract…{nl}Hancurkan… Pot of silence…

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Pot of Silence is at Memum Corridor... {nl}I'm so... exhausted...
침묵의 항아리는 메뭄 회랑에..{nl}이젠.. 지쳤어..
Pot of silence berada di Memum Corridor...{nl}Aku...merasa lelah…

Please select the user requiring a quest: Where to start...
어디서부터 얘길 해야 할까..
Darimana aku harus memulainya…

Please select the user requiring a quest: I was a disciple of Agailla Flurry when I was alive. {nl}I didn't have any magical abilities so I couldn't use magic.
나는 생전엔 아가일라 플러리님의 제자였지.{nl}마법적인 재능은 전혀 없어서 마법같은 건 쓰지 못했지만.{nl}
Aku adalah anggota dari Agailla Flurry saat aku masih hidup. {nl}Aku tidak memiliki kemampuan magis sehingga aku tidak dapat menggunakan magic.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: That's why I survived Helgasercle's wrath. {nl}She must've thought she didn't have to kill me since I wasn't able to use magic.
그래서 헬가 세르클의 손에서 살아 남을 수 있었지.{nl}마법을 쓰지 못했기에 제거할 필요조차 없는 제자라고 생각했던 것 같아.{nl}
Itulah mengapa aku tidak bisa selamat dari tangan Helgasercle.{nl}Aku pikir dia tidak akan menghabisiku karena aku tidak bisa menggunakan magic.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I am confident I am better when it comes to theories than other disciples... {nl}That's why I studied magic. And in my studies, I learned of the magic stone of interaction.
대신 이론에는 다른 제자들보단 자신 있었거든.{nl}그래서 마법학을 연구했어. 그러던 도중 교감의 마법석에 대해 알게 되었지.{nl}
Aku sangat percaya akan theories dibandingkan anggota lain.{nl}Karena itulah aku mempelajari magic. Saat aku masih belajar, Aku mengetahui bahwa ada magic stone of interaction.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I came here when Helgasercle attacked the Mage Tower. {nl}I thought that if I could use the magic stone of interaction, I'd be able to use magic.
마법사의 탑에 헬가 세르클이 재차 공격해 왔을 때 이 곳에 왔어.{nl}교감의 마법석을 이용하면 나도 마법을 쓸 수 있을지도 모른다고 생각했거든.{nl}
Aku datang ke sini saat Helgasercle menyerang Mage Tower.{nl}Aku pikir jika aku menggunakan magic stones of interaction, aku jadi bisa menggunakan magic.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: But, Archon drove me away from the Mage Tower. {nl}Due to this disturbance, the magic stone activated defensive magic, linking my,{nl}and Archon's spirit to each other.
하지만 마법사의 탑에서부터 아콘이 추격해왔다.{nl}아콘의 방해로 마법석이 방어 마법을 발동하면서 아콘과 내 영혼이 링크로 묶여버렸지.{nl}
Tetapi, Akon mengejarku dari Mage Tower.{nl}Karena gangguan dari Akon, Magic Stone telah mengaktifkan Defensive Magic {nl}dan Spirits of Akon juga diriku terikat dalam suatu hubungan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: As a result, Archon was sealed and my body disappeared without a trace. {nl}We became shackled to each other.
그 때의 충격으로 아콘은 봉인되고, 내 육체는 흔적도 없이 날아가버렸다. {nl}서로가 서로의 족쇄가 되어버린 셈이지.
Sehingga akhirnya, Akon telah tersegel dan tubuhku menghilang tanpa jejak.{nl}Kami menjadi terbelenggu satu sama lain.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've been tied here for hundreds of years... {nl}Since I can't do anything with my astral body.
마법학에 정통한 내가 수 백년이나 묶여있었다..{nl}영체의 몸으론 아무것도 할 수 없어서이기 때문이지.{nl}
Aku telah terbelenggu di sini selama ratusan tahun?{nl}Sejak aku tidak bisa berbuat apa-apa dengan jiwa yang tidak terlihat seperti ini.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The bigger problem is that Archon was released as well. {nl}I lost the body, but Archon, who is a demon, is still alive.
그보다 더 큰 문제는 아콘도 같이 풀려나기 때문이다.{nl}인간인 나는 육체를 잃었지만 마족인 아콘은 아직 살아있거든.{nl}
Masalah yang lebih besar adalah Akon telah terlepas.{nl}Aku telah kehilangan tubuhku, tapi Akon adalah seorang Demon masih tetap hidup.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Memorial Stone
기록비
Memorial Stone

Please select the user requiring a quest: By avoiding the eyes of Helgasercle, I was able to come here to continue my research. {nl}I needed to find a way. A way to reduce the power of demons and increase that magical power.
헬가 세르클의 눈을 피해 연구를 계속 이어나가려 이 곳으로 왔다.{nl}방법을 찾아야 했다. 마족의 힘을 약화시키고 마력을 증대시킬 수 있는 방법을.{nl}
Dengan menghindari mata dari Helgasercle, aku datang ke sini untuk melanjutkan penelitianku.{nl}Aku harus menemukan cara. Cara untuk mengurangi kekuatan Demon dan meningkatkan magical power.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: By my name, Valius, the one who walks the way of Linker, {nl}I swear that I will not surrender to the demons.
링커의 길을 걷는 나 발류스의 이름을 걸고 끝까지 마족에게 굴복하지 않을 것을 맹세한다.
Dengan namaku, Balryus, yang berjalan di jalur Linker, Aku bersumpah tidak akan menyerah kepada Demon.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've made many magical tools, but I wasn't able to repel the attacks of the demons. {nl}Without checking out the result, I close my eyes.
수많은 마도구를 만들었으나 마족들의 침공을 막을 수 없었다.{nl}결국 그 결과를 확인하지 못한 채 나는 눈을 감노라.{nl}
Aku telah membuat banyak magical tools, tapi aku masih tidak bisa memblokir serangan para demon.{nl}Tanpa memeriksa hasilnya, Aku memejamkan mata.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Records of Investigation
연구기록
Records of investigation

Please select the user requiring a quest: The basics of Linker magic are to find the common factors in each others' spirits. {nl}So it is impossible if the acceptor does not possess any magical abilities or bases. {nl}
링크 마법의 기초는 서로의 영혼에서 공통의 요소를 찾아내는 것이다.{nl}때문에 수용자가 아무런 마법적 재능이나 기초가 없다면 거의 불가능한 일인 셈이다.{nl}
Inti dari Link Magics adalah mencari hubungan dasar dari spirit.{nl}Jadi akan mustahil jika acceptor tidak menguasai dasar dari skill magic.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've completed the first stage magic stone. {nl}It still does not satisfy the previous objective of delivering the perfect magic,{nl}and magical power somewhat.{nl}But now, at last it is possible to accept Linker Magic even without magical ability.{nl}
부족하지만, 초기 단계의 마법석을 완성하였다.{nl}아직은 애초에 의도한 완벽한 마법과 마력의 전달이라는 목표에는 부족하지만, {nl}마법적 재능이 없어도 어느 정도 링크 마법을 받아들이는 것이 가능하게 되었다.{nl}
Meskipun ada sedikit kekurangan, Aku telah menyelesaikan stage pertama magic stone.{nl}Sepertinya ada yang kurang dari tujuan sebelumnya menyalurkan tenaga magic yang sempurna dan kekuatan magic,{nl}tapi sekarang kamu bisa mendapatkan Link Magics meskipun kamu tidak menguasai ilmu magic.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Proposal
계획서
Plan

Please select the user requiring a quest: If a magician finds a way to share all his abilities and knowledge with another, {nl}then even those without magical abilities can become a strong magician,{nl}within a short period of time.
만약 한 마법사가 그의 모든 능력과 지식을 다른 사람에게 전이시킬 방법을 찾아낸다면, 마법적 재능이 없는 사람도 짧은 시간에 강력한 마법사로 만들 수 있을 것이다.{nl}
Jika salah satu magician menemukan cara untuk menyebarkan kemampuan dan pengetahuannya ke orang lain, seseorang yang bahkan tidak tahu ilmu magic bisa menjadi magician yang kuat dalam waktu singkat.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: This way, you'd be able to hide from the eyes of Helgasercle,{nl}who is extremely afraid of the disciple of Agailla Flurry appearing.
이 방법이라면 아가일라 플러리님의 제자가 출현하는 것을 극도로 경계하는 헬가 세르클의 눈을 피할 수 있을 것이다.{nl}
Dengan metode ini, kamu dapat menghindari eyes of Helgasercle yang sangat takut terhadap kemunculan The disciple of Agailla Flurry.

Please select the user requiring a quest: However, I'm not sure if this is at all possible or whether or not it will have any side effects.
다만 이것이 실제로 가능한지, 부작용은 없는지는 아직 미지수이다.{nl}
Tapi, Aku tidak tahu apakah ini akan berhasil dan mungkin ada efek sampingnya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Design Proposal
설계도면
Design Plan

Please select the user requiring a quest: The magic stone of the interaction can be made to work on the behalf of a Linker. {nl}However, maintaining the stone of interaction requires a considerable amount of magical power.
교감의 마법석은 링크된 자가 부담해야 할 마법적 처리를 대신 부담해줄 수 있다.{nl}하지만 그렇기 때문에 이 교감의 마법석을 유지하는데는 많은 마력이 필요하다.{nl}
Magic stone of the interaction dapat bekerja dengan kemampuan Link.{nl}Tapi, dibutuhkan banyak kekuatan magic untuk menjaga the magic stone of the interaction agar tetap bekerja.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hence, we decided to maintain the magic stone of the interaction {nl}with 12 regenerating magical power stones. {nl}If no problems arise, we will be able to maintain it, but if the magical power supply is cut, {nl}it won't last long.
그래서 12개의 마력 재생석으로 교감의 마법석을 유지하기로 하였다.{nl}이 마력 재생석에 문제가 없는 한 교감의 마법석을 유지할 수 있겠지만 마력 재생석에서 공급되는 마력이 끊어진다면 얼마 버티지 못할 것이다.{nl}
Jadi kami memutuskan untuk menjaga Magic stone of the interaction dengan 12 regenerating magical power stone.{nl}Jika kita tidak menemukan masalah, maka kita dapat melanjutkan untuk terus menerus menjaga magical stone of the interaction, tapi jika magical power berhenti memberikan tenaga, itu tidak akan bertahan lama.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Adrijus' Notice Board
아드리유스의 알림판
Notice Board of Adrius

Please select the user requiring a quest: I am looking for a stone rubbing of the tablet at the central sanctum. {nl}If you find any tablets with writings engraved, make a rubbing off of it. {nl}- Adrijus
중앙 성소에서 비석 탁본을 구하고 있습니다.{nl}무언가 새겨진 비석을 발견하시거든 탁본을 떠서 제게 가져다 주세요.{nl}- 아드리유스
Aku mencari salinan dari tombstone di central sanctum.{nl}Jika kamu menemukan tombstone dengan sesuatu yang tertulis diatasnya, buatlah salinan dari tulisan itu.{nl}- Adrius

Please select the user requiring a quest: Stained Tablet
얼룩이 남은 비석
Tombstone dengan bercak

Please select the user requiring a quest: It seems that someone has already made a rubbing since there is a vague trace of ink. {nl}Shall I read it?
누군가 이미 탁본을 떴는지 희미하게 먹물 자국이 남아 있다.{nl}읽어 볼까?
Sepertinya seseorang telah membuat salinan karena terlihat sisa vague ink.{nl}Mari kita baca.

Please select the user requiring a quest: King Kadumel finally dies.
카듀멜 국왕이 마침내 죽으리라.
King Kadumel akhirnya gugur.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Instead of the Mage Tower, the Tower of Fire would be a more fitting name for Flurry's tower.
플러리의 탑은 마법사의 탑이 아니라 불의 탑이 그 명칭에 더 적합하리라.
Daripada Mage Tower, Tower of Fire sebutannya lebih cocok untuk Tower of Flurry.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This is a very secluded area so monsters usually prey around here. {nl}Be careful around here.
여긴 워낙 외진 곳이라 몬스터들이 정말 마구 덤벼든다고.{nl}늘 조심해.
Tempat ini sangat terisolasi, jadi monster sering menyerang tempat ini.{nl}Berhati-hatilah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Research Records of Demetrius
데메트리우스의 연구 기록
The research records of Demetrius

Please select the user requiring a quest: In ancient times, humans lived with the goddesses. {nl}When I first heard of this piece of folklore, {nl}I thought it was made up out of respect for the goddesses. {nl}{nl}I started to investigate what historic background caused such reverence, {nl}as well as why this myth was created.
태고의 인간들은 여신과 함께 거주하였다.{nl}처음에 이 전승을 접했을 때는 단순히 여신에 대한 동경으로 인해 만들어진 이야기라고 생각했다.{nl}과거의 어떤 시대적 배경이 그런 동경을 조성했고, 그로 인해 이런 전승이 만들어졌는지 그 원인을 탐구하기 시작하였다.{nl}{nl}
Jaman dahulu, manusia hidup berdampingan dengan Goddess .{nl}Pada saat pertama kali aku menemukan kisah ini, Aku berpikir bahwa cerita ini dibuat hanya untuk menghormati Goddess .{nl}Aku mulai melakukan investigasi dan mencari kenapa mereka sangat menghormati Goddess , dan juga alasan kenapa cerita ini dibuat.{nl}{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I increased the extent of my research. {nl}I traveled to many regions of the kingdom and collected similar cases. {nl}And I started to believe that this story was part of a bigger truth rather {nl}than just a small truth covered in fabrication.
나는 연구의 범위를 넓혔다.{nl}왕국의 많은 지역을 직접 다니며 유사한 다른 사례를 수집하였다.{nl}그리고 그 실체는 이 전승이 어떤 진실을 담고 있는 것을 넘어서 더 큰 진실의 일부라는 생각이 확고해졌다.{nl}
Aku meningkatkan tingkat penelitian aku. {nl} aku melakukan perjalanan ke berbagai daerah kerajaan dan dikumpulkan kasus serupa. {nl} Dan aku mulai percaya bahwa cerita ini adalah bagian dari kebenaran yang lebih besar agak {nl} dari sekedar kebenaran kecil tertutup fabrikasi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The facts that we've discovered so far are thus: {nl}{nl}In the beginning, or a period not that far from the beginning, {nl}all humans used to live with the goddesses underground. {nl}I suppose the goddesses used to be more directly involved with humans. {nl}I have no idea why but soon, the humans left that place and scattered across the land.
그간 밝혀낸 사실을 적자면 다음과 같다.{nl}{nl}태초, 혹은 그와 얼마 멀지 않은 시기에 모든 인간들은 여신들과 함께 지하의 거주처에 있었다.{nl}아마도 지금보다 더 직접적인 보살핌을 넘어서 통치에 이르렀을 것이다.{nl}그리고 그 이유는 알 수 없으나 인간들은 그 장소에서 나와 여신의 인도하에 지상의 곳곳으로 흩어져 정착하기 시작하였다.{nl}{nl}
Fakta yang telah kami temukan kurang lebih seperti ini.{nl}{nl}Pada awalnya, atau periode yang sangat dekat dengan permulaan, semua manusia hidup bersama Goddess  dibawah tanah.{nl}Aku rasa para Goddess  memelihara dan melindungi manusia dengan kasih sayang.{nl}Dan aku tidak tahu alasannya, tetapi para manusia mulai keluar dari tempat itu dan menyebar ke berbagai daerah dan tempat.{nl}{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: This movement was made very naturally. {nl}If that hadn't been the case, then there must have been conflicts, {nl}and more fables would have been created as a result.
이 이동은 매우 자연스럽게 이루어졌다고 보고 있다.{nl}그렇지 않다면 틀림없이 갈등이 있었을 테고, 지금보다 더 많은 설화를 낳았을 것이기 때문이다.{nl}{nl}
Gerakan ini dibuat sangat alami. {nl} Jika itu tidak pernah terjadi, maka pasti ada konflik, {nl} dan lebih dongeng akan telah dibuat sebagai hasilnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I believe the goddesses erased all memory and records of that time completely. {nl}However, we can't deny the possibility that another reason may exist {nl}due to the fact that this legend still remains despite the authority of the great goddesses.
아마도 인간의 그 때의 모든 기억과 기록을 여신께서 완전히 지웠을 것이라 추측한다.{nl}하지만 위대하신 여신의 권능에도 불구하고 전승이 남아있다는 점에서 어쩌면 여신이 아닌 다른 원인이 있었을 가능성도 배제할 수 없다.{nl}{nl}
Aku memperkirakan bahwa para Goddess  menghapus semua ingatan dari manusia tentang hal itu.{nl}Namun bagaimanapun, kita tidak bisa menghilangkan kemungkinan bahwa cerita itu masih dapat dibuat meskipun sudah dicegah oleh kekuatan Goddess  yang agung.{nl}{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: And this is a very cautious prediction, but the creatures that we call demons{nl}may exist underground. {nl}{nl}Though that theory is hard to accept when we think about all the facts {nl}that are recorded in history and the present.
또한 매우 조심스러운 추측이지만, 이 지하 거주처에서 어쩌면 우리가 마신이라 부르는 존재들도 함께 거주했을지도 모른다.{nl}그러나 역사에 기록된 모든 사실이나 현재에 비추어 보면, 극히 받아들이기 어려운 가설이다.
Dan ini perkiraan yang paling berbahaya, mahluk yang kita sebut Demon mungkin hidup dibawah tanah.{nl}Namun, itu adalah teori yang cukup sulit kita terima karena fakta yang ada di sejarah berbeda dengan keadaan saat ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I can smell many Avietes. I heard they're effective... Could you share them with us?

Aku mencium aroma Avietes. Aku dengar itu sangat efektif?Maukah kamu berbagi dengan kami?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thank you. I will give you as many as you need. {nl}You will be successful.

Terima kasih. Aku akan memberikanmu sebanyak yang kamu butuhkan.{nl}Kamu akan sukses.

내어 드릴게요.{nl}성공할 거예요.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ah, you're the one Adrijus sent. {nl}I've obtained the diluting solution he ordered. {nl}Be careful not to break the glass.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I lie here without yet creating thirteen thousand pieces of armor. {nl}I hope to finish them alongside the goddesses.
만 삼천개의 갑옷을 완성하지 못한 채 이 곳에 눕다.{nl}부디 여신의 곁에서 완성할 수 있길 바라며.
Terbaring disini tanpa menyelesaikan tiga belas ribu armor.{nl}Aku harap aku bisa menyelesaikannya di sisi Goddess .

Please select the user requiring a quest: The monsters will feel threatened by the energies that spurt out from the crystals {nl}containing my authority and begin their attack.

Para monster akan merasa terancam karena energi yang keluar dari crystals yang menyimpan kekuatanku dan mulai menyerang.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please protect the crystals so that they may produce my authority, {nl}and spread it to Sirdgela Forest.
제 권능이 수정에서 빠져나와 시르드겔라 숲에 퍼질 수 있도록 수정을 지켜주십시오.
Tolong lindungi crystals jadi kekuatanku yang ada di dalam crystals dapat menyebar ke Sirudgellar Forest.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You prepared this, brother? You're truly a great man.

발화 기초

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ignition differs by elements, but with the blessing from the goddess, there may be cases where we can ignore that. {nl}To do so, we should try hard to achieve the scholarly knowledge and the faithfulness to the goddesses.
발화는 대상이 되는 원소마다 차이가 있지만 여신의 은총에 따라 그것을 무시하는 경우도 발생한다.{nl}이를 위해선 높은 학문적 성취에 여신에 대한 신앙의지를 병행해야 할 것이다.
Ignition terbagi berdasarkan element, tapi karena berkat dari Goddess , kita tidak perlu memikirkannya.{nl}Supaya bisa berhasil, kita harus berusaha keras dan mencapai Scholarly knowledge dan kepercayaan kepada Goddess .

1. Lingkungan yang kering{nl}2. Sesuatu yang sudah lapuk.{nl}3. Mana yang cukup{nl}4. Berkat dari Goddesses

Flurry?Dia menghilang menjadi abu saat mencoba mengeluarkan kekuatan cahaya yang hebat.{nl}Apakah itu karena Demon? {nl}Aku tidak tahu begitu banyak karena aku wizard pemula.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: [Caution]{nl}- It is the last stage of the experiment. Be cautious when handling it -

[Perhatian]{nl}- Ini adalah tingkat terakhir dari eksperimen. Berhati-hatilah saat mencobanya -

Please select the user requiring a quest: 1. Do not overreact Schilt Essences into a sample of Petrification Detector. {nl}2. Do not keep the Schilt Amplifier activated for a long time. {nl}3. Even if you become immune to petrification using the Schilt Amplifier, it will only be temporary, so do not stay in the lab room for too long.
1. 석화 탐지기 견본에 실트 결정체를 과다 반응시키지 마시오.{nl}2. 실트 증폭기를 장시간 가동하지 마시오.{nl}3. 실트 증폭기를 통해 석화에 면연되더라도 잠시 뿐이니 격리 실험실에 장시간 있지 마시오.
1. Jangan menggunakan reaksi berlebihan pada Schilt Essences ke dalam sample of Petrification Detector.{nl}2. Jangan mengaktifkan Schilt amplifier dalam waktu yang lama.{nl}3. Meskipun kami menjadi immun terhadap Petrification by Schilt amplifier, itu hanya berlangsung sementara jadi jangan terlalu lama berada di lab.

Please select the user requiring a quest: [Usage Limit]{nl}- Due to a recent incident, we sealed the isolated lab room. {nl}Only people permitted by the chief can enter the room via the portal.
[사용제한]{nl}- 최근 사건으로 인해 격리 실험실을 봉쇄했습니다.{nl}단장에게 허가받은 인원에 한하여 포탈을 통해서만 출입이 가능합니다.-
[Terbatas]{nl}- Karena kecelakaan sebelumnya, kami menyegel isolated lab room. {nl}Hanya orang yang diizinkan oleh chief yang dapat masuk ke ruangan lewat portal.

Please select the user requiring a quest: [Method of Usage]{nl}1. Use the Schilt Essences on the portal generator. {nl}2. One person can enter after a certain number of Essences are used. {nl}3. When more than one person enters simultaneously, please notify and ask the chief.
[사용방법]{nl}1. 제공받은 실트 결정을 포탈 동력기에 사용하시오.{nl}2. 일정 수량을 사용해야 한 명이 들어갈 수 있음.{nl}3. 다수의 인원이 출입할 경우 단장에게 문의바람.
[Metode Penggunaan]{nl}1. Gunakan Schilt Essences ke portal generator.{nl}2. Satu orang bisa masuk jika sejumlah Essences digunakan.{nl}3. Jika bersama lebih dari satu orang, hubungi chief.

움직임이 가벼워졌다.
Kita dapat bergerak lebih cepat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We tried our best to impede them until your arrival. {nl}But as you can see, we're at our limit.
계시자님을 기다리는 동안 어떻게든 그들을 방해해왔습니다만.{nl}보시다시피 이런 몸인지라 한계에 다다른 상황입니다.
Kami sudah berusaha sebaik mungkin menghalangi mereka saat menunggumu. {nl}Namun seperti yang kamu lihat, kami sudah tidak mampu lagi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've received your letter. {nl}Now is the chance the goddesses gave to you since Legwyn is dead. {nl}It's great to hear that the lads of the Legwyn family trust you.
자네의 편지는 잘 받았네.{nl}르귄이 목숨을 잃은 지금이 바로 여신께서 주신 기회일세.{nl}당주 잃은 르귄가의 잔챙이들이 자네를 신뢰하고 있다니 다행이군.{nl}
Aku telah menerima suratmu.{nl}Ini adalah saatnya dimana Goddesses mengutusmu semenjak kematian Legwyn.{nl}Sangat beruntung karena kerabat dan keluarga Legwyn mempercayaimu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've changed the name on this certificate for you so return the rest of documents to me. {nl}I guarantee either his assets or his land document. {nl}Please pay me the deposit as you did last time.
이 권리증은 자네 이름으로 내가 변경했으니 나머지 문서들도 보내 놓게.{nl}그의 재산이라던가 땅문서도 내가 보증하겠네.{nl}착수금은 저번의 방식대로 지불하도록 하지.{nl}
Aku telah mengganti nama pada certificate untukmu jadi berikan sisa dokumen kepadaku.{nl}Aku akan menjamin aset miliknya atau surat tanahnya.{nl}Silahkan bayar padaku depost seperti waktu itu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Anyone under the Legwyn name can't be left alive. Even their servants. {nl}Please, get rid of Legwyn's daughter. She is the Squire Master.
르귄의 이름은 단 한명도 살아남아선 안 되네. 하인들까지 말이네.{nl}스콰이어 마스터라는 르귄의 딸도 반드시 처리하도록.
Semua dengan nama Legwyn, tidak boleh hidup. Bahkan pesuruhnya.{nl}Tolong kalahkan anak perempuan Legwyn yang seorang Squire Master.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Mysterious Man
의문의 남자
Orang Mencurigakan

Please select the user requiring a quest: It seems that you don't have a problem moving your body. {nl}You almost got into deep trouble.
보아하니 몸을 움직이는 덴 별 지장은 없는 모양이군.{nl}당신 정말 큰일날 뻔 했소.
Sepertinya kamu tidak punya kesulitan menggerakkan tubuhmu.{nl}Kamu hampir saja terjebak masalah besar.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ah, I am Mintz. I lead the Hunters. {nl}If it's fine with you, I want to have a talk at my camp at Dumvala Crossroads.
아, 나는 민츠라는 사람이오. 헌터들을 이끌고 있지.{nl}괜찮다면 덤발라 사거리에 있는 내 캠프에서 이야기를 좀 나눴으면 하오.
Ah, Aku di panggil Mints. Aku memimpin para hunter.{nl}Jika kamu baik-baik saja, aku ingin mengajakmu ke camp yang terletak di Dumbala Intersections.

Please select the user requiring a quest: For now, there is no way to help the patient.
지금으로서는 환자를 도울 방법이 없을 것 같습니다.
Saat ini, tidak ada cara untuk menolong pasien.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Have you tried giving the antidote?
해독제는 먹여 보았소?
Apakah kamu sudah memberikannya antidote?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please go to Viltis Forest after persuading the senior monk.
선임 수도사의 설득이 끝나면 빌티스 숲으로 가주시기 바라오.
Setelah membujuk senior monk, tolong pergi ke Viltis Forest.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thanks! {nl}I ran away without noticing my bag was ripped by the thorns.
감사합니다!{nl}가방이 가시에 걸려 찢어진것도 모르고 부리나케 도망치다보니...
Terima kasih!{nl}Aku berlari tanpa tersadar tas ku robek terkena semak belukar.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We ran away from Laukyme Swamp. {nl}When you find the pages of the documents from Ershike Path to Dumvala Crossroads, {nl}please bring them to me.
저희는 라우키메 저습지 쪽에서 도망쳐 왔습니다.{nl}에르쉬케 오솔길부터 덤발라 사거리 사이에서 서류 낱장을 발견하시면 가져다 주시기 바랍니다.
Kami lari dari Raukime Swamp.{nl}Saat kamu menemukan halaman dokumen dari Ershike Trail ke Dumbala Intersections, tolong bawakan padaku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: No. That cannot be done. {nl}I don't have anything more to say about the expulsion, {nl}until I retake the monastery and save the abbot.
아무리 그러셔도 안되는 건 안되는 겁니다.{nl}수도원을 되찾고, 원장님을 구출하기 전엔 추방건에 대해선 더 이상 할 말이 없습니다.
Itu tidak dapat terjadi.{nl}Aku tidak bisa mengatakan apapun tentang expulsion sebelum aku mendapatkan kembali monastery dan menyelamatkan director.

Please select the user requiring a quest: What? You're going with the Hunters? {nl}Well... I don't approve, but I guess I can't do anything about it.{nl}Since Marko told you that he'd go with them... Okay.
네? 헌터들과 함께한다고요?{nl}전 좀 별론데요. 일단 마르코님이 그러시겠다니 어쩔 수 없습니다만은.. 알겠습니다.
Apa? Kamu akan pergi dengan para Hunter?{nl}Hmm, Aku tidak setuju sebenarnya. Tapi, sepertinya aku tidak berbuat apa-apa sejak Marko bilang akan pergi dengan mereka?Oke.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Are you going to retake the monastery with the Hunters?{nl}That's good news, but I guess that means Marko changed his mind, huh?
헌터들과 함께 수도원을 되찾는다고요?{nl}좋은 소식이긴 합니다만, 마르코님이 마음이 바뀌셨나보죠?
Apakah kamu ingin merebut kembali monastery dengan para hunter?{nl}Itu berita bagus, tapi perkiraanku pasti Marko berubah pikiran bukan?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm worried about the abbot of the monastery who should be at the prayer room. {nl}I don't know if the Hunters can be trusted...
안그래도 기도실에 계신 수도원장님이 걱정되었는데 잘 되었군요.{nl}헌터들이 믿을만한 사람들인진 잘 모르겠지만..
Aku khawatir akan chief of the monastery yang ada di prayer room.{nl}Aku tidak tahu apakah para hunter bisa dipercaya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know if it's going to be okay. {nl}It feels like the outsiders are swinging us around... {nl}I know Marko is clever, so we should trust him.
정말 이래도 괜찮은건지 모르겠습니다.{nl}외부인에게 휘둘리는 느낌이라.. 뭐 마르코님은 현명하신 분이니까 믿어야겠죠.
Aku tidak tahu kalau semua akan baik-baik saja.{nl}Rasanya seperti orang luar yang memperdaya kita?Baiklah, Aku tahu Marko itu kamu dan aku percaya padanya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: At any rate, we will trust Marko's orders. {nl}It's good that we've got reliable reinforcements now.
어쨌든 저흰 마르코님의 명령을 따를겁니다.{nl}든든한 지원군이 생겨서 좋군요.
Lagipula, kita harus percaya dengan perintah Marko.{nl}Bagus jika kita mempunyai pasukan yang bisa diandalkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Also, it's important to retake the monastery as soon as possible. {nl}The safety of the monastery's is critical.
어쨌든 빨리 수도원을 되찾는게 중요하죠.{nl}뭐든 수도원장님의 안위가 제일 중요한 게 아니겠습니까.
Dan, sangat penting untuk merebut kembali monastery secepatnya.{nl}Keselamatan dari chief of the monastery adalah yang paling penting.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unknown traveler. Falls down under the nameless poison.{nl}Now, stop this journey and rest in peace in the arms of the goddesses.
이름 없는 나그네. 이름 없는 독에 스러지다.{nl}이제 그만 여행을 멈추고 여신의 품에서 편히 쉬길.{nl}
Pengelana tanpa identitas. Tumbang akibat racun yang tidak diketahui.{nl}Sekarang berhenti berkelana dan istirahat dengan damai atas nama Goddess .

Please select the user requiring a quest: Biblam the Farmer. {nl}He, who took care of his neighbors more than himself, rests here.
자신보다 주변을 우선하던 농부 비블람.{nl}여기에 잠들다.
Sang petani, Biblam yang sangat peduli kepada orang lain ketimbang dirinya sendiri.{nl}Tidur disini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm going to go to the arms of you who I longed for for a long time. {nl}With your bow and dagger. {nl}{nl}From, {nl}Siana.
나는 이제 그토록 그리던 당신의 품으로 갈 거예요.{nl}당신의 활과 함께. 당신의 단검과 함께. 시아나가.
Aku akan pergi ke tempat dimana aku telah menunggumu dalam waktu yang lama.{nl}Dengan bow dan dagger milikmu. Dari Siana.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The young tailor, Godan, who was born in Fedimian, rests in the Tilda Monastery.
페디미안 태생의 젊은 재봉사 고단.{nl}틸다 수도원에서 잠들다.{nl}
Sang Tailor muda Godan yang lahir di Fedimian.{nl}Tidur didalam Tilda Monastery.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Mighty goddess. {nl}I am finally free. {nl} - Tenant Farmer Tila
전능하신 여신이시여.{nl}저는 마침내 자유로워졌습니다. {nl}- 소작농 틸라
Goddess yang kuat.{nl}Akhirnya aku bebas. {nl}- Tenant Farmer Tila

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thank you. {nl}If their number could be reduced by even a bit, I'd feel more relaxed.
감사합니다.{nl}숫자를 조금 줄여주시기만 해도 목숨의 위협은 덜 것 같습니다.
Terima kasih.{nl}Jika jumlah mereka bisa dikurangin, Aku bisa merasa lebih lega.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thanks. {nl}If you see any bubble that spurts out air, it means that there are spiny water chestnuts. {nl}Please bring me the roots of those.
감사합니다.{nl}물이 고인 장소에서 공기를 뿜어내는 거품을 보신다면 가시마름이 있다는 뜻입니다.{nl}그 뿌리를 가져와 주세요.
Terima kasih.{nl}Jika kamu melihat ada gelembung udara yang keluar, berarti terdapat spiney water chestnuts.{nl}Tolong bawakan akar dari tanaman itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Really? {nl}If you can help me, I'll do anything I can.
정말입니까?{nl}도와주신다면 제가 할 수 있는 건 다 해드리겠습니다.
Benarkah?{nl}Jika kamu bisa membantuku, Aku akan melakukan apapun yang kubisa.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We've retaken the hall. {nl}Let's keep moving forward!
일단 전당은 확보했습니다.{nl}계속해서 가지요!
Kita telah merebut bagian Hall.{nl}Terus lanjutkan!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Quickly, let's save the abbot!
원장님을 빨리 구합시다!
Cepat selamatkan chief!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Finally, the time to retake the monastery has come.
드디어 수도원을 되찾을 때가 왔습니다.
Akhirnya, saat untuk merebut monastery kembali telah datang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I shall go with the Revelator. {nl}Let's do this as best as we can.
난 계시자님과 함께 가겠소.{nl}잘해 봅시다.
Aku akan pergi bersama Savior.{nl}Ayo kita selesaikan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Let's run fast from the next corridor. {nl}I know you're exhausted, but hang on! We're almost there.
다음 복도부터는 한 번에 달려가지요.{nl}힘겨운 상황이지만 얼마 남지 않았습니다.
Lari secepatnya pada koridor di depan.{nl}Aku tahu kamu merasa lelah, tapi kita hampir sampai.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'll block the monsters that are rushing in here. {nl}You and Goss move up first.
나는 여기서 몰려오는 몬스터들을 막겠소.{nl}계시자님과 거스님은 먼저 위로 올라가시오.
Aku akan memblokir monster yang menuju kemari.{nl}Kamu dan Gus pergi lebih dulu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thanks. {nl}I saw the Moheim brothers enter the monastery a while ago. {nl}Looking after the important objects is also their responsibility, so you better ask them.
감사합니다.{nl}아까 수도사 모하임 형제가 수도원 안에 진입하는 것을 보았습니다.{nl}중요 물건의 보관임무에 그도 있었으니 그에게 물어보시는 것이 좋을 것 같습니다.
Terima kasih.{nl}Aku melihat Moheim brothers masuk ke dalam monastery sesaat yang lalu.{nl}Mereka juga bertanggung jawab dalam menyimpan objek-objek yang penting, sebaiknya kamu tanyakan mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm sorry I bothered you. {nl}The boxes are lined up inside the reception room.
수고스럽게 해 드려서 죄송합니다.{nl}상자들은 안쪽 응접실 안에 정렬되어 있을 겁니다.
Maaf mengganggumu.{nl}Box berada di dalam reception room.

Please select the user requiring a quest: So you've come. {nl}Please give me the Crystal Ball.
찾아오셨군요.{nl}수정구를 제게 주시지요.
Kamu telah tiba.{nl}Tolong berikan Crystal Ball padaku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Darn! Until the bitter end... {nl}You two! Follow that guy! {nl}The rest of you, help me!
이런! 끝까지..{nl}너희 둘은 저 녀석을 쫓고 나머지는 날 도와!
Sial! Sampai akhir?nl}Kalian berdua ikuti orang itu dan sisanya bantu aku!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Concerned Hunter
동료를 살피는 헌터
Hunter yang membantu sahabatnya

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hey...! Get a hold of yourself!
이봐...! 정신차려!
Hei? Jangan pergi dulu!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thank you. I have far too many things to do... {nl}I have to sort out the green cover pages, but I can't find any. {nl}Please look for them around the furniture inside the monastery.
감사합니다. 제가 작업할 것이 워낙 많아서...{nl}녹색 표지를 분류해야 하는데 마침 한 권도 보이질 않는군요.{nl}수도원 실내의 가구에서 찾아봐 주세요.
Terima kasih. Aku punya banyak pekerjaan?nl}Aku harus memilah green cover pages, tapi aku tidak menemukan satupun.{nl}Tolong carikan untukku di dalam furnitur pada monastery.

Please select the user requiring a quest: For what reason did you visit this cursed city? {nl}Go back if you have none.
이 저주받은 도시엔 무슨 일이십니까.{nl}특별한 용건이 없다면 돌아가 주십시오.
Apa tujuanmu mengunjungi kota terkutuk ini?{nl}Pergilah jika kamu tidak punya tujuan yang jelas.

Please select the user requiring a quest: So, you are the famous Revelator. {nl}I have definitely heard about you before.
계시자셨습니까. {nl}확실히 당신의 이야기는 들은 적이 있습니다.{nl}
Jadi kamu adalah Savior yang terkenal itu. {nl}Aku pernah mendengar tentang dirimu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I shall temporarily permit your entrance. {nl}The Knights of Kaliss are looking for competent people like you.
일단은 통과시켜 드리겠습니다. {nl}마침 칼리스 기사단에서 유능한 사람을 찾고 있으니까요.
Aku akan memberikan ijin masuk sementara kepadamu. {nl}Caliss knightage sedang mencari orang yang berkompeten sepertimu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: However, all the authority here belongs to our Royal Army.{nl}Please behave well.
단. 이 곳의 모든 권한은 우리 왕국군에게 있습니다.{nl}알아서 잘 처신하시길.
Tapi, semua otoritas disini adalah milik kingdom military.{nl}Aku harap kamu dapat bersikap baik.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Saltistter? What are you talking about? {nl}Such nonsense you speak...
살티스터라니, 그게 무슨 소립니까?{nl}말도 안 되는 소리를..
Saltistter? Apa yang kamu bicarakan?{nl}Yang kamu bicarakan tidak masuk akal tau?

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Gambler of Klaipeda
클라페다의 내기꾼{/} {nl}(A Wagerer of Klaipeda)
Pertaruhan sportif di Klaipeda {/} {nl} (A Wagerer of Klaipeda)

Please select the user requiring a quest: Modestas admitted defeat and said he'd pay him pay back. As he was leaving the place with wagon in tow, the old alchemist broke into a strange smile that caught Modestas' attention.
모데스타스씨가 패배를 인정하고 약속대로 나중에 갚겠다고 말하고, 말과 수레를 끌고 떠나려 할 때 늙은 알케미스트가 알 수 없는 미소를 지으며 모데스타스 주의를 환기해 자기를 보게 했습니다.{nl}
Menyelidiki Miners' Village

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please enter the name of your companion.
컴패니언 이름을 입력해주세요.
Masukkan nama companionmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Companions can help you in combat. {nl}You can make your companions watch you or teach them special attributes.
컴패니언은 당신의 전투를 도와줄 수 있어요.{nl}컴패니언에게 당신이 싸우는 것을 옆에서 지켜 보게 하거나 특성 훈련을 시킬 수도 있지요.{nl}
Companions dapat membantu kamu dalam pertarungan. {nl}Kamu dapat membuat companion belajar dan melatih special Attribute.

Please select the user requiring a quest: What do you think? They make a pretty good friend, right? {nl}But, do take note that only certain classes can ride companions. {nl}
어때요. 이만 하면 당신의 멋진 동반자가 아닐까요?{nl}하지만 컴패니언을 타는 건 특정 클래스만 가능하니 이 점은 유의바랄게요.{nl}
Bagaimana menurutmu? Mereka bisa menjadi teman yang baik, bukan? {nl}Tapi catatan, hanya class tertentu yang dapat menunggangi Companion. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Item Merchant
잡화 상인
Item Merchant

Please select the user requiring a quest: I am sorry, but I can't come forward myself. {nl}It's just... if I use magic, the demons will sense it.
제가 직접 나서지 못해서 정말 미안해요.{nl}하지만 제가 마법을 쓴다면 마족들이 금새 알아차릴 거예요.
Maaf aku tidak bisa mendapatkannya dengan cepat. {Nl} Namun aku akan mencari cara untuk menangani masalah ini secepatnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I will correct the disrupted magic of this tower.{nl} I will have to use magic at first so monsters will rush in. Please protect me.
지금부터 탑의 뒤틀린 마력을 바로잡겠어요.{nl}처음엔 어쩔 수 없이 마력을 써야 하니 몬스터들이 몰려올 거예요. 잘 지켜주세요.
Aku tertangkap saat pergi ke Mage Tower. {Nl} Sepertinya monster itu berdatangan karena ada kekuatan magic. Berhati-hatilah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I hope Goddess Gabija is safe... Let's hurry.
가비야님께서 제발 무사하셔야 할 텐데.. 빨리 가요.
Apakah Gabija baik-baik saja?Ayo cepat kita bergerak.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't have a good feeling about it. That vibration...{nl}Let's move quickly for now.
예감이 좋지 않아요. 그 진동.. {nl}일단 빨리 움직여요.
Perasaanku tidak enak. Getaran apa itu?nl}Sebaiknya kita cepat pergi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We can help Goddess Gabija if we have the Jewel of Prominence.
홍염의 보석만 있으면 가비야님께 큰 힘이 되어드릴 수 있어요.
Jika kamu mempunyai jewels of Prominence, mungkin itu dapat membantu Gabija.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The goddess has reached her limit.{nl}We should give her the Jewel of Prominence as quickly as possible.
여신께선 이미 한계에요.{nl}어떻게든 홍염의 보석을 빨리 전해드려야 해요.
Goddess telah mencapai batas kekuatan.{nl}Kita harus memberikannya jewels of prominence secepatnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: That vibration... It's serious.
아까 그 진동.. 심상치 않아요.
Getaran itu? Sepertinya ini serius.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Let's quickly go to Magic Control Room.{nl}I will be able to control the magic of the tower.
빨리 마력 제어실로 가요.{nl}탑의 마력을 제어하는 것 정도라면 저도 할 수 있어요.
Cepat pergi ke Magic Control Room.{nl}Aku bisa mengendalikan kekuatan magic dari tower itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's fortunate that the Magic Control Room is near.{nl}Let's go quickly.
마력 제어실이 가까워서 그나마 다행이에요.{nl}어서 가요.
Untungnya Magic Control Room berada di dekat sini.{nl}Ayo cepat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: My other disciple, Laius, is clever and a fast learner but has an insatiable greed for knowledge. I am worried that he may fail the task. {nl}A scholar should always try to learn, but obsessing about it will make one walk the wrong path.
나의 또 다른 수제자인 라이어스는 총명하고 이해력과 판단력이 훌륭하나 지식에 대한 욕심이 과하여 일을 그르칠 수 있다는 걱정이 든다.{nl}지식의 갈구하는 학자로서 당연히 갖춰야 할 자세이나 그것이 과하면 비뚤어진 길을 걸을 뿐이다. {nl}
Pengikutku yang lain, Raius sangat pandai dan cepat mengerti, namun ketamakan akan ilmu telah merusaknya.{nl}Sebagai scholar yang selalu mencari ilmu pengetahuan yang baru, itu sikap yang baik, tapi itu berlebihan, sepertinya dia memilih jalan hidup yang salah. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Among my disciples, two of them followed me until my later years and will be my successors after my death.
나의 제자 가운데 말년에 이른 지금까지 나를 따르고, 내가 죽은 뒤에도 그 성과를 이어받을 제자는 두 사람이다. {nl}
Tetapi, Raius adalah murid yang aku kenal.{nl}Hasrat dia terhadap ilmu pengetahuan diarahkan dengan cara yang salah.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Suspicious Tombstone
수상한 비석
Hones, adalah salah satu dari mereka, tidak begitu pintar dalam ilmu scholar, tapi aku yakin usaha dan kepercayaannya akan membuat dia percaya padaku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: When small things are gathered one by one, they will one day become a great power.
작은 것이 하나 둘씩 모이면 언젠가는 큰 힘이 되리라.
Sedikit demi sedikit kekuatan dikumpulkan, akan menjadi kekuatan yang besar suatu hari nanti.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Suspicious Stone Pole
수상한 돌기둥
Stone Pole yang mencurigakan

Please select the user requiring a quest: The one Gabija is waiting for... has he come yet?
가비야님께서 기다리시는 그분은 아직인걸까..
Seseorang yang ditunggu Gabija?apakah dia telah datang?

Please select the user requiring a quest: [Caution]{nl}- It is the last stage of the experiment. Be cautious when handling it -{nl}
[취급주의]{nl}- 실험의 마지막 단계입니다. 취급을 주의해 주십시오. -{nl}
[Perhatian]{nl}- Ini adalah tingkat terakhir dari eksperimen. Berhati-hatilah saat mencobanya -{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: 1. Do not overreact Schilt Essences into a sample of Petrification Detector. {nl}2. Do not keep the Schilt Amplifier activated for a long time. {nl}3. Even if you become immune to petrification using the Schilt Amplifier, {nl}it will only be temporary, so do not stay in the lab room for too long.
1. 석화 탐지기 견본에 실트 결정체를 과다하게 반응시키지 마십시오.{nl}2. 실트 증폭기를 장시간 가동하지 마십시오.{nl}3. 실트 증폭기를 통해 석화에 면역되더라도 잠시 뿐이니 격리 실험실에 장시간 있지 마십시오.
1. Jangan menggunakan reaksi berlebihan pada Schilt Essences ke dalam sample of Petrification Detector.{nl}2. Jangan mengaktifkan Schilt amplifier dalam waktu yang lama.{nl}3. Meskipun kami menjadi immun terhadap Petrification by Schilt amplifier, itu hanya berlangsung sementara jadi jangan terlalu lama berada di lab.

Please select the user requiring a quest: [Usage Limit]{nl}- Due to a recent incident, we sealed the isolated lab room. {nl}Only people permitted by the chief can enter the room via the portal.
[사용제한]{nl}- 최근 사고로 인해 격리 실험실을 봉쇄했습니다.{nl}단장에게 허가받은 인원에 한하여 포탈을 통해서만 출입이 가능합니다.-{nl}
[Limit pemakaian]{nl}- Karena kecelakaan belakangan ini maka Laboratorium telah diisolasi.{nl}Ijin masuk bisa didapat melalui Kapten yang portal untuk Member.-{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: [Method of Usage]{nl}1. Use the Schilt Essences on the portal generator. {nl}2. One person can enter after a certain number of Essences are used. {nl}3. When more than one person enters simultaneously, please notify and ask the chief.
[사용방법]{nl}1. 제공받은 실트 결정을 포탈 동력기에 사용하세요.{nl}2. 일정 수량을 사용해야 한 명이 들어갈 수 있습니다.{nl}3. 다수의 인원이 출입할 경우 단장에게 문의바랍니다.
[Metode Penggunaan]{nl}1. Gunakan Schilt Essences ke portal generator.{nl}2. Satu orang bisa masuk jika sejumlah Essences digunakan.{nl}3. Jika bersama lebih dari satu orang, hubungi chief.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The flame crystals are formed here.{nl}Be careful, because you might get burned.
불꽃의 결정이 맺히는 곳입니다.{nl}화상을 입을 수 있으니 주의하시길 바랍니다.
Essence of spark terbentuk disini.{nl}Hati-hati jika tidak ingin terbakar.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Modestas admitted defeat and said he'd pay him pay back. As he was leaving the place with wagon in tow, the old alchemist broke into a strange smile that caught Modestas' attention.
모데스타스씨가 패배를 인정하고 약속대로 나중에 갚겠다고 말하고, 말과 수레를 끌고 떠나려 할 때 늙은 알케미스트가 알 수 없는 미소를 지으며 모데스타스
Modestas menerima kekalahannya dan akan membalasnya nanti. Saat Modestas ingin pergi dengan kereta dan kudanya, Sang old Alchemist menyeringai dan membuat Modestas menatapnya beberapa detik.  {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Story of Fire
불의 이야기
Kisah dari Api

Please select the user requiring a quest: I saw a bizarre sight at the goddess' whereabouts at the top of the tower. The bird beside Gabija, by her grace, lit up and engulfed itself in flames.{nl}
나는 탑의 가장 높은 곳에 있는 여신의 거소에서 이상한 광경을 보았다.{nl}가비야 여신의 곁에 있던 그 새는 마치 여신의 은총인 양 온 몸을 불로 감싸고 있었다.{nl}
Aku melihat pemandangan yang aneh dekat Goddess yang berada di puncak tower. Burung disamping Gabija, dengan kekuatannya, dia berubah menjadi menyala dengan api.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The serenely burning fire. The wings consumed by flames. Nothing else in this world has left me more in awe than that sight.{nl}
고요하게 타오르는 불꽃. {nl}모든 것을 태워 버릴 것만 같던 그 날개짓..{nl}경외심마저 느껴지는 그 황홀한 광경은 절대로 이 세계의 것이 아니였다.{nl}
Apinya menyala. Sayapnya mulai dimakan api. Tidak ada lagi pemandangan yang luar biasa di dunia ini selain yang aku lihat tadi.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hmm... Have the party members fully gathered yet?
음.. 아직 파티원들이 다 모이지 않은 것 같은데요?
Hm?Sudah berkumpul bersama anggota party?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Welcome to the Mercenary Post. {nl}Unfortunately... I don't have any appropriate requests for you yet.{nl}
어서 오세요, 용병 의뢰소입니다. {nl}그런데.. 아직 적당한 의뢰가 없네요.{nl}
Selamat datang di Commissioner's Office. {nl}Tetapi?Belum ada request untuk saat ini.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I will give you an appropriate quest when you return with reliable comrades.{nl}If there are such requests.{nl}
믿음직한 동료들과 함께 다시 오시거든, 그 때 맞는 의뢰를 드릴게요.{nl}의뢰가 있다면 말이지요.{nl}
Aku akan memberikanmu quest saat kamu kembali bersama anggota party.{nl}Jika terdapat quest yang cocok.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: There is a good request that just came in.{nl}Would you like to take it?
마침 좋은 의뢰가 들어와 있어요.{nl}시작하시겠어요?
Ada request bagus yang baru tiba.{nl}Apa kamu ingin mengambilnya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Anyway, that is very strange.{nl}If it was Goddess Laima's will, not just anyone could undo her seal.
그나저나 참 이상하군요.{nl}라이마 여신의 계시라면 봉인을 푸는 것 자체가 아무나 할 수 없는 일일 텐데요.
Omong-omong, itu sangat aneh.{nl}Jika itu memang kehendak Goddess Laima, tidak semua orang dapat membuka seal itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Whether this revelation will become a new beacon of hope or a start of a new disaster, {nl}is indeed difficult to judge... We are thinking of continuing our investigation.
이 계시가 과연 희망이 될지, 새로운 재앙의 시작일지 단언하기 어렵습니다만..{nl}저희도 계속 조사해 볼 생각입니다.
Meski wahyu ini menjadi sebuah cahaya harapan yang baru atau suatu bencana yang akan datang, kita tidak tahu bukan?{nl}Lebih baik kita lanjutkan investigasi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: )}My son volunteered to join the army.{nl}So I have been offering my prayers to the great Goddess Ausrine.{nl}
)}우리 아들은 자원해서 군에 입대했어.{nl}그래서 최고의 여신이신 아우슈리네님께 기도를 드리고 있었지.{nl}
)}Anakku mendaftarkan diri untuk menjadi anggota militer.{nl}Jadi aku telah berdoa setulus hari kepada Goddess Ausrine yang agung.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: )}Monsters have been multiplying to the point where people cannot safely live in the forest anymore.{nl}At least Klaipeda is still safe.{nl}
)}몬스터는 자꾸 불어나고 숲 속은 사람이 살 수 없을 지경으로 난리가 났어.{nl}그나마 클라페다는 안전하지.{nl}
)}Jumlah monster sekarang semakin banyak dan penduduk tidak dapat tinggal dengan aman di hutan.{nl}Setidaknya Klaipeda masih aman.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Maybe Goddess Ausrine gave us her protection.{nl}Isn't she the goddess who leads all other goddesses?
아마 아우슈리네 여신께서 지켜주신 게 아닌가 싶어.{nl}모든 여신을 이끄시는 여신이시잖아?
Mungkin Goddess Ausrine memberikan kita perlindungan.{nl}Bukankah dia Goddess yang memimpin para Goddess lainnya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: )}I am glad my son dreams of becoming a soldier...{nl}But the monsters keep increasing in number, and I'm worried he will be injured.
)}내 아들이 병사가 되고 싶다는 꿈을 이룬 건 다행이라고 생각하지만..{nl}몬스터는 자꾸 불어나는데 혹시 다칠까 싶어서 걱정이야.
)}Mungkin aku senang karena anakku bisa menjadi seorang prajurit?nl}Tapi karena jumlah monster yang terus meningkat, aku khawatir dia bisa cedera.

Please select the user requiring a quest: (You told him about the revelation that you found at the Crystal Mine.)
수정광산에서 얻은 계시의 일부를 알려주었다.
Mempelajari arti wahyu Goddess  yang ditemukan di Crystal Mine.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Morning dawns after night, does it not? Goddess Ausrine is the one who brings us morning. {nl}Not only that, when we die, we go to her as well.
밤이 가면 아침이 오지? 아우슈리네 여신께선 그 아침을 이끄는 여신이셔.{nl}뿐만 아니라 우리가 죽으면 아우슈리네 여신께로 가지.
Bukankah Pagi muncul setelah malam hari? The Goddess Ausrine lah yang membawa cahaya pagi. {nl}Bukan hanya itu, jika kita mati maka kita akan bersama Goddess Ausrine.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Eternal life...{nl}Through Goddess Ausrine's power, my life extends for every Owl Statue I sculpt.{nl}If this old body of mine can give her strength and help the world then I am determined to carry on forever.
영생이라..{nl}나는 아우슈리네 여신님의 권능으로 부엉이 조각상을 하나 세울 때마다 삶을 연장받게 되었지.{nl}이 늙은 몸이라도 여신님께 힘이 되고 세상에 도움이 된다면 언제까지고 해내야겠다고 생각한다오.
Hidup Abadi?nl}Melalui kekuatan Goddess Ausrine hidupku akan semakin sempurna dengan setiap owl statue yang aku pahat.{nl}Jika dengan tubuhku yang tua ini bisa memberikan dia kekuatan dan menolong dunia maka aku akan selalu bersamanya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Are you interested in everlasting life?{nl}Since necromancers deal with the dead, they can sense life forces, and, depending on their ability, manipulate it. {nl}If you are as good as I am, absorbing that life force to extend your own is possible.
너도 영생에 관심이 있는건가?{nl}네크로맨서들은 죽은 자를 다루니까 생명력이라는 것을 느낄 수도 있고 실력에 따라서 조금은 다룰 수도 있지.{nl}나정도 실력이 되면 그 생명력을 흡수해서 수명을 연장시키는 일도 가능한거야.
Apa kamu tertarik hidup abadi?{nl}Karena necromancers berurusan dengan kematian, mereka dapat merasakan life force, dan, berdasarkan kemampuan dan ilmu, mereka merekayasanya.{nl}Kamu sama hebatnya sepertiku, menyerap life force untuk memperpanjang umurmu itu bisa dilakukan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Are you curious as to how I obtained eternal life?{nl}If stilled time is eternal, then you can consider it life everlasting.{nl}By stopping time I maintain a body that is neither aging nor dying.{nl}Whether or not quiescence can be described as eternal, I do not have an answer.
제가 영생하고 있는 방법에 대해서 궁금하신 모양이군요.{nl}시간을 멈춰둔 것도 영원하다면 영원하다 할 수 있겠지요.{nl}저는 신체의 시간을 멈추는 것으로 늙지도 죽지도 않는 몸을 유지하고 있답니다.{nl}과연 그대로 멈춰서 정지한 것이 영원한 것이라고 표현할 수 있을지는 모르겠지만요.
Apakah kamu penasaran dengan caraku bisa hidup abadi?{nl}Jika menghentikan waktu membuat abadi, kalau begitu kamu bisa hidup selamanya.{nl}Dengan mengatur waktu dan menghentikannya tubuh tidak dapat menjadi tua atau sekarat.{nl}Mungkin bisa dikatakan sebagai keabadian, tapi aku tidak tahu jawabannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unless during a specific window of time, {nl}recklessly touching the terminal would only bring trouble. {nl}It could release the curse.
단말기는 특별한 때가 아니면 함부로 만지면 곤란하지..그 저주를 풀어주겠다.
Terminal akan bermasalah jika menyentuhnya secara sembarangan tidak pada waktu tertentu… akan kuhilangkan kutukan itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: If all that is small is gathered, they shall one day add up to a larger force.
작은 것이 모이면 언젠가 큰 힘이 되리라.
Sedikit demi sedikit, lama kelamaan akan menjadi bukit.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It is said the statue of Goddess Ausrine at Klaipeda's central plaza,{nl}is related with the story of Modestas, the Gambler.
클라페다의 중앙 광장에 있는 아우슈리네 여신상에게는 내기꾼 모데스타스씨의 재미있는 이야기가 얽혀 있습니다.{nl}
Katanya Goddess Ausrine statue di Klaipeda's central plaza berhubungan dengan cerita Modestas the Gambler.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Back when the Goddess Statue was just finished, no one knew who the statue represented. {nl}Only the Dievdirbys who carved the statue and Modestas knew.
여신상이 조각되었을 당시에는 그 여신상이 누구를 기리는지 아무도 알 수 없었습니다.{nl}오직 여신상을 조각한 딥디르비와 모데스타스씨만이 알고 있었지요.{nl}
Dulu, saat Statue of Goddess baru selesai dibuat, tidak ada yang tahu Statue dari Goddess  siapa itu. Hanya Dievdirbys yang memahat statue dan Modestas yang tahu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Many tried to reveal the identity of the Statue by challenging Modestas to bets, but he passed away before losing even once.
많은 이들이 여신상이 누구인지 알기 위해 모데스타스에게 내기를 걸었지만 모데스타스가 죽을 때 까지 지는 일은 결코 없었었습니다.
Banyak yang ingin membongkar identitas Statue dengan menantang Modestas bertaruh, namun dia telah meninggal tanpa ada satupun yang menang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I thank you again in the name of all fate. {nl}From here on, I will follow the stars to find Goddess Ausrine.{nl}
모든 인연의 이름으로 다시 한 번 감사드립니다.{nl}저는 이제부터 벌들을 따라 아우슈리네님을 찾으려고 합니다.{nl}
Atas nama takdir aku mengucapkan terima kasih. {nl}Mulai dari sini, Aku akan mengikuti bintang untuk menemukan Goddess Ausrine.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: About the Goddess Statue
여신상 안내
Tentang Statue of Goddess

Please select the user requiring a quest: You can move to your desired location with the blessings of Goddess Ausrine.
주신 아우슈리네님의 권능으로 원하는 지역으로 이동할 수 있습니다.
Kamu dapat berpindah ke lokasi yang di inginkan dengan berkat dari Goddess Ausrine.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Holy Relic of the Order
교단의 성물
Holy Relics of the Church Order

Please select the user requiring a quest: When greed and pride of men reaches its end, a Divine Tree will emerge from the ground to punish the greedy.
인간들의 욕심과 오만에 그 끝에 달할 때, 지하에서 성스러운 나무가 자라나 오만한 자들을 벌하고 그 모든 것을 앗아가리라.
Saat ketamakan dan kesombongan manusia mencapai puncaknya, sebuah pohon yang suci akan muncul dari tanah untuk menghukum mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Coffin destroyed
관 파괴
Peti telah dihancurkan

Please select the user requiring a quest: Coffin has been destroyed!
관이 파괴되었다!
Peti telah dihancurkan!

Please select the user requiring a quest: A corpse walked out of the coffin!
관이 열리면서 시체가 걸어나왔다!
Sebuah mayat berjalan keluar dari peti!

Please select the user requiring a quest: An unknown force prevents you from getting closer.
알 수 없는 힘에 가로막혀 다가갈 수 없다.
Kekuatan magic yang tidak diketahui mencegahmu untuk mendekat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Aiste asked the elderly beggar, {nl}'Did you by any chance pick up the silver coins I dropped? Would you return them to me? I worked very hard everyday for those coins and really need them.'{nl}{nl}
아이스테는 나이 든 거지에게 부탁했습니다.{nl}[혹시 제가 땅에 떨어뜨린 은화를 주우셨나요? 그랬다면 돌려주시면 좋겠어요. 그건 오늘 제가 하루 종일 일해서 번 돈이에요. 저는 그 돈이 꼭 필요해요.]{nl}
Aiste bertanya pada Old Beggar.{nl}[Apakah kamu sempat mengambil silver coin yang terjatuh dariku? Jika kamu mengambilnya, bisakah kamu kembalikan kepadaku? Aku bekerja sepanjang hari untuk mendapatkannya. Aku sangat membutuhkannya.]{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The beggar was taken aback. Aiste was asking for the impossible. After all, finding dropped coins in Fedimian was unthinkable. {nl}The old beggar was about to explain this to Aiste but instead remarked, {nl}'I've also lost coins in this area. It would be nice if you looked for mine as you searched for yours.'{nl}{nl}
{nl}나이 든 거지는 아이스테의 말에 어처구니 없었습니다. {nl}페디미안에서 떨어진 은화를 찾을 생각을 하다니 말도 안 되는 일이었기 때문입니다.{nl}나이 든 거지는 아이스테에게 설명을 하려다가 문득 귀찮아서 이렇게 말했습니다.{nl}[나도 근처에 은화를 떨어뜨리고 못 찾았다. 네가 찾다가 내 것도 찾으면 좋겠다.]{nl}
Old Beggar diminta kembali. {nl}Mencari silver coin yang hilang di Fedimian, dengan berbagai cara, yang aneh. {nl}Old Beggar ingin menjelaskan kepada Aiste tapi, dia berubah pikiran.{nl}[Aku juga kehilangan silver coin disekitar sini. Lebih baik jika kucari punyamu dan kamu cari punyaku.]{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: 'Why don't you go to where you work and explain what happened to them? Make sure you look lost.' The beggar then hesitantly added, {nl}'In the meantime, I'll be looking for your silver coins here.'{nl}{nl}
네가 일한 곳에 가서 사정을 말하고 부탁하면 어떨까?]{nl}그리고 망설이듯이 덧붙였습니다.{nl}[네 은화는 내가 여기서 계속 찾아보마.]{nl}{nl}
Kenapa kamu tidak pergi dimana kamu bekerja dan menjelaskan apa yang terjadi dengan mereka? Pastikan kamu terlihat kehilangan.' Kemudian Beggar menambahkan, {nl}'Sebenarnya, aku mencari silver koin kamu di sini.'{nl}{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: And so he said, {nl}'Just as you've been able to pick up all my fruit, you should be able to find your lost money at Fedimian, so do not tell me to give you a second pay.' {nl}The orchard owner's cold words brought tears to the girl's eyes. {nl}The sight broke his heart, but even so, he did not want to give her any more money. {nl}{nl}
그래서 그는 이렇게 말했습니다.{nl}[과수원에 떨어진 나무열매가 하나 남김 없이 주워지는 것처럼, 페디미안에 떨어진 네 돈도 다시 주울 수 있다. 그러니 네 삯을 두 번 달라고 말하지 말아라.]{nl}아이스테는 과수원 주인의 서운한 말에 눈물이 글썽해졌습니다. {nl}과수원 주인은 그 모습에 마음이 약간 흔들렸지만, 돈을 다시 주고 싶지는 않았습니다. {nl}
Dan begitulah yang dia katakan. {nl}[Seperti buah yang diambil di orchard, semua uang yang jatuh di jalan Fedimian juga dapat diambil siapapun. Jadi jangan minta aku untuk membayar dobel.]{nl}Mendengar perkataan pemilik Orchard, mata Aiste jadi berkaca-kaca.{nl}Hati pemilik Orchard pun terenyuh, meskipun begitu, dia tetap tidak memberikan uang. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: He was soon overtaken by guilt and said, {nl}'If you really need that money, you should go to the silversmith's.'{nl}{nl}
그래서 마음을 모질게 먹고 이렇게 말했습니다.{nl}[네가 정말 은화가 필요하다면, 은장이에게 가서 부스러기라도 얻어보려무나.]{nl}{nl}
Dia segera disusul oleh rasa bersalah dan berkata, {nl} 'Jika Kamu benar-benar membutuhkan uang itu, Kamu harus pergi ke silversmith.' {nl} {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The silversmith, after hearing Aiste's story, stated, {nl}'Even for children it is foolish to be so careless. How could you not know that all money that falls on Fedimian soil disappears, never to be found again?'{nl}{nl}
은장이는 아이스테의 말을 듣고 이렇게 말했습니다.{nl}[아무리 어리다지만, 어리석구나. 페디미안에서 땅에 떨어진 돈은 모두 사라진다는 사실을 모르다니.]{nl}{nl}
Setelah mendengarkan cerita Aiste, Sang Silversmith berkata.{nl}[Meskipun kamu sangat muda, kamu sangat bodoh. Kamu harus tahu, jika ada uang yang jatuh di Fedimian akan hilang dan tidak bisa ditemukan lagi.]{nl}{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Aiste was surprised by what the silversmith said and grew sad. {nl}After a while she asked, {nl}'Then why is it that such a cruel thing happens?'{nl}{nl}
아이스테는 그 말에 놀랐고 이어지는 은장이의 설명에 더 슬퍼졌습니다. {nl}그래서 결국 이렇게 물었습니다.{nl}[왜 그런 일이 일어나는 것일까요?]{nl}{nl}
Aiste, kaget dengan perkataan Silversmith, dan menjadi lebih depresi.{nl}Setelah itu Aiste bertanya.{nl}[Kenapa hal buruk seperti ini terjadi?]{nl}{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Even the silversmith did not know the true answer, so he improvised, {nl}'Goddess Zemyna must be taking them.'{nl}{nl}
은장이도 그 이유를 모르기 때문에 그냥 떠오르는 대로 이렇게 말했습니다.{nl}[제미나 여신께서 가져가시든가 하겠지.]{nl}{nl}
Tentu saja Silversmith tidak tahu alasannya karena dia spontan mengatakan hal itu.{nl}[Goddess Zemyna mungkin mengambilnya atau sesuatu.]{nl}{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hearing those words, Aiste replied, {nl}'Then I will just have to go ask the goddess.' {nl}The silversmith was astounded and replied, {nl}'While you're at it, why don't you ask the goddess to return my silverware?'{nl}{nl}
그 말을 듣고 아이스테가 말했습니다.{nl}[그럼 제미나 여신께 가서 부탁해야겠군요.]{nl}은장이는 그 말에 어이가 없어서 이렇게만 말했습니다.{nl}[그럴 생각이라면 내가 떨어뜨린 옛날에 떨어뜨린 은세공품도 돌려달라고 한번 같이 부탁해보렴.]{nl}{nl}
Setelah mendengar perkataan Aiste.{nl}[Kalau begitu aku harus bertanya pada Goddess Zemyna.]{nl}Silversmith terkejut dan membalas.{nl}[Jika kamu ingin melakukan hal itu aku juga ingin minta barangku yang hilang kembali.]{nl}{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: An exhausted Aiste soon arrived at the Statue of Goddess Zemyna. {nl}She prostrated herself before it and prayed to the Goddess Statue represented, her head completely down. {nl}'Oh, goddess. Please return my lost silver coins.' {nl}Soon, while offering her prayers, Aiste could no longer hold in her sadness and she finally wept.{nl}{nl}
아이스테는 많이 지쳤지만, 제미나 여신상을 찾아갔습니다. {nl}제미나 여신상 앞에 엎드린 아이스테는 여신께 간절히 기도했습니다.{nl}[제발, 제가 잃어버린 은화를 돌려주세요.] {nl}그런 기도를 올리면서 아이스테는 그간 참았던 눈물을 흘렸습니다. {nl}
Meskipun Aiste merasa lelah, dia mencari Goddess Zemyna.{nl}Bersujud di depan patung Goddess Zemyna, dia berdoa dengan putus asa.{nl}[Tolong, kembalikanlah silver coin ku yang hilang.] {nl}Saat mengucapkan doanya, Aiste tidak dapat membendung rasa sedihnya dan meneteskan air mata{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: How long did she pray crying? {nl}Suddenly, Aiste heard a voice addressed to her. {nl}'My child, have come to take back what you have lost?'{nl}{nl}
얼마나 울고 얼마나 기도했을까요?{nl}아이스테는 문득 자신에게 응답하는 목소리를 들었습니다. {nl}[나의 아이야. 네 것을 되찾고 싶다고?]{nl}{nl}
Berapa lama dia berdoa menangis? {nl} Tiba-tiba, Aiste mendengar suara yang ditujukan kepada dirinya. {nl} 'Anakku, datang untuk mengambil kembali apa yang telah hilang?' {nl} {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The goddess' voice was heard again. {nl}'Aiste, what your asking from me is not in a method I approve of. Where I reign there is no harvest nor fruits to those who do not work.'{nl}{nl}
여신의 목소리가 다시 들려왔습니다.{nl}[아이스테야, 지금 네가 내게 원하는 일은 내가 좋아하는 방식이 아니란다. 내가 다스리는 대지는 수고하지 않은 농부에게 곡식과 과일을 내주지 않는단다.]{nl}{nl}
Suara Goddess terdengar lagi.{nl}[Aiste, yang kamu inginkan dariku sekarang bukanlah begitu caranya. Jika kamu tidak menanam benih kamu tidak bisa mendapatkan buah.]{nl}{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: 'But I worked very hard today!'{nl}{nl}
[하지만 저는 오늘 열심히 일했는데요.]{nl}
[Tapi aku bekerja sangat keras hari ini.]{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: 'I know. So instead, I will give you and the others a chance. Look under your feet.'{nl}{nl}
[알고 있단다. 그러니 네게 그리고 네 이웃들에게 기회를 주도록 하겠다. 네 발 밑을 보려무나.]{nl}{nl}
[Aku tahu. Maka dari itu aku memberikanmu kesempatan. Lihatlah kebawah kakimu.]{nl}{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: After a number of steps, Aiste thought about the silversmith, {nl}and, again, went to his house and knocked on his door. {nl}As if the silversmith was waiting for her return, he opened the door immediately and said. {nl}'I'm sorry. I regret sending you away like that. I'll give you some silver. {nl}This time, be careful not to drop any and get home safely.'{nl}{nl}
몇 걸음 걷던 아이스테는 은장이 아저씨가 생각났습니다. {nl}그래서 다시 그 집으로 가서 문을 두들겼지요. {nl}그러자 은장이 아저씨는 기다렸다는 듯이 나와서 말했습니다.{nl}[미안하다. 너를 그렇게 보내고 후회했다. 내가 은화를 몇 개 주마. 이번에는 떨어뜨리지 않도록 조심해서 집으로 가렴.]{nl}{nl}
Setelah berjalan sebentar Aiste terpikir akan Silversmith. {nl}Jadi Aiste kembali ke tempatnya dan mengetuk. {nl}Seperti yang diharapkan Silversmith bahwa Aiste datang, dia keluar dan bicara.{nl}[Maafkan aku. Aku menyesal menyuruhmu seperti itu. Aku akan memberikan sedikit silver coins. Kali ini jangan sampai hilang dan pulanglah.]{nl}{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: As the silversmith held out his silver coins, Aiste shook her head and said,{nl}'No thank you, the goddess returned all my coins. On top of that she gave me even more. {nl}I remembered you saying you had also lost silver, so I came to give you my extra coins. You don't need to give me yours.'{nl}{nl}
그러면서 은장이 아저씨가 은화를 꺼내주자 아이스테는 고개를 저으며 말했습니다.{nl}[아니에요. 여신께서 제 은화 한 개를 돌려주셨어요. 거기다 더 주셨답니다. 그래서 저는 아저씨가 은을 잃어버렸다는 말이 생각나서 남은 것을 드릴까 해서 왔어요. 지금 주시려는 은화는 필요 없어요.]{nl}{nl}
Sebagai silversmith yang mengulurkan silver coin itu, Aiste menggeleng dan berkata, {nl} 'Tidak, terima kasih, Goddess kembali semua koin aku. Di atas itu dia memberi aku bahkan lebih. {nl} Aku ingat Kamu mengatakan Kamu juga telah kehilangan silver, jadi aku datang untuk memberikan uang tambahan aku. Kamu tidak perlu memberikan bagian kamu. '{nl} {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: At first, the silversmith was skeptical about the coins being returned, {nl}so he was surprised when Aiste showed him genuine coins. After thinking for a while, the silversmith said, {nl}'Then how about this. You give me what you want while you accept what I was about to give you. {nl}Isn't that fair? On top of that I'll give you a pouch to carry your extra silver.'{nl}{nl}
은장이는 여신께서 은화를 돌려주셨다는 말에 반신반의했지만, 아이스테가 내미는 은화는 진짜여서 놀랐습니다. 은장이는 잠시 생각하다가 이렇게 말했습니다.{nl}[그러면 이렇게 하자 너는 내게 주려던 것을 주고 너는 내가 주려던 것을 받는 거야. 어떠냐? 그러면 공평하지? 그리고 늘어난 은화를 담을 주머니도 하나 주마.]{nl}
Pada awalnya, silversmith yang skeptis tentang koin yang akan dikembalikan, {nl} sehingga dia terkejut ketika Aiste menunjukkan kepadanya koin asli. Setelah berpikir sejenak, silversmith mengatakan, {nl} 'Lalu bagaimana dengan ini. Kamu memberi aku apa yang Kamu inginkan saat Kamu menerima apa yang aku hendak berikan. {nl} Apakah tidak adil itu? Di atas itu aku akan memberikan kantong untuk membawa silver ekstra. '{nl} {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: After leaving the silversmith's house, {nl}Aiste suddenly remembered that the old beggar must still be looking for her lost coins and worried about him. {nl}On her way to the beggar, she met the orchard owner again. {nl}Upon seeing Aiste, the orchard owner was overjoyed. {nl}'I was looking for you. I'm sorry for sending you off earlier. As an apology, I'll give you your salary again. {nl}Please be careful not to lose it this time.'{nl}{nl}
은장이 아저씨를 작별하고 집으로 가던 아이스테는 문득 거지 아저씨가 아직도 자기 돈을 찾고 있을까 걱정이 되었습니다. {nl}그래서 그곳으로 가는 도중에 과수원 주인을 만났어요. {nl}과수원 주인은 아이스테를 발견하고는 크게 기뻐하여 말했습니다.{nl}[너를 찾고 있었다. 사실은 너를 그렇게 보내고 미안했거든…. 사과하는 의미로 네 품삯을 다시 주마. 이번에는 잃어버리지 않도록 조심해라.]{nl}{nl}
Setelah meninggalkan rumah silversmith itu, {nl} Aiste tiba-tiba teringat bahwa pengemis tua masih harus mencari koin yang hilang dan khawatir tentang dia. {nl} Dalam perjalanan ke pengemis, ia bertemu dengan orchard owner lagi. {nl} Setelah melihat Aiste, orchard owner sangat gembira. {nl} 'aku cari Kamu. aku minta maaf untuk memecat sebelumnya. Sebagai permintaan maaf, aku akan memberikan gaji Kamu lagi. {nl} Harap berhati-hati untuk tidak kehilangan kali ini. '{nl} {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The orchard owner took out a large amount of coins, more than what Aiste's salary was, and handed it to her. {nl}However, Aiste shook her head and said, {nl}'Goddess Zemyna already returned my money to me. The silversmith also helped me, so now I actually have too much. {nl}Here, take a look.'{nl}{nl}
그리고는 원래 품삯보다 많은 은화를 꺼내주려 했습니다. {nl}그러나 아이스테는 고개를 저으며 말했어요.{nl}[제미나 여신께서 제 돈을 돌려주셨어요. 게다가 은장이 아저씨도 도와주셔서 지금은 너무 많아요. 그러니까 고맙지만 괜찮아요. 자, 보세요.]{nl}{nl}
orchard owner mengeluarkan sejumlah besar uang, lebih dari apa yang Aiste gaji itu, dan menyerahkannya kepadanya. {nl} Namun, Aiste menggeleng dan berkata, {nl} 'Goddess Zemyna sudah mengembalikan uang aku untuk aku. silversmith juga membantu aku, jadi sekarang aku benar-benar memiliki terlalu banyak. {nl} Di sini, lihatlah. "{nl} {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Disregarding the amount Aiste had shown him, the orchard owner said, {nl}'Well, even so, I would be ashamed for not giving you my due, so please just take it.' {nl}After saying this, the orchard owner stuffed his coins into Aiste's bag and left. {nl}By the time Aiste could muster up the energy to call the orchard owner, he was too far away.{nl}{nl}
아이스테가 늘어난 은화 때문에 아무 말도 못 하는 사이 과수원 주인이 이렇게 말했습니다.{nl}[아무튼, 이걸 안 주면 내가 부끄러우니 꼭 받아주렴.] {nl}{nl}그렇게 말하고는 말릴 틈도 없이 열린 은화주머니에 돈을 던지듯 강제로 집어 넣고는 가버렸습니다.{nl}아이스테가 정신을 차렸을 때는 과수원 주인은 이미 너무 멀리 가서 아이스테는 그를 부를 수가 없었습니다. {nl}
Mengabaikan jumlah Aiste telah menunjukkan kepadanya, orchard owner berkata, {nl} "Yah, meskipun demikian, aku akan malu untuk tidak memberikan aku karena, jadi silakan ambil saja." {nl} Setelah mengatakan ini, orchard owner memasukkan koin ke dalam tas Aiste dan pergi. {nl} Pada saat Aiste bisa mengumpulkan energi untuk memanggil orchard owner, dia sudah terlalu jauh. {nl} {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: She hesitated for a moment but then set her mind on the beggar. {nl}After a bit of walking, Aiste arrived at where they met. The old beggar spotted her first and hurried over to her. {nl}He showed her the silver coins he was clenching onto and said, 'Look! I found your lost silver.' {nl}Aiste received the beggar's silver and then showed the beggar her bag and said, {nl}'Look, I found your silver coins too.'{nl}{nl}
잠시 머뭇거리던 아이스테는 가던 대로 거지 아저씨에게 가기로 하고 걸음을 옮겼습니다.{nl}아이스테가 거지 아저씨를 만났던 곳에 가까이 갔을 때; 거지는 아이스테를 먼저 발견하고는 그녀에게 허겁지겁 달려오더니 손가락으로 꼭 잡은 은화를 보여주면서 말했습니다.{nl}[봐라. 내가 네 은화를 찾아냈단다.]{nl}{nl}
Dia ragu-ragu sejenak tapi kemudian teringat pada pengemis. {nl} Setelah sedikit berjalan, Aiste tiba di tempat mereka bertemu. Pengemis tua melihat dia pertama dan bergegas menghampirinya. {nl} Dia menunjukkan padanya koin silversmith ia mengepalkan dan berkata, 'Lihat! aku menemukan silver Kamu yang hilang. ' {nl} Aiste menerima silver pengemis dan kemudian menunjukkan pengemis tasnya dan berkata, {nl} 'Dengar, aku menemukan koin silver Kamu juga.' {nl} {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: After that, Aiste also held out her bag and said, {nl}'This is a gift as thanks for looking for my silver. I was given this through Goddess Zemyna's grace.' {nl}Aiste then left before the Old Beggar could figure out how to reply.{nl}{nl}
아이스테는 거지의 은화를 잘 갈무리 한 다음에는 자신의 은화 주머니를 거지에게 내밀며 말했습니다.{nl}[이건 제 은화를 찾아주신 보답으로 드리는 선물이에요. 제미나 여신께서 은혜로 주신 것이기도 하고요.]{nl}{nl}그렇게 말하고는 거지 아저씨가 미처 뭐라 대답도 하기 전에 서둘러 사라졌습니다.{nl}{nl}

Dan bertanya apa yang akan dia lakukan dengan gold bar itu.{nl}Lalu wanita tua itu menjawab.{nl}[Jika aku punya dua gold bar bisa aku nikahkan, lalu mereka punya berkata.{nl}[Tidak, jika kamu mau menjadi kaya dengan gold bar, kamu harus membuka usaha atau melakukan investasi. Menikahkan sebuah barang supaya mendapatkan barang lainnya, itu tidak masuk akal bukan?]{nl}

노파는 손가락으로 턱을 만지며 잠시 망설이고 고민하다 대답했습니다.{nl}[각각 세 번이면 충분하겠지. 그러니까 자네는 여섯 번의 내기를 하고 내게 돌아와야 하네. 물론 마지막 여섯 번째 내기도 질 줄 알면서도 해야 하지. 안 그러면 무조건 내가 이길 테니까.]{nl}
Dengan tangannya berada di dagunya, wanita tua itu memberikan respon yang membingungkan.{nl} 'Tiga kali dari masing-masing, seharusnya cukup. Kembali ke saya setelah Kamu membuat enam taruhan.{nl} Tentunya, jika Kamu tidak memiliki koin setelah taruhan keenam, maka Aku akan menang."{nl}

모데스타스씨는 약간 떨리는 목소리로 물었습니다.{nl}[그럼 얼마나 벌어야 하지요?]{nl}노파가 대답했습니다.{nl}[일단 금괴를 하나 주지. 그리고 내게 올 때 그것 말고 다른 금괴를 하나 가져오게. 내 금괴들이 새끼를 쳤든 안 쳤든 그러면 자네가 이긴 걸로 해주지. 시간은 흠. 어디 보자… 한 일주일이면 충분하겠지.]{nl}모데스타스씨는 마지막으로 한 가지를 더 물었습니다. {nl}[만약 당신과의 이 내기에서 내가 지면 무엇을 내놓아야 하죠?]{nl}
Modestas tampak gemetaran. "Berapa yang bisa saya dapatkan, kemudian?'{nl} 'Kamu mulai dengan satu keping emas,"jawabnya,'dan ketika Kamu kembali, tunjukkan semua keping emas Anda, termasuk yang satu itu.{nl} Jika Kamu membuat satu keping itu menjadi sesuatu yang lebih banyak, maka Kamu akan menang. 노파가 대답했습니다.{nl}[그건 말일세…]{nl}{nl}그렇게 잠시 뜸을 들인 노파가 말을 이었습니다.{nl}[일단 이길 경우에 내 금괴를 모두 주지. 그리고 자네에게 준 번갈아 이기고 지는 능력을 평생 지니게 해주지. 그러나 만약 지면..]{nl}[지면요?]{nl}모데스타스씨가 긴장해서 물었습니다.{nl}

Bila saya menang, setelah ini, teman-teman yang Kamu kenal akan menghilang setiap kali Kamu kalah taruhan."{nl} Modestas terkesima dengan ketentuan yang ditetapkan. Ia tidak keberatan, namun hanya memikirkan kemenangan,{nl} dan menerima ketentuan itu. Modestas adalah, tipe orang yang tidak pernah mundur.{nl}

하지만 모데스타스씨가 뭐라고 말을 더 잇기 전에 지그프리씨가 이렇게 말했습니다.{nl}[정 그렇게 내 말을 못 믿겠다면 우리 내기함세.]{nl}모데스타스씨는 ‘내기 그것 좋지. 뭘 걸까?’ 라는 말이 저절로 목구멍까지 치솟아 오르는 것을 간신히 누를 수 있었습니다.  {nl}

Despite his efforts it didn't move a single hoof at all.{nl}At the end, Sigfried repeatedly cursed its strange behavior. Realizing he'd be late to his appointment without a horse, he threw the reins to Modestas and sprinted away.{nl}
지그프리씨는 내기가 시작되자 한 발자국도 움직이지 않는 말을 달래고 때리고 별짓을 다했지만, 전혀 움직일 기미도 보이지 않았습니다.{nl}결국 지그프리씨는 연신 이상하다는 말을 되풀이하다가 말이 없으면, 약속에 늦을 것이란 생각이 들자 말고삐를 모데스타스씨에게 던지듯 넘겨주고, 말릴 틈도 없이 죽어라 뛰어가기 시작했습니다.{nl}
Begitu taruhan dimulai, Sigfried mencoba segala cara untuk memerintahkan kudanya untuk berlari. Meskipun usahanya itu tidak membuat kudanya bergerak sedikitpun.{nl} Pada akhirnya, Sigfried berulang kali mengutuk perilaku aneh ini. Menyadari ia akan terlambat ke tempat pertemuannya tanpa kuda, ia melemparkan tali kekang kepada Modestas dan berlari kencang.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: As Sigfried disappeared, Modestas felt uncomfortable.
지그프리씨가 사라지자 모데스타스씨는 기분이 좋지 않았습니다.
Dengan menghilang Sigfried, Modestas merasa gelisah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You, the young man with the horse, can you come over and help us for a bit?' {nl} Modestas had no idea what these soldiers needed help for, but since he could no longer ignore them, he decided to head over. {nl} Once Modestas arrived, one of the soldiers said, {nl} 'You came at just the right time. We would like you to referee a small gamble we're about to make here.' {nl}
[거기 말을 끌고 가는 아저씨. 이리 와서 우리를 도와주지 않겠소?]{nl}모데스타스씨는 몇 명의 병사들이 무슨 일로 도와달라는지 몰랐지만, 그 소리를 듣고 그냥 지나칠 수 없어서 말을 끌고 그들에게 다가갔습니다.{nl}모데스타스씨가 다가가자 병사들 가운데 한 사람이 말했습니다.{nl}[마침 잘 오셨소. 우리가 여기서 한 가지 내기를 했는데 당신이 심판을 봐주면 좋겠소.]{nl}
Kamu, pemuda dengan kuda, Bisakah Kamu dapat kemari dan membantu kami sebentar?'{nl} Modestas tidak tahu mengapa tentara ini membutuhkan bantuan, namun karena ia tidak bisa mengabaikan mereka, ia memutuskan untuk menemuinya.{nl} Setelah Modestas tiba, salah satu prajurit mengatakan,{nl} 'Kamu datang di waktu yang tepat. Kami ingin Kamu untuk menjadi wasit untuk taruhan kecil yang akan kami lakukan di sini.'{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: What started as trivial banter turned into a big argument, which finally grew to become a big money bet. The soldiers had already gathered their money and only had to decide the winner. Unfortunately, every goddess got equal votes and a winner couldn't be decided.{nl}Thus, the soldiers decided to settle the bet by calling the first person who passed by, asking him who he thought the best goddess is, and deciding the winner from there. The soldiers agreed that the first passer-by would symbolize the will of whatever goddess he favored. {nl}
작은 입씨름으로 시작된 일은 큰 논쟁이 되었고, 결국 큰돈이 걸린 내기가 되었습니다. 병사들은내깃돈을 모두 모아놓고 승자를 가리기만 하면 되는 상황이었지만, 공교롭게도 각각의 여신을 지지하는 사람들 수가 똑같아서 결정을 내리지 못 하고 있던 참이었습니다.{nl}
Awalnya dimulai dari ejekan kecil yang berubah menjadi argumen besar, dan akhirnya tumbuh menjadi uang taruhan yang besar. Para prajurit sudah mengumpulkan uang mereka dan hanya perlu untuk memutuskan pemenangnya. Sayangnya, setiap Goddess mendapat penilaian yang sama dan pemenangnya tidak bisa ditentukan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thus, the soldiers decided to settle the bet by calling the first person who passed by, asking him who he thought the best goddess is, and deciding the winner from there. The soldiers agreed that the first passer-by would symbolize the will of whatever goddess he supported. {nl}
그래서 의논 끝에 이제부터 가장 먼저 지나가는 사람에게 물어봐서 그 사람이 말하는 여신을 지지한 병사를 승자로 하기로 정했습니다. 가장 먼저 우연히 지나는 사람이 택했으니 그것을 여신의 뜻이라고 간주하기로 한 것입니다. {nl}
Dengan demikian, para prajurit memutuskan untuk bertaruh dengan memanggil orang pertama yang lewat, menanyakan siapa Goddess terbaik menurutnya, dan memutuskan pemenang dari itu. Para prajurit sepakat orang pertama yang lewat melambangkan kehendak dari Goddess terlepas dari siapa yang ia dukung.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Since a big jackpot was on the line, the soldiers waited with bated breath for Modestas' answer. {nl}Knowing there was no right answer to the question, Modestas simply said aloud the name of his favorite goddess. {nl}
그런 큰돈이 걸린 내기인 만큼 병사들은 모두 모데스타스씨의 선택을 기다렸습니다. {nl}이런 문제는 대개 정답이란 없기 때문에 모데스타스씨는 자신이 가장 좋아하는 여신의 이름을 말했답니다. {nl}
Semenjak hadiah yang besar ada didepan mata, para tentara menahan napas dan menunggu jawaban Modestas'.{nl} Mengetahui tidak ada jawaban yang tepat untuk pertanyaan itu, Modestas hanya mengatakan dengan lantang nama Goddess favoritnya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: When he did, the soldiers reacted strangely. {nl} There was supposed to be an ecstatic winner and disappointed losers, but nobody seemed joyful nor disappointed. Instead, everyone had a bewildered look on their faces. {nl}
그런데 병사들의 반응이 이상했습니다. {nl}모데스타스씨가 말한 여신의 이름에 따라서 승리한 어떤 병사는 기뻐하고 다른 병사들은 실망해야 했으나, 실망하거나 기뻐하는 사람은 없고 모두 당혹스런 표정을 지었기 때문입니다.{nl}
Ketika ia mengatakannya, reaksi para tentara sangat aneh.{nl} Seharusnya ada pemenang yang merasa gembira dan yang kalah merasa kecewa, Namun tak seorang pun tampak gembira atau kecewa. Sebaliknya, semua orang terlihat bingung.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Modestas, perplexed by their reaction, asked for an explanation to which one of the soldiers answered, {nl}'We originally had votes for four goddesses but your choice isn't any of them, so now we have five goddesses.' {nl}Then the soldiers resumed their squabble about how to decide the winner. {nl}
모데스타스씨가 의아해서 그 이유를 묻자 병사 가운데 한 사람이 대답했습니다.{nl}[우리들의 의견은 모두 넷으로 나뉘었는데 그중에 당신이 말한 여신이 없으니 이제는 의견이 다섯 가지로 나뉜 셈이오.]{nl}그러고 나서 병사들은 승부를 다시 어떻게 가려야 할지 다투기 시작했습니다. {nl}
Modestas, bingung dengan reaksi mereka, dan meminta penjelasan kepada salah satu prajurit, {nl} 'Awalnya pilihan kami adalah ke empat Goddess namun pilihan Kamu bukanlah salah satu dari mereka, jadi sekarang kita memiliki lima Goddess.'{nl} Kemudian para prajurit kembali berselisih mengenai bagaimana cara untuk menentukan pemenang.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The mood began to deteriorate so Modestas wanted to leave them. {nl}When he was about to take off, the soldiers blocked his path and accused him.{nl}'It's your fault the argument heated up even more. You're not thinking of just leaving are you?'{nl}Intimidated by the irritated soldiers, Modestas dared not to escape. {nl}
그 분위기가 점점 험악해졌기 때문에 모데스타스씨는 그들을 놓아두고 떠나려 했습니다. {nl}그런데 모데스타스씨가 떠나려고 하자 병사들이 그를 막아서며 말했습니다.{nl}[당신 탓에 싸움만 더 커졌는데 일만 만들고 그냥 갈 셈이오.]{nl}성난 병사들의 기세에 주눅이 든 모데스타스씨는 감히 그들을 벗어날 수 없었습니다. {nl}
Mood mulai memburuk sehingga Modestas ingin pergi meninggalkan mereka.{nl} Ketika ia pergi, para tentara menghalangi jalannya dan menyalahkannya.{nl} Ini semua salahmu, argumen ini semakin memanas dari sebelumnya. Kau tidak berpikir untuk pergi meninggalkan kami, bukan?'{nl} Terintimidasi oleh tentara yang merasa jengkel, Modestas tidak berani pergi melarikan diri.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Knowing Modestas, he could not simply sit on the sidelines watching a big bet grow. Eventually, he became enticed to join.
그러나 알다시피 모데스타스씨는 자기 눈앞에서 내기가 오가는 상황에서 그것을 보고만 있을 수 없는 사람이었기에 약간의 부추김만 있으면 내기에 빠지고 맙니다. {nl}
Mengetahui itu, Modestas tidak hanya duduk terdiam dan hanya menonton taruhan yang besar terus tumbuh. Akhirnya, ia menjadi tertarik untuk bergabung.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Modestas, caught in the heat of the moment and ending up participating in the soldier's bet, finally remembered it was his turn to lose.{nl}But it was too late.{nl}
분위기에 휩싸여 여신에 관련한 병사들의 내기에 참여한 모데스타스씨는 일이 정해진 뒤에야 비로소 이번 내기는 무조건 자신이 질 차례였다는 사실이 생각났습니다.{nl}하지만 그 생각을 떠올렸을 때는 이미 늦었습니다.{nl}
Modestas, terperangkap dalam situasi yang panas saat itu dan akhirnya ikut berpartisipasi dalam taruhan, akhirnya ia ingat itu gilirannya untuk kalah.{nl} Tapi itu semua sudah terlambat.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: If you think about it, even if it was his turn to lose, all it took for him to lose was one more vote for any of the goddesses he didn't choose. With the odds of the next person walking by supporting his goddess being against him, the probability of winning was low anyway.{nl}
따지고 보면 굳이 자신이 질 차례가 아니더라도 다른 여신의 지지자들보다 모데스타스씨의 표가 부족하니 모데스타스씨를 편들어 같은 여신을 말할 사람이 연속으로 와야 하는 불리한 상황에서 이길 가능성은 없어 보였습니다.{nl}
