Please select the user requiring a quest: I will stay here with the Believers. {nl}I will somehow prevent the Thorn Forest from expanding any more.{nl}
저는 신도들과 함께 여기에 남겠습니다. {nl}이 곳에서 가시숲이 더 이상 확장되는 것을 어떻게든 막을 것입니다.{nl}
Aku akan tinggal di sini bersama Believer.{nl} Aku akan mencari cara mencegah Thorn Forest memperluas lagi.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Don't tell them about me for a while.{nl}Humans need a place to rely on...{nl}When they find out the powerlessness of the goddesses, this world will be filled with chaos and sighs.{nl}
허나 저의 존재는 잠시 발설하지 말아 주십시오.{nl}인간은 본디 기댈 곳이 필요한 존재.. {nl}여신의 무력함을 알게 되면 이 세상은 탄식과 혼란으로 가득차게 될 것입니다.{nl}
Jangan katakan kepada mereka mengenai saya untuk sementara waktu.{nl} Manusia membutuhkan tempat untuk bergantung... {nl} Ketika mereka mengetahui ketidakberdayaan Goddess, dunia ini akan terisi dengan kekacauan dan keluhan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The guardian of the Royal Mausoleum where the next revelation awaits is quite far from here.{nl}So I will open a portal for you as a shortcut.{nl}In the name of Saule, the goddess of the sun, I will pray for your safety.
다음 계시의 수호자가 기다리고 있는 왕릉은 그대의 발걸음으론 너무나 먼 곳에 있습니다.{nl}제가 포탈을 열어 드리지요.{nl}태양의 여신 사울레의 이름으로 그대의 가호를 빌겠습니다.
Guardian of the Royal Tomb di mana Revelation berikutnya menanti cukup jauh dari sini.{nl} Jadi Aku akan membuka portal untuk Kamu sebagai jalan pintas.{nl} Dengan nama Saule, Goddess Matahari, Aku akan berdoa untuk keamanan anda.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Speaking of eternal life... look at Tesla. {nl}You would think that there is no aging in eternal life, don't you agree?
영생이라.. 테슬라를 봐.{nl}영원한 삶에는 늙음도 없다고 착각하는 건 아니겠지?
Berbicara mengenai kehidupan abadi.. lihatlah Tesla.{nl} Orang-orang akan berpikir bahwa tidak ada penuaan dalam kehidupan yabg abadi, apakah Kamu setuju?

Please select the user requiring a quest: (There are barely legible words written here.) {nl}...Juros could not hold his breath any longer so he ended up inhaling the spores and died. {nl}Mushworts hunt people with the cruelest method I've ever seen. {nl}They walk around our gathering places and shake out mushrooms that release spores.{nl}
(간신히 읽을 수 있는 부분이 보인다){nl}..유로스는 끝내 숨을 참지 못하고 포자를 들이마셨고, 곧 피를 토했다.{nl}머쉬워트는 내가 여태껏 본 몬스터 중에 제일 악랄한 방법으로 사람을 사냥한다.{nl}그 녀석은 우리 집결지 주변을 돌아다니며 포자를 뿜어낼 버섯을 몸에서 털어대고 있다.{nl}
(Hampir tidak terbaca kata-kata yang tertulis di sini.){nl} ...Juros tidak bisa menahan napasnya lagi sehingga ia akhirnya menghirup spora dan meninggal.{nl} Mushworts memburu manusia dengan metode paling kejam yang pernah saya lihat.{nl} Mereka berjalan-jalan ke tempat pertemuan kami dan mengeluarkan jamur yang melepaskan spora.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Even when the goddesses are not around, the Oracles still deliver the goddesses' message to people. {nl}Surely that is proof that the goddesses still exist.
여신들께서 부재한 상황이라도 오라클은 여전히 사람들에게 여신의 신탁을 전할 수 있습니다. {nl}그것이 바로 여신들께서 실재하신다는 증거가 아니겠습니까.
Bahkan ketika Goddess tidak berada di sekitar, Oracle masih menyampaikan pesan Goddess kepada orang-orang.{nl} Tentunya itu adalah bukti bahwa Goddess masih ada.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Medzio Diena was not nature's will.{nl}After all, nature is governed by the goddesses, and they would never do harm to us all.
신수의 날은 자연의 뜻이 아니에요.{nl}자연은 엄연한 여신의 영역. 여신께선 결코 우리를 해하지 않으십니다.
Medzio Diena itu bukanlah kehendak alam. Lagi pula, alam diatur oleh Goddess, dan mereka tidak akan pernah menyakiti kami semua.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I offer this Goddess Statue, which I have put all my heart and soul into, to the goddess of great honor and light.
큰 영광이자 빛인 여신께 내 모든 영혼을 담은 여신상을 바칩니다.
Saya memberikan Patung Goddess ini, yang saya buat sepenuh hati dan jiwa saya ke dalamnya, kepada Goddess yang terhormat dan bersinar.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Among my disciples, two of them followed me until my latter years and they will also be my successors after my death. {nl}
나의 제자 가운데 말년에 이른 지금까지 나를 따르고, 내가 숨을 거둔 뒤에도 그 성과를 이어받을 제자는 두 사람이다. {nl}
Saya memberikan Patung Goddess ini, yang saya buat sepenuh hati dan jiwa saya ke dalamnya, kepada Goddess yang terhormat dan bercahaya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: ...I am thinking whether I should thank the goddesses for this discovery or worry that my craving for knowledge could ruin the world.{nl}
..여신께서 내게 이러한 발견을 하게 하신 것을 감사해야 할지, 혹은 내 지나친 학문적 욕심이 세상에 누를 끼치게 되는 것은 아닌지 고민하는 바이다.{nl}
...Saya berpikir apakah saya harus berterima kasih kepada para Goddess untuk penemuan ini atau khawatir akan keinginan saya mengenai pengetahuan bisa merusak dunia.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I can't sleep well due to the fear of my research results being spread by interrogations from the demons. {nl}That's why I wish to pass the rest of the research to the one I can trust.
내 연구 성과가 혹여라도 마족의 탐문에 이 일이 알려지기라도 하면 큰 일이 아닐 수 없어 나는 밤잠을 이루기 어렵다.{nl}그래서 나는 이 사실을 감당할 수 있는 올곧은 자에게 이 연구의 처분을 남기려 한다.{nl}
Aku tidak bisa tidur dengan tenang karena takut hasil penelitian saya tersebarkan karena interogasi demon.{nl} Itulah sebabnya saya ingin memberikan seluruh penelitian saya kepada seseorang yang bisa saya percaya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Are you interested in the eternal life?{nl}We, Necromancers control the dead, so it's easy when you think about that.{nl}
너도 영생에 관심이 있는 건가?{nl}우리 네크로맨서들은 호흡이 없는 자를 다루니 거꾸로 생각하면 쉬운 일이지.{nl}
Apakah Kamu tertarik dengan hidup yang abadi?{nl} Kami, Necromancers mengontrol kematian, sehingga mudah jika Kamu memikirkannya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: If he asks about the weather, then tell him that it will be sunny.{nl}Okay then, I will be counting on you as I wait.
만일 그가 날씨에 대해서 묻거든 맑을 것이라고 답하시오.{nl}그럼 당신만 믿고 기다리겠소.
Jika ia bertanya mengenai cuaca, maka katakan padanya cuaca itu akan menjadi cerah.{nl} Baiklah kalau begitu, aku akan mengandalkanmu seperti dan Aku akan menunggu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: If he asks about the weather, then tell him that it will be cloudy. {nl}Okay then, I will be counting on you as I wait.
만일 그가 날씨에 대해서 묻거든 흐릴 것이라고 답하시오.{nl}그럼 당신만 믿고 기다리겠소.
Jika ia bertanya mengenai cuaca, maka katakan padanya cuaca itu akan menjadi berawan.{nl} Baiklah kalau begitu, aku akan mengandalkanmu seperti dan Aku akan menunggu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: If he asks about the weather, then tell him that it will be rainy. {nl}Okay then, I will be waiting for you.
만일 그가 날씨에 대해서 묻거든 비가 올 것이라고 답하시오.{nl}그럼 당신만 믿고 기다리겠소.
Jika ia bertanya mengenai cuaca, maka katakan padanya cuaca itu akan menjadi hujan.{nl} Baiklah kalau begitu, Aku akan menunggu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I am a merchant selling goods at Fedimian.{nl}Do you need anything from me?
저는 페디미안에 물건을 팔러다니는 행상을 하고 있습니다.{nl}저에게 뭔가 볼일이 있으신가요?
Saya seorang merchant yang menjual barang di Fedimian.{nl} Apakah Kamu membutuhkan sesuatu dari saya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Yes, we have a long way to go so I hope it won't rain.{nl}The weather won't get bad today, right?
네, 그런데 갈길이 먼데 행여 비라도 오는 게 아닌지 걱정입니다.{nl}오늘 중으로 날씨가 나빠지거나 하지는 않겠지요?
Ya, pejalanan kami masih panjang sehingga saya harap cuaca tidak hujan.{nl} Cuaca tidak akan memburuk hari ini, bukan?

Please select the user requiring a quest: So you are the one sent by the Monk Master.{nl}We've received the goods well.{nl}Please send my gratitude to the Monk Master.
몽크 마스터가 보내신 분이군요.{nl}물건은 잘 받겠습니다.{nl}몽크 마스터께는 감사하다고 전해주세요.
Jadi Kamu adalah orang yang dikirim oleh Monk Master.{nl} Kami telah menerima barangnya dengan baik.{nl} Tolong sampaikan rasa terima kasih saya kepada Monk Master.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Is that so... I must hurry then.
그렇습니까.. 어찌 되었든 서둘러야겠습니다.
Apakah benar begitu... aku harus bergegas kalau begitu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unfortunately, we don't have any goods to sell at the moment.
안타깝지만 지금은 팔 물건을 들고 있지 않습니다.
Sayangnya, kami tidak memiliki apapun untuk dijual saat ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Be careful on your way back.
당신도 조심해서 돌아가세요.
Hati-hati saat perjalanan kembali.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'll never forgive the monsters that killed my family. {nl}Though my body returns to the ground, my soul still burns with anger. {nl}Oh, goddess. Only the cold blood of the monsters can cool my rage.
내 가족들을 앗아간 몬스터들을 도저히 용서할 수가 없다. {nl}비록 육신은 대지로 돌아가련만 나의 영혼만은 꺼지지 않은 분노로 불타오를 것이다. {nl}아아, 여신이시여. 차가운 몬스터의 체액만이 저의 분노를 식힐 수 있겠습니까.
Aku tidak akan pernah memaafkan monster yang membunuh keluargaku.{nl} Meskipun tubuh Aku akan kembali ke tanah, jiwaku masih membakar dengan kemarahan.{nl} Oh, Goddess. Hanya darah dingin dari para monster yang dapat mendinginkan kemarahanku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: King Kadumel finally dies.
카듀멜 국왕이 마침내 눈을 감으리라.
King Kadumel akhirnya meninggal.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The balance of power between the demons and the goddesses, while fragile, has been stable for a long time.{nl}So long as they didn't cross each other's territories.{nl}
마족과 여신 사이의 미묘한 힘의 견제는 아주 오래 전 부터 있던 일이에요.{nl}서로의 영역을 침범하지 않는 선에서요.{nl}
Pemeriksaan kekuasaan antara demon dan Goddess telah stabil dalam waktu yang lama.{nl} Selama mereka tidak melewati wilayah masing-masing.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: But, the demons broke through first.{nl}With the Petrifying Frost... even the spirits became stones.
하지만 먼저 깬 건 마족이였어요.{nl}그것이 이 석화서리.. 죽음을 넘어서 영혼까지 돌이 되어 버렸지요.
Namun, demon menerobos terlebih dahulu.{nl} Dan dengan petrifying frost... bahkan para spirim menjadi batu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: As the demons started casting their petrification curse on this region, the goddesses tried to save the humans.{nl}However, the demons advised the goddesses that doing so would violate the rules that they mutually agreed to...
마족은 이 일대에 석화의 저주를 내렸고 여신들은 인간을 구원하려고 헀죠.{nl}하지만 마족은 서로의 일에 관여하지 않겠다는 규칙을 잊었냐며 그 곳에..{nl}
Disaat demon mulai melakukan casting petrification curse di wilayah ini, para Goddess mencoba untuk menyelamatkan manusia.{nl} Namun, demon yang mengatakan kepada para Goddess bila melakukan hal itu maka akan melanggar aturan yang mereka saling setujui…

Please select the user requiring a quest: Excuse me for a bit. It is a horrible memory...{nl}They brought the catastrophe. {nl}A strong catastrophe which made goddesses to give up rescuing this place.
잠시만요. 너무 끔찍한 기억이라서요..{nl}재앙을 내렸어요. 여신들이 석화된 이 곳의 구원을 포기해야 할 만큼 엄청난 재앙을요..
Permisi sebentar. Ini adalah memori yang mengerikan...{nl} Mereka membawa bencana. Sebuah bencana yang kuat dan membuat Goddess menyerah untuk menyelamatkan tempat ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The goddesses already gave up rescuing once as they couldn't do anything on Medzio Diena.{nl}But, we can't just give up.
이미 한 번 구원을 포기했고, 신수의 날엔 아무것도 할 수 없었지요.{nl}하지만 그렇다고 해서 전부 포기할 순 없어요.
Goddess sudah menyerah untuk menyelamatkan kita karena mereka tidak bisa melakukan apapun pada saat Medzio Diena.{nl} Namun, kita tidak boleh menyerah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Savior.{nl}As you can see, I cannot do anything myself at the moment.{nl}As you have heard, after Medzio Diena my powers have become weak...{nl}
구원자여.{nl}보시다시피 지금의 저는 혼자의 힘으론 아무것도 할 수 없는 처지입니다.{nl}그대들이 말하는 신수의 날 이후로 미약한 힘 만이 남아있을 뿐..{nl}
Savior.{nl} Seperti yang Kamu lihat, aku tidak bisa melakukan apapun sendirian pada saat ini.{nl} Seperti yang telah kamu dengar, setelah Medzio Diena kekuatanku telah melemah...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: A new disaster is brewing in this prison.{nl}The demons are invading through the dimensional crack, {nl}and are trying to take over this prison as a new base.{nl}
이 수감소에서는 새로운 재앙이 움트고 있습니다.{nl}마족들은 계속해서 전이의 틈새로 넘어와 이 수감소를 새로운 거점으로 만드려 하고 있지요.{nl}
Di penjara ini, bencana baru akan segera terjadi.{nl} Para demon yang terus berdatangan dari dimensional crack dan mereka mencoba untuk membuat penjara ini sebagai camp baru mereka.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't have any power left to close the dimensional crack.{nl}But, I think there is still a way.{nl}
저에겐 전이의 틈새를 닫을 힘 조차 남아있지 않습니다만.{nl}그렇다고 해서 아주 방법이 없는 건 아닙니다.{nl}
Aku tidak memiliki kekuatan yang tersisa untuk menutup dimensional crack.{nl} Namun, kurasa masih ada jalan lain.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Your help is the only way to turn this situation around.{nl}Since I am powerless, please lend me your power to close the dimensional crack.
바로 그대의 도움이 이 상황을 뒤집을 수 있는 유일한 돌파구이지요.{nl}부디 무력한 절 대신하여 전이의 틈새를 닫을 힘을 빌려주십시오.
Pertolongan kamu adalah satu-satunya cara untuk mengubah situasi ini berbalik.{nl} Karena aku tidak berdaya, tolong pinjamkan kekuatan kamu untuk menutup dimensional crack.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unforgivable.
용서할 수 없다.
Tak Termaafkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Additionally, the heart of a Stoulet is required after offering the flowers.{nl}Do you wish to dedicate a Stoulet Heart in exchange for my blessing?
헌화 한 이후에는 스타울리트 심장이 추가로 필요합니다.{nl}스타울리트 심장을 바치고 축복을 받으시겠습니까?
Selain itu, jantung Stoulet dibutuhkan setelah memberikan bunga.{nl} Apakah Kamu ingin mendedikasikan Stoulet Heart dan ditukarkan dengan blessing saya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: (A dubious black powder covers the pillar. Try scraping them off?)
이 기둥에 덕지덕지 붙은 검은색 가루가 신경쓰인다. 긁어내 볼까?
Perhatian saya tertuju kepada serbuk hitam yang ada di pilar ini. Haruskah saya mengikisnya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: (It's unreadable.)
읽히지 않는다.
Ini tidak terbaca.

Please select the user requiring a quest: (You can see number 1 on the pillar.)
기둥에서 1이라는 숫자가 보인다.
Kamu dapat melihatnya pada pilar nomor 1.

Please select the user requiring a quest: (You can see number 2 on the pillar.)
기둥에서 2라는 숫자가 보인다.
Kamu dapat melihatnya pada pilar nomor 2.

Please select the user requiring a quest: (You can see number 3 on the pillar.)
기둥에서 3이라는 숫자가 보인다.
Kamu dapat melihatnya pada pilar nomor 3.

Please select the user requiring a quest: (There is something vaguely written on the pillar. Is this a piece of symbol?)
희미하게 뭔가 적혀 있다. 문양 .. 조각..?
Ada sesuatu yang samar-samar tertulis di pilar. Apakah ini bagian dari simbol?

Please select the user requiring a quest: N/A
우리 상단?{nl}뭐 궁금하다니까 알려줘 볼까?
Merchant Committee kami?{nl}Kalau penasaran, haruskah kuberitahukan?

Please select the user requiring a quest: {nl}I would say that the world has grown to such a state that it cannot live without us.{nl}Developing the Crystal Mines, providing construction materials to the Astral Tower and the Great Cathedral.{nl}We, the Kedoran Merchant Alliance, are the ones that made such feats possible.
{nl}실은 우리 상단이야말로 이 세상에서 없어서는 안 될 존재지.{nl}수정광산을 개발했다든지, 별의 탑, 대성당 등의 대형 공사의 자재를 공급했다든지 하는 일 말이야.{nl}그런 일을 해 온 상단이 바로 우리 케도라 상단이라네.
{nl}Sebenarnya kami Merchant Alliance adalah sesuatu yang tidak ada jika dunia ini tidak ada.{nl}yang dimaksud adalah pekerjaan mendistribusikan material bangunan skala besar dari mengembangkan Crsytal Mine, Astral Tower, Cathedral Etc.{nl}Merchant Committee yang melakukan hal itu semua adalah kami yaitu Kedora Merchant Alliance.

Please select the user requiring a quest: {nl}However, areas nearby suffered enormous damage on Medzio Diena. {nl}A great deal of our original power was lost, and thereafter, we could only do what we knew we could do.
{nl}하지만 신수의 날에 이 근처에서 막대한 피해를 입었지.{nl}그래서 과거보다는 많이 세력이 줄긴 했지만 또 그렇기 때문에 더 열심히 제 할일을 하고 있다고 생각해.
{nl}Tetapi hari Medzio Diena, memberikan kerusakan besar di sekitar sini.{nl}Maka dari itu kekuatan banyak berkurang dibandingkan di masa lampau, tetapi karena itu aku berpikir untuk melakukan pekerjaanku dengan lebih serius.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Behold.{nl}This is the result of the great disaster.
보이시나요.{nl}이것은 이미 벌어진 재앙..{nl}
Terlihatkah.{nl} ini adalah bencana yang sudah terjadi..{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: However, it seems like the disaster has only begun.{nl}The demons are looking for the Light of Salvation.{nl}
하지만 더 거대한 재앙의 싹이 움트려 해요.{nl}마족은 구원의 빛을 노리고 있어요.{nl}
Tetapi bencana yang jauh lebih besar akan menyebar sekejap.{nl}Demon mengincar cahaya dari keselamatan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: At this rate...{nl}All life in this world will come to an end.{nl}
이대로라면 이 세계가.. {nl}모든 생명이 종말을 맞이하고 말 거예요.{nl}
Jika terus begini, maka dunia ini…{nl}Maka seluruh kehidupan akan mengalami akhir.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I ask for your help...{nl}
도와주세요..{nl}
Tolong…{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Only you...{nl}Only the Revelator can save this world.{nl}
당신만이.. {nl}계시자만이 이 세계를 구할 수 있어요..{nl}
Hanya kamu...{nl}Hanya Savior saja yang dapat menyelamatkan dunia..{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please go to Klaipeda. {nl}And please... do everything you can to keep the Light of Salvation safe from the demons.
클라페다로 가세요..{nl}부디 구원의 빛을.. 마족에게서 지켜주세요.
Pergilah ke Klaipeda..{nl}Tolong jagalah cahaya keselamatan itu… dari para Demon.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Yurate
유라테
Yurate

Please select the user requiring a quest: N/A
몬스터한테 이미 뜯어먹힌 건 아닌지..
Tidak mungkin sudah dicabik dan dimakan oleh monster kan..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hammer? You need it to make a sanctum?
망치? 성소를 만드는 데 필요하다고?
Hammer? Kamu memerlukannya untuk membuat sebuah sanctum?

Please select the user requiring a quest: {nl}I can't give you what I was using so take this if you want. It will be gone once you use it.
{nl}내가 쓰는 걸 줘 버릴 수는 없고, 일단 이 낡은 거라도 가져가던가. 한번 쓰면 없어질거요.
{nl} Saya tidak bisa memberikanmu yang biasa saya gunakan jadi ambilah ini jika Kamu menginginkannya. Ini akan menghilang setelah Kamu menggunakannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hammer, I've already given it to you. Why are you asking for it again?
망치, 이미 줬는데 뭘 또 달래?
Hammer, saya sudah memberikannya kepadamu. Mengapa Kamu memintanya lagi?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Repairing the Sanctum...
성소 수리라..
Memperbaiki Sanctum…

Please select the user requiring a quest: In usual circumstances, I would sell it, but I will just give it to you for free this time. {nl}But, it can be only used once.
평소 같으면야 돈 받고 팔겠지만, 이번만은 그냥 드리지요. 대신 1회용이라오.
Dalam kondisi biasanya, Aku akan menjualnya, tetapi Aku akan memberikannya kepada Kamu secara gratis kali ini. Namun, itu hanya dapat digunakan sekali.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You're too greedy. One will be enough.
욕심도 많으시지. 한개면 충분할거요.
Kamu terlalu serakah. Satu saja sudah cukup.

Please select the user requiring a quest: While I may have built my sanctum here, {nl}the materials for making a goddess scripture is found elsewhere. {nl}Thus, we have founded this religious organization,{nl}to look for the records of the Ancient Sages of the Rhud Order.
여기서 나는 성소를 만들고 있지만, 다른 곳에는 여신 경전을 만들기 위해 재료를 공수하고 있다든지, 러드종단 선현들의 기록을 찾아 정리하는 등의 일을 하는 종단원들이 있소.
Aku sedang membuat Sanctuary di sini, tetapi aku juga sedang memindahkan material melalui udara untuk membuat scripture di tempat lain, Sekte Reode mencari catatan dari Ancient Sages dan memiliki anggota sekte yang bekerja merapikannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Kedoran Merchant Alliance Notice Board
케도라 상단 알림판
Pemberitahuan Kedora Merchant Alliance

Please select the user requiring a quest: This vicinity is Kedoran Merchant Alliance's excavation site.
이 근처는 케도라 상단의 발굴지 입니다.
Di sekitar sini adalah tempat penggalian Kedora Merchant Alliance.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Received the benefits of the... Kedoran Merchant Alliance.{nl}Somehow I'm full of energy.
케도라 상단.. 이라는 혜택을 받았다.{nl}어쩐지 기운이 솟는다.
Mendapatkan fasilitas dari… Kedora Merchant Alliance.{nl}Entah kenapa energi meluap.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Kedoran Merchant Alliance's good is near the upper right corner.
우상단 가까운 곳에 상단 물품이 있다고 한다.
Katanya terdapat item Merchant Alliance dekat pada bagian kanan atas.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Kedoran Merchant Alliance's good is near upper end.
위쪽 가까운 곳에 상단 물품이 있다고 한다.
Katanya terdapat item Merchant Alliance dekat pada bagian atas.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Kedoran Merchant Alliance's good is near the upper left corner.
좌상단 가까운 곳에 상단 물품이 있다고 한다.
Katanya terdapat item Merchant Alliance dekat pada bagian kiri atas.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Is it below?
아래쪽인가?
Apakah itu di bawah?

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Kedoran Merchant Alliance's good is a bit far away in the upper right corner.
우상단 조금 먼 곳에 상단 물품이 있다고 한다.
Katanya terdapat item Merchant Alliance sedikit jauh pada bagian kanan atas.

급진쪽은 아나스토스 중에서도 소수예요.{nl}네스토스랑 대립만 하고 있을 것이 아니라 적극적으로 그들을 교화시키자는 주장을 하는 거죠.{nl}그래서 아마 그 알비나스라는 사람도 급진쪽이라고 자신을 이야기 했을 거예요.
Orang-orang yang progresif adalah minoritas di antara Anastos.{nl}Mereka menyatakan untuk menghentikan bertentangan dengan Nestos, melainkan mencoba untuk mengubah Nestos. {Nl} Sehingga Albinas mungkin mengatakan kepada mereka dia juga progresif.

Please select the user requiring a quest: N/A
{nl}그래야 네스토스들의 성소를 부수는 일에 당신을 끌어들일 수 있을 테니.
{nl}Dengan begitu dapat menarik kamu pada pekerjaan menghancurkan Nestos' Sanctuary.

Please select the user requiring a quest: They say what is the use in the world with disappeared goddesses, but we believe goddesses will one day return and save us.{nl}Is it wrong to pray so that the day will come sooner?{nl}These monuments were built with our devotion from our praying hearts.{nl}Until some strange person came and destroyed the monuments, it symbolized our prayers.
여신이 사라진 세상에 무슨 소용이냐는 말도 있지만, 우리는 언젠가 여신이 돌아오셔서 우리를 구원해 주실 것을 믿소.{nl}그 날이 하루라도 빨리 오기를 기원 하는 것이 잘못된 것이오?{nl}그런 기원의 마음으로 정성을 모아 세운 것이 이 비석들이요.{nl}어떤 이상한 녀석이 와서 파괴하기 전까지는 멀쩡히 우리의 기원을 상징하고 있었고.
Ada yang berkata apa gunanya ada di dunia dimana Goddess telah menghilang, tetapi kami selalu percaya bahwa Goddess akan kembali dan menyelamatkan kami.{nl}Sungguh permohonan yang salah karena meminta hari itu lebih cepat datang  walaupun sehari saja kan?{nl}Yang mengumpulkan dan mendirikan kesetiaan itu dengan hati adalah Tombstone ini.{nl}Seluruh permintaan kami telah terwakilkan, sampai seorang yang aneh datang dan menghancurkannya!

Please select the user requiring a quest: If it's a normal monument, we prayed to release such an aura.[nl]It's not some corruption!{nl}Working under someone who neither understand or can hear, did the person who destoryed our monuments saw it as a corruption?
정상적인 비석이라면 그런 오오라가 나오도록 기도를 걸어 놓았던 거요.{nl}오염 따위가 아니라고!{nl}알지도 듣지도 못한 사람이 시킨 일이라면서 우리 비석을 파괴한 녀석이 보기에는 오염으로 보였던 건가?
Jika itu adalah Tombstone yang normal, maka diperlukan doa agar muncul aura yang seperti itu.{nl}Bukan seperti polusi kataku!{nl}Pekerjaan yang disuru oleh orang yang tidak tahu dan tidak mendengar katamu! {nl}menurut pandangan orang yang menghancurkan tombstone kita, apakah itu terlihat seperti polusi?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Do you finally understand?{nl}What your utter stupidity has caused?{nl}If you understand, start trying to think of a way to revert this.{nl}This can't simply be ignored.
이제 좀 알겠소?{nl}당신이 얼마나 얼척없는 일을 저질렀는지? {nl}알겠다면 이제 이걸 다시 되돌릴 방법이나 궁리 하든가.{nl}그냥 대충 넘어갈 수는 없지.
Apakah sekarang mulai mengerti?{nl}Kamu sudah melakukan hal yang seberapa bodoh? {nl} Kalau sudah mengerti coba pikirkan cara untuk mengembalikan ini kembali.{nl}Tidak bisa melakukannya hanya dengan asal-asalan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Below, I believe there's someone destroying Nestospa's Monuments by disguising as Anastospa.{nl}Can you go and investigate?{nl}It might be dangerous, take this flare.{nl}Be careful.
저 아래쪽에 아나스토스파를 사칭해서 네스토스파의 비석을 파괴하고 다니는 사람이 있는것 같아. {nl}가서 좀 조사를 해 봐 주겠어? {nl}혹시 위험해 질지도 모르니 이 불꽃 신호탄을 가지고 가 봐. {nl}조심해.
DI bawah sana, sepertinya terdapat orang yang menghancurkan Nestos Tombstone yang disebut Anastos. {nl}Maukah kau pergi kesana, dan memeriksanya untukku? {nl}Karena mungkin disana berbahaya, bawalah Temporary Flare ini. {nl}Waspadalah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Why are there only seniors there?{nl}Darn.. Is this monocle a sham?{nl}

Disana tidak ada apapun selain orang manula katanya?{nl}Ini.. Bukankah ini Monocle Sun Ongtori?{nl}

그래도 노인이 네가 찾는 계시란 걸 알고 있다니 정말 잘 됐네.{nl}어쨌든 내 얘긴 안한거지? {nl}잘했어, 잘했어.{nl}
Walaupun begitu, sungguh hal baik karena para manula adalah Savior yang kau sedang cari.{nl}Omong-omong mereka tak bicara tentangku kan? {nl}bagus,bagus.{nl}

그나저나, 다른 구역으로 가려면 인증표가 필요하단 말이지..{nl}나도 인증표를 만들 수 있도록 나중에 쪽지라도 남겨줄래?{nl}
Omong-omong, Jika ingin pergi ke distrik lainnya, membutuhkan Certification Ticket kan..{nl}Maukah kamu meninggalkan surat nanti, agar aku juga dapat membuat Certification Ticket?{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: There's something I need to find out.{nl}Let's go in our separate ways while keeping in contacts with each other. Do you understand?

Ada hal yang harus kucari tahu loh.{nl}Sambil melakukan kontak di sela-sela, mari bergerak secara terpisah dalam waktu dekat. Mengerti?

Berhenti berpikir kalau ini adalah metode yang buruk. Ini adalah metode terbaik yang bisa saya pikirkan untuk membantu Kamu saat ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Saviors, who followed all the way here by having faith in the revelation.{nl}You are gradually getting closer to the truth.{nl}
여기까지 계시를 믿고 따라와 준 구원자여.{nl}그대는 점점 진실에 다가가고 있습니다.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Savior. What does the Divine Tree mean to humans?{nl}A symbol of calamity, the roots of everyone's sorrow in this land...
구원자여. 인간들에게 있어 신수란 무엇입니까.{nl}재앙의 상징, 이 땅에 내린 모든 슬픔의 근원.. {nl}
Savior. Apakah yang dimaksud Medzio Diena kepada para manusia.{nl}sumber dari semua kesedihan yang turun ke tanah ini, pertanda bencana.. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: No.{nl} That's the image created by the crooked hearts of the demons.{nl}
아닙니다.{nl}그것은 마족들의 비뚤어진 사랑이 만들어 낸 심상입니다.{nl}
Bukan.{nl}Itu adalah gambar yang muncul karena cinta persilangan dari Para Demon.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: In the beginning... There was God.{nl}
태초에.. 신께서 계셨습니다.{nl}
Awalnya…Dewa itu ada. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: A sky with dancing stars, land to support that sky...{nl}It was all created together with humans and other lives.{nl}
별이 움직이는 하늘, 그것을 떠받쳐 줄 땅..{nl}그리고 인간과 그 외의 모든 생명을 만드셨지요.{nl}
Bintang yang bergerak di langit, tanah yang mendukung akan hal itu..{nl}Lalu membuat manusia dan semua kehidupan lain diluarnya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: And thus the world was created.{nl}The God who painted the world with radiance had fallen to an eternal dream.{nl}
그렇게 세계는 만들어졌습니다.{nl}세상이 아름답게 물들자 신께서는 스스로 영원한 꿈에 빠지셨습니다.{nl}
Begitulah dunia ini dibuat.{nl}Dewa yang ingin menghiasi dunia dengan indah, perlahan terlelap dalam mimpi yang kekal.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Divine Tree. It is another form that God has taken for himself.{nl}The God had turned into a tree that will breathe life force out to the world, {nl}making the world complete.{nl}
신수. 바로 그것이 신의 다른 모습입니다.{nl}신께서는 이 세계의 완성을 위해 세계에 생명력을 불어넣는 나무가 되신 것이지요.{nl}
Medzio Diena. Itu secara langsung adalah bentuk lain dari dewa.{nl}Dewa menjadi pohon yang meniupkan kehidupan pada dunia untuk menyelesaikan dunia ini.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: We are beings that are born to groom the world and the Divine Tree...{nl}The God has asked us to not wake him up from his slumber.{nl}
본디 저희들은 신수와 세계를 가꾸기 위해 태어난 존재..{nl}신께서는 자신의 잠을 절대 깨우지 말라고 당부하셨습니다.{nl}
Awalnya kami adalah sesuatu yang lahir untuk menumbuhkan dunia dan Medzio Diena..{nl}Dewa meminta agar dirinya tidak pernah dibangunkan dari tidurnya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thus, we lived side by side in the new peaceful age.{nl}However, there began a feeling of thirst within some.{nl}
그렇게 저희들은 평화로운 시대에 어우러져 살아갔습니다.{nl}하지만 어떤 이들은 점점 마음 속에 움터오는 목마름을 느꼈지요.{nl}
Kami tinggal bergandengan dalam era kedamaian.{nl}Tetapi sekelompok orang merasakan kehausan yang muncul di dalam hatinya perlahan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The fact that God is not by us.{nl}The moment that people realized the absence of God was the source of their thirst, {nl}we could no longer live together.{nl}
신이 곁에 없다는 것.{nl}그들의 목마름이 신의 부재라는 걸 깨달았을 때 우리는 함께 살아갈 수 없었습니다.{nl}
Dewa yang tidak ada di sekeliling.{nl}Kita tidak dapat hidup bersama ketika rasa haus mereka setelah mengetahui butuhnya keberadaan akan dewa.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: In the end, the thirst that has craved for God had grown into obsession for awakening the God.{nl}They threw away the name that God had given them, {nl}and took the mantle named "Demon" within them.{nl}
결국 신을 갈구하는 목마름은 신을 깨우는 계획으로 치달았습니다.{nl}그들은 신께서 주신 이름을 버리고 스스로 마족이라 칭하였지요.{nl}
Akhirnya rasa lapar akan dewa tercapai dengan rencana membangunkan dewa.{nl}Mereka membuang nama yang diberikan oleh dewa, dan memanggil diri sendiri sebagai Demon.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The obsessions... It has brought calamity upon this world.{nl}In order to be loved... They had decided they needed to disobey God's words and awaken him.{nl}
그리고 그 집착은.. 이 세계에 재앙을 불러왔습니다.{nl}오직 신을 깨우기 위해.. 사랑을 받기 위해 신의 뜻을 거스른 것입니다.{nl}
Lalu obsesi itu.. Telah memanggil bencana ke dunia ini.{nl}Hanya untuk membangunkan dewa saja.. Mengalirkan arti dari dewa untuk mendapatkan cinta .{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Savior.{nl}You are the one that will take God's revelation, {nl}and save the world from the demons and truly make the world complete.{nl}
구원자여.{nl}그대만이 신의 뜻을 이어받아 마족에게서 세상을 구하고 세계를 완성할 존재입니다.{nl}
Savior.{nl}Mereka yang mendapat kontak dengan para dewa, menyelamatkan dunia dari para demon, dan keberadaan yang menyempurnakan dunia.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The time is nigh.{nl}I will wait in the cruel place that the tyrant has carved out.
이제 머지 않았습니다.{nl}폭군이 벼려낸 참혹간 공간에서 그대를 기다리겠습니다.
Sekarang sudah tidak jauh lagi.{nl}Tirant menunggu kamu dari disasterous space.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It is so fortunate that I am able to see you again.
다시 널 볼 수 있어서 다행이야.
Sangat beruntung bagi saya bisa bertemu lagi denganmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Do you remember when I asked you to check if the Monocle detected any strong powers?{nl}You've told me that there's only an old manager there. {nl}The things that we thought were hidden under the special force were actually demons. {nl}And even more absurd, the object that we felt the strong power was in fact the manager.
내가 모노클에 강한 힘이 탐지된다면서 확인해달라고 했을 때 기억나?{nl}확인하고 돌와온 넌 내게 늙은 관리인만 있다고 말했어. 특별한 힘에 감춰진 물건이라 생각했던 것이 막상 마족 몬스터들이였지. 그리고 말도 안될 정도로 강하게 느껴졌던 물건이라 생각했던게 확인하고 보니깐 늙은 관리인이였어.
Apakah Kamu ingat ketika saya meminta Kamu untuk memeriksa apakah Monocle mendeteksi kekuatan yang kuat?{nl} Kamu mengatakan kepadaku bahwa hanya ada seorang manajer tua di sana. Sesuatu yang tersembunyi di balik kekuatan special itu ialah para demon. Dan bahkan yang lebih tidak masuk akal adalah, objek dengan kekuatan yang kuat yang kita rasakan sebenarnya adalah manajer itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: After I separated from you, I've been searching for Monocle... {nl}There were only demons at the place where the special force was detected.{nl}So I thought maybe Monocle can only be seen by the demons...
너와 헤어진 이 후에도 난 모노클로 계속 탐색을 했는데.. 특별한 힘이 감지된 곳엔 마족 몬스터밖에 없었지.{nl} 그래서 난 이런 생각을 했어. 어쩌면 모노클은 마족을 볼 수 있는 물건이 아닐까...
Setelah saya berpisah dengan Anda, saya sedang mencari Monocle... Hanya ada demon di tempat di mana kekuatan special itu terdeteksi.{nl} Jadi saya pikir mungkin Monocle hanya bisa terlihat oleh para demon…

Please select the user requiring a quest: I will go to the left side. You go to the right side and look for the parts.
난 왼편으로 가겠네. 자네는 오른편으로 가서 부품을 찾게.
Aku akan pergi ke sisi kiri. Kamu pergi ke sisi kanan dan mencari komponen-komponennya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We were almost killed by the demons.
하마터면 마족에게 휘둘리다가 죽을 뻔했어.
Kita hampir terbunuh oleh para demon.

Please select the user requiring a quest: (This guard lost his consciousness. Let's pick up the bomb.)
경비병이 의식을 잃었다. 어서 폭탄을 챙기자.
Penjaga itu kehilangan kesadarannya. Ayo kita ambil bomnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We've succeeded distracting the guards.{nl}Let's go deep inside!
왕국군 경비병들의 눈을 돌리는데 성공한거 같아.{nl}어서 더 안쪽 구역으로 가자!
Kita telah berhasil mengalihkan perhatian para penjaga.{nl} Ayo kita pergi lebih jauh ke dalam!

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't want to meet you as an enemy next time.{nl}Let's return to where Delus is.
다음부터는 적으로 만나지 않았으면 좋겠습니다.{nl}일단 델루스님이 계신 곳으로 돌아가지요.
Aku tidak ingin bertemu dengan kamu sebagai musuh di kemudian hari.{nl} Ayo kita kembali ke tempat Delus berada.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You're an intruder, but I guess we have no choice.{nl}I will go to the place where my colleagues are.
침입자이지만, 어쩔 수 없군요.{nl}일단 동료들이 있는 곳으로 가겠습니다.
Kamu seorang penyusup, tapi kurasa kita tidak punya pilihan.{nl} Aku akan pergi ke tempat di mana rekan-rekanku berada.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Darn... To think I have to ask an intruder for help...{nl}Anyway, I will return.
난감하군. 침입자에게 도움이라니..{nl}어쨌든 돌아가겠어.
Sial... aku harus meminta bantuan kepada penyusup... {nl} Baiklah, aku akan kembali.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We can't just let go of your intrusion into the Fortress of the Land. {nl}Of course, we can't just forget about your help.
당신이 대지의 요새에 침입한 건 그냥 넘어갈 수 없는 일입니다. {nl}그렇다고 우릴 도와준 것도 그냥 넘어갈 순 없는 일이죠.
Kita tidak bisa membiarkan Kamu menyusup ke Fortress of the Great Earth.{nl} Tentu saja, kami tidak bisa melupakan bantuan Anda.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We appreciate for your help, but we can't just ignore the royal order.
저희를 도와드린 것은 감사드리지만 왕명을 거스를 순 없습니다.
Kami sangat menghargai bantuanmu, tetapi kami tidak bisa mengabaikan perintah kerajaan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please get out of the Fortress of the Land.
대지의 요새를 나가주십시오.
Silakan keluar dari Fortress of the Great Earth.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ruklys Army Soldier's Spirit
루클리스 부대 병사의 영혼
Ruklys' Army Spirit

Please select the user requiring a quest: Escape...
도망쳐..
Kabur..

Please select the user requiring a quest: The resistance has been weakened. Let's use the token of the restraint.
저항이 약해졌다. 속박의 증표를 사용하자.
Daya tahan telah melemah. Ayo gunakan token untuk menahannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Premier Eminent is giving some orders to the demons.
프리미어 에미넌트가 마족들에게 뭔가 지시하는 것 같다.
Premier Eminent memberikan beberapa perintah kepada para demon.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Pursuit
추적
Melacak

Please select the user requiring a quest: (No bloodstain or corpse to be seen.)
혈흔이나 시체 같은건 보이지 않는다.
Tidak terlihat ceceran darah atau mayat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I will be stationing one of our guards here in case you're planning to run away.
혹시라도 당신이 도망칠 것에 대비해 경비병 한 명을 붙이겠습니다.
Aku akan menempatkan salah satu penjaga kami di sini untuk berjaga-jaga bila Kamu berencana untuk melarikan diri.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Beyond Pilgrim's Way is the Great Cathedral, which was built by Maven. {nl}Ruklys, Lydia Schaffen, and Agailla Flurry were all his disciples.{nl}
순례자의 길 너머엔 현자 메이번이 지었다던 대성당이 있습니다.{nl}그 유명한 루클리스라던가 리디아 샤펜, 아가일라 플러리가 그의 제자들이지요.{nl}
Di luar Pilgrim Way terdapat Great Cathedral, yang dibangun oleh Maven.{nl}Ruklys, Lydia Schaffen, dan Agailla Flurry semuanya adalah muridnya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Among them, the Paladin Master was a hero who saved many lives in the capital. {nl}Currently, he has gone to Srautas Gorge to fight a great evil...
그 중 팔라딘 마스터는 수도에서 많은 이들을 구한 영웅입니다.{nl}현재 그는 거대한 악에 맞서기 위해 스라우타스 협곡으로..
Di antara mereka, Paladin Master adalah seorang pahlawan yang menyelamatkan banyak nyawa di capital.{nl} Saat ini, ia sedang pergi ke Srautas Gorge untuk melawan kejahatan…

Please select the user requiring a quest: Many people made bets with Modestas to find out who the statue of the goddess is, but Modesta has never lost before he died.
많은 이들이 여신상이 누구인지 알기 위해 모데스타스에게 내기를 걸었지만 모데스타스가 눈을 감을 때 까지 지는 일은 결코 없었었습니다.
Banyak orang yang bertaruh dengan Modestas untuk mengetahui siapa nama patung Goddess ini, namun Modesta tidak pernah kalah sebelum ia meninggal.

Please select the user requiring a quest: By the end of my life I hope to see Fedimian completely restored.{nl}If there's one thing I can do, I can make 1,000 pots in dedication to this wish.
내 명이 다하기 전에 페디미안이 완전히 복구되기를. {nl}하나못해 소원이 담긴 도자기를 천 개라도 빚을 수 있기를.
Pada akhir hidup saya, saya berharap untuk melihat Fedimian benar-benar kembali pulih{nl}. Jika ada satu hal yang dapat saya lakukan, saya bisa membuat 1.000 pot untuk mendedikasikan keinginan ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I hope I can make it big off of the excavation site at Zachariel's Royal Mausoleum...
자카리엘의 왕릉 발굴지에서 크게 한건 할 수 있기를..
Saya harap saya bisa memperluas situs penggalian di Zachariel Royal Tomb…

Please select the user requiring a quest: I beg to the goddess. {nl}I hope the day when my oath to the Watchers is realized never comes...
여신께 간청합니다. {nl}부디 파수꾼들과의 맹약을 실현시킬 그 날이 오지 않길..
Saya memohon kepada Goddess.{nl} Saya harap hari ketika saya bersumpah kepada Watchers tidak akan pernah datang…

Please select the user requiring a quest: When I close my eyes at last, I hope my many disciples will protect me at my side.
내가 눈을 감을 땐, 많은 제자들이 나의 곁을 지켜 주었으면 좋겠다.
Ketika saya menutup mata untuk terakhir kalinya, saya harap banyak dari muridku yang akan melindungiku di sampai akhir.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Now is the moment that we become one with our blades. My last wish is to die beside the one I love.
검의 경지를 이룬 지금, 사랑하는 이의 품에서 눈을 감는 것 만이 마지막 소원이오.
Sekarang adalah saatnya kami bersatu dengan pisau kami. Keinginan terakhir saya adalah untuk mati di samping orang yang saya cintai.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Why did you come back?{nl}
왜 다시 돌아오셨죠?{nl}
Mengapa Kamu kembali?{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: It is so fortunate to hear that Grazina is okay.{nl}But, I guess Grazina can't be relaxed since she gave this to me.{nl}
그라지나가 무사하다니 정말 다행입니다.{nl}하지만 제게 이걸 굳이 전해 준 걸 보면 그라지나도 안심할 수 없는 모양입니다.{nl}
Sungguh sangat melegakan mendengar bahwa Grazina baik-baik saja.{nl} Namun, kurasa Grazina tidak bisa tenang karena ia memberikan ini kepadaku.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: This is the second page of the Roxona Conflict that I gave to you a while ago.{nl}It was among the objects which Grazina stole. Please receive it.{nl}
아, 이건 아까 드렸던 록소나 내전의 2장입니다.{nl}그라지나가 빼돌렸다는 물건 중에 껴 있더군요. 받아주세요.{nl}
Ini adalah halaman 2 dari Konflik Roxona yang saya berikan kepada Kamu beberapa saat yang lalu.{nl} Itu adalah barang-barang yang dicuri Grazina. Tolong terima ini.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: And Alina... I am not sure.{nl}She ran to the lower side so I think she may be near there.
그리고 알리나는.. 저도 모르겠습니다.{nl}헤어질 때 아랫쪽으로 뛰어갔으니 아마 그 근처에 있지 않을까 합니다만.
Dan Alina... aku tidak yakin.{nl} Ia berlari ke sisi yang lebih rendah jadi kurasa ia mungkin berada di dekat sana.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You've passed the object and the story of Grazina.
그라지나의 이야기와 물건을 전했다
Kamu telah menerima benda dan kisah dari Grazina.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please find Alina...
알리나를 찾아주십시오..
Tolong temukan Alina…

Please select the user requiring a quest: 2nd page of the Roxona Conflict
록소나 내전 2장
Halaman 2 dari Konflik Roxona

Please select the user requiring a quest: The time went by and the summer, the season of new green leaves came...{nl}Lydia Schaffen wandered around to find the one who'd killed her parents and relatives.{nl}The goddesses were on her side after all.{nl}The time that she's been waiting for has finally come.{nl}
시간은 흐르고 신록이 잦아드는 여름..{nl}리디아 샤펜은 부모와 친지를 죽인 원수를 찾아 헤멨다.{nl}여신은 결국 그녀의 편이였는가.{nl}기다리고 기다리던 때가 드디어 오고야 말았다.{nl}
Waktu berlalu dan musim panas, merupakan musim daun hijau baru tumbuh...{nl} Lydia Schaffen berkeliling untuk menemukan orang yang telah membunuh orang tua dan kerabatnya.{nl} Para Goddess selalu berada di sisinya.{nl} Waktu yang ia nantikan akhirnya datang.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: One by one they fell in the dark to her unexpected arrows.{nl}Although it should have been an easy fight for them, they never knew where she was.{nl}The sound of her arrows ripped through air and skin.{nl}Soon there were no one other than Lydia Schaffen, who stood still.{nl}
어둠 속에서 예상하지 못한 그녀의 화살에 그들은 한 명씩 고꾸라졌다.{nl}일대 다의 승부임에도 불구하고 그들은 리디아 샤펜이 어디에 있는지조차도 몰랐다.{nl}그녀의 활이 튕기는 날카로운 울림은 공기와 살갗을 찢었다.{nl}그리고 아무도 없었다. 오직 리디아 샤펜만이 서 있었다.{nl}
Satu per satu mereka jatuh kedalam kegelapan dan terkena anak panah yang tak terduga.{nl} Meskipun seharusnya mudah bagi mereka untuk melawan, mereka tidak pernah tahu di mana ia berada.{nl} Suara anak panahnya merobek udara dan kulit.{nl} Sampai akhirnya tidak ada orang lain yang tersisa selain Lydia Schaffen.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Lydia Schaffen raised her torch.{nl}The flame wavered ominously, causing her shadow to waver as well...{nl}She wanted to see the faces of the villains who killed her parents and neighbors as well as burnt the village.{nl}Many of the faces she saw for the first time, but some of them were familiar.{nl}They were loyal subordinates of Ruklys and she knew very well about them.{nl} If it had been a brighter time and different location, she may have noticed the incident before it occurred.{nl}But, the incident had occurred and it was irrevocable.{nl}Just as Lydia Schaffen had her reasons to kill her enemies, Ruklys now had his: to defeat her for killing his subordinates.{nl}
리디아 샤펜은 횃불을 들었다.{nl}불길하게 흔들리는 횃불, 일렁이는 그림자..{nl}부모와 이웃을 죽이고 마을을 불태워버린 흉악한 악당들의 얼굴을 확인하고 싶었다.{nl}모르는 자들이 적지 않았으나 그 가운데 낯익은 얼굴들이 보였다.{nl}그들은 루클리스의 충성스런 부하들이었고 그녀도 잘 아는 사람들이었다.{nl}조금 더 밝은 시간에 다른 장소였다면, 혹은 더 나은 상황이었다면 일이 이렇게 되기 전에 알아차릴 수도 있었다.{nl}그러나 일은 벌어졌고 사건은 돌이킬 수 없는 것이 되었다.{nl}이유가 어디 있건 리디아 샤펜이 그녀의 원수를 처단하지 않을 수 없었던 것처럼 루클리스 역시 부하들을 살해한 자를 그냥 넘길 수 없으리라.{nl}
Lydia Schaffen mengangkat obornya.{nl} Api bergoyang tak menentu, menyebabkan bayangannya tak menentu juga...{nl} Ia ingin memeriksa wajah para penjahat yang membunuh orang tuanya dan kerabatnya yang membakar desanya.{nl} Banyak wajah-wajah yang ia baru lihat untuk pertama kalinya, tetapi beberapa dari mereka tidak asing.{nl} mereka pengikut setia Ruklys dan ia tahu betul siapa mereka.{nl} Jika sudah pada waktu yang cerah dan di lokasi yang berbeda.., ia mungkin ditemukan terlebih dahulu sebelum insiden itu terjadi{nl} Namun, insiden itu telah terjadi dan itu tidak dapat diulang kembali{nl} Sama seperti Lydia Schaffen yang punya alasan untuk membunuh musuh-musuhnya, Ruklys sekarang memilik alasan: untuk mengalahkannya karena telah membunuh pengikutnya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: With a gloomy sense of shame and unfamiliar embarrassment, {nl}she quietly picked up her bow and left the place.{nl}The news soon reached Ruklys.{nl}They both comforted themselves by thinking that they just fell into a wicked plan.{nl}But, it was useless. They felt the vague shadow of the wicked plan behind them.{nl}
암울한 자괴감과 낯선 당혹감 속에서 그녀는 조용히 활을 챙겨 천천히 그 장소를 떠났다.{nl}머지 않아 이 소식은 루클리스의 귀에 들어갈 것이다.{nl}역겨운 흉계에 빠졌을 뿐이다.{nl}그렇게 스스로를 위로해 봤자 소용 없는 일이었다.{nl}그와 그녀 둘 다 어렴풋이 흉계 뒤의 그림자를 느끼고 있었다.{nl}
Dengan rasa murung dan malu, ia diam-diam mengambil busur dan meninggalkan tempat itu.{nl} Kabar itu segera terdengan oleh Ruklys.{nl} Mereka berdua berusaha untuk menghibur diri dengan berpikir bahwa mereka telah jatuh ke dalam rencana yang jahat.{nl} Namun, itu tidak berguna.{nl} Mereka telah merasakan bayangan yang tersamarkan dari rencana jahat di belakang mereka.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: But, it was too late.{nl}There was nothing she could do except for put an end to Ruklys, {nl}with the arrows that she now love and hate.{nl}Or else his sword will guide her to the goddesses... There was nothing she could do.
하지만 이미 때는 늦었다.{nl}애증어린 화살로 루클리스의 숨을 거두어 주는 일 외에는 해줄 것이 없었다.{nl}혹은 그의 검이 그녀를 여신의 품으로 인도하는 일 밖엔.. 할 수 있는 것이 없었다.
Tapi, itu sudah terlambat.{nl} Tidak ada yang bisa ia lakukan kecuali untuk mengakhiri Ruklys dengan panah yang ia cintai dan sekaligus ia benci.{nl} Atau pedang Ruklys akan membimbingnya ke pada Goddess... tiada yang bisa ia lakukan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There is one more thing I must tell you. {nl}Follow the name of Ruklys.{nl}
그리고 한 가지 더. {nl}그대는 루클리스라는 이름을 쫓아가야 합니다.{nl}
Ada satu hal lagi yang saya harus beritahu kepada Anda.{nl} Ikuti nama Ruklys.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: His final battleground...{nl}Laima's revelation at the Fortress of the Land is waiting for you.{nl}
그가 머물렀던 최후의 항전지.. {nl}대지의 요새에서 라이마님의 계시가 당신을 기다리고 있습니다.{nl}
Pada pertempuran terakhirnya... {nl} Revelation Laima berada di Fortress of the Great Earth sudah menanti Anda.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Goddess Laima...{nl}The Revelator who you foretold has finally come...{nl}
라이마 여신이시여.{nl}드디어 당신께서 약속하신 구원자가 온 것입니까..{nl}
Goddess Laima... {nl} Savior yang telah diramalkan akhirnya tiba... {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: After a thousand years of sleep, I am finally able to meet you, {nl}the one whose coming the goddess foretold.{nl}I am also relieved to see that the effort I put into building {nl}the Royal Mausoleum during my rule was not futile.{nl}
천 년의 영면 끝에 마침내 여신께서 말씀하셨던 그대를 만날 수 있었습니다.{nl}나의 치세 내내 공을 들인 왕릉의 축조가 헛되지 않았음이 기쁠 따름입니다.{nl}
Setelah ribuan tahun tertidur, saya akhirnya bisa bertemu dengan Anda, seseorang yang akan datang sesuai ramalan Goddess.{nl} Saya juga lega melihat bahwa usaha saya untuk membangun Royal Tomb selama pemerintahan saya tidaklah sia-sia.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Although I founded the kingdom,{nl}I wish to speak to you as the guardian of the revelation rather than as king.
내 비록 개국의 시조이고 그대가 속한 왕국의 시초이나,{nl}왕으로서의 권위가 아닌 계시의 수호자로서 그대에게 전할 바를 전하고자 합니다. {nl}
Meskipun saya telah mendirikan kingdom,{nl} Saya ingin bicara kepada Kamu sebagai Guardian dari Revelation dan bukan sebagai seorang raja.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You are the Savior of this kingdom.{nl}I can feel that you will save this world and become the one who the goddesses would rely upon.{nl}
그대는 왕국의 구원자입니다.{nl}이 세상 전체를 구하고 모든 여신들의 의지가 될 지고한 존재임이 느껴집니다.{nl}
Kamu adalah menyelamatkan kingdom ini.{nl} Saya bisa merasakan bahwa Kamu akan menyelamatkan dunia ini dan menjadi seseorang yang Goddess dapat akan andalkan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: After spending a thousand years of worshiping the providence of the goddess,{nl}I shall now show you the great will that was left to you in the revelation.
이제 천년의 세월을 넘어 이 만남이 가능하게 하신 여신의 섭리를 찬양하면서.. {nl}그대에게 계시에 남겨진 위대한 의지를 보여드리겠습니다.
Setelah menghabiskan ribuan tahun menghormati Goddess,{nl} sekarang Aku akan menunjukkan kehendak besar yang ditinggalkan untuk Kamu di dalam Revelation.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The soldiers will die if I don't make it. {nl}I have to be strong.
내가 제대로 해내지 못하면 병사들은 아마 다 전멸할 거야.{nl}힘낼 거야.
Para prajurit akan mati jika saya tidak bisa melakukannya. {nl} Saya harus kuat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: ...Only after three years since Ruklys learned from my teachings...
...루클리스가 대성당에서 나의 가르침을 받은지 3년이라는 시간이 흘러서야...
...Hanya setelah tiga tahun semenjak Ruklys mempelajari ajaran saya…

Please select the user requiring a quest: If the demons cross the dimensional crack, {nl}and join hands together with their brethren at the Demon Prison...{nl}The world will be in for another kind of threat.
만약 마족들이 전이의 틈새를 통해 마족 수감소에서 그들과 합세하게 된다면.. {nl}이 세계의 또 다른 위협이 되겠지요.
Jika para demon menyeberangi dimensional crack dan bekerja sama dengan saudara-saudara mereka di Demon Prison..., {nl} dunia akan akan semakin terancaman.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've told sister Vakarine to promise me that she'd prepare for the worst.{nl}But the uprising of the demons that broke through might be hindering her.
저의 자매인 바카리네에게 대비할 수 있도록 언질을 주었습니다만.{nl}찢겨진 마족이 일으킬 파도는 그녀의 발목을 잡을지도 모릅니다.
Sister Vakarine berjanji kepadaku bahwa ia sudah mempersiapkan diri untuk hal yang terburuk.{nl} Namun bertambahnya demon yang menerobos masuk mungkin akan menghalanginya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Bishop Aurelius, who was ordained at a young age, soon took ill and lost his life.{nl}
젊은 나이에 서품을 받은 주교 아우렐리우스는 얼마 가지 않아 불치의 병으로 숨을 거뒀다.{nl}
Bishop Aurelius, yang diangkat pada usia muda, mengalami sakit dan kehilangan nyawanya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: His last request was for the Divine Mission for Maven to be fulfilled even after his death, {nl}and the Church accepted.
유언으로 메이번을 대신하여 여신의 품으로 가지 않고 신성한 사명을 수행하고 싶다고 간청했고 교단에서는 그의 바램을 승인하였다.
Permintaan terakhirnya adalah agar terpenuhinya Divine Mission untuk Maven bahkan setelah kematiannya, dan Church menerimanya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Insurgent's Journal
반란군의 일지
Journal dari Pasukan pemberontak

Please select the user requiring a quest: We just wanted to create a world where we can live happily.{nl}We just wanted to stop the tyrannous monarch.{nl}
우리는 단지 행복하게 살 세상을 만들고 싶었다.{nl}국왕의 폭정을 멈추게 하고 싶었을 뿐이었다.{nl}
Kami hanya ingin membuat dunia yang lebih bahagia untuk ditinggali.{nl}Kami hanya ingin menghentikan tirani yang dilakukan Raja.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: So we gathered under the flag of Commander Ruklys.{nl}We were able to stand up and resist due to the support of Chancellor Premier Eminent.
그래서 우린 루클리스 대장님의 깃발 아래 모였다.{nl}그리고 재상인 프리미어 에미넌트.. {nl}그가 몰래 우리의 반란을 지지해 주었기에 우리는 일어날 수 있었다.
Maka dari itu kami semua berkumpul di bawah bendara Captain Ruklys.{nl}Lalu Perdana Menteri Premier Eminent...{nl}Ia diam-diam memberidukungan pada pemberontakan kita, sehingga kita dapat bangkit.

Please select the user requiring a quest: However, Premier Eminent didn't give a single hair about our resistance.{nl}It was all planned meticulously from the very beginning.{nl}Only to take over the Fortress of the Land...{nl}
하지만 프리미어 에미넌트는 우리의 반란 따위엔 눈꼽만큼도 관심이 없었다.{nl}처음부터, 모든 건 아주 오래 전 부터 세밀하게 계획되었던 것이다.{nl}오로지 대지의 요새를 차지하기 위해서..{nl}
Tetapi Premier Eminent tidak tertarik sedikit pun pada pemberontakan kita yang hanya secuil ini.{nl}Sejak awal, semua telah direncanakan dengan detil sejak lama.{nl}Untuk mengambil alih Earth Castle..{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: We were swung around like idiots.{nl}The monarch becoming tyrannous, ordering Commander Ruklys to attack the hometown of Lydia Schaffen, and Lydia retaliating to our resistance because of it was all according to his plan.
우린 바보처럼 휘둘렸다.{nl}국왕이 저 지경이 된 것도, 루클리스 대장이 리디아 샤펜의 고향을 습격하게 한 것도, 그 때문에 리디아 샤펜이 우리 군을 습격한 것도 전부 그의 계략이었다.
Kami terayun-ayun seperti orang bodoh.{nl}Sepertinya ini semua adalah ulah raja, sehingga Captain Ruklys menyerang desa Lydia Schaffen, dan karena itu Lydia Schaffen menyerang pasukan kami semua.

Please select the user requiring a quest: When the Royal Army said that they will spare our lives when we surrender at Roxona City,{nl}we knew that it was a sugarcoated lie.{nl}If they were really willing to spare our lives, Commander Ruklys would already have surrendered.{nl}As long as Eminent was widely known throughout the world. We knew this was a lie to tormemt our ranks.{nl}
왕국군이 록소나 도시에서 투항하면 목숨을 살려주겠다고 했을 때,{nl}정말 살려 줄 생각이 있었다면 벌써 루클리스 대장이 투항했을 것이다.{nl}에미넌트가 세상에 널리 알려진 대로라면 말이지.{nl}하지만 우릴 내부로부터 흔들기 위한 거짓말이라는 것을 알고 있다.{nl}
Ketika mengatakan akan mengampuni nyawa dari pasukan kerajaan jika menyerah pada kota Roxona,{nl}Jika memang ada pikiran untuk memberi pengampunan maka, Captain Ruklys pasti sudah mengampuninya.{nl}Jika Eminent memang benar yang diketahui oleh dunia.{nl}Tetapi kami pun tahu ia berbohong untuk menggoyangkan kami dari internal.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Soon, the demons' full out assault led by Eminent will begin.{nl}We won't survive, and we won't be able to say anything.
곧 에미넌트를 필두로 마족들의 총 공격이 시작된다.{nl}우린 살아남을 수 없겠지, 아무것도 알리지 못한 채..{nl}
Segera serangan keseluruhan dari para Demon akan Eminent dimulai.{nl}Kita tidak akan dapat bertahan, karena tidak ada yang bisa memberitahukannya..{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: And for what?{nl}What could possibly be in the Fortress of the Land that Commander Ruklys were fighting so hard about?{nl}A simple soldier like me cannot come to understand..{nl}
도대체, 무얼 위해서?{nl}대지의 요새에 무엇이 있길래 루클리스 대장도, 프리미어 에미넌트도 기를 쓴단 말인가. {nl}나로선 알 수가 없다..{nl}
Omong-omong, Untuk apa?{nl}Apakah yang ada di Earth Castle sehingga Captain Ruklys dan Premier Eminent juga menggunakan kekuatannya. {nl}Aku tidak dapat mengetahuinya..{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Commander Ruklys said that he will go meet Lydia Schaffen for the last time.{nl}He said that as long as he sacrificed, we would be able to stop everything.
루클리스 대장님은 마지막으로 리디아 샤펜을 만나러 가겠다고 했다.{nl}자신만 희생되면 모든 것을 멈출 수 있다고 하셨다.
Captain Ruklys berkata akan menemui Lydia Schaffen untuk terakhir kalinya.{nl}Ia berkata jika ia mengorbankan dirinya sendiri, maka semua hal akan berhenti.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I am sorry, Officer Gorman.{nl}I couldn't complete the mission due to the monsters' attacks.{nl}
죄송합니다, 고먼 대장님.{nl}몬스터의 습격으로 임무를 수행하지 못했습니다.{nl}
Aku minta maaf, Officer Gorman.{nl} Aku tidak bisa menyelesaikan misi karena serangan para monster.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Take some rest. It is fortunate that you came back alive.{nl}I will pass the mission to another person.
살아 돌아온 것만으로도 다행이니 그만 쉬도록 하게.{nl}그 임무는 다른 자에게 맡기도록 하지.
Beristirahatlah. Sangat melegakan Kamu dapat kembali dengan selamat.{nl} Aku akan memberikan misi ini kepada orang lain.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You will have to think a lot since when you touch on something, {nl}many things that are near get also influenced.{nl}I will write down which one to turn on. I am counting on you.
참, 하나를 만지면 그 주변에 있는 것도 영향을 받으니 잘 생각해봐야 할 거요.{nl}어떤 걸 켜야 하는지는 메모해 줄테니 잘 부탁하오.
Kamu akan harus memikirkannya dengan matang karena ketika Kamu menyentuh sesuatu, banyak hal di dekat kamu bisa ikut terpengaruh juga.{nl} Aku akan menuliskan yang mana yang harus diaktifkan. Saya mengandalkanmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Let's see... For now, just activate the shrine above.{nl}When you activate one, the shrines near it would get also influenced, {nl}so you will have to think a lot.
어디보자.. 지금은 위쪽 신단만 활성화시키면 되오.{nl}참, 하나를 활성화하면 그 주변에 있는 신단도 영향을 받으니 잘 생각해봐야 할 거요.
Mari kita lihat... Untuk saat ini, aktifkan shrine yang berada di atas.{nl} Bila Kamu mengaktifkannya, shrine yang berada didekatnya akan ikut terpengaruh juga jadi Kamu harus memikirkannya dengan matang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Let's see... For now, just activate the shrine on the left.{nl}When you activate one, the shrines near it would get also influenced,{nl}so you will have to think a lot.
어디보자.. 지금은 왼쪽 신단만 활성화시키면 되오.{nl}참, 하나를 활성화하면 그 주변에 있는 신단도 영향을 받으니 잘 생각해봐야 할 거요.
Mari kita lihat... Untuk saat ini, aktifkan shrine yang berada di sebelah kiri.{nl} Bila Kamu mengaktifkannya, shrine yang berada didekatnya akan ikut terpengaruh juga jadi Kamu harus memikirkannya dengan matang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Let's see... For now, just activate the shrine on the right.{nl}When you activate one, the shrines near it would get also influenced,{nl}so you will have to think a lot.
어디보자.. 지금은 오른쪽 신단만 활성화시키면 되오.{nl}참, 하나를 활성화하면 그 주변에 있는 신단도 영향을 받으니 잘 생각해봐야 할 거요.
Mari kita lihat... Untuk saat ini, aktifkan shrine yang berada di sebelah kanan.{nl} Bila Kamu mengaktifkannya, shrine yang berada didekatnya akan ikut terpengaruh juga jadi Kamu harus memikirkannya dengan matang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Let's see... For now, just activate the shrine below.{nl}When you activate one, the shrines near it would get also influenced,{nl}so you will have to think a lot.
어디보자.. 지금은 아래쪽 신단만 활성화시키면 되오.{nl}참, 하나를 활성화하면 그 주변에 있는 신단도 영향을 받으니 잘 생각해봐야 할 거요.
Mari kita lihat... Untuk saat ini, aktifkan shrine yang berada di bawah.{nl} Bila Kamu mengaktifkannya, shrine yang berada didekatnya akan ikut terpengaruh juga jadi Kamu harus memikirkannya dengan matang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Order of the Tree of Truth worships the Divine Tree that stands in the capital city.{nl}The greeds of the humans are getting bigger, so the Divine Tree is punishing them for it.{nl}
진리의 나무 교단은 왕도에 우뚝 솟은 신수를 숭배합니다.{nl}인간들의 욕심이 하늘을 찌르니 신수께서 직접 어리석은 인간들을 벌하시는 거죠.{nl}
Lembaga religius dari pohon kebenaran yang menghormati Divine Tree di capital city.{nl} Keserakahan manusia yang semakin membesar, sehingga Divine Tree akan menghukum mereka karenanya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Order of the Tree of Truth will be the ones selected by the Divine Tree,{nl}and they will help starting to build a new era.
진리의 나무 교단은 신수께서 선택한 자들이 되어 새 시대를 여는데 앞장 서게 될 겁니다.
Lembaga religius dari pohon kebenaran akan dipilih oleh Divine Tree dan mereka akan membantu untuk membangun era baru.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Margiris once told us. The salvation can't be achieved easily.{nl}What we are doing is washing off the sins of the ignorant ones and washing off our sins.{nl}The ones who die are because they are weak. Only the survivors would receive the salvation.
마르기리스님은 말씀하셨습니다. 구원은 손 쉽게 가질 수 있는 것이 아니다.{nl}지금 우리가 하는 일은 어리석은 자들의 죄를 씻는 일임과 동시에 우리의 죄를 씻어내는 일이다.{nl}이 과정에서 죽는 신도들은 그들이 약하기 때문이고 오직 이겨내는 자들만이 구원받을 것이다라고요.
Margiris pernah mengatakan kepada kami. Salvation tidak dapat dicapai dengan mudah.{nl} Apa yang kami lakukan adalah membersihkan rasa acuh dan membersihkan dosa-dosa kami.{nl} Semua yang mati terjadi karena mereka lemah. Hanya mereka yang mampu bertahan yang dapat menerima salvation.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The ones who came to this place before Utara came here are the guys from{nl}the Order of the Tree of Truth.{nl}They are the disciples acknowledged by Goddess Zemyna.{nl}
그 유타라는 보코르가 카타콤에 오기 전에 먼저 온 게 진리의 나무 교단 녀석들이야.{nl}뭐, 제미나 여신께 인정받은 정식 사제들이라나?{nl}
Orang-orang yang datang ke tempat ini sebelum Yuta datang ke sini ialah orang-orang dari lembaga religius dari pohon kebenaran.{nl} Mereka adalah murid yang diakui oleh Goddess Zemyna.{Nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: This land is blessed by Goddess Zemyna, so they thought they should make a will of the goddess.{nl}How can I stop it.
이 곳은 제미나 여신께 축복받은 땅이니 자신들은 여기서 여신의 뜻을 행하겠다더군.{nl}그걸 내가 어떻게 말리겠어.
Tanah ini diberkahi oleh Goddess Zemyna, jadi mereka merasa harus berbuat sesuatu kepada Goddess.{nl} Bagaimana mungkin saya bisa menghentikannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Xth of X, Year 45X{nl}-{nl}Construction has reached its last stage.{nl}Commander Ruklys said we would soon be able to leave the fortress construction site.{nl}The only job left was to create a magic circle based on the design given to us by the magicians.{nl}Since Ruklys himself is checking up on us, we can't go easy on the job.{nl}
왕국력 45X년 X월 X일{nl}-{nl}요새 공사가 막바지에 이르렀다.{nl}루클리스 대장님의 말씀으론 우리 모두 요새 공사장을 벗어날 수 있을 거랬다.{nl}이제 남은 작업은 마법사들이 짜준 설계도에 따라 마법진을 만드는 거다.{nl}루클리스님이 직접 나서서 점검하시니 대충 하긴 글렀다.{nl}
Tanggalan kerajaan tanggal X bulan X tahun 45X{nl}-{nl}Pembangunan kastil sudah mencapai tahap akhir.{nl}Menurut perkataan captain Ruklys, kita semua dapat keluar dari area pembangunan kastil.{nl}Sekarang pekerjaan yang tersisa adalah membuat magic circle sesuai dengan design yang dibuat oleh para penyihir sejak awal.{nl}Tuan Ruklys akan memeriksanya secara langsung maka dari itu tidak boleh mengerjakannya sembarangan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Xth of X, Year 45X{nl}-{nl}Thanks to the residents of Roxona, the construction might finish sooner than planned.{nl}Although my superior fear that the fortress' security might leak from all this help, I believe Ruklys wants to prioritize on finishing the construction.
왕국력 45X년 X월 X일{nl}-{nl}록소나 시민들이 공사를 도와준 덕분에 예상보다 빨리 끝날 것 같다.{nl}내 상관은 요새의 보안이 누설될까 염려하지만, {nl}루클리스님은 그것보단 공사를 빨리 완료하는 게 먼저라고 생각하시는 것 같다.{nl}
Tanggalan kerajaan tanggal X bulan X tahun 45X{nl}-{nl}Berkat Para penduduk Roxona yang membantu konstruksi, sepertinya dapat menyelesaikan lebih cepat dibandingkan perkiraan.{nl}Pimpinanku menegaskan apakah keamanan kastil akan bocor, {nl}tetapi Tuan Ruklys memikirkan sebaiknya menyelesaikan pembangunan dahulu dibandingkan hal itu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Xth of X, Year 45X{nl}-{nl}There's a bad rumor going around.{nl}The monarch of Kadumel isn't too pleased with the construction itself.{nl}It won't really matter what that dumb monarch thinks as long as there's Chancellor Eminent's contribution to the construction.{nl}
왕국력 45X년 X월 X일{nl}-{nl}좋지 않은 소문이 돌고 있다.{nl}카듀멜 국왕이 우리가 하고 있는 공사를 별로 좋지 않게 생각한다고 한다.{nl}그 멍청한 국왕이 뭐라고 생각하던 재상인 에미넌트 공이 있으니 별 문제가 되지 않을 것이다.{nl}
Tanggalan kerajaan tanggal X bulan X tahun 45X{nl}-{nlRumor yang tidak baik sedang tersebar.{nl}Raja Kardumel berpikir bahwa pembangunan yang sedang kita lakukan tidaklah bagus.{nl}Apapun yang raja yang bodoh itu pikirkan, karena Eminent yang bertanggung jawab akan semuanya, sepertinya tidak akan ada masalah besar.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Xth of X, Year 45X{nl}-{nl}The fortress magic circle and its defensive system is truly spectacular!{nl}Only Ruklys and the goddesses can understand how the fortress will differentiate between us and the Royal Army.{nl}
왕국력 45X년 X월 X일{nl}-{nl}요새의 마법진과 방어시설은 정말 대단하다!{nl}이게 어떻게 적과 아군을 구별할지는 아마 루클리스님과 여신들께서만 아실 것이다.{nl}
Tanggalan kerajaan tanggal X bulan X tahun 45X{nl}-{nl}Magic Circle Kastil dan fasilitas untuk bertahan sungguh luar biasa!{nl}Benda ini bagaimana dapat mengenali lawan dan kawan, mungkin hanya tuan Ruklys dan para Goddess saja yang mengetahuinya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Xth of X, Year 45X{nl}-{nl}The dreaded prediction has come true.{nl}We received news that the Royal Army was on their way.{nl}I also heard that the monarch of Kadumel himself had stepped in.{nl}What in the world is that so called wise chancellor doing?{nl}I'm starting to doubt his reputation.{nl}
왕국력 45X년 X월 X일{nl}-{nl}설마 설마 했는데 불길한 예상이 맞아 떨어졌다.{nl}왕국군이 우리 요새를 향해 다가온다는 소식이 들렸다.{nl}카듀멜 국왕이 직접 나선다는 이야기도 들린다.{nl}도대체 그 현명하다던 재상은 뭘 하고 있는거야?{nl}그의 평판에 새삼 의심이 든다.{nl}
Tanggalan kerajaan tanggal X bulan X tahun 45X{nl}-{nl}Tidak mungkin ini terjadi, perkiraan yang tidak baik menjadi kenyataan rupanya.{nl}pasukan kerajaan menuju ke kastik kita, dan mendengar rumor yang beredar.{nl}Berita tentang Raja Kardumel yang muncul secara langsung pun terdengar.{nl}Bagaimanapun entah apa yang sedang dilakukan perdana menteri yang bijak itu?{nl}Reputasinya sungguh meragukan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Xth of X, Year 45X{nl}-{nl}Those soldiers seem only royal and experienced with its name.{nl}Even if the order came from their own monarch, do they even know who they are daring to fight?{nl}Do they not know what kind of person Ruklys is even after facing him?{nl}It seems that thing over their shoulder doesn't even contain brains.{nl}If not, the monarch of Kadumel was truly out of his mind.
왕국력 45X년 X월 X일{nl}-{nl}저 바보같은 왕국군들은 이름만 정규군이지 제대로 된 것 같지가 않다.{nl}아무리 국왕 명령이라도 그렇지, 감히 누굴 상대하는지 알고 있기는 한 건가?{nl}우리 루클리스님이 어떤 사람인지 보고도 모른단 말인가?{nl}아무래도 그들의 어깨 위에 달린 게 머리는 아닌 것 같다.{nl}아니면 카듀멜 국왕이 미쳐도 단단히 미친 것이겠지.
Tanggalan kerajaan tanggal X bulan X tahun 45X{nl}-{nl} Para pasukan kerajaan yang bodoh itu, mereka disebut sebagai pasukan biasa, tapinya tidaklah demikian sepertinya.{nl}Walaupun itu adalah perintah raja pun, siapa yang berani melawan jika mengetahuinya kan?{nl}Apakah kita tidak mengetahui Tuan Ruklys adalah orang yang seperti apa hanya dengan melihatnya saja?{nl}Bagaimanapun sesuatu yang ada diatas bahu mereka sepertinya bukan kepala mereka.{nl}Jika tidak kalau Raja Kardumel menggila, maka mereka pun ikut gila.

Please select the user requiring a quest: 264th day of the War{nl}-{nl}A friend who's acting as Ruklys' advisor told me that Kadumel is conspiring with a group of thieves to overturn the situation.{nl}To stop this, Ruklys with his chosen elite troops will leave the fortress in secret.{nl}Telling me to keep the secret at all costs, my friend had a very serious look on his face.{nl}
전쟁 264일째{nl}-{nl}루클리스님의 참모로 있는 친구가 말하길 카듀멜이 왕국군의 난황을 뒤집기 위해 도적 무리와 결탁한다고 했다.{nl}루클리스님은 이걸 막기 위해 직접 정예들을 이끌고 은밀히 요새를 벗어나신다고 했다.{nl}절대로 비밀을 지킬 것을 다짐시키는 친구의 얼굴이 무척 진지하다.{nl}
Peperangan hari ke 264{nl}-{nl}Menurut info dari seorang teman yang merupakan staff dari tuan Ruklys, Kardumel bersekongkol dengan para perampok untuk membalikkan kondisi dari Pasukan kerajaan.{nl}Untuk menghalangi hal ini, Ruklys memimpin langsung sejumlah pasukan dan pergi meninggalkan kastil diam-diam.{nl}Wajah dari teman yang berjanji akan menjaga rahasia ini, terlihat sangat serius.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: 275th day of the War{nl}-{nl}After the secret mission, Ruklys' complexion didn't look too good.{nl}The plan seems to have succeeded with the words going around, but there's a worry that there might be some another problem.{nl}Their numbers and supplies of the Royal Army is far superior to ours, but there's no one to make use of the power and take control.{nl}In the long term, it seems certain that we will be victorious, but the the air between us seemed anxious.{nl}
전쟁 275일째{nl}-{nl}그 때의 비밀 작전이 있은 뒤 루클리스님의 안색이 심상치 않다.{nl}흘러나오는 말을 들어 보면 작전은 성공한 것 같던데 무슨 다른 우환이 생긴 건 아닌지 걱정스럽다.{nl}왕국군은 병력과 보급이 아무리 우리보다 우세하지만, 그걸 활용할 지휘부가 없는 상황이다.{nl}장기적으로 보면 우리가 승리할 것이 분명한데 동료들 사이에도 불안한 공기가 떠돌기 시작했다.{nl}
Peperangan hari ke 275{nl}-{nl}Setelah adanya operasi rahasia waktu itu, perilaku dari tuan Ruklys menjadi tidak biasa.{nl}Menurut berita yang beredar, sepertinya operasi yang dijalankan berjalan sukses, dan dikhawatirkan entah apa muncul masalah lainnya.{nl}Pasukan kerajaan lebih unggul dalam kekuatan pasukan dan persediaan perang, tetapi kondisi saat ini adalah tidak ada perintah untuk menggunakannya.{nl}Jika melihat jangka panjangnya, kemenangan sudah pasti di tangan kita, tetapi kawan-kawan mulai mengalami rasa cemas.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: 311th day of the War{nl}-{nl}Unbelievable news.{nl}Legendary marksman Lydia Schaffen has sided with the Royal Army.{nl}Although I tried to calm my subordinates by asking whether she was better than our Commander Ruklys, but once the anxiety and nervousness spreads, there's nothing we can truly do about it.{nl}
전쟁 311일째{nl}-{nl}믿을 수 없는 소식이다. {nl}전설의 명궁 리이아 샤펜이 왕국군의 편에 선다고 한다.{nl}그녀가 우리 루클리스 장군님보다 낫다는 말이냐며 수하들을 다그쳐 봤지만 이미 퍼지기 시작한 불안과 동요는 어쩔 수 없는 것 같다.{nl}
Peperangan hari ke 311{nl}-{nl}berita yang tidak dapat dipercaya. {nl}Terdengar kabar bahwa Archer yang legendaris yaitu Lydia Schaffen memihak kepada pasukan kerajaan.{nl}Ia lebih handal dibandingkan jendral Ruklys kita dan walaupun berita ini telah coba dihalangi agar tidak tersebar, tetapi sepertinya sudah mengalir dan membuat kepanikan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: 324th day of the War{nl}-{nl}We've become sure of this after this fight.{nl}Premier Eminent, who not only the world compliments and say he's been at hard work to support the ignorant monarch was the absolute evil in the entire world.{nl}The monarch's temper might be aggressive, but there's no one else that can plan and act the evil deeds that the foolish monarch can't simply think of himself.{nl}
전쟁 324일째{nl}-{nl}이번 내전으로 확실해졌다. {nl}세상이 칭찬하는, 심지어 어리석은 국왕을 보좌하느라 고생한다고 안타까워 하는 사람마저 있는 프리미어 에미넌트가 천하의 사악한 놈이라는 것 말이다.{nl}국왕의 성질은 난폭하지만, 어리석기에 국왕의 머리론 저지르기 힘든 나쁜 일들을 생각하고 실천하는 인간이 그 말곤 없다.{nl}
Peperangan hari ke 324{nl}-{nl}Kali ini peperangan sipil menjadi sebuah kepastian. {nl}Dunia yang memuji, bahkan sampai orang-orang yang menyayangkan kesulitan akan tahta seorang raja bodoh, dan berpikir bahwa Premier Eminent adalah seorang penjahat di dunia ini.{nl}Sifat dari raja memang meledak-ledak, Menurut raja yang berpikir semua hal buruk yang sulit dilakukan pada kebodohan, dan tidak ada manusia yang mempraktekkannya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: 325th day of the War{nl}-{nl}We cannot win...{nl}If we were to lose this war, the most regrettable thing would be that we won't be able to spread the words that Eminent that even the goddess won't be able to save, and that the world will still believe him as a chancellor who protect the kingdom.{nl}Not only does he use the monarch as a shield to carry out his evil deeds, but he also plants the fault on the monarch himself.{nl}
전쟁 325일째{nl}-{nl}이길 수 없다..{nl}우리가 만약 이 내전에서 진다면 가장 안타까운 일은 에미넌트 그 자식이 여신도 구제 못할 썩은 인간이라는 사실을 알리지 못하고, 세상은 여전히 그를 이 왕국을 지키는 명재상으로 여길 것이란 점이다.{nl}그는 어리석은 국왕을 방패로 악행을 저지르면서도, 그 죄업마저 국왕에게 뒤집어 씌우는 간신 중의 간신이다.{nl}
Peperangan hari ke 325{nl}-{nl}Tidak dapat menang..{nl}Seandainya kami kalah dalam perang sipil ini, hal yang paling disayangkan adalah tidak dapat memberitahukan kebenaran bahwa Eminent adalah manusia busuk yang tidak percaya Goddess, banyak orang yang menganggap ia adalah seorang perdana menteri yang menjaga kerajaan ini.{nl}Ia menggunakan raja yang bodoh sebagai tameng dan melakukan kejahatan, dan kebusukan itu ia salahkan kepada raja.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: 331st day of the War{nl}-{nl}No matter how this war ends, if given the chance, I want to kill the chancellor.{nl}If we emerge victorious, I will ask Ruklys to have me execute him, and if we fail, I will at least want to charge at his barricade and stab his chest with a blade; even if I die in the process.{nl}Eminent has started to take over the Earth Tower while leading the demons.{nl}As a human being, how dare he join forces with the demons...?
전쟁 331일째{nl}-{nl}만약 기회가 닿는다면 이 전쟁이 어떻게 끝이 나는 에미넌트 그 자식만은 꼭 내가 죽이고 싶다. {nl}이긴다면 루클리스님에게 그 놈의 처형 집행을 내게 시켜달라 할 것이고, 진다면 그 놈의 막사로 돌격이라도 감행해서 그 놈의 가슴에 칼을 꽂고 전사하고 싶을 지경이다.{nl}에미넌트는 마족들을 이끌고 대지의 탑을 휩쓸기 시작했다.{nl}인간으로서 어떻게 마족과 손을 잡는단 말인가..
Peperangan hari ke 331{nl}-{nl}Jika diberikan kesempatan, entah bagaimana peperangan ini akan berakhir aku pokoknya ingin membunuh orang yang bernama Eminent.{nl} Jika menang maka aku akan meminta pada Ruklys untuk menjatuhkan hukuman mati padanya, dan jika kalah maka aku akan pergi menyerbu ke tempatnya lalu menusukkan pisau tepat di jantungnya, lalu menjadi pahlawan.{nl}Eminent telah mulai merubuhkan Earth Tower dan memimpin para demon.{nl}Bagaimana ia sebagai manusia bisa bekerja sama dengan Demon..

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ferret
페릿
Ferret

Please select the user requiring a quest: Demon. Came and planted. Totem.{nl}Ferret. Touched totem. Ferret stronger.{nl}Ferret win human!
마족. 여기 와서 세웠다. 토템.{nl}토템. 만지면. 페릿 쎄져.{nl}페릿. 인간 이긴다!
Demon. Datang kesini dan berdiri.Totem.{nl}Totem. Jika menyentuhnya. Ferret.{nl}Ferret. Manusia menang!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Human days over. Ferret days now!{nl}Fruits bigger. Cowardly humans ran away.{nl}Humans unworthy! Ferrets chase away!
인간 시대 끝이다. 이제 페릿 시대다!{nl}과일 커졌다. 겁쟁이 인간 도망쳐.{nl}인간 자격 없어! 페릿이 쫓아낸다!
Akhir dari jaman manusia. Sekarang adalah jaman Ferret!{nl}buah telah membesar. Manusia pengecut kabur.{nl}Manusia tidak layak! Ferret mengusir!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Demons help ferrets.
마족. 페릿 돕는다. 마족. 페릿 강하게 했다.{nl}마족. 페릿한테 지키라고 했다. 인간. 가까이 못 온다.{nl}그러면 마족. 페릿 계속 돕는다.
Demon. Membantu Ferret. Demon. Telah membuat Ferret kuat.{nl}Demon. Telah meminta Ferret menjaga. Manusia. Tidak dapat datang mendekat.{nl}Kalau begitu Demon. Ferret akan terus membantu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Fake Box
가짜 상자
Box Palsu

Please select the user requiring a quest: It doesn't seem to be this box.
이상자가 아닌 것 같다.
Tampaknya ini bukanlah box-nya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's not enough to destroy the Holy Relic of the Order, but you did release Carlyle...{nl}
교단의 성물을 파괴하는 것도 모자라서 칼라일을 풀어주다니..{nl}
Itu tidak cukup untuk menghancurkan holy relic dari perintah church, Kamu telah melepaskan Karail..{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: You will pay with your life!
그 대가는 목숨으로 받겠다!
Kamu akan membayarnya dengan hidup Anda!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Truth Token
진리의 증표
Truth Token

Please select the user requiring a quest: The divine energy subsided when the Truth Token was lit.
진리의 증표가 빛을 내자 성물의 기운이 잦아들었다.
Divine energi mereda ketika Truth Token digunakan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The mysterious girl with the light has appeared. Talk to her.
신비한 소녀가 빛과 함께 나타났다. 말을 걸어보자.
Gadis misterius dengan cahaya telah muncul. Bicara kepadanya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The mysterious girl ran away without saying anything. Follow her.
신비한 소녀가 말 없이 어딘가로 뛰어갔다. 따라가보자.
Gadis misterius itu lari tanpa berkata apapun. Ikuti dia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Suspicious Basket
수상한 바구니
Basket yang mencurigakan

Please select the user requiring a quest: The stench offends your nose. Looks like rotten food is hidden underneath.
악취가 코를 찌른다. 숨긴지 오래된 식량 같다.
Bau yang menyengat hidung Anda. Seperti makanan busuk tersembunyi di bawahnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The mysterious girl with the light has appeared once again.
신비한 소녀가 다시 한번 빛과 함께 나타났다.
Gadis misterius dengan cahaya muncul kembali.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The freed girl has ran away somewhere with urgency.
풀려난 소녀가 어디론가 황급히 뛰어갔다.
Wanita kecil yang dibebaskan, pergi berlari dengan terburu-buru ke suatu tempat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The girl stared at me as if she wanted me to follow her.
소녀는 따라오라는 듯 이쪽을 쳐다보다가 뛰어갔다.
Wanita kecil pergi berlari setelah menengok ke arah sini, seperti datang mengikuti.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Quickly! We have no time!{nl} My power is over here!
어서와라! 시간이없다!{nl}내 힘만으로는 여기까지다!
Cepat! Kita tidak punya waktu!{nl} Kekuatanku ada di sini!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Aldona! Zydrone!{nl}Now!
알도나! 지드로네!{nl}지금이다!
Aldona! Zydrone!{nl} Sekarang!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Aldona, Zydrone...{nl}I'm sorry for being a burden to you both because of my feebleness.{nl}
알도나, 지드로네.. {nl}나의 무력함 때문에 너희들에게까지 짐을 지워 미안하구나.{nl}
Aldona, Zydrone.. {nl} Aku minta maaf telah menjadi beban bagi untuk kalian berdua karena kelemahanku.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: But, let's not waste any time.{nl}You've brought the Savior here... who has the power to get rid of this disaster.{nl}
하지만 지체할 시간은 없다.{nl}너희들이 데려온 자는 바로 구원자.. 이 곳의 재앙을 걷어낼 힘을 가진 자이니라.{nl}
Namun, jangan buang-buang waktu.{nl} Kamu telah membawa savior ke sini.. seseorang yang memiliki kekuatan untuk menyingkirkan semua bencana ini.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I will ask the Savior to help me.{nl}You two should get ready to quickly make the Evening Star Key.{nl}
구원자에겐 내가 도움을 구할 것이다.{nl}너희들은 어서 저녁별 열쇠를 만들 준비를 하거라.{nl}
Aku akan meminta Savior untuk membantu saya.{nl} Kalian berdua harus bersiap-siap untuk segera membuat Key of the Night Star.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The many deaths of demons could not fill the emptiness in my heart. {nl}Once the goddess' great mission for me is over, {nl}I will be left with a long life full of boring moments.
가슴 속의 허무함은 얼마나 많은 마족이 스러져야 채워질지.{nl}여신께서 주신 위대한 사명의 준비를 모두 마치고 나면 남은 건 길고 지루한 삶의 순간들일 것이다.
Banyak kematian demon tidak bisa mengisi kekosongan di hati saya.{nl} Setelah misi besar Goddess untukku selesai, aku akan hidup dengan umur yang panjang penuh dengan moment yang membosankan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ugh, I thought it would die after its throat had been cut.{nl}I hope it can just behave now and die slowly.
어휴, 기다리느라 목이 빠져 죽는 줄 알았네.{nl}그러니까 이번엔 좀 얌전히 죽어 줬으면 좋겠어.
Ugh, saya kira itu akan mati setelah tenggorokannya terpotong.{nl} Saya harap itu dapat tenang sekarang dan mati secara perlahan-lahan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: A fake revelation... all this so you can lure me out and get rid of me?{nl}How disappointing to see such trickery is the best that Laima can prepare.
거짓 계시.. 이런 걸로 날 꼬드겨 해치우려고?{nl}라이마가 기껏 준비했다는 게 이런 눈속임이라니 참으로 안타깝구나.{nl}
Sebuah Revelation palsu.. semua ini dilakukan agar kamu dapat memancingku keluar dan menyingkirkanku?{nl} Sangat mengecewakan melihat tipu daya itu adalah hal terbaik yang Laima dapat persiapkan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: But for all your preparations, you are powerless against me...{nl}It's amusing how your foolishness blinds you from the overwhelming gap of power between us.
하지만 너희들이 준비한 것으로도 날 어찌하지 못했다.{nl}절대적인 힘의 차이를 보고도 고개를 숙이지 못하는 어리석음에 웃음이 나는군.{nl}
Namun dari semua persiapan kamu. Kamu tidak akan berdaya dihadapanku..{nl} Sangat lucu melihat kebodohan Kamu yang tidak mampu menilai gap kekuatan diantara kita.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Right. I can feel where the real revelation is located.{nl}Try struggling once more.
그래. 진짜 계시가 있는 곳이 느껴진다.{nl}어디 한 번, 또 발버둥 쳐 보거라.
Benar. Aku bisa merasakan dimana Revelation yang asli berada.{nl} Coba berjuang sekali lagi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: So, this is where the revelation is hidden.
고작 계시를 숨긴 곳이 여긴가.
Jadi, di sini tempat di mana Revelation disembunyikan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Demon Lord Marnox
마군주 마르녹스
Demon Lord Marnox

Please select the user requiring a quest: Such are the fools who follow the goddesses.{nl}Have you not witnessed enough to know me?{nl}All this time I've been waiting for you all to come at your own will.
여신을 따른다는 녀석들은 하나 같이 멍청하군{nl}그렇게 당하고도 아직도 나를 모르겠나!{nl}네녀석들이 스스로 이곳으로 들어오길 기다리고 있었다.
Seperti orang-orang bodoh yang mengikuti Goddess{nl} Tidakkah cukup melihat dan mengetahui siapa saya?{nl} Selama ini saya telah menunggu kalian semua untuk datang menemuiku atas kemauan kalian sendiri.

Please select the user requiring a quest: After I defeat you, I will continuously disturb the priest until he opens the box himself.
널 처리하고 저 사제가 제 손으로 상자를 열 때까지 괴롭혀주마.
Setelah saya mengalahkanmu, Aku akan terus mengganggu priest sampai ia membuka box itu sendiri.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Urbonas
우르보나스
Urbonas

Please select the user requiring a quest: From succession, We've spent a long time preparing to greet the Revelator.
전승에 따라 우린 계시자를 맞이하기 위해 오랜 시간 준비해 왔네.{nl}(이야기 추가 중)
Menurut cerita untuk menjadi Savior, kita membutuhkan waktu persiapan yang sangat lama.{nl}(Sedang menambahkan cerita)

Please select the user requiring a quest: I was able to retrieve my soul thanks to you... {nl}Isn't this the Chain of Reversion that shredded my soul?
덕분에 내 영혼을 모을 수 있었다.{nl}그런데 이건.. 내 영혼을 찢어발긴 환원의 사슬 아닌가.{nl}
Aku bisa mengambil jiwaku kembali karena kamu.. Bukankah ini Chain of Reversion yang mengiris jiwaku?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Gathering Shining Moss.
빛나는 이끼 채취 중
Mengumpulkan Shiny Moss

빛나는 이끼를 채취했습니다!
Mendapatkan Shiny Moss!

이끼 채취에 실패했습니다!

나치 버섯을 획득했습니다!
Mendapatkan Nachi Mushroom!
