Please select the user requiring a quest: If Laswi is here... What about Rose?{nl}Rose must have escaped too, then. I'm going back to the Herb Gatherers Cabin!
라쉬라면.. 로제인가요?{nl}로제도 잘 도망쳤나 보군요. 약초꾼 오두막으로 돌아갈래요!
Jika Rashi di sini... Bagaimana dengan Rose?{nl}Rose pasti berhasil lolos juga kan. Aku akan kembali ke Herb Gatherers Cabin!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hey, it's Laswi! Did you come find me?{nl}Thank you so much for finding me. I was so scared...
오오, 그래 라쉬야! 네가 날 찾아 준 거니?{nl}찾아주셔서 정말 감사합니다. 정말 무서웠어요..
Hei, itu Rashi ! Apakah kamu mencariku?{nl}Terima kasih banyak karena telah mencariku. Aku sangat takut…

Please select the user requiring a quest: (Rose will be in danger if she's all alone. Let's look for her in Knidos Jungle.)
로제 혼자서는 위험할 것 같다. 크니도스 숲으로 쫓아가보자.
Rose akan berada dalam bahaya jika Ia sendirian. Ayo cari ia di Knidos Jungle.

Please select the user requiring a quest: (This seems to be the demons' laboratory. Time to defeat some demons around here.)
마족의 실험실이 이곳인 것 같다. 주변의 마족을 처치해두자.
Ini seperti demon laboratory. Ayo kalahkan beberapa demon di sekitar sini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The number of seconds is important too, but for this secret {nl}you need to remember the sequence as well.{nl}It's similar to the first secret.{nl}
초의 개수도 중요하지만 이번 비밀은 순서도 기억하셔야 합니다.{nl}제일 처음 풀었던 비밀과 비슷하지요.
Jumlah waktunya sangat penting, namun untuk rahasia ini{nl}kamu juga harus mengingat urutannya.{nl}Ini seperti rahasia yang pertama.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm really glad to hear Grazina is safe.{nl}But if you came to tell me that, it sounds like Grazina herself isn't so sure.{nl}
그라지나가 안전하다니 정말 다행입니다.{nl}하지만 제게 이걸 굳이 전해 준 걸 보면 그라지나도 안심할 수 없는 모양입니다.{nl}
Aku sangat senang ketika mendengar Grazina sudah aman.{nl}Namun jika kamu datang hanya untuk memberitahukanku hal itu, kedengarannya seperti Grazina sendiri tidak begitu yakin.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please find Alina.{nl}When we split up she went downwards, maybe she could be somewhere in that direction.
알리나를 찾아주세요.{nl}헤어질 때 아랫쪽으로 뛰어갔으니 아마 그 근처에 있지 않을까 합니다만.
Tolong cari Alina.{nl}Ketika kami berpisah ia pergi ke arah bawah, mungkin ia berada disekitar situ.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Pilgrim Agatas' Journal
순례자 아가타스의 일지
Pilgrim Agatas's Journal

Please select the user requiring a quest: I could not help but be surprised when I discovered the Soul Fragments were those of Hauberk.{nl}Hauberk, the Demon Lord of Brutality who is notorious for cruelty...{nl}
내가 그 영혼조각이 하우벅이라는 걸 알았을 때, 놀라지 않을 수 없었다.{nl}하우벅이라면, 잔인하기로 유명한 잔학의 마군주 하우벅 아니었던가..{nl}
Aku tidak bisa membantu tetapi heran ketika aku menemukan Soul Fragmen orang-orang dari Hauberk. {nl} hauberk, Demon Lord of Brutality yang terkenal karena kekejamannya ... {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The same Hauberk who, {nl}slaughtered so many people and made a gruesome sight of the Kupoles of Goddess Vakarine who were following them.{nl}The Soul Fragment of that Hauberk is in my hands...{nl}
과거에 많은 사람들을 무참히 죽이고, {nl}그를 뒤쫓는 바카리네 여신의 큐폴들마저 끔찍한 꼴로 만들어버린 그 하우벅 말이다.{nl}그 하우벅의 영혼조각이 내 손에 있다니..{nl}
Hauberk yang sama, {nl} membantai begitu banyak orang dan membuat pemandangan mengerikan dari Kupoles of Goddess Vakarine yang mengikuti mereka. {Nl} The Soul Fragment of Hauberk yang ada di tangan saya ... {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: But the Soul Fragment of Hauberk in front of me has long lost the essence of what it used to be,{nl}asking for help running from the demons chasing it in return for granting a wish.
하지만 내 앞에 있는 하우벅의 영혼조각은 자신의 본질은 잃어버린 채,{nl}그저 내게 소원을 들어줄 테니 자신을 뒤쫓는 마족에게서 도망쳐 달라고 말하고 있었다.{nl}
Tapi Soul Fragment of Hauberk di depan aku telah lama hilang esensinya dari apa yang dulu, {nl} meminta bantuan berjalan dari demon mengejar itu sebagai imbalannya kamu bisa meminta sebuah keinginan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I remember seeing it somewhere. {nl}About how Hauberk's essence was split amongst the Soul Fragments when Hauberk's soul was ripped apart by demons.{nl}One fragment contains what conscience that was left, another contains his memories and knowledge,{nl}yet another has his boldness, and yet another his essence of brutality...{nl}
어디선가 본 기억이 난다. {nl}하우벅이 마족에게 영혼이 찢겨졌을 때, 그의 본질 또한 각각의 영혼조각에 나뉘어 담겨졌다고 말이다.{nl}어떤 조각은 그에게 약간이나마 남은 양심을, 어떤 조각은 그의 기억과 지식을,{nl}또 다른 조각은 그의 대범함을, 그리고 또 어떤 조각은 그의 본질인 잔혹성을..{nl}
Aku ingat melihat suatu tempat. {nl} Tentang bagaimana Hauberk essence terpecah antara Jiwa Fragmen ketika Hauberk jiwa terkoyak oleh demon. {nl} Salah satu fragmen mengandung apa hati nurani yang tersisa, yang lain mengandung kenangan dan pengetahuan, {nl} lagi memiliki keberanian nya, dan satu lagi esensinya kebrutalan ... {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I will agree to his contract because I have something I wish to accomplish.{nl}But his essence... Where is the Soul Fragment containing his brutality?{nl}Noone could possibly imagine the atrocities that will occur if that fragment ever surfaces.
나는 이루고자 하는 바가 있어 그와 계약을 맺을 것이다.{nl}하지만 그의 본질.. 그의 이름인 잔학의 영혼조각은 대체 어디에 있단 말인가.{nl}그 영혼조각이 세상에 나오게 되면 벌어질 끔찍한 일은 아무도 모를 것이다.
Aku akan setuju untuk kontraknya karena aku memiliki sesuatu yang aku ingin capai. {nl} Tapi  essencenya ... Dimana Soul Fragment mengandung kekejamannya? {nl} Tak seorangpun mungkin bisa membayangkan kekejaman yang akan terjadi jika fragmennya ditemukan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hauberk, Demon Lord of Brutality
잔학의 마군주 하우벅
Hauberk, Demon Lord of Brutality

Please select the user requiring a quest: Year 624, records of Archivist Dartas Jonas.{nl}-{nl}Even amongst the many demons, Demon Lord Hauberk especially enjoyed slaughtering and manipulating humans to create his legion.{nl}There is no record of such atrocities being committed, even by demons, in any of the kingdom's libraries.{nl}
왕국력 624년, 왕국 기록관 다르타스 요나스의 기록.{nl}-{nl}많은 마족들 중에서도 잔학의 마군주 하우벅은 그의 군단을 만들기 위해 인간을 학살하고 이용하는 것을 즐겼다.{nl}그 어떤 왕국의 사서에서도, 설령 마족이라도 이런 잔혹한 행위를 저질렀다는 기록은 없다.{nl}
Tahun 624, catatan Archivist Dartas Jonas {nl} -.. {nl} Bahkan di antara banyak demon, Demon Lord Hauberk sangat menikmati menyembelih dan memanipulasi manusia untuk menciptakan pasukannya {nl} Tidak ada catatan dari kekejaman seperti yang dilakukan, bahkan oleh demon, di setiap perpustakaan kerajaan. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Goddess Vakarine sent the Kupoles as she could no longer bear to watch his villainy,{nl}but even the Kupoles sustained heavy losses as they fell victim to Hauberk's ruses.
여신 바카리네께서 그의 악행을 참지 못하고 수 많은 큐폴들을 보냈지만,{nl}그 큐폴들 또한 하우벅의 농간에 걸려들어 큰 피해를 입었다.
Goddess Vakarine mengirim Kupoles Karena Dia tidak kuat untuk review Melihat hal karena dia tidak bisa lagi tahan melihat kejahatan nya, {nl} tapi bahkan Kupoles menderita kerugian besar karena mereka menjadi korban tipu muslihat Hauberk .

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oh, hello there. Welcome.{nl}We collect various requests and present them to adventurers like you.{nl}
어머, 잘 오셨어요.{nl}저흰 여러 가지 의뢰를 받아서 모험가님께 소개해 드리고 있답니다.{nl}
Oh, Halo disana. Selamat datang.{nl}Kami mengumpulkan banyak permintaan dan mempersembahkannya kepada petualang seperti kamu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: You can receive requests over there from receptionists Ramda, Liam or Donnes.{nl}Please remember that they all deal with different requests.
저쪽의 접수원인 람다, 리암, 도네스에게서 의뢰를 받으실 수 있어요.{nl}각자 취급하는 의뢰가 다르다는 것. 꼭 알아두시고요.
Kamu dapat menerima request di sana dari receptionist Ramda, Liam atau Donnes.{nl}Mohon ingat mereka dapat memenuhi request yang berbeda.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oh, you're the inquisitive type aren't you? Unfortunately, that information is classified.{nl}Otherwise, our clients wouldn't have any faith in me when requesting jobs.{nl}
안타깝게도, 그건 비밀이예요.{nl}그래야 의뢰주가 믿고 맡길 수 있는 것 아니겠어요?{nl}
Oh, Kamu adalah tipe yang ingin tahu bukan? Sayangnya, ini rahasia. {nl} Jika tidak, klien kami tidak akan memiliki kepercayaan setiap saat meminta pekerjaan. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Well... Everyone has their own reasons.{nl}I am sure you will understand this since the pay is good.
뭐.. 다들 각자 사정은 있는 법이니까요.{nl}보수는 확실하니 이해해 주실 거라고 믿어요.
Baiklah... Setiap orang mempunyai alasannya masing-masing.{nl}Aku yakin kamu akan mengerti ini karena bayarannya bagus.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This is the catastrophe that has already arisen...{nl}The seeds of a greater calamity have already been planted.{nl}
이것은 이미 벌어진 재앙..{nl}곧 더 거대한 재앙의 싹이 움틀 거예요.{nl}
Malapetaka ini sudah semakin membesar....{nl}Benih dari bencana yang lebih besar sudah tertanam.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I wonder... Where could the goddess of fate be?{nl}Where could all the other goddesses be...?{nl}
그런데.. 운명의 여신은 어디에 있지요?{nl}다른 여신들은요..?{nl}
Aku ingin tahu... dimana Goddess Laima berada?{nl}Dimana semua Goddess lainnya berada...?{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: See?{nl}Not a single goddess can protect you from the death that is me.{nl}
봐요.{nl}죽음인 나에게서 당신을 지켜줄 여신은 아무도 없어요.{nl}
Lihat?{nl}Tidak satu Goddess pun yang dapat melindungimu dari kematian kecuali aku.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: And so I hereby ask you, Revelator...{nl}Why don't you just close your eyes and ears...
그러니 계시자님.. {nl}눈과 귀를 막고..{nl}
Savior, dengan ini aku memintamu...{nl} Kenapa kamu tidak menutup mata dan telingamu…

Please select the user requiring a quest: And run away like every other human did.
다른 인간들처럼 얌전히 도망치세요.
Dan melarikan diri seperti yang mereka lakukan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Swordsmen are all about pure STR.{nl}
검사 계열이라면 역시 힘이죠.{nl}
Semua mengenai murni STR adalah Swordsman.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: However, you can also build up your DEX and CON.{nl}You'll need to think very careful about what path you will take.
하지만 민첩한 몸놀림이나 강한 체력을 키울수도 있어요.{nl}앞으로 무엇이 될지 먼저 따져보는 게 좋을 겁니다.
Namun, kamu juga dapat menaikkan DEX dan CON.{nl}Kamu harus memikirkannya dengan sangat hati-hati mengenai pilihan mana yang akan kamu ambil.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Wizards need INT.{nl}
마법사 계열이라면 역시 지능이죠.{nl}
Wizards memerlukan INT.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: However, you shouldn't forget SPR if you want to cast more spells.{nl}You'll have to choose between being balanced or specialized.
하지만 마법을 자주 사용하려면 정신력도 잊지 말아야 합니다.{nl}균형과 집중 중에서 잘 선택하셔야 해요.
Namun, Kamu jangan melupakan SPR jika kamu ingin mengeluarkan lebih banyak mantra.{nl} Kamu harus memilihnya agar seimbang atau lebih spesifik.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Archers are all about STR.{nl}
궁수 계열이라면 역시 힘이죠.{nl}
Archer sangat identik dengan STR.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: However, DEX will prevent problems with movements.{nl}Think careful about what path you will take.
하지만 민첩한 몸놀림을 빼 놓을 순 없겠지만요.{nl}앞으로 무엇이 될지 먼저 따져보는 게 좋을 겁니다.
Namun, DEX juga mempengaruhi ketangkasan.{nl}Pikirkan baik-baik mengenai pilihan mana yang akan kamu ambil.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Clerics need INT, but they might need a lot of STR or SPR as well.{nl}
성직자 계열이라면 역시 지능이죠.{nl}하지만 강한 힘이나 정신력이 필요할 수도 있어요.{nl}
Cleric memerlukan INT, selain itu memerlukan banyak STR juga SPR.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: It is up to you what path you will take in this adventure.
앞으로 무엇이 될지 먼저 따져보는 게 좋을 거예요.
Itu terserah padamu pilihan apa yang akan kamu ambil untuk petualangan ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Bishop Urbonas
주교 우르보나스
Bishop Urbonas

Please select the user requiring a quest: If the orders from the Demon Orders are achieved, Orsha will no longer be safe.{nl}I hope our lord will make her decisions wisely.{nl}The situation right now is disastrous enough as it is with the migration order.{nl}
마족 명령서의 계획이 모두 실현된다면 이 오르샤의 안전을 장담할 수 없습니다.{nl}영주님께서 현명한 판단을 내려주시길 바라지만, 지금은 이주령 만으로도 벅찬 상황입니다.{nl}
Jika perintah dari Demon Order terlaksana, Orsha tidak akan lagi aman.{nl}Aku harap pemimpin kami dapat mengambil keputusan dengan bijaksana.{nl}Situasi sekarang ini cukup berbahaya dengan perintah emigrasi.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The choice is yours.{nl}I am sure the goddesses want you to lead our salvation too.
선택은 계시자님의 몫입니다.{nl}분명 여신께서도 계시자님의 여정이 모두의 구원으로 이어지도록 안배하셨을 겁니다.
Pilihan ada di tanganmu.{nl}Aku yakin para Goddess  juga menginginkanmu untuk memimpin salvation kami.

Please select the user requiring a quest: O Revelator, the one who saved Orsha. What can I do for you?
오르샤를 구한 계시자여 무슨 일이십니까?
Apa yang kamu butuhkan, oh Savior yang menyelamatkan Orsha?

Please select the user requiring a quest: (The writing is hard to make out since it's smudged from the rain.)
그을리고 비에 젖어 내용을 알아보기 힘들다.
(Tulisannya luntur akibat dari hujan dan sulit untuk membacanya.)

Please select the user requiring a quest: (There are traces of a fire having been hastily put out.)
누군가 급하게 불을 끈 흔적이 보인다.
(Ada bekas api yang secara buru-buru dipadamkan.)

Please select the user requiring a quest: (These are the objects of the priests... It seems like they took only a few important things and left.)
사제들의 물건.. 필요한 것만 챙겨서 급하게 떠난 것 같다.
(Ini adalah barang-barang dari para priest... Sepertinya mereka hanya mengambil beberapa hal yang penting dan pergi.)

Please select the user requiring a quest: The events of the Ashaq Underground Prison were only the beginning.{nl}How much more will we have to sacrifice...
아샤크 지하 감옥에서 있었던 일은 시작에 불과합니다.{nl}앞으로 얼마나 더 많은 희생을 치뤄야 할지..
Peristiwa yang terjadi di Ashaq Underground Prison hanya permulaan.{nl}Berapa banyak lagi kita harus berkorban…

Please select the user requiring a quest: All I can trust is the map left by the bishop and you...{nl}Please be careful.
지금 믿을 수 있는 건 주교님이 남겨두신 지도와 당신 뿐..{nl}부디 조심하십시오.
Aku hanya bisa mempercayai map yang ditinggalkan oleh bishop dan kamu...{nl} berhati-hatilah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Too many people have been asking to speak to our lord in person.{nl}She's outside the walls now trying to answer to them.
너무나도 많은 사람들이 영주님과의 면담을 요청해오고 있습니다.{nl}결국 영주님께서 그들을 달래시려고 성 밖으로 직접 나와 계시지요.
Banyak orang yang meminta untuk berbicara kepada pemimpin kami secara pribadi.{nl}Ia berada diluar sekarang mencoba untuk menjawab permintaan mereka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Even small things will become strong when they unite.
작은 것이 모이면 큰 힘이 되리라.
Bahkan hal terkecil akan menjadi kuat ketika mereka bersatu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: (It reeks.)
악취가 코를 찌른다.
Ini berbau.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I think this is what the writings on the platform said.{nl}
단상에 쓰여진 글귀는 아마 이런 내용이었지요.{nl}
Aku rasa itu yang tertulis pada platform tersebut.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Remember the sacred numbers with your own two eyes.{nl}The candle light will chase away the evil darkness...{nl}
두 눈으로 성스러운 숫자를 기억하라.{nl}촛불의 빛은 사악한 어둠을 쫓을지니.. {nl}
Ingatlah angka suci dengan kedua matamu.{nl}Cahaya lilin akan mengusir kegelapan jahat...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: We've started to clear out some monsters and open the seal.{nl}The treasure hidden in the Legwyn family mansion...{nl}We will find it no matter what.
우리는 몬스터를 해치워가면서 봉인을 풀기 시작했다.{nl}저택 어디엔가 숨겨져있다는 르귄 가문의 보물..{nl}우리는 반드시 찾아낼 것이다.
Kami sudah mulai menghabisi beberapa monster dan membuka segel.{nl}Harta karun yang tersembunyi di Legwyn family mansion...{nl}Kami akan menemukannya tidak peduli apa pun yang terjadi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Basic skills are the most important and serious of all.{nl}These basics are extremely practical in a Swordsman's career.
기본이야말로 가장 중요하고 심오한 법이지.{nl}소드맨의 길이야말로 기본의 극한이 담겨있다네.
Skill dasar merupakan hal terpenting dan serius.{nl}Basis ini sangat berguna untuk karir Swordsman.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Worthy talented people are gathering in Orsha as well.{nl}But something big is about to happen, I can tell it is.
오르샤에도 뜻 있는 실력자들이 모이고 있군.{nl}하지만 곧 엄청난 일이 닥칠 게야. 내 감이 그렇게 말하고 있네.
Orang-orang berbakat juga berkumpul di Orsha.{nl}Namun sesuatu yang besar akan terjadi, saya bisa merasakannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: More and more settlers are now gathering in Orsha.{nl}I think if there's anyone who can protect them all, it's the Peltasta.
오르샤로 점점 더 많은 이주민들이 몰려오고 있어요.{nl}전 이 모두를 지킬 수 있는 방패는 오직 펠타스타 뿐이라고 생각합니다.
Semakin banyak pendatang kini berkumpul di Orsha.{nl}Aku rasa, jika ada yang bisa melindungi mereka semua, itu adalah Peltasta.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Swords and shields aren't equipment that just protect you.{nl}The shields of the Peltasta have the power to protect the entire kingdom.
검과 방패로 지킬 수 있는 건 자기 자신뿐만이 아닙니다.{nl}펠타스타의 방패는 왕국을 지킬 수 있는 힘이기도 하지요.
Sword dan shield bukan sekedar equipment yang melindungimu saja.{nl}Shield dari Peltasta memiliki kekuatan untuk melindungi seluruh kerajaan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Medzio Diena, the missing goddesses... and now this monster invasion...{nl}As Clerics, we need to share the divine grace of the goddesses now more than ever.
신수의 날과 여신의 부재.. 거기에 몬스터의 침공까지..{nl}이런 때일수록 우리 클레릭이 여신께 받은 은총을 나누어드려야 해요.
Medzio Diena, para Goddess  yang menghilang... dan sekarang invasi monster...{nl} Seperti para Cleric, kita perlu berbagi keistimewaan dari para Goddess  lebih dari sebelumnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: For the Clerics, our mission is to help people through healing.{nl}If only we could heal wounded hearts, too...
우리 클레릭의 사명은 치유의 은혜로 많은 분들에게 봉사하는 것이예요.{nl}하지만 마음의 상처까지 어루만져 드릴 수 있으면 좋겠네요.
Untuk para Cleric, misi kami adalah untuk membantu orang dengan healing.{nl}Jika saja kami bisa menyembuhkan hati yang terluka, juga…

Please select the user requiring a quest: I learned that a true Krivis must lower itself and be devoted to the goddesses.{nl}An unshakable faith can overcome even the worst catastrophe.
무릇 참된 크리비란 성직자로서 자신을 낮추고 여신께 봉헌해야 한다고 배웠습니다.{nl}굳건한 신실함만이 그 어떤 재앙도 이겨낼 수 있게 하지요.
Aku mempelajari bahwa Krivis sejati harus rendah hati dan setia kepada para Goddess .{nl}Keyakinan yang tak tergoyahkan dapat mengatasi semua bahkan bencana terburuk.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Faith is both a Krivis' power and mission.{nl}It's a shame how people seem to be forgetting the goddesses after all these catastrophes.{nl}
신실함이야 말로 크리비의 힘이자 사명이지요.{nl}잇따른 재앙 때문에 사람들이 점점 여신을 잊고 있는 것 같아서 정말 안타까워요.{nl}
Keyakinan adalah kekuatan dan misi dari Krivis.{nl}Hal ini mengerikan, orang-orang tampaknya akan melupakan para Goddess  setelah semua bencana ini.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Until the day all wrongful things disappear from this land...{nl}Our role as Priests is to deliver justice in the name of the goddesses.
부정한 것들이 이 땅에서 영원히 사라지는 그 날까지..{nl}여신의 이름으로 심판하는 것이 우리 프리스트의 역할입니다.
Sampai segala sesuatu yang salah menghilang dari tanah ini...{nl}Peran kami sebagai Priest adalah untuk menciptakan keadilan atas nama Goddess .

Please select the user requiring a quest: Priests purge the world of evil energy by the grace of the goddesses.{nl}Our powers are proof that the goddesses still exist.
프리스트는 여신의 은총으로 사악한 기운을 몰아내지요.{nl}우리의 힘이야말로 여신께서 아직 건재하시다는 증거가 아니겠습니까.
Priest membersihkan dunia dari energi jahat dengan karunia dari para Goddess .{nl}Kekuatan kami adalah bukti bahwa para Goddess  masih ada.

Please select the user requiring a quest: So, you want my blessing to become a Priest?{nl}Of course, it'll be my pleasure to bless you.
프리스트의 길을 축복해달라는 말씀이신가요? {nl}물론 기꺼이 축복해드릴게요.{nl}
Jadi, Kamu menginginkan restuku untuk menjadi seorang Priest?{nl}Tentu saja, dengan senang hati aku akan merestuimu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: May your path be blessed by the goddesses.
그대의 앞길에 여신의 축복이 함께 하기를 빌겠습니다.
Semoga yang kamu jalani diberkahi oleh para Goddess .

Please select the user requiring a quest: Spears are a good beginner's weapon, but the learning curve is steep.{nl}Once you master the techniques, enemies will be no match for your spear.
창은 시작하기 쉬운 무기이지만, 궁극의 경지에 다다르긴 어렵습니다.{nl}하지만 그 경지를 이룰 수만 있다면 뚫을 수 없는 적은 존재하지 않지요.{nl}
Spear merupakan senjata yang mudah untuk permulaan, tetapi sulit untuk di kuasai.{nl}Namun, setelah kamu menguasai teknik spear, tidak ada musuh yang tidak bisa kamu kalahkan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: More and more people are coming to Orsha in search of a safe place.{nl}I wonder what they think when they see Orsha like this...
안전한 곳을 찾아 오르샤로 점점 더 많은 사람들이 몰려오고 있습니다.{nl}하지만 이 오르샤를 보고 무슨 생각을 할지.. 걱정되는군요.
Semakin banyak orang yang datang ke Orsha mencari perlindungan.{nl}Aku penasaran apa yang mereka pikirkan ketika mereka melihat Orsha seperti ini…

Please select the user requiring a quest: A broker standing between life and death...{nl}That's how the Bokor Master from Klaipeda described the Bokor.
생과 죽음 사이의 중개업자..{nl}클라페다의 보코르 마스터께서는 보코르에 대해 그렇게 말씀하셨어요.
Seorang bokor berdiri di antara kehidupan dan kematian...{nl}Begitulah Bokor Master dari Klaipeda mendeskripsikan Bokor.

Please select the user requiring a quest: A sword in your left hand, a shield in your right hand. {nl}It feels weaker than carrying a two-handed sword, right?{nl}That's if you don't know about the Rodeleros. {nl}What's in your right hand is just as much of a weapon.
왼손엔 검, 오른손엔 방패. 양손검보다 약할 것 같지?{nl}그건 로델레로를 모르고 하는 소리야. 오른손에 든 것도 훌륭한 무기니까.
Sword di tangan kirimu, shield di tangan kananmu.{nl}Itu terasa lebih lemah dibandingkan membawa two-handed sword, bukan?{nl}Itu jika kamu tidak mengetahui tentang Rodeleros.{nl}Apa yang ada di tangan kananmu sama kuatnya dengan senjata.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You're not seeing things clearly if you think a shield is the only way to protect you from attacks.{nl}A shield can be a weapon just as good as a sword.
방패로 적의 공격을 막기만 한다면 그건 방패를 잘못 보고 있는 거야.{nl}검과 마찬가지로 하나의 훌륭한 무기가 될 수 있지.
Kamu tidak akan menjadi kuat jika kamu berpikir shield adalah satu-satunya cara untuk melindungimu dari serangan.{nl}Sebuah shield dapat menjadi senjata yang sama kuatnya dengan sword.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Mobility is the best means for a Cataphract to attack.{nl}You use your speed to strike your opponents with your spear.
캐터프랙트에게 있어서 기동력은 최고의 공격 수단이지.{nl}그 속도 그대로 적에게 창을 내다 꽂아버리는 거야.
Mobilitas adalah hal terpenting bagi Cataphract untuk menyerang.{nl}Kamu menggunakan kecepatan untuk menyerang lawanmu dengan menggunakan spear.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The settlers who moved to Orsha are mostly people {nl}who lost their hometowns due to monster attacks.{nl}But who knows... if another disaster like Medzio Diena won't happen again.
오르샤로 온 이주민 대부분이 몬스터의 습격 때문에 고향을 잃은 사람들이야.{nl}신수의 날 같은 재앙이 또 벌어지지 않을 거라는 건 아무도 모르는 거지.
Para pendatang yang pindah ke Orsha kebanyakan adalah orang-orang{nl}yang kehilangan kampung halamannya karena serangan para monster.{nl}Namun tidak ada yang bisa memastikan... bencana lain seperti Medzio Diena tidak akan terjadi lagi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Don't be scared. I just want to help Orsha so I sent out my spirit.{nl}You can do that if you're a high-ranked Sadhu.
놀라지 마세요. 오르샤를 돕기 위해 제 유체를 보내놓은 겁니다.{nl}높은 경지의 사두라면 이런 것도 가능하지요.
Jangan takut. Aku hanya ingin membantu Orsha jadi aku mengirimkan spiritku.{nl}Kamu dapat melakukannya jika kamu seorang high-rank Sadhu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We Paladins are always on the frontline in battles against the demons.{nl}Even if your mind is in the right place, if your confidence falters,{nl}your faith will be nothing but unfortunate.
우리 팔라딘은 마족과의 싸움에서 항상 최전선에 서 있어야 해요.{nl}아무리 뜻이 좋더라도 어중간한 믿음으로는 금방 불행한 일을 당하고 말 겁니다.
Kami Paladin selalu di garis depan dalam pertempuran melawan para demon.{nl}Walaupun kamu berpikir jernih, jika keyakinanmu tergoyahkan,{nl}maka keyakinanmu tidak akan berubah menjadi apapun selain kesengsaraan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Paladins are fearless because we believe the goddesses will always protect us.{nl}Fear comes from a lack of faith, you see.
우리 팔라딘들은 언제나 여신께서 지켜주실 것을 믿기 때문에 두려움이란 없죠.{nl}두려움이란 믿음의 부족에서 오는 것입니다.
Paladin tidak memiliki rasa takut karena kami percaya para Goddess  akan selalu melindungi kami.{nl}Rasa takut berasal dari kurangnya rasa yakin, kamu mengerti.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Now it's time to test out the techniques you've learned so far.{nl}Go and defeat the monsters in Apsimesti Crossroads.
이제는 그간 배운 기술을 응용해 보는 시험을 치룰 차례랍니다.{nl}압시메스티 교차로에서 몬스터들을 처치해 보세요.
Sekarang saatnya untuk menguji teknik yang telah kamu pelajari sejauh ini.{nl}Pergilah dan kalahkan para monster di Apsimesti Crossroads.

Please select the user requiring a quest: They say everything works out if you just devote yourself, right?{nl}Orsha and Fedimian are a bit far away but... please think of it as devotion.
뭐든 정성을 다하면 나중에라도 알아 줄 거라고 하죠?{nl}오르샤와 페디미안이 조금 멀긴 하지만.. 이것도 정성이라고 생각해 주세요.
Orang-orang mengatakan semuanya akan berhasil jika kamu mendedikasikan segalanya, bukan?{nl}Orsha dan Fedimian memang agak jauh tetapi... tolong anggap itu sebagai dedikasi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ardel's Diary, Page 1
아르델의 일기 1페이지
Ardel's Diary Page 1

Please select the user requiring a quest: Date: XX/XX. A clear sky.{nl}-{nl}Things at Delmore Castle are busy as always.{nl}The walls destroyed during Medzio Diena are being rebuilt and everyone is returning to their normal lives.{nl}I hope nothing like Medzio Diena happens ever again.{nl}Thanks to Lord Delmore I think the castle will be safe now.
X월 X일. 맑음.{nl}-{nl}델무어 성은 여전히 바쁘다.{nl}신수의 날로 부숴진 성벽도 착실히 복원되고 있고, 다들 원래의 삶으로 돌아가고 있다.{nl}다신 신수의 날 같은 건 오지 않았으면 좋겠다.{nl}다행히 델무어 성은 성주님 덕분에 그럴 일은 없을 것 같다.
Tanggal: XX/XX. Langit Cerah.{nl}-{nl}Segala kegiatan di Delmore Castle terlihat sibuk seperti biasa{nl}Dinding yang hancur ketika Medzio Diena kembali dibangun dan semua orang kembali ke aktivitas normal mereka{nl}Aku harap kejadian seperti Medzio Diena.. tidak terjadi kembali.{nl}Berkat Lord Delmore aku rasa castle akan aman sekarang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ardel's Diary, Page 2
아르델의 일기 2페이지
Ardel's Diary Page 2

Please select the user requiring a quest: Date: XX/XX. Cloudy.{nl}-{nl}They've been raising pillars in some places inside the fortress.{nl}Lord Delmore said that Orsha was occupied by monsters and demons and so he is raising them to prevent that.{nl}As expected of a truly talented alchemist...{nl}The people of Delmore Hamlet are joining in too.
X월 X일. 흐림.{nl}-{nl}성 내 곳곳에 알 수 없는 기둥들이 세워지고 있다.{nl}성주님께서는 오르샤 일대가 몬스터와 마족에게 점령당하고 있다면서 그걸 막기 위함이라고 하셨다.{nl}역시. 실력 좋은 알케미스트셔서 그런 건가..{nl}소작촌의 사람들도 동참하기로 했다.
Tanggal: XX/XX. Cuaca Berawan.{nl}-{nl}Mereka telah mengangkat pilar-pilar di beberapa tempat di dalam benteng{nl}Lord Delmore mengatakan bahwa Orsha pernah diduduki oleh para monster dan demon maka ia meninggikan pilar untuk mencegah itu terjadi lagi.{nl} sesuai dugaan dari alchemist yang berbakat...{nl}Orang-orang dari Delmore Hamlet juga ikut bergabung.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ardel's Diary, Page 3
아르델의 일기 3페이지
Ardel's Diary Page 3

Please select the user requiring a quest: Date: XX/XX. A clear sky.{nl}-{nl}The demons attacked us by surprise.{nl}Lord Delmore commanded every single resident of the fortress to move to the manor.{nl}I'll probably be safe if I go there too.
X월 X일. 맑음.{nl}-{nl}갑자기 마족들이 들이닥쳤다.{nl}성주님은 모든 성주민들은 하나도 빠짐 없이 장원으로 모이라고 했다.{nl}장원으로 가면 안전할 수 있겠지.
Tanggal: XX/XX. Langit Cerah{nl}-{nl}Para demon menyerang secara tiba-tiba{nl}Lord Delmore memerintahkan setiap penduduk di fortress untuk mengungsi ke manor{nl}Mungkin akan lebih aman bila aku pergi ke sana juga…

Please select the user requiring a quest: If you hunt Charcoal Walkers, some of them have arrows in their bodies that you can still use...
차콜 워커를 사냥하다보면 아직도 쓸만한 화살을 몸에 달고 다니는 녀석들이 있을 것이오.
Jika kamu berburu Charcoal Walkers, beberapa diantara mereka memiliki anak panah di tubuhnya dan kamu masih bisa menggunakan…

Please select the user requiring a quest: Revelator Yane
계시자 야네
Savior Yane

Please select the user requiring a quest: Wait, how did this happen?{nl}I thought you said the magic supply device had been destroyed!{nl}
아니, 이게 어떻게 된 거죠?{nl}분명히 마력 공급 장치가 모두 파괴되었다고 하지 않았나요?{nl}
Tunggu, bagaimana ini bisa terjadi?{nl}Bukankah kamu bilang magic supply device telah hancur!{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Isn't the protective shield around the Kruvina device still intact?
크루비나 제조 장치의 보호막은 그대로 남아있지 않습니까?
Bukankah protective shield di sekitar Kruvina device masih utuh?

Please select the user requiring a quest: That's impossible... I was sure it would disappear...{nl}
그럴리가.. 분명 보호막이 사라졌어야 하는데..{nl}
Itu mustahil... aku yakin sekali itu telah lenyap...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Wait a second!{nl}This can only mean Delmore Rephaim changed the device's layout after I left!
잠시만요! {nl}제가 떠난 뒤로 델무어 르바임이 장치의 설계를 바꾼 게 틀림없어요!
Tunggu sebentar!{nl}Itu berarti Delmore Rephaim mengubah tata letak device setelah aku pergi!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Could it be?{nl}So you too were a pawn of that Lord Delmore...{nl}
과연 그럴까요?{nl}당신도 그 델무어 성주의 하수인이었던 사람..{nl}
Mungkinkah begitu?{nl}Jadi kamu juga hanyalah sebuah pion dari Lord Delmore...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: What you know is useless and now I'm not even sure I believe you.{nl}We need to find a way to stop this ourselves.
당신이 알고 있는 건 소용도 없고 이젠 믿지도 못하겠네요.{nl}우린 우리 나름대로 막을 방법을 찾아보겠어요.
Apa yang kamu ketahui tidaklah berguna dan sekarang aku tidak yakin bisa mempercayaimu.{nl}Kita harus menemukan cara untuk menghentikannya dengan cara kita sendiri.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Yane. Wait.{nl}Wouldn't it be better to help Melchioras first and then find a new way to solve this?
야네. 기다려요.{nl}여기선 일단 멜히오라스씨를 도와 새로운 해결 방법을 찾는 것이 좋지 않을까요?
Yane. Tunggu.{nl}Bukankah lebih baik membantu Melchioras terlebih dahulu dan menemukan cara lain untuk memecahkan masalah ini?

Please select the user requiring a quest: You will help Melchioras then.{nl}As far as I can tell it's time for us to act separately.
그렇다면 미하일씨는 멜히오라스님을 도와 보시던가요.{nl}제가 보기엔 따로 행동할 때가 온 것 같네요.
Biarkan Mihail membantu Melchioras.{nl}Sejauh yang aku ketahui sudah saatnya bagi kita untuk bertindak secara terpisah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Alright everybody, let's go.{nl}We need to find a way to destroy the Kruvina device together.
자. 여러분들, 이만 가시죠.{nl}저와 함께 크루비나 제조 장치를 부술 방법을 찾아 봅시다.
Baiklah semua, ayo kita pergi.{nl}Kita harus menemukan cara untuk menghancurkan Kruvina device bersama-sama.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I was so oblivious.{nl}To think that Delmore Rephaim had anything to do with it...
제가 너무 안일했습니다.{nl}델무어 르바임이 손을 써 두었을 줄이야..
Aku mengabaikan.{nl}Untuk berpikir bahwa Delmore Rephaim memiliki kaitan dengan semua ini…

Please select the user requiring a quest: I know what Yane is like.{nl}In a situation like this she's definitely going to try and destroy the device by force.{nl}
야네의 성격은 잘 알고 있습니다.{nl}이런 상황이라면 무리해서 힘으로 장치를 부수려고 할 게 틀림없어요.{nl}
Aku paham Yane itu seperti apa.{nl}Dalam situasi seperti ini ia pasti akan mencoba dan menghancurkan device secara paksa.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't think our words can convince her.{nl}Melchioras, we need to find another way before Yane puts herself out there.
말로 해서 설득할 수 있을 것 같진 않네요.{nl}멜히오라스씨, 야네가 무리하기전에 우리가 먼저 해결 방법을 찾아냅시다.
Saya tidak yakin kata-kata kita bisa menenangkannya.{nl}Melchioras, kita perlu mencari cara lain sebelum Yane pergi ke sana.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oh... you're that new Revelator from earlier.{nl}You're helping out Mihail and Melchioras, are you?{nl}
아.. 아까 봤던 새로운 계시자님이군요.{nl}미하일씨와 멜히오라스님을 돕고 계시죠?{nl}
Oh... kamu Savior yang sebelumnya.{nl}Kamu yang membantu Mihail dan Melchioras, bukan?{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: That's good.{nl}The information you found is important, you should let them know, too.{nl}
마침 잘 됐네요.{nl}중요한 정보를 찾았으니 그분들에게도 전해주세요.{nl}
Itu bagus.{nl}Informasi yang kamu temukan sangatlah penting, Kamu harus memberitahu mereka juga.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Looking through a suspicious area we found a secret document hidden by Lord Delmore.{nl}We also found a way to destroy the Kruvina device.{nl}
의심가는 곳을 조하사던 중 델무어 성주가 숨겨 놓은 비밀 문서를 발견했어요.{nl}거기에서 크루비나 제조 장치를 부술 수 있는 방법도 찾았지요.{nl}
Mencari disekitar area yang terlihat mencurigakan kami menemukan sebuah dokumen rahasia{nl}yang disembunyikan oleh Lord Delmore. Kami juga menemukan cara untuk menghancurkan Kruvina device.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: We're all set here...{nl}Go and tell Mihail to come meet us by the device at the Palma Plaza.{nl}
저희가 모든 준비를 마쳤으니.. {nl}미하일씨에게 팔마 광장의 제조 장치 앞으로 와달라고 전해 주세요.{nl}
Kami sudah siap di sini...{nl}Pergi dan beritahu Mihail untuk datang menemui kami di Palma Plaza device.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: We're going to join forces and strike at once.{nl}You join in too, if you can.
모두의 힘을 모아서 한 번에 강한 충격을 줄 겁니다.{nl}가급적이면 당신도 협력해 주시고요.
Kita akan bergabung dan menyerang sekaligus.{nl}Kamu juga bisa ikut bergabung, jika kamu bisa.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Stop!{nl}Everybody, step away from the device!
그만 두세요!{nl}어서 장치에서 다들 떨어져요!
Berhenti!{nl}Semuanya, menjauh dari device!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Welcome, Mihail.{nl}Now let's hurry and destroy this vicious device.
어서 오세요. 미하일.{nl}한시라도 빨리 이 끔찍한 장치를 파괴해 버리죠.
Selamat datang, Mihail.{nl}Sekarang ayo kita bergegas dan hancurkan device ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I know, just get away from the device, quick!{nl}Yane! Hey!
아니, 일단 알겠으니까.. 빨리 장치에서 멀어지세요!{nl}야네! 어서요!
Aku tahu, menjauhlah dari device, cepat!{nl}Yane! Hei!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Delmore Rephaim
델무어 르바임
Delmore Rephaim

Please select the user requiring a quest: What a nice gesture to see you all gathered around here.{nl}Now, give everything to me!
고맙게도.. 잘 모여 주셨습니다.{nl}자아, 어서 내게 모든 걸 바치십시오!{nl}
Sungguh menyenangkan bisa melihat kalian semua berkumpul di sini.{nl}Sekarang, berikan semuanya kepadaku!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Give me more life... More power!
내게 더 많은 생명을.. 더 많은 힘을!
Beri aku lebih banyak nyawa... Lebih banyak kekuatan!

Please select the user requiring a quest: No!!{nl}How could this happen...{nl}
안돼!!{nl}이렇게 된 이상..{nl}
Tidak!!{nl}Bagaimana ini bisa terjadi...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'll take down the magic of the device even if I have to give my whole power and life for it!{nl}Please save me!
제 마력과 목숨을 모두 태워서라도 제조 장치의 마력을 비틀어 보겠습니다!{nl}저를 지켜 주십시오!
Aku akan menghancurkan magic pada device itu walaupun aku harus kehilangan seluruh{nl}kekuatanku dan hidupku! Tolong selamatkan aku!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ah... are you Melchioras, the traitor?{nl}I have to thank you.{nl}
아.. 배신자 멜히오라스인가?{nl}자네에겐 감사를 표하지. {nl}
Ah... kamukah Melchioras, si pengkhianat itu?{nl}Aku harus berterima kasih kepadamu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: You and Revelator Yane there as well...{nl}You have no idea how fun it was to watch you from above...
그리고 저 야네라는 계시자에게도..{nl}자네들의 머리 꼭대기에서 구경하는 게 어찌나 즐거웠던지..
Kamu dan Savior Yane berada disana juga...{nl}Kamu tidak tahu bagaimana menyenangkannya melihat kalian dari kejauhan…

Please select the user requiring a quest: What are you doing, Melchioras!!{nl}Go hide in a corner somewhere like the coward you are!!{nl}
무슨 짓인가, 멜히오라스!!{nl}겁쟁이면 겁쟁이답게 구석에 쳐박혀 있으란 말이다!!{nl}
Apa yang kamu lakukan, Melchioras!!{nl}Pergilah bersembunyi seperti pengecut!!{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Alright... Let's see just how bravely you can destroy it.{nl}I'll give you a taste of how the Kruvina is really used!
그래.. 네가 어디까지 용감하게 굴 수 있을지 보자.{nl}크루비나의 올바른 사용법을.. 특별히 구경시켜주마!
Baiklah... Mari kita lihat seberapa hebat kamu untuk bisa menghancurkannya.{nl}Aku akan membuatmu merasakan bagaimana kekuatan Kruvina ketika digunakan!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Is everyone alright?
다들 정신이 드십니까?
Apakah semuanya baik-baik saja?

Please select the user requiring a quest: What have I done...{nl}It was all my fault... I was so careless...
내가 무슨 짓을..{nl}전부 제가.. 경솔한 탓입니다..{nl}
Apa yang sudah Aku lakukan...{nl}Ini semua adalah salahku... Aku sangat ceroboh…

Please select the user requiring a quest: Melchioras is in danger.{nl}I'll save him!
멜히오라스님이 위험해요.{nl}제가 구하겠어요!
Melchioras dalam bahaya.{nl}aku akan menyelamatkannya!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Yane! Wait!
야네! 기다려요!
Yane! Tunggu!

Please select the user requiring a quest: We should go after her.{nl}Those who are injured should stay here and take care of the other demons.
우리도 뒤쫓아 갑시다.{nl}아직 회복이 안된 분들은 이곳에 남아 다른 마족들을 부탁드리겠습니다.
Kita harus pergi mengejarnya.{nl}Kalian yang terluka tinggallah di sini dan atasi demon lainnya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Follower Bigs
추종자 빅스
Follower Bigs

Please select the user requiring a quest: If only we were more powerful we could have helped the Revelators...{nl}All we can do is feel sorry about our limitations.
우리가 능력만 되었다면 계시자님들을 따라가 도움이 되어드렸을텐데...{nl}스스로의 한계가 안타까울 뿐입니다.
Kalau saja kami lebih kuat kami pasti bisa membantu Savior...{nl}Yang bisa kami lakukan hanyalah meratapi keterbatasan kami.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There was even talks of kidnapping a wizard and running away...{nl}Definitely not ordinary people.
그 와중에도 마법사님을 납치해 달아날 생각을 하다니...{nl}역시 보통 놈은 아니었군요.
Bahkan ada yang mengatakan ia menculik seorang wizard dan melarikan diri...{nl}Ia pasti bukan orang biasa.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thank you. With someone capable like you, there should be no problems.
감사합니다. 당신의 능력이라면 걱정없겠지요.
Terima kasih. Dengan keberadaan orang yang hebat sepertimu, seharusnya itu tidak ada masalah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There's no telling how far the demons' evil deeds will go.{nl}Just look at how they built that device.
마족들의 사악한 수단은 그 깊이를 알 수가 없군요.{nl}저런 장치까지 만들어내다니 말입니다.
Tidak ada yang tahu sejauh mana kekuatan jahat bekerja.{nl}Lihatlah bagaimana mereka membangun device tersebut.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thank you.{nl}To collect it the ground needs to stay still or it won't have any effect, so be careful.
감사합니다.{nl}채취하다 땅에 흘리기라도 하면 효과가 없으니 조심해주세요.
Terima kasih.{nl}Telah menyediakan lahan yang cukup untuk menempatkannya atau ini tidak akan bekerja, jadi berhati-hatilah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Conner and I will take the path on the right.{nl}You and Mihail look through the path that goes up.{nl}Monsters here are especially fierce so be careful.{nl}{nl}Conner and I will head towards the Tagica Crossroads.{nl}You and Mihail can head to the Assembly Hall.{nl}{nl}
저와 코너는 오른쪽 방향의 길을 찾아보겠습니다.{nl}당신과 미하일은 함께 윗쪽 방향을 조사해 주시기 바랍니다.{nl}이 곳의 몬스터들은 특히 더 사나우니 주의하시고요.{nl}{nl}저와 코너는 타지카 갈림길 쪽으로 가지요.{nl}당신과 미하일은 오렘 집회장 쪽으로 가 보세요.{nl}{nl}
Conner dan aku akan mengambil jalan sebelah kanan.{nl}Kamu dan Mihail pergi lewati jalan keatas.{nl}Monster di sini sangat aggresif jadi berhati-hatilah.{nl}{nl}Conner dan aku akan menuju ke arah Tagica Crossroads.{nl}Kamu dan Mihail pergi menuju ke Assembly Hall.{nl}{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: To have an enchantment prepared in such a short time is definitely extraordinary.{nl}So, enchantment and demons... I think I got it.{nl}
짧은 시간에 이런 결계까지 준비하다니 역시 보통내기가 아니군요.{nl}결계와 마족이라.. 알 것 같습니다.{nl}
Mempersiapkan enchantment dalam waktu singkat sangatlah luar biasa.{nl}Jadi, enchantment dan para demon... Aku rasa aku paham sekarang.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The core of it is magic.{nl}To keep an enchantment this strong it takes a lot of magical power.{nl}
핵심은 마력입니다.{nl}이만한 결계를 유지하려면 어마어마한 마력이 들겠지요.{nl}
Kuncinya adalah magic core.{nl}Untuk menjaga enchantment tetap kuat membutuhkan banyak kekuatan magic.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The demons' stamina may be lower, but the magic core could still make an appearance.{nl}Let's attack that or just defeat all the demons!
마족의 체력이 낮아지만 아마 마력핵이 모습을 드러낼 겁니다.{nl}그걸 공격하든지, 아니면 차라리 마족을 전부 해치워버립시다!
Stamina para demon mungkin sedikit, tapi magic core mereka perlu diperhitungkan.{nl}Ayo serang itu atau kalahkan semua demon!

Please select the user requiring a quest: As expected... the enchantment is a lot trouble to deal with.
역시.. 결계로 고생하는군요.{nl}
Seperti dugaanku... enchantment sangat sulit untuk di tangani.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I saw a device on my way here...{nl}Maybe that's the main core of the enchantment. Let's go back.{nl}
오면서 장치 하나를 봤는데.. {nl}아마 그게 결계의 주체일 겁니다. 돌아가지요.{nl}
Aku melihat sebuah device saat perjalananku ke sini...{nl}Mungkin itu adalah core dari enchantment itu. Ayo kembali kesana.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The doll is glowing just like Yane said.{nl}Please take it to her.
야네 말처럼 인형이 빛나고 있군요.{nl}그녀에게 어서 전달해 주세요.
Boneka tersebut bersinar seperti yang Yane katakan.{nl}Tolong bawakan itu kepadanya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It won't move.{nl}It's completely stuck to the spot.
진짜 질리지도 않는군요.{nl}오도가도 못하게 막혀버렸어요.
Ini tidak mau bergerak.{nl}Ini benar-benar stuck ditempat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I think I can break it down with a bomb.{nl}Two minutes should be enough. Please hold back the demons.
이건 제가 폭탄으로 어떻게든 부술 수 있을 것 같네요.{nl}2분이면 됩니다. 마족이 작업을 방해하지 못하도록 부탁드립니다.
Aku rasa aku bisa menghancurkannya dengan bom.{nl}Dua menit ku rasa cukup. Tolong halangi demon yang mendekat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Success!{nl}
성공입니다!{nl}
Sukses!{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The explosion is sure to make demons come running here.{nl}I'll try and stop them as much as I can; you take care of Delmore Rephaim.
폭발 소리를 듣고 마족들이 쫓아올 겁니다.{nl}그건 제가 어떻게든 막아볼 테니 당신은 델무어 르바임을 부탁합니다.
Ledakannya akan membuat para demon datang berlarian ke sini{nl}Aku akan mencoba menghentikan mereka sebisa mungkin; Kamu urus Delmore Rephaim.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You're here...{nl}
왔군..{nl}
Kamu di sini...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: You must think I lost now that you found me.{nl}But I won't lose that easily.{nl}
날 따라잡았으니 내가 졌다고 생각하겠지?{nl}하지만 그냥 지는 건 있을 수 없는 일이야.{nl}
Kamu pasti berpikir aku telah kalah sekarang karena kamu menemukanku.{nl}Namun aku tidak akan kalah dengan mudah.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's true... I don't think I can become a god.{nl}But I can turn myself into something more noble.{nl}
그래.. 내가 신이 될 수 있을 거라고 생각하진 않네.{nl}하지만 나 자체가 좀 더 고결한 무언가가 될 수도 있겠지.{nl}
Memang benar... Aku tidak bisa menjadi Dewa.{nl}Namun setidaknya aku bisa mengubah diriku menjadi sesuatu yang lebih mulia.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: All my possessions, my people, my knowledge, they're still not enough!{nl}Revelators... Their power alone will guide me.{nl}
내 재산, 내 주민, 내 모든 지식을 쏟아부어도 아직 부족해!{nl}계시자.. 그들의 신성한 힘만이 날 이끌어 줄 거야.{nl}
Semua hartaku, pengikutku, pengetahuanku, masih tidak cukup!{nl}Savior... kekuatan mereka akan membimbingku.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Surprised?{nl}This Kruvina is the first piece made with all my loyal vassals.{nl}
놀랐나?{nl}이 크루비나는 내 충성스런 가신들로 만든 첫 번째 작품이었지.{nl}
Terkejut?{nl}Kruvina adalah bagian pertama yang dibuat oleh seluruh pengikut setiaku.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Consider it an honor to be its first victim.{nl}Don't worry, I'll make sure to turn all the other Revelators into Kruvina so you won't feel lonely!
첫 제물이 된 것을 영광으로 생각하게.{nl}외롭지 않게 나머지 계시자들도 전부 크루비나로 만들어 줄 테니까!
Anggap itu suatu kehormatan untuk menjadi korban pertamanya.{nl}Jangan khawatir, aku akan pastikan untuk mengubah semua Savior lain menjadi Kruvina sehingga kamu tidak akan merasa kesepian!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Of course monsters are a threat, but not as much as the demons.{nl}If we keep exterminating them this place will soon be free of the demons.
몬스터들도 물론 위협적이지만 마족만큼은 아니겠지요.{nl}꾸준히 퇴치하다 보면 이곳에서 마족이 사라질 날도 머지 않을 겁니다.
Tentu saja monster merupakan ancaman, namun tidak sebanyak demon.{nl}Jika kita terus membasmi mereka, tempat ini akan segera terbebas dari para demon.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The box is empty.
상자는 비어 있다.
Kotak kosong.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Entrance Portal

Please select the user requiring a quest: Here you can play a pair-matching game with monsters.{nl}Inside each barrel is a monster and your goal is to find and eliminate pairs of identical monsters. {nl}You have 20 tries. Would you like to play?
이 곳에서는 몬스터를 이용한 짝 맞추기 게임을 진행합니다.{nl}상자에 숨어있는 몬스터 중 같은 몬스터를 찾아서 없애는 게임입니다. 기회는 총 20번 주어집니다.{nl}도전 하시겠습니까?
Di sini kamu dapat bermain game mencocokkan sepasang monster.{nl} Di dalam setiap barel terdapat monster dan kamu harus menemukan dan mengalahkan sepasang monster yang identik.{nl}Kamu memiliki 20 kesempatan. Apakah kamu ingin bermain?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Mysterious Bulletin Board
신비한 알림판
Mysterious Bulletin Board

Please select the user requiring a quest: 311st day of the War{nl}-{nl}Unbelievable news.{nl}Legendary marksman Lydia Schaffen has sided with the Royal Army.{nl}Although I tried to calm my subordinates by asking whether she was better than our Commander Ruklys, but once the anxiety and nervousness spreads, there's nothing we can truly do about it.{nl}
전쟁 311일째{nl}-{nl}믿을 수 없는 소식이다. {nl}전설의 명궁 리디아 샤펜이 왕국군의 편에 선다고 한다.{nl}그녀가 우리 루클리스 장군님보다 낫다는 말이냐며 수하들을 다그쳐 봤지만 이미 퍼지기 시작한 불안과 동요는 어쩔 수 없는 것 같다.{nl}
Hari Perang ke-311{nl}-{nl}berita mengejutkan{nl}Legendary marksman Lydia Schaffen telah berpihak kepada Royal Army{nl}Meskipun aku mencoba menenangkan pengikutku dengan menanyakan apakah dia lebih baik dari Commander Ruklys, namun saat kecemasan dan kegelisahan menyebar, tidak ada bisa kami lakukan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: 331st day of the War{nl}-{nl}No matter how this war ends, if given the chance, I want to kill the chancellor.{nl}If we emerge victorious, I will ask Ruklys to have me execute him, and if we fail, I will at least want to charge at his barricade and stab his chest with a blade; even if I die in the process.{nl}Eminent has started to take over the Earth Tower while leading the demons.{nl}As a human being, how dare he join forces with the demons...?
전쟁 331일째{nl}-{nl}만약 기회가 닿는다면 이 전쟁이 어떻게 끝이 나는 에미넌트 그 자식만은 꼭 내가 죽이고 싶다. {nl}이긴다면 루클리스님에게 그 놈의 처형 집행을 내게 시켜달라 할 것이고, 진다면 그 놈의 막사로 돌격이라도 감행해서 그 놈의 가슴에 칼을 꽂고 전사하고 싶을 지경이다.{nl}에미넌트는 마족들을 이끌고 대지의 요새를 휩쓸기 시작했다.{nl}인간으로서 어떻게 마족과 손을 잡는단 말인가..
Hari perang ke-331{nl}-{nl}Tidak peduli bagaimana perang ini akan berakhir, jika aku diberi kesempatan, aku ingin membunuh chancellor itu{nl}Jika kami menang, aku akan meminta Ruklys agar aku bisa mengeksekusinya, dan jika kami kalah, setidaknya aku akan menerobos barikadenya dan menusuk dadanya dengan pisau; walaupun aku harus mati saat itu.{nl}Eminent mulai mengambil alih Earth Tower dengan memimpin para demon.{nl} Sebagai manusia, beraninya ia bekerja sama dengan para demon...?

Please select the user requiring a quest: If you adore the goddess so much, then allow me send you back to Her!
여신의 품이 그토록 좋다면 내 손으로 직접 보내주마!
Jika kamu begitu merindukkan Goddess , maka izinkan aku untuk mengirimmu kembali kepada-Nya!

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Story of Karolis Vol. 1
카롤리스 이야기 1권
Story of Karolis Vol. 1

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Springs of Karolis hide the story of a not so well-known hero.{nl}-{nl}Karolis... He was the favorite disciple of Tesla, the most famous of the Dievdirbys.{nl}Commanded by Goddess Ausrine, Tesla had carved several statues of the Spirit-Leading Owl.{nl}
카롤리스의 샘터엔 잘 알려지지 않는 영웅의 이야기가 숨어 있습니다{nl}-{nl}카롤리스.. 그는 가장 유명한 딥디르비인 테슬라가 가장 좋아하던 수제자였습니다.{nl}테슬라는 아우슈리네 여신의 부탁으로 영혼을 인도하는 부엉이 조각상을 깎았습니다.{nl}
The springs of Karolis menyembunyikan kisah pahlawan yang tidak begitu dikenal{nl}-{nl} Karolis... Ia adalah murid favorit Tesla, Dievdirbys yang paling terkenal{nl}Diperintahkan oleh Goddess Ausrine, Tesla telah mengukir beberapa patung Spirit-Leading Owl.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: He placed each statue in a different spot deep within the dark forest.{nl}This was to guide the spirits on their way to Goddess Ausrine.{nl}He also made a friend to protect the owls - Sequoia.{nl}
완성된 부엉이 조각상들은 깊고 어두운 숲 여기 저기에 세워 두었지요.{nl}영혼들이 아우슈리네 여신께 가다가 길을 잃지 않도록요.{nl}그리고 그 부엉이를 지킬 멋진 친구인 세콰이아도 만들었어요.
Ia menempatkan masing-masing patung di tempat yang berbeda di dalam dark forest{nl} Itu untuk memandu para roh dalam perjalanan mereka menuju Goddess Ausrine{nl}Ia juga memiliki teman untuk melindungi owls - Sequoia{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Story of Karolis Vol. 3
카롤리스 이야기 3권
Story of Karolis Vol. 3

Please select the user requiring a quest: Karolis looked at the girl and said,{nl}"I will give you my life, if you give me the power to protect you."{nl}With a sad look on her face, the girl shook her head, but Karolis would not give up.{nl}
카롤리스는 소녀를 바라보며 말했습니다. {nl}제 모든 생명을 당신께 드릴 테니 저에게 당신을 지킬 힘을 달라고요.{nl}소녀는 슬픈 표정으로 고개를 가로저었지만, 카롤리스의 고집을 꺾을 순 없었습니다.{nl}
Karolis menatap gadis itu dan berkata,{nl}"Aku akan memberimu nyawaku, jika kamu memberiku kekuatan untuk melindungimu."{nl}Dengan ratapan sedih di wajahnya, gadis itu menggelengkan kepalanya, namun Karolis tidak menyerah.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: And so, with a reluctant nod of the girl's head, Karolis' body began to glow as it turned into a tree.{nl}The light radiating from him turned all the demons in the forest to ashes and drove away all evil energy within it.{nl}
소녀가 마지 못해서 고개를 끄덕이자 카롤리스의 몸이 밝게 빛나며 한 그루의 나무로 변했습니다.{nl}그리고 거기서 뿜어져 나오는 빛은 숲에 있던 모든 마족들을 재로 만들었고, 숲에서 나오던 사악한 기운까지 한 번에 날려버렸습니다.{nl}
Dan, dengan anggukan terpaksa dari kepala gadis itu, tubuh Karolis mulai bercahaya dan berubah menjadi pohon.{nl}Cahaya yang memancar darinya membuat semua demon di hutan menjadi abu dan mengusir semua energi jahat di dalamnya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The girl left in tears, and the forest once charged with evil forces was now filled with divine energy.{nl}Karolis' traces can be found to this day.{nl}Letas' holy trees are descendants of the tree Karolis was turned into.{nl}
소녀는 눈물과 함께 그 숲을 떠났고, 사악한 기운이 뿜어져 나오던 그 숲은 신성한 기운이 가득한 곳으로 바뀌었습니다.{nl}지금도 카롤리스의 흔적을 찾아볼 수 있습니다.{nl}레타스의 신성한 나무들이 카롤리스가 변한 나무의 후손들이지요.{nl}
Gadis yang ditinggalkannya menangis, dan hutan yang di kelilingi kekuatan jahat kini penuh dengan energi suci.{nl}Jejak Karolis dapat ditemukan sampai hari ini.{nl}Letas holy tree adalah keturunan dari Karolis yang berubah menjadi pohon.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: To this day, Karolis protects the forest.{nl}He was never able to become the great Dievdirbys he had dreamed of, but his sacrifice lives on.{nl}
카롤리스는 그 숲을 지금도 지키고 있습니다.{nl}자신의 꿈인 위대한 딥디르비는 되지 못했지만, 그의 희생은 지금까지도 길이길이 전해지고 있습니다.{nl}
Hingga kini, Karolis melindungi hutan.{nl}Ia tidak pernah bisa menjadi Dievdirbys hebat seperti yang ia impikan, namun pengorbanannya hingga kini.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Demon Class Notes
마족 수업 필기
Demon Class Notes

Please select the user requiring a quest: Today's class notes... I'm so sleepy. I want my bed...{nl}-{nl}Since the beginning of human history, the goddesses have exercised their benign power on people.{nl}Demons, then, are the evil forces opposed to that power.{nl}They use their own power to hurt humans and work against the goddesses.{nl}
오늘의 수업 필기.. 너무 졸립다. 자고 싶다..{nl}-{nl}여신들께서는 우리 인간의 역사가 시작될 때부터 언제나 인간을 위해 선한 권능을 행사하셨어요.{nl}하지만 마족은 그 선함에 반대되는 악한 존재이지요.{nl}언제나 그들의 힘으로 인간에게 해를 끼치고 여신께 대적했으니까요.{nl}
Catatan kelas hari ini... Aku sangat mengantuk. aku ingin tidur...{nl}-{nl}Sejak awal sejarah manusia, para Goddess  menggunakan kekuatan suci kepada manusia{nl}Para demon merupakan kekuatan jahat yang menentang kekuatan itu{nl}Mereka menggunakan kekuatannya untuk menyakiti manusia dan melawan Goddess .{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Evil itself has no substance.{nl}Knives, for example, can be used both to hurt people and prepare food.{nl}But demons are absolute evil.{nl}Demons cannot be eternal, and they are not accepted by the goddesses.
악함이란 건, 실체가 없어요.{nl}식칼은 사람을 해칠수도 있지만, 요리를 만들어 주잖아요?{nl}하지만 마족은 절대적인 악이에요.{nl}마족들은 영원할 수 없고, 여신께서는 마족을 용납치 않으세요.
Kekuatan jahat itu sendiri tidak memiliki bentuk.{nl} Pisau, misalnya, dapat digunakan untuk menyakiti orang dan menyiapkan makanan.{nl} tetapi para demon mutlak jahat.{nl} Demon tidak bisa kekal, dan mereka tidak diterima oleh para Goddess .

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Mystery of Bracken Forest
고사리 숲의 신비
The Mystery of Bracken Forest

Please select the user requiring a quest: Koru Jungle, Knidos Jungle and Dadan Jungle are all known for their herbs, but particularly for their bracken.{nl}The night dew gathers in their small, closely arranged leaves, creating a fantastic sight when the first rays of light shine on them every morning.{nl}
코루 숲, 크니도스 숲, 다단 숲은 약초로도 유명하지만, 그 중에서도 제일 유명한 건 고사리이다.{nl}작은 고사리들이 잘게 군집되어 새벽 이슬을 머금은 채로 떠오르는 아침 햇살을 받아 환상적으로 빛난다.{nl}
Koru Jungle, Knidos Jungle dan Dadan Jungle semua dikenal karena tumbuh-tumbuhannya, terutama untuk tanaman pakis mereka.{nl}Embun malam terkumpul pada dedaunannya yang erat, menciptakan pemandangan yang fantastis ketika cahaya pertama menyinari mereka setiap paginya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Watching the bracken spores float around when the season comes makes one wonder if such a sight isn't too a blessing of the goddesses.
그 고사리들이 철이 되어 포자를 날리는 광경을 보고 있으면 여신의 은혜란 이런 것이 아니겠는가 하고 생각하게 된다.
Melihat spora pakis yang mengapung di sekitar ketika musimnya tiba membuat orang bertanya-tanya bukankah pemandangan tersebut diberkati oleh para Goddess .

Please select the user requiring a quest: King Kadumel's Prison
카듀멜 국왕의 감옥
King Kadumel's Prison

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Ashaq Underground Prison is the only remaining prison out of several built in the south part of King Kadumel's kingdom.{nl}Despite its connection to Ruklys Civil War and King Kadumel's tyranny, the building remains to this day as it was maintained through the years for various purposes other than a prison.{nl}
아샤크 지하 감옥은 카듀멜 국왕의 시대에 왕국 남부에 지어진 감옥 중 현재까지 남아있는 거의 유일한 감옥입니다.{nl}루클리스의 반란이라던가 카듀멜 국왕의 폭정의 산물이라고 평가되어도 긴 시간 동안 남아 있을 수 있었던 이유는 여러 세력이 감옥이 아닌 각자 다른 목적으로 사용했었기 때문입니다.{nl}
Ashaq Underground Prison adalah penjara yang tersisa dari beberapa penjara lain di bagian selatan King Kadumel's kingdom.{nl}Meskipun berhubungan dengan Ruklys Civil War dan tirani King Kadumel, bangunan ini tetap dipertahankan selama bertahun-tahun untuk berbagai tujuan selain dari penjara.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Curiously, despite this, the building's structure and interior have maintained the same atmoshpere of the original prison.
다만, 그럼에도 불구하고 감옥의 내부나 구조는 그 당시의 감옥의 분위기 그대로 이어져 내려오고 있다는 점도 특이한 일입니다.
Anehnya, meskipun struktur bangunan dan interior sudah dibenahi, suasananya masih sama seperti penjara asli.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Orsha, City of Commerce
상업도시 오르샤
Orsha, Kota Perdagangan

Please select the user requiring a quest: Orsha, the city of commerce. Great as it was, it did not survive Medzio Diena unscathed.{nl}Large tree roots spread throughout Orsha, demolishing the city's mighty walls and causing an earthquake of tremendous magnitude.{nl}The disaster killed the lord of Orsha and all his successors, merely sparing his only daughter, who is currently in charge of the city.
상업도시 오르샤. 그 찬란한 위상도 신수의 날을 피해가지 못했다.{nl}오르샤를 향해 뻗은 나무뿌리는 오르샤의 웅장한 성벽을 허물고 도시 전체에 엄청난 규모의 지진을 동반했다.{nl}그 결과, 오르샤의 영주와 그의 계승자들은 모두 사망하였고, 어린 외동딸만이 살아남아 현재의 오르샤를 지탱하고 있다.
Orsha, kota perdagangan. Sangat besar, namun tetap mengalami kerusakan ketika Medzio Diena.{nl}Akar pohon besar yang menyebar di seluruh Orsha, menghancurkan dinding perkasanya dan menyebabkan gempa bumi berkekuatan besar.{nl}Bencana itu menewaskan Lord Orsha dan semua penerusnya, hanya putri satu-satunya, yang saat ini bertanggung jawab atas kota ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Zeraha's Goddess Statue
제라하의 여신상
Zeraha's Goddess Statue

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unlike the other goddesses, Laima, the goddess of fate and foresight, exists only in records.{nl}Goddess Laima's encounters with humans are scarce and so are her known blessings, making her a lesser known deity despite being one of the main goddesses.{nl}
다른 여신과는 달리 기록에만 존재하는 운명과 예지의 여신 라이마.{nl}라이마 여신께서는 인간들과 접촉이 드물고, 전해져오는 은총도 다른 여신에 비해 드물기 때문에 많은 여신들 가운데 주된 여신임에도 불구하고 그리 유명하지 않다. {nl}
Tidak seperti Goddess  lainnya, Laima, Goddess  takdir dan prediksi masa depan, hanya ada di dalam catatan.{nl}Goddess Laima sangatlah jarang bertemu dengan manusia dan begitu juga blessingnya, membuatnya kurang dikenal meskipun salah satu dari Goddess  utama.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Despite this, the statue of Goddess Laima in Zeraha is universally admired for its tremendous size and beauty.{nl}Some believe that in ancient times there could have existed a hidden city, while others say the city was built in a single day by the power of the goddess.{nl}
한 편, 제라하에 있는 라이마 여신상은 눈 앞에 펼쳐지는 그 엄청난 크기와 아름다움에 모두가 숨을 죽인다.{nl}혹자는 고대에 숨겨진 도시가 있었을 것이라고 하고, 어떤 이는 여신의 권능으로 하루 만에 만들어졌다고도 한다.{nl}
Meskipun demikian, patung Goddess Laima di Zeraha secara umum sangat dikagumi karena ukuran dan keindahannya yang luar biasa.{nl}Beberapa diantaranya percaya bahwa di zaman dahulu itu adalah sebuah kota yang tersembunyi, sementara yang lain berpendapat kota itu hanya dibangun dalam satu hari dengan kekuatan Goddess .{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Whatever the truth, it is believed that the people who built the statue are no longer among us, their few descendants having created a village where they currently live.
어떤 것이 사실이던, 그 여신상을 만든 사람들은 전부 사라지고 아주 약간의 후손들만이 남아 마을을 이루고 살고 있다고 한다.
Apapun faktanya, sudah pasti yang membangun patung itu sudah tidak lagi berada di antara kita, beberapa keturunan mereka membangun desa di mana mereka bisa hidup.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Correct Classification of Demons and Monsters
마족과 몬스터의 올바른 구분법
Klasifikasi Tepat Para Demon dan Monster

Please select the user requiring a quest: There is no exact way to classify demons and monsters based on external appearance.{nl}Those familiar with monsters can often distinguish them from demons, however this knowledge comes merely from experience and not from the application of general principles.{nl}
마족과 몬스터를 외형적으로 구분할 수 있는 확실한 방법은 존재하지 않는다.{nl}몬스터에 능숙한 사람이라면 현존하는 모든 마족과 몬스터를 구분할 수 있으나 이는 경험의 축척일 뿐, 일반적인 법칙이 따로 존재하여 아는 것이 아니다.{nl}
Tidak ada cara yang tepat untuk mengklasifikasikan para demon dan monster berdasarkan penampilan luarnya.{nl}Mereka yang paham akan monster dapat membedakan mereka dari para monster, namun pengetahuan ini datang hanya dari pengalaman dan bukan dari teori-teori umum.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: There is one fundamental internal difference between demons and regular monsters.{nl}Demons possess a mind capable of producing thoughts, among which is their clear malevolence towards humans.
마족은 그 내면에 일반적인 몬스터와 분명한 차이점이 있다.{nl}마족은 생각과 심리를 가지고 있으며, 그 가운데 인간에 대한 분명한 악의를 품고 있다.
Ada satu perbedaan internal yang mendasar antara para demon dan monster biasa.{nl} Para demon memiliki daya pikir yang mampu menghasilkan sesuatu, di antaranya adalah kedengkian mereka terhadap manusia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Alchemist's Oath
알케미스트 선서
Sumpah Alchemist

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Alchemist's Oath originated in the Winterspoon family, known as the founders of alchemy.{nl}Their principles were passed down and, over time, they became established as the alchemists' official rules.{nl}
알케미스트의 선서는 연금술의 종주가문인 윈터스푼 가문의 가훈이 전해져 내려오는 것으로{nl}다른 모든 알케미스트들 사이에 오랜 세월에 걸쳐 원칙으로 확립되었다.{nl}
Sumpah Alchemist berasal dari keluarga Winterspoon, yang dikenal sebagai pendiri dari alchemy.{nl}Prisip mereka diturunkan dan dari waktu ke waktu mereka menjadi kokoh sebagai aturan resmi alchemist.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: {nl}One. Alchemists must not defy the will of the goddesses through their research or its results.{nl}-{nl}Two. Alchemists may not harm what is good or the goddesses through their research or its results.{nl}-{nl}Three. Alchemists may not use the goddesses or fellow humans as materials.{nl}
{nl}하나. 모든 알케미스트의 연구와 결과는 모든 여신의 섭리를 거스르지 않아야 한다.{nl}-{nl}하나. 모든 알케미스트의 연구와 결과는 선과 여신을 해쳐서는 안 된다.{nl}-{nl}하나. 모든 알케미스트는 여신과 인간을 재료로 절대 쓰지 않는다.{nl}
{nl}Satu. Alchemist tidak boleh menentang kehendak para Goddess  melalui penelitian maupun hasil penelitiannya{nl}-{nl}Dua. Alchemist tidak boleh membahayakan kebaikan ataupun Goddess  melalui penelitian maupun hasil penelitiannya{nl}-{nl}Tiga. Alchemist tidak boleh menggunakan para Goddess  atau sesama manusia sebagai bahan percobaan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: All alchemists vow to protect others by obeying these principles.
모든 알케미스트는 위의 조항을 지키며 다른 사람들이 지키도록 노력한다.
Semua alchemist bersumpah untuk melindungi orang banyak dan mematuhi prinsip-prinsip ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Old Diary
낡은 일기
Old Diary

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ours was a peaceful kingdom. There was nothing we lacked and people were happy.{nl}Every year we celebrated the spring festival and the goddesses answered our prayers.{nl}But eventually, more and more of our prayers started being left unanswered.{nl}Was it an omen? Suddenly, in the center of the capital an enormous tree sprouted up from the ground and started to spread out.{nl}
정말 평화로운 왕국이었지. 무엇 하나 부족한 것이 없었고 모두가 행복했었어.{nl}매년 봄이 오는 축제를 했고 여신들께선 언제나 우리들의 기도에 화답하셨어.{nl}하지만 언젠가부터 여신들께선 하나 둘 씩 우리들의 기도에 응답하지 않으시더군.{nl}그것이 예고였을까. 수도의 한 가운데서 갑자기 거대한 나무가 솟아오르면서 폭주하기 시작했어.{nl}
Kerajaan kami damai. Tidak kekurangan apapun dan penduduknya sangat bahagia.{nl}Setiap tahun kami merayakan festival musim semi dan para Goddess  menjawab doa-doa kami.{nl}Dan kemudian, tiba-tiba doa-doa kami mulai tidak dijawab.{nl}Apa ini pertanda? Tiba-tiba, di tengah ibukota sebuah pohon besar tumbuh dari bawah tanah dan mulai menyebar.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Within moments, the capital was destroyed beyond recognition and many had to face the loss of loved ones.{nl}After the initial shock, people started to run, trying to escape the source of the disaster.{nl}But it was far from over.{nl}
수도는 손 쓸 수도 없이 순식간에 파괴되었고 많은 이들은 사랑하는 사람의 죽음에 눈물을 흘려야 했지.{nl}정신을 차렸을 때 많은 사람들이 재앙에서 벗어나려고 달리기 시작했어.{nl}하지만 재앙은 그것이 끝은 아니었어. {nl}
Dengan sekejap, ibukota hancur diluar dugaan dan banyak orang yang harus kehilangan orang yang dicintainya.{nl}Setelah goncangan awal, orang mulai berlarian, mencoba melarikan diri dari sumber bencana.{nl}Namun itu belumlah selesai.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The colossal tree spread out its fully-bloomed flowers and started to engulf those trying to escape.{nl}Soon the capital had completely collapsed. The tremendous aftermath extended the disaster to many other cities.{nl}
그 아름드리 나무가, 흐드러지게 피던 꽃들이 입을 벌려 도망치던 사람들을 집어삼키기 시작했지.{nl}수도는 그렇게 멸망해 버렸어. 그 여파는 너무나도 거대해서 많은 도시들도 화를 입었다더군.{nl}
Pepohonan itu menyebar luas, bunga bermekaran dan mulai menelan mereka yang mencoba melarikan diri.{nl}Ibukota telah benar-benar runtuh. Bencana luar biasa ini terus menjalar ke kota-kota lainnya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Four years have passed since the nightmare.{nl}The wounds have hardly begun to heal. The goddesses remain unheard of.{nl}Monsters continue to terrorize our world and the affected cities are yet to be reconstructed.{nl}We still struggle with the lack of supplies, but we're trying to return to our normal lives as best as we can.{nl}
그 악몽에서 4년이라는 시간이 흘렀어.{nl}상처를 아무는 데도 턱없이 부족한 시간이지. 여신께선 아직도 응답이 없으셔.{nl}몬스터들은 여전히 흉폭하고 파괴된 도시들도 복구되지 않았어.{nl}모든 것이 부족해서 허덕이고 있지만, 어떻게든 원래의 생활을 되찾기 위해 모두가 노력하고 있어.{nl}
Empat tahun telah berlalu semenjak bencana itu.{nl}Trauma sangat sulit untuk disembuhkan. Para Goddess masih menghilang.{nl}Para monster terus meneror dunia dan kota-kota yang terkena bencana belum direkonstruksi kembali.{nl}Kami masih berjuang dengan sedikitnya supply, namun kami terus berusaha untuk kembali ke kehidupan normal kami sebisa mungkin.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: In Klaipeda, some people have started to recount dreams of the goddesses.{nl}If only that were a sign that the goddesses are returning.{nl}If... if they come back, can we finally wake up from this nightmare?
헌데 클라페다에 여신의 꿈을 꾸었다던 사람들이 갑자기 나타나기 시작한거야.{nl}그게 여신께서 돌아오신다는 징조라면 좋으련만.{nl}여신께서.. 여신만 돌아오신다면 이 기나긴 악몽에서 깨어날 수 있는 걸까.
Di Klaipeda, beberapa orang mulai memimpikan para Goddess .{nl}Jika saja itu merupakan tanda bahwa para Goddess  akan kembali.{nl}Jika... jika mereka kembali, Dapatkah kita bangkit dari keterpurukan ini?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Letter for an Unknown Receiver
수취인 불명의 편지
Surat untuk seseorang yang tidak diketahui

Please select the user requiring a quest: ...{nl}These spores grow out from the body of the host by feeding off the host's energy of after laying dormant for a while. Spores that have fully grown to ferns immediately prepare to multiply by emitting the same spores.{nl}The enlargement of the ferns is going smoothly as well.{nl}The ferns can be made to emit more spores in a larger radius at any time.{nl}
..님{nl}이 포자는 얼마간의 잠복기를 지나 숙주의 체내에서 생명을 양분삼아 몸 바깥으로 자랍니다.{nl}고사리로 자라난 포자는 곧바로 번식 준비를 마치며 같은 성질의 포자를 내뿜습니다.{nl}고사리의 거대화도 순조롭습니다.{nl}포자를 더 많이, 그리고 더 멀리 내뿜을 수 있도록 언제든지 만들어 낼 수 있습니다.{nl}
...{nl}Spora ini tumbuh keluar dari badan induknya dan memberi makan energi untuk induknya setelah tertidur untuk sementara waktu. Spora yang sepenuhnya tumbuh dewasa bersiap untuk menyebarkan spora yang sama.{nl}Pengembang biakan berjalan dengan lancar.{nl}Tumbuhan ini dapat memproduksi dan menyebarkan spora dalam radius yang besar setiap saat.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I am thinking of regulating through controlling a qualifier.{nl}There is no trouble in the maintaining a steady supply of subjects and finding qualifiers. {nl}I prompted the monsters into positions where they will attack towns.{nl}As planned, the Lord of Orsha has issued migration orders, and will not notice if a few towns disappear.{nl}
그 조절은 적합자를 통해 제어할 생각입니다.{nl}실험체의 원활한 공급과 적합자를 찾는 것도 문제 없습니다. {nl}몬스터를 자극하여 마을을 습격하도록 배치했습니다.{nl}계획대로 오르샤 영주가 이주령을 내렸으니 마을 하나 둘 없어진다 한 들, 오르샤도 알아채지 못할 것입니다.{nl}
Aku rasa aku dapat mengaturnya dengan pengendalian berkala.{nl}Tidak ada kesulitan dalam menjaga supply dari subject dan mendapatkannya secara berkala.{nl}Aku menyebarkannya di tempat para monster biasa menyerang kota-kota.{nl}Sesuai rencana, Lord Orsha telah mengeluarkan perintah migrasi, dan ia tidak akan menyadari jika beberapa kota menghilang.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Leave it to me.{nl}At this rate, we will be able to sacrifice not only Orsha, but the entire kingdom as nourishment for the Divine Tree.{nl}{nl}
제게 맡겨 주십시오.{nl}이대로라면 오르샤는 물론이고 왕국 전체를 신수의 양분으로 바칠 수 있습니다.{nl}{nl}
Serahkan padaku.{nl}Kali ini, kita bisa mengorbankan bukan hanya Orsha, tetapi seluruh kerajaan sebagai makanan untuk Divine Tree.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Lord Delmore Rephaim. {nl}Begin preparations for the next plan at once.{nl}Survival of the vessel planned to protect the Reservoir Kruvina has been confirmed.{nl}The ferns are growing at a steady pace and we will soon be able to capture the targeted qualifier.{nl}
델무어 르바임님. {nl}어서 다음 계획을 준비하십시오.{nl}수원지의 크루비나를 지킬 그릇의 생존이 확인되었습니다.{nl}고사리들도 순조롭게 거대화되고 있으며 목표인 적합자도 곧 포획할 수 있습니다.{nl}
Lord Delmore Rephaim.{nl}Mulailah persiapan untuk rencana berikutnya.{nl}Kelangsungan hidup yang untuk melindungi Reservoir Kruvina telah dikonfirmasi.{nl}Tanaman ini tumbuh dengan kecepatan yang stabil dan kita dapat segera menangkap target.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The demons have not caught on yet. {nl}If everything goes to plan, it will be possible to steal the divine power as a new ingredient.
마족은 아직 눈치채지 못하고 있습니다. {nl}이번 일만 순조롭게 되면 새로운 재료인 신성력을 빼앗는 것도 가능합니다.
Para demon belum tertangkap juga.{nl}Jika semuanya berjalan sesuai rencana, mungkin itu  dapat mengambil kekuatannya sebagai unsur baru.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Officer's Diary, Part I
장교 일지 상
Officer's Diary Volume I

Please select the user requiring a quest: The lord issued new construction orders even as the restoration work after Medzio Diena was being conducted.{nl}He said that it was to create a large barrier to ward off monsters.{nl}As ordered, I divided sections with the new mages and deployed soldiers accordingly.{nl}
신수의 날 복구 공사가 한창인 가운데 성주님께서 새로운 공사를 명하셨다.{nl}몬스터들을 막기 위해 거대한 결계를 만든다고 하셨다.{nl}나는 명령대로 새로 온 마법사들과 함께 구획을 나누고 병사들을 새로이 배치하였다.{nl}
Pemimpin mengeluarkan perintah konstruksi baru sebagai restorasi setelah Medzio Diena terjadi.{nl}Ia mengatakan bahwa itu untuk membuat barrier penangkal monster.{nl} Seperti yang diperintahkan, saya membagi divisi baru para mage dan tentara yang dikerahkan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The work on restoration and the barrier is going smoothly.{nl}There was a bit of trouble with public order, but was sorted soon enough.{nl}
복구 공사와 결계 공사는 순조롭게 진행되고 있다.{nl}약간의 치안 문제가 발생하였지만 그것도 곧 제압되었다.{nl}
Pengerjaan restorasi dan pembuatan barrier berjalan lancar.{nl}Namun ada sedikit masalah dengan ketertiban umum, tetapi dapat diselesaikan dengan cepat.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Lord of Orsha sent Migration Recommendations.{nl}I am sure that our lord will not respond to such nonsense.{nl}Abandoning your hometown is such a ridiculous thought.{nl}I also doubt that Orsha has the capacity to receive all the new refugees.{nl}
오르샤 영주 쪽에서 이주 권고가 날라들었다.{nl}성주님께선 그 권고를 받아들이시지 않으라고 믿는다.{nl}세상에, 고향을 버리라는게 말이 되는가?{nl}그리고 오르샤가 이 많은 성주민들을 받을 능력이 되는지도 의문이다.{nl}
Lord Orsha mendapatkan Rekomendasi Migrasi.{nl}Aku yakin bahwa pemimpin kami tidak akan menanggapi omong kosong semacam itu.{nl}Mengabaikan kampung halamanmu adalah suatu hal yang konyol.{nl}Aku juga ragu bila Orsha memiliki kapasitas untuk menerima semua pengungsi baru.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The lord advanced the deadline for the barrier saying that protecting the people from monsters is more important than the restoration projects.{nl}Workforce from the restoration project will be reassigned to the construction of the barrier.
성주님께서 복구보단 몬스터에게서 주민들의 안전이 먼저라고 말씀하시며 결계 공사 완료 기한을 앞당기셨다.{nl}복구 인원을 전부 결계 공사로 돌릴 것이다.
Pemimpin mempercepat deadline pembuatan barrier, ia mengatakan melindungi orang-orang dari para monster lebih penting daripada proyek restorasi.{nl}Tenaga Kerja dari proyek restorasi dipindahtugaskan untuk pembangunan barrier.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Officer's Diary, Part II
장교 일지 하
Officer's Diary Part II

Please select the user requiring a quest: The barrier was completed thanks to the cooperation of the mages.{nl}We will be safe from all monster threats as soon as the lord finishes the last stage on the barrier.{nl}I had heard rumors that our lord is an alchemist that is recognized by even the Winterspoon family. They must not have been exaggerations afterall.{nl}
마법사들의 협조로 결계 공사가 완료되었다.{nl}성주님께서 마지막 작업만 완료하시면 이제 몬스터의 모든 위협에서 안전할 것이다.{nl}과연 성주님께선 윈터스푼 가문에게서도 인정받은 엄청난 실력의 알케미스트라더니, 결코 과장은 아니었나 보다.{nl}
Barrier telah selesai berkat bantuan dari para mage.{nl}Kami akan aman dari segala ancaman monster setelah pemimpin kami menyelesaikan tahap akhir pada barrier.{nl}aku mendengar rumor bahwa pemimpin kami adalah seorang alchemist yang cukup diakui bahkan oleh keluarga Witherspoon. Mereka pasti tidak melebih-lebihkannya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I received reports to raise the watch level to maximum from guard posts located outside of the castle walls.{nl}They say that demons are coming.{nl}
성 바깥의 경계 초소로부터 경계를 최대치로 올릴 것을 전달받았다.{nl}마족이 몰려오고 있다고 한다.{nl}
Aku menerima perintah untuk meningkatkan penjagaan ke maksimum pada pos jaga yang terletak di luar dinding kastil.{nl}Mereka mengatakan bahwa para demon berdatangan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The lord ordered that all soldiers including those stationed at guard posts are to accompany all residents and vassals within the castle to the device.{nl}We may finally be able to see the full might of the barrier.{nl}I divided the resident ledger by section and distributed it to all squads.
성주님께서 모든 병사는 물론이고 경계 초소의 병사까지 지금 즉시 성 내의 모든 주민과 가신들을 데리고 장치 앞으로 모이라는 명령을 내리셨다.{nl}드디어 그 결계 장치의 위엄을 볼 수 있는 것인가.{nl}성내 인원 장부를 구획별로 나누어 모든 분대에게 나누어 주었다.
Pemimpin kami memerintahkan bahwa semua tentara termasuk yang ditempatkan di pos-pos penjagaan menemani semua warga masuk ke dalam benteng menuju device.{nl}Mungkin akhirnya kami dapat melihat kekuatan penuh dari barrier.{nl}AKu membagi penduduk menjadi beberapa bagian dan mendistribusikan setiap pasukan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Monster of Absenta Reservoir
압셈타 수원지의 괴수
Monster Absenta Reservoir

Please select the user requiring a quest: The astonishment of when coming across the uncanny monster called a Hydra at the Absenta Reservoir cannot be fully put into words.{nl}It has six serpentine heads, crawls on four finned feet and can also swim freely because it also has a large fin on its tail.{nl}
압셈타 수원지에서 만난 히드라라는 기괴한 몬스터를 만났을 때의 눌라움이란, 말로 다 할 수 없다.{nl}뱀과 비슷한 여러 개의 머리를 달고 지느러미가 달린 네 발로 엉금엉금 기어다니며 꼬리에도 큰 지느러미가 있어 물 속을 자유로이 헤엄친다.{nl}
Takjub ketika melihat monster yang luar biasa yang disebut Hydra di absenta Reservoir.{nl}Monster itu memiliki enam kepala ular, merangkak dengan keempat kaki dan juga dapat berenang dengan bebas karena memiliki sirip besar di ekornya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: It lurks in the depths of the Reservoir and swallows prey in one mouthful after killing it with it's big mouth and fangs. {nl}While it is only as big as a grown man, it is very agile and has remarkable recuperative powers.{nl}Thankfully, it is not hostile towards humans allowing the nearby residents to simply call it a mystical creature and avoid it.
수원지 깊은 곳에 숨어서 큰 입과 송곳니로 먹이의 숨통을 끊어 한 입에 꿀꺽 삼킨다. {nl}크기는 성인 남자 정도의 작은 크기지만 매우 잽싸고 상처를 입어도 회복력도 좋다.{nl}다행히 인간에게 호전적이지 않아서 인근 주민들도 굳이 잡을 필요가 없어 영물이라 부르며 서로 기피한다.
Bersembunyi di kedalaman Reservoir dan menelan mangsanya dengan satu lahap setelah membunuh dengan mulut besar dan taringnya.{nl}Meskipun hanya sebesar pria dewasa, ia sangat lincah dan memiliki kekuatan pemulihan yang luar biasa.{nl}Untungnya, ia tidak memusuhi manusia sehingga memungkinkan warga terdekat menyebutnya makhluk mythical dan hindari ia.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The sun was so nice that I decided to dry the books in the sunlight.{nl}I was afraid that they might have gone moldy if I had left them inside any longer.{nl}
