도와줘서 고맙네{nl} 당신 덕분에 우리 마을 사람들 모두 마음 편히 내려갈 수 있겠어.
Terima kasih telah membantu kami.{nl}Semua warga kota bisa turun dengan selamat berkat kamu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Mysterious Device
의문의 장치
Device Misterius

Please select the user requiring a quest: The 5th of X{nl}-{nl}I steamed some potato dumplings to try to get to know the new neighbors.{nl}I heard some loud noises when I knocked on the door.{nl}The neighbor seemed to be quite expressionless, but lightened up at the sight of the dumplings I had brought along.{nl}
X월 5일{nl}-{nl}이사 온 이웃과 친해져 볼까 싶어서 감자만두를 조금 쪄갔다.{nl}문을 두들기자 뭔가 안에서 우당탕탕 소리가 크게 났다.{nl}이웃집 아저씨는 별로 표정이 없어 보였지만 내가 싸온 감자 만두를 보시더니 환한 표정으로 맞아 주셨다.{nl}
Tanggal 5 tahun X{nl}-{nl}Aku mengukus beberapa pangsit kentang untuk mengenal tetangga-tetangga baru{nl}Aku mendengar suara keras ketika sedang mengetuk pintu{nl} Para tetangga tampaknya tidak banyak berexpresi, namun menjadi cair saat melihat kue yang saya bawa.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: It seems that everybody that says they are followers of the goddesses are half-witted.{nl}Do you still not know my strength after all that you have been through!{nl}
여신을 따른다는 녀석들은 하나같이 멍청하군.{nl}그렇게 당하고도 아직도 나를 모르겠나!{nl}
Tampaknya semua orang yang mengatakan bahwa mereka adalah pengikut Goddess  kurang waras.{nl}Apakah kamu masih tidak tahu kekuatanku setelah semua yang kamu lalui!{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I was waiting for you to come here.{nl}I will take care of you and torture the priest until the chest is unlocked!
네녀석들이 이곳으로 들어오길 기다리고 있었다.{nl}널 처리하고 저 사제가 제 손으로 상자를 열 때까지 고문해주마!
Aku menunggumu untuk datang ke sini.{nl}Aku akan mengurusmu nanti dan menyiksa priest sampai kotak itu terbuka!

Please select the user requiring a quest: We have long prepared to receive the Revelator in accordance to the legends.{nl}
전승에 따라 우린 계시자를 맞이하기 위해 오랜 시간을 들여 준비해 왔습니다.{nl}
Kami telah lama mempersiapkan kedatangan Revelator sesuai dengan legenda.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: What stands below are four sacred candlesticks...{nl}They are crafted in accordance to legend passed only to the bishops of Orsha.{nl}
저 아래에 있는 네 개의 신성한 촛대.. {nl}오르샤 주교들에게만 내려오는 전승대로 만든 것입니다.{nl}
Sesuatu yang berada di bawah sana merupakan Empat Lilin Suci...{nl}Mereka dibuat sesuai legenda hanya diberikan kepada para Bishop dari Orsha.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: So that we could bring and confirm Revelators at any time.{nl}
언제든지 계시자를 데려와 바로 확인할 수 있도록요.{nl}
Sehingga kami bisa membawa dan memberitahukan Relevator setiap saat.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Now. Step onto the magic circle between the candlesticks.{nl}If you are indeed a Revelator, the magic circle will react and {nl}you will be able to oppose the Demon Lord with that power.{nl}
자. 어서 촛대 사이에 있는 마법진 위로 올라가세요.{nl}당신이 계시자가 맞다면 마법진이 반응할 것이며 그 힘으로 마군주와 맞설 수 있을 겁니다.{nl}
Sekarang. Masuklah kedalam ke Magic Circle diantara Lilin-lilin tersebut.{nl}Jika kamu adalah sang revelator, Magic Circle akan bereaksi dan kamu dapat melawan Demon Lord dengan kekuatan itu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I thought that someone would come and try to rescue their colleague...{nl}It seems that I have caught someone completely different.{nl}
동료를 구하러 올 거라고 생각은 했다만..{nl}엉뚱한 녀석이 걸려들었군.{nl}
Aku pikir seseorang akan datang dan mencoba untuk membebaskan Priest Irma...{nl} Tampaknya aku telah menangkap seseorang yang sama sekali berbeda.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Tell me... {nl}How are you free of my power within my sphere of influence?{nl}
그런데.. {nl}네녀석은 어떻게 내 권역 안에서 자유로운 거지?{nl}
Katakan padaku...{nl} Bagaimana kamu bisa membebaskan kekuatanku dari daerah kekuasaanku?{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Yes... Of course.{nl}You are the Revelator that miss Giltine was speaking of.{nl}
그래.. 그렇군.{nl}길티네님께서 말씀하신 계시자가 바로 네녀석이였어.{nl}
Ya... Tentu saja.{nl}Kamu adalah Savior yang Giltine bicarakan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Today is my lucky day.{nl}Not only have I almost found where the orders are hidden, but I also get to catch a Revelator...
오늘은 운이 아주 좋구나.{nl}명령서를 숨겨둔 곳도 거의 찾았고 계시자도 잡게 되다니..
Hari ini adalah hari keberuntunganku.{nl}Tidak hanya aku hampir menemukan di mana perintah itu disembunyikan,{nl} namun aku juga bisa menangkap Savior…

Please select the user requiring a quest: There is no need for I, Marnox, to step forward.
이 마르녹스님까지 굳이 나설 필요는 없겠지.
Tidak perlu untukku, Marnox, untuk melawanmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: And right before his eyes, the lead nugget prize let out a sparkle and in a moment clearly became gold. {nl} The old Alchemist now snickered, 'Now you owe me one gold nugget, be sure to bring it.' {nl} Modestas protested, but as much as he looked, what the old Alchemist now held was clearly no longer lead. {nl}
그리고 모데스타스씨가 보는 앞에서 수상한 빛이 나더니 황당하게도 납덩이는 순식간에 금괴로 변했습니다. 그리고 알케미스트는 뻔뻔하게도 이렇게 말했습니다.{nl}[이제 자네가 빚진 것은 금괴 하나이니 반드시 가져오게.]{nl}모데스타스씨는 항의도 하고 화도 냈지만, 가만히 따져 보면 알케미스트는 자신의 손에 든 그 물건을 정확하게 납덩이라고 명시한 적이 없었습니다.{nl}
Luar biasa, potongan timah berubah menjadi emas di depan Modestas setelah kilatan cahaya yang aneh. Sang alchemist dengan lantang berkata berikut.{nl}[Sekarang kamu berutang sebuah batangan emas, jadi pastikan kamu membawakannya kepadaku.]{nl} Modestas protes dan menentang, tapi sang alchemist tidak pernah secara eksplisit menyatakan bahwa apa yang dia pegang terbuat dari timah.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Listen up, a pretty good request just came in.
마침 좋은 의뢰가 들어와 있어요.
Dengar, ada request yang menarik loh.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Welcome.{nl}Are you looking for any requests?
어서 오세요.{nl}어떤 의뢰를 찾으시나요?
Selamat datang.{nl}Kamu sedang mencari request?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hm... This cannot be done all by your own.{nl}Speak to me again once you've gathered a few allies.
흠.. 혼자선 힘들 텐데요.{nl}믿을 수 있는 동료와 함께 와 주세요.
Hmm... Ga bisa dikerjain sendiri.{nl}Kabarin lagi kalau udah dapet temen ya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Do you want to go?
바로 가실건가요?
Mau berangkat?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Darn... I am sorry, but I don't have an appropriate request for you.{nl}Maybe I'll have something for you next time.
이런.. 죄송하지만, 적당한 의뢰가 없네요.{nl}다음에 다시 찾아 오시겠어요?
Darn... sorry, Aku tak ada request khusus untukmu.{nl}Mungkin lain kali.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Don't bite off more than you can handle. You seem to have a request already.{nl}Please come back after you've finished your current request.
욕심도 많으셔라. 진행중인 의뢰가 있으시네요.{nl}의뢰를 끝내고 다시 찾아주세요.
Jangan rakus. Kamu sudah dapat requestnya.{nl}Please come back after you've finished your current request.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Only the party leader can accept our requests.{nl}Could you ask your party leader to come here?
의뢰는 파티장님만 수락하실 수 있어요.{nl}파티장님을 불러 와 주시겠어요?
Hanya ketua party yang bisa menerima request dari kami.{nl}Suruh kemari ketua party kalian?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Earth Tower Lolopanther Area
대지의 탑 롤로펜서 구간
Earth Tower Lolopanther Area

Please select the user requiring a quest: Earth Tower Lolopanther Area (Recommended Lv: 280) {nl}Only you and your party members can enter together. {nl}Are you sure you want to enter?
대지의 탑 롤로펜서 구간(권장레벨:280)으로, 당신과 파티를 맺은 플레이어만이 함께 입장할 수 있습니다.{nl}입장하시겠습니까?
Earth Tower Lolopanther Area (Recommended Lv: 280) {nl}Hanya kamu dan anggota party kamu yang bisa masuk. {nl}Yakin mau masuk?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Valis
발리스
Valis

Please select the user requiring a quest: There's nothing better than sparring to improve your skills!{nl}What do you say, would you like to participate?
실력 향상에는 대련만큼 좋은 게 없지요!{nl}당신도 참가해 보시는 건 어떻습니까?
Tiada yang lebih baik untuk mengasah skill kamu selain sparring!{nl}Bagaimana, mau bergabung?

Please select the user requiring a quest: There seems to be some sort of mysterious power indwelling in it.{nl}Would you mind me taking a closer look?
무언가 신비한 힘이 깃들어 있는 것 같네요.{nl}제가 좀 더 자세히 살펴봐도 될까요?
Seperti ada kekuatan misterius bersemayam di dalam sini.{nl}Maukah kamu memeriksanya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: It seems research worthy.{nl}I sense an unknown power.
연구해볼 가치가 있겠는데요.{nl}처음 보는 힘이 느껴지네요.
Sepertinya ini menarik.{nl}Aku merasakan kekuatan yang aneh.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unfortunately you didn't bring enough to create a combination with.{nl}Come visit me again once you've found them all.
조합이 부족하네요.{nl}다 모이면 다시 찾아주세요.
Sayangnya tidak cukup untuk membuat kombinasi ini.{nl}Datang lagi jika sudah lengkap.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There seems to be something missing.{nl}I think you'll have to have everything in order to realize the full power.
뭔가 모자란 부분이 있는 것 같은데요?{nl}전부 모여야 완전한 힘을 발휘할 수 있을 것 같아요.
Seperti ada yang hilang.{nl}Kamu harus memiliki semuanya jika ingin mewujudkan kekuatan yang sempurna.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There now seems to be enough ready.{nl}It's all thanks to you.
이제 충분히 모였어요.{nl}모두 도와주신 덕분이에요.
Sepertinya sudah cukup siap.{nl}Semua karenamu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I've collected all that I need for my research.{nl}Thank you for helping.
연구에 필요한 건 충분히 모았어요.{nl}도와주셔서 감사합니다.
Aku telah memiliki semua yang aku butuhkan.{nl}Terima kasih telah menolongku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Sister Aiste
수녀 아이스테
Sister Aiste

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't think I'll be able to ask for any more help today.
오늘은 더 부탁드리기 힘들겠네요.
Kayanya hari ini tidak perlu ada yang mesti kuminta tolong dulu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I think it'll be too much to ask for more help since only the most difficult tasks remain.
어려운 일만 남아 있어서 당신께 부탁드리기에는 힘들 것 같아요.
Kalau Cuma untuk tugas berat saja, sepertinya terlalu banyak minta bantuan lagi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm doing my best to stop the demons, but it will become more difficult.{nl}I'm sure I'll manage to prevail if you lend a hand.{nl}Please help me.
최선을 다해서 마족을 막고 있지만, 더 힘들어지네요.{nl}당신이 힘을 보태주신다면 이겨낼 수 있을 거예요.{nl}부탁드려요.
Aku lakukan sebisanya untuk mengusir para demon, tapi semakin sulit.{nl}Aku yakin semua bisa diatasi dengan pertolonganmu.{nl}Tolonglah.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Sister Lhasa
수녀 라사
Sister Lhasa

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please...{nl}Although we are weak, we are holding the demons back for the sake of humanity.{nl}But our strength alone is not enough. Please! We need your help.
부탁드려요..{nl}저희는 작은 힘이지만 인류의 안전을 위해 마족들을 막고 있습니다.{nl}하지만 저희의 힘만으로는 부족합니다.{nl}꼭! 당신의 도움이 필요해요.
Tolonglah...{nl}Meskipun kami lemah, kami tetap mencegah para demon kembali hanya untuk kebaikan umat manusia.{nl}Tapi jika hanya kami tidak akan cukup. Tolonglah! Kami membutuhkan pertolonganmu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thank you so much for saving me!{nl}I'm Ruina from the second group that was supposed to demolish that gate.{nl}
구해주셔서 정말 감사합니다!{nl}전 저 게이트를 폭파하려고 파견된 후발대 소속 루이나라고 합니다.{nl}
Terima kasih telah menolongku!{nl}Saya Ruina dari kelompok kedua yang seharusnya menghancurkan gerbang itu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: We came here to destroy the gate at the request of Saalus Convent.{nl}They said that monsters have been coming through that gate that suddenly appeared one day.{nl}
저희는 살러스 수녀원의 부탁을 받아 게이트를 파괴하려고 왔어요.{nl}언젠가부터 갑자기 생겨난 저 게이트를 통해서 몬스터들이 넘어왔다고 하더군요.{nl}
Kami datang kemari untuk  menghancurkan gerbang atas permintaan dari Saalus Convent.{nl}Mereka bilang para monster muncul dari gerbang yang tiba-tiba muncul ini.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The advance contingent succeeded in pushing back the monsters, but failed to destroy the gate.{nl}That's why we came with divine magic scrolls and bomb materials.{nl}
선발대가 몬스터를 밀어내는데 성공했지만, 게이트를 파괴하는덴 실패했어요.{nl}그래서 저희 후발대가 신성마법 스크롤과 폭탄 재료를 준비해 온 거예요.{nl}
Tim pendahulu telah berhasil menghalau para monster, tapi belum berhasil  menghancurkan gerbang.{nl}Itulah kenapa kami datang membawa divine magic scrolls dan bomb materials.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: But we were ambushed by a group of Hogmas on the other side of the lower bridge...{nl}We ended up losing all of our prepared bomb material.{nl}
하지만 이 곳에 도착하자마자 아래쪽 다리 건너에서 호그마떼에게 습격당하는 바람에.. {nl}준비해온 폭탄 재료를 잃어버리고 말았어요.{nl}
Tapi kami disergap oleh sekelompok Hogmas di sisi lain di dekat lower bridge...{nl}Dan kami kehilangan semua bomb material yang telah disiapkan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Please.{nl}I think we'll be just be able to procure the necessary firepower {nl}to destroy the gate if you can retreive some usable materials.
부탁드려요.{nl}저희가 잃어버린 재료들과 쓸 만한 것만 찾아 주신다면 약하더라도 필요한 화력은 확보될 것 같아요.
Tolonglah.{nl}Kami hanya bisa mempersiapkan senjata seadanya {nl}untuk menghancurkan gerbang membutuhkan material tertentu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Book written in Runic Characters
룬 문자로 적힌 책
Book written in Runic Characters

Please select the user requiring a quest: This is a story about the nearly forgotten runic characters.{nl}Runic characters had been used since before the foundation of the kingdom by smaller northern tribes.{nl}Peculiarly, these people believed that the characters held magical powers.{nl}That's the reason why the northern people spent a long time to find those powers.{nl}
지금은 아는 사람이 거의 없는 룬 문자에 대한 이야기이다.{nl}룬 문자는 왕국 건국 이전부터 북방의 소수 민족들이 사용하고 있었다.{nl}특이하게도, 이 사람들은 룬 문자에 마법적인 능력이 깃들어 있다고 믿었다.{nl}그래서 북방의 많은 사람들은 그 능력을 찾아내려고 오랫동안 노력하였다.{nl}
Ini adalah cerita tentang Runic character yang nyaris terlupakan.{nl}Runic character telah dipakai sebelum kerajaan dibangun oleh suku-suku kecil dari utara.{nl}Secara khusus, orang-orang percaya bahwa karakter-karakter itu memiliki kekuatan magis.{nl}Itulah kenapa orang-orang dari utara sepenjang waktu mencari kekuatan itu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Finally, a person was able to find the powers dwelling in the runic characters.{nl}They do not have any powers by themselves, but they are a channel for powers that can only be manifested through them...{nl}That was the secret behind the runic characters.{nl}
마침내 룬 문자에 깃든 능력을 찾아내는데 성공한 자가 나타났다.{nl}룬 문자 그 자체로는 힘을 가지지 않지만, 오직 그것을 통해서만 발현되는 힘의 통로..{nl}그것이 바로 룬 문자에 깃든 비밀의 능력이었다.{nl}
Akhirnya, seseorang dapat menemukan kekuatan yang berasal dari runic characters.{nl}Mereka tidak memiliki kekuatan dari dirinya sendiri, tapi mereka menyalurkan kekuatan yang hanya bisa diwujudkan diantara mereka...{nl}Itulah rahasia dibalik runic characters.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: He went straight to Goddess Saule and told her of the hidden powers of the runic characters, and the goddess rejoiced and blessed him.{nl}
그는 곧바로 사울레 여신을 찾아가 룬 문자의 능력을 깨달았다고 알렸고, 여신께서는 기뻐하시며 그에게 축복을 내려주셨다.{nl}
Dia langsung menemui Goddess Saule dan menceritakan tentang kekuatan tersembunyi dari runic characters, goddesspun gembira dan mensyukurinya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: People came to call him a 'Rune Caster'.{nl}He became the first Rune Caster Master and fostered many more Rune Casters.{nl}He also created the Rune Stone so that the new Rune Casters would easily be able to use runic characters.{nl}
사람들은 그를 룬캐스터라고 불렀다.{nl}그는 초대 룬캐스터 마스터가 되어 많은 룬캐스터를 길러내었다.{nl}그리고 새로운 룬캐스터들을 위해 룬 문자를 쉽게 쓸 수 있도록 룬 스톤을 만들었다.{nl}
Orang menyebutnya 'Rune Caster'.{nl}Dia menjadi Rune Caster Master pertama dan membimbing Rune Casters lainnya.{nl}Dia juga menciptakan Rune Stone supaya Rune Caster baru akan lebih mudah menggunakan kekuatan runic characters.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: One day, he vanished leaving only his Rune Stone behind.{nl}The Rune Stone he left behind has become a symbol of the way of the Rune Caster and has been passed down from master to master.
그러던 그는 어느 날, 그의 룬 스톤만을 남긴 채 홀연히 자취를 감추었다.{nl}그가 남긴 룬 스톤은 룬캐스터들에게 자신들의 길을 열어준 상징으로 남아 룬캐스터 마스터들에게 이어져 내려오고 있다.
Suatu hari dia kehilangan Rune Stone satu-satunya yang ia miliki.{nl}Rune Stone itu telah menjadi simbol dari Rune Caster lainnya dan telah diturunkan dari master ke master.

Please select the user requiring a quest: People often say that the goddesses are always with us.{nl}This is right not only in a spiritual sense but also a practical sense.{nl}That's because it symbolizes the fact that the goddesses are tending over us from their abodes.{nl}
사람들은 흔히 표현하기를, 여신께서 우리와 늘 함께 하신다고 한다.{nl}이는 정서적인 것만 아니라 실질적으로도 옳은 말이다.{nl}여신들께서 그분들의 처소에서 우리를 굽어 살피고 계신다는 점을 의미하기 때문이다.{nl}
Orang-orang sering berkata bahwa goddess selalu bersama kita.{nl}Tidak hanya untuk hal yang bersifat spiriual saja, tapi untuk hal bersifat fisik juga.{nl}Karena merupakan simbol dari bukti  bahwa goddesses yang melindungi kita.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: {nl}For instance, it is said that Goddess Vibora manages a massive library only permitted to the goddesses.{nl}This library is also the dwelling place of Goddess Vibora.{nl}
{nl}예를 들자면, 바이보라 여신께서는 여신들께만 허락된 거대한 도서관을 운영하신다고 한다.{nl}그리고 이 도서관이 바이보라 여신의 처소이기도 하다.{nl}
{nl}Contohnya, dikatakan bahwa Goddess Vibora mengelola perpustakaan besar yang hanya diizinkan untuk para goddess.{nl}Perpustakaan ini juga merupakan tempat bersemayamnya Goddess Vibora.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: {nl}Another example is the residence of Goddess Jurate which is rumored to be on a mysterious sea where human ships cannot reach.{nl}They say that a ship larger than most islands is the residence of Goddess Jurate.{nl}
{nl}다른 예로 유라테 여신의 처소는 인간의 배가 닿을 수 없는 신비한 바다 위에 있다고 전해진다.{nl}어지간한 섬보다 커다란 배가 유라테 여신의 처소라고 한다.{nl}
{nl}Contoh lain adalah tentang tempat tinggal Goddess Jurate yang rumornya di sebuah lautan misterius dimana perahu manusia tidak bisa mencapainya.{nl}Mereka bilang tentang sebuah kapal yang besarnya melebihi sebuah pulau adalah tempat tinggal Goddess Jurate.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: {nl}It is said that even Goddess Vakarine that goes around numerous locations has her own abode.{nl}Some say that there is a demon prison in a dimension that we do not know of, and that is the domain of Goddess Vakarine. {nl}But that is only one of the many locations that Goddess Vakarine visits.{nl}
{nl}심지어는 여러 장소를 순회하는 바카리네 여신께서도 자신만의 처소가 있다고 한다.{nl}어떤 사람들은 우리가 모르는 차원에 마족들이 수감된 감옥이 있으며, 그 곳이 바카리네 여신의 영역이라고 주장한다. {nl}그러나 그 곳은 단지 바카리네 여신의 수 많은 순회지중의 하나일 뿐이다.{nl}
{nl}dikatakan juga bahwa Goddess Vakarine yang sering berpindah-pindah tempatpun memiliki tempat tinggal.{nl}Beberapa mengatakan bahwa terdapat demon prison di sebuah dimensi yang tidak bisa kita ketahui, dan itulah daerah kekuasaan dari Goddess Vakarine. {nl}Tapi itu hanya salah satu tempat tinggal Goddess Vakarine yang pernah dikunjungi.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: {nl}There are also legends that Goddess Laima has a palace deep underground where nobody knows of.{nl}There is no way to find it, it is also said that the Demon Goddess Giltine also resides there.
{nl}또한 아무도 그 장소를 모르지만, 라이마 여신 역시 지하의 어느 깊은 곳에 궁전이 있으며, 그 안에 처소가 있다는 전승도 있다.{nl}사실 여부는 알 수 없으나 그 궁전 안에는 마신인 길티네도 그녀의 처소를 두고 있다고도 전한다.
{nl}Ada juga Legenda tentang Goddess Laima yang tinggal di bawah tanah dan tidak seorangpun mengetahuinya.{nl}Tiada cara untuk menemukannya, dikatakan juga bahwa Demon Goddess Giltine tinggal di sana.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The Rune Stone...{nl}I haven't heard of that in a long time.{nl}
룬 스톤이라..{nl}참으로 오랜만에 들어보는군요.{nl}
Rune Stone...{nl}Setelah sekian lama aku berlum pernah mendengar hal ini lagi.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: In the past, I've met a person that was searching for the {nl}special powers hidden within the runic characters.{nl}He was filled with a pure passion for the task.{nl}
과거에 룬 문자에 숨겨진 특별한 능력을 찾는 사람을 만난 적이 있었지요.{nl}그는 그 누구보다 순수한 열정으로 가득 차 있었습니다.{nl}
Dulu aku pernah bertemu seseorang yang mencari {nl}special powers tersembunyi bersama runic characters.{nl}Dia memiliki hasrat yang tinggi akan tugasnya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: He eventually found the hidden powers in the runic characters and became the first Rune Caster.{nl}A channel for power... The power of the runic characters was their {nl}ability to allow the casters to realized their strength through them.{nl}
결국 그는 룬 문자에 숨겨진 능력을 찾아내는데 성공했고 최초의 룬캐스터가 되었습니다.{nl}힘의 통로.. 시전자의 힘을 룬 문자를 통해 발현할 수 있게 해 주는 것이 룬 문자의 능력이었지요.{nl}
Dia akhirnya menemukan hidden powers pada runic characters dan menjadi Rune Caster pertama.{nl}Channel for power... Kekuatan runic characters adalah {nl}kemampuannya untuk dapat mewujudkan kekuatan dia sebenarnya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: He crafted a Rune Stone to let others use the powers of the Rune Stone with easier access.{nl}Although his Rune Stone was nothing extraordinary, the following generations of {nl}Rune Caster Masters have carefully guarded his Rune Stone out of respect...{nl}
그는 룬 스톤을 만들어 다른 사람들도 쉽게 룬 문자의 능력을 쓸 수 있도록 하였습니다.{nl}그의 룬 스톤은 평번한 것이였지만, 역대 룬캐스터 마스터들은 그를 존경하는 마음을 담아 그의 룬스톤을 소중하게 지켜왔습니다..{nl}
Dia menciptakan Rune Stone supaya orang lain dapat menggunakan Rune Stone lebih mudah.{nl}Karena Rune Stone merupakan sesuatu yang sangat luar biasa, generasi berikutnya {nl}Rune Caster Masters harus menjaga Rune Stone dengan baik...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unfortunately his Rune Stone was lost during the Petrified City incident.{nl}That is why the Rune Caster Master is still looking for his Rune Stone.{nl}
하지만 안타깝게도 석화도시 사건 때, 그의 룬 스톤은 전부 소실되고 말았어요.{nl}그 때문에 룬캐스터 마스터들은 지금까지도 그의 룬 스톤을 찾고 있다고 합니다.{nl}
Sayangnya Rune Stone miliknya hilang saat peristiwa Petrified City.{nl}Itulah kenapa Rune Caster Master masih mencari Rune Stone tersebut.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The fact that you've come to me with knowledge of the Rune Stone... {nl}Perhaps it means that you were led here by its powers.
당신이 룬 문자에 대해 알고 저를 찾아온 것은.. {nl}어쩌면 그것에 담긴 힘이 이끈 것일지도 모르겠군요.{nl}
Kenyataannya kamu telah datang bersama pengetahuanmu tentang Rune Stone... {nl}Bisa jadi kamu telah dituntun untuk menuju kemari oleh kekuatan ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Yes. Although it is an old tale...{nl}I do have an idea of where the Rune Stone may be.{nl}{nl}
그래요. 오래된 이야기입니다만..{nl}룬 스톤의 행방에 대해서 짐작가는 바가 있습니다.{nl}{nl}
Ya. Meskipun ini kisah yang lama...{nl}Aku dapat mengetahui dimana kemungkinan Rune Stone itu berada.{nl}{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The last place I sensed the Rune Stone was at the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}But that was a long time ago... I don't recall exactly where I sensed it.{nl}
제가 마지막으로 그 룬 스톤을 느낄 수 있었던 곳은 왕릉이었습니다.{nl}하지만 그건 아주 오래 전의 일이라.. 정확히 어느 곳에 있는지는 모르겠습니다.{nl}
Tempat terakhir yang kurasakan kehadirannya adalah di Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Tapi itu sudah lama sekali... Aku tidak ingat persis dimana aku merasakannya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I remember the traveler that came to me asking for a blessing a few hundred years ago.{nl}He said that he had seen a mysterious stone with {nl}strange characters engraved on it near a waterfall.{nl}
수 백년전에 저에게 찾아와 축복을 빌던 여행자도 생각나는군요.{nl}폭포가 쏟아지는 곳에서 처음 보는 글자가 새겨진 신비로운 돌을 보았다는 이야기를 했었지요.{nl}
Aku ingat traveler yang datang padaku meminta blessing beberapa ratus tahun lalu.{nl}Dia bilang telah melihat sebuah batu misterius di dekat air terjun {nl}dengan tulisan aneh terukir.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unfortunately I was not able to know about what was occurring{nl}around the world after I had resolved to protect the revelation.{nl}Perhaps humans may know more about the whereabouts of the Rune Stone than I do.{nl}
안타깝게도 저는 계시를 지키기로 결심한 뒤 부턴 한동안 세상의 일을 다 알 수 없었습니다.{nl}어쩌면 나머지 룬 스톤의 행방에 대해선 인간들이 더 잘 알고 있을지도 모릅니다.{nl}
Sayangnya aku tidak dapat mengetahui apa yang terjadi{nl} di seluruh dunia setelah saya memutuskan untuk melindungi revelation.{nl}Mungkin manusia lebih tahu tentang keberadaan Rune Stone itu daripada aku.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Yes. Maybe a human family that has survived for a long time such as the Jonas family...{nl}Someone that has eternal life like the Amjinas is sure to know something.
그래요. 요나스 가문처럼 오래된 인간의 가문이라던가..{nl}암지나스처럼 영생을 사는 사람이라면 분명 아는 바가 있을 겁니다.
Mungkin sebuah keluarga yang telah hidup dalam waktu yang lama seperti Jonas family...{nl}Seseorang yang hidup abadi seperti Amjinas pasti mengetahuinya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You mentioned 'Rune Stone', didn't you?{nl}Ah, could it be...{nl}
룬 스톤 말씀이십니까?{nl}아, 혹시.. {nl}
Kamu bilang 'Rune Stone' ?{nl}Ahh .. mungkinkah...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: If you are talking about a stone with strange characters engraved on it, yes I do have one.{nl}I don't know how long it has been, but it has been in {nl}the possession of the Jonas family for generations.{nl}
이상한 글자 같은 것이 새겨진 돌이라면 제가 가지고 있습니다.{nl}언제부터 있었는지는 모르겠지만, 요나스 가문에 전해지는 물건이지요.{nl}
Jika kamu berbicara tentang batu dengan ukiran aneh, ya … aku punya.{nl}Tak tahu berapa lama {nl}tapi dimiliki oleh Jonas family beberapa generasi.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: But it is treated as rubbish since there is no way of knowing what it is used for.{nl}Now I know it is Rune Stone thanks to you.{nl}
하지만 무엇에 쓰는 것인지 알 길이 없어 잡동사니 취급입니다.{nl}그걸 룬 스톤이라고 부르는 것인지는 당신 덕분에 처음 알았군요.{nl}
Tapi sudah dianggap sampah karena tidak tahu untuk apa gunanya.{nl}Sekarang aku tahu itu adalah Rune Stone, terima kasih.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Why are you searching for it though?
그런데 이건 왜 찾으시는 거죠?
Kenapa kamu tertarik sekali?

Please select the user requiring a quest: I see.{nl}It is useless in our hands, so we'll give it to you if you absolutely need it.{nl}
그렇군요.{nl}어차피 저희에겐 있어봤자 의미도 없는 물건이니 필요하시다면 그냥 드리겠습니다.{nl}
Ohh begitu.{nl}bagi kami ini tidak berguna, akan kuberikan padamu jika memang kamu membutuhkannya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: No matter how valuable an object may be, {nl}it has to be in the hands of someone that needs it to be worth anything.
어떤 귀한 물건이라도 필요한 사람이 아니면 쓸모없는 법 아니겠습니까.
Tak peduli seberapa berharganya benda itu, {nl}mesti di tangan yang memang benar-benar membutuhkannya.

Please select the user requiring a quest: You've come here in search of the Rune Stone?{nl}
룬 스톤을 찾아오셨다구요?{nl}
Kami kemari untuk mencari Rune Stone?{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know where you've heard of it, but I do have one.{nl}I threw a tantrum when I was young to get it when {nl}it was gifted to the Winterspoon family long ago.{nl}
어느 분에게 들으셨는지는 모르겠지만 제가 하나 가지고 있긴 하지요.{nl}제가 어렸을 적에 윈터스푼 가문에 선물로 들어온 것을 떼를 써서 받았답니다.{nl}
Aku tidak tahu darimana kamu mengetahuinya, tapi aku memang memilikinya{nl}Aku susah payah mendapatkannya {nl}ketika dihadiahkan pada Winterspoon family pada waktu itu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Though, that's already a few hundred years ago.{nl}Now where did I put it...
그게 벌써 수백 년 전 이야기네요.{nl}그걸 어디에 뒀더라..
Meskipun, itu sudah beberapa ratus tahun yang lalu.{nl}Sekarang dimana aku menyimpannya...

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oh, as it happens, I have it right here.{nl}I have no use for it, so you may have it if you need it.{nl}
아, 마침 가지고 있었네요.{nl}제게 필요한 물건은 아니니 원하신다면 드리도록 할게요.{nl}
Ohh, di sini.{nl}Aku tidak membutuhkannya, kamu boleh memilkinya jika memang perlu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: It may have been destined for you since you are the first person {nl}to seek something that nobody wanted for hundreds of years.{nl}As a handler of time, I am thinking that perhaps it was a future promised in the past.
수백 년 동안 아무도 찾지 않던 물건을 찾아오신 것도 어쩌면 인연이겠지요.{nl}시간을 다루는 사람으로서 과거에 이미 약속된 미래가 아니었을까 하는 생각도 들어요.
Mungkin ini jodohmu, karena kamu yang pertama kali memintanya {nl}mencari sesuatu yang tidak dicari orang bertahun-tahun.{nl}Sebagai pengendali waktu, mungkin itu masa depan yang dijanjikan di masa lalu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I can't seem to find where I've put it.{nl}I'll keep an eye out for it, so would you mind coming back later?
어디에 뒀는지 찾을 수가 없네요.{nl}다음에 찾아둘테니 나중에 다시 오시겠어요?
Aku lupa dimana menyimpannya.{nl}Akan kuingat-ingat dulu, maukah kembali lagi nanti?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Do you mean the Rune Stone?{nl}
룬 스톤말인가?{nl}
Maksudmu Rune Stone?{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't have anything like that...{nl}But I do have something that comes to mind.{nl}
그런 건 가지고 있지 않네만..{nl}그래도 하나 생각나는 것이 있네.{nl}
Aku tidak punya barang semacam ntu...{nl}Tapi aku punya sesuatu yang muncul dalam benakku.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: There is a place in West Siauliai Woods that cannot be accessed through ordinary means.{nl}I had faintly sensed a mysterious aura for a few hundred years...{nl}But I couldn't find a way to get there.{nl}
이 곳, 샤울레이 서쪽 숲에는 보통의 방법으로는 갈 수 없는 곳이 있지.{nl}몇백 년 전부터 신비한 기운이 희미하게 느껴졌네만.. 그곳으로 갈 방법을 도저히 모르겠더군.{nl}
Ada satu tempat di West Siauliai Woods yang tidak bisa diakses dengan cara biasa.{nl}Selama bertaun-taun aku sering merasakan adanya aura misterius di sekitar situ...{nl}Tapi tak tahu caranya pergi ke sana.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Perhaps the item you are searching for may be there.{nl}How about taking a look if you know how to get there?
어쩌면 그곳에 자네가 찾는 물건이 있을지도 모르겠어.{nl}가는 방법을 안다면 한번 가 보는 게 어떤가?
Mungkin barang yang kamu cari ada di sana.{nl}Jika kamu tahu cara masuk ke sana, bisakah kamu memeriksanya?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Do you know that there is a place in West Siauliai Woods {nl}that cannot be accessed by ordinary means?{nl}I had sensed a mysterious aura there for hundreds of years.{nl}
사울레이 서쪽 숲에는 보통의 방법으로는 갈 수 없는 곳이 있다는 걸 알고 있는가?{nl}몇백 년 전부터 그곳에서 아주 신비한 기운이 느껴졌다네.{nl}
Tahukah kamu suatu tempat di West Siauliai Woods {nl}yang tidak bisa diakses dengan cara biasa?{nl}Selama bertaun-taun aku sering merasakan adanya aura misterius di sekitar situ....{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know how to get there, or what to expect to find there.{nl}You might be able to find something if you find a way to get there.
난 그곳에 갈 방법도, 무엇이 있는지도 모르지만 말이야.{nl}혹시 가는 방법을 안다면 무언가 찾을 수 있을지도 모르겠군.
Aku tak tahu caranya ke sana, dan ada apa sebenarnya di sana.{nl}Mungkin kamu bisa menemukan sesuatu jika dapat masuk ke sana.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Rune Stone
룬 스톤
Rune Stone

Please select the user requiring a quest: (Unrecognizable characters are glowing.)
알 수 없는 문자가 빛을 내고 있다
(Sesuatu yang tidak dikenali bersinar.)

Please select the user requiring a quest: (It seems as if you require more Rune Stones.)
다른 룬 스톤을 더 모아야 할 것 같다
(Kamu butuh Rune Stones lainnya.)

Please select the user requiring a quest: Something glowing seems to be embedded behind the tombstone.{nl}Take it out?
비석 뒷편에 무언가 반짝이는 것이 박혀 있다.{nl}뽑아볼까?
Sesuatu bersinar di belakang tombstone.{nl}Periksalah?

Please select the user requiring a quest: You can see many interesting things if you sit here.{nl}
이곳에 앉아있으면 재밌는 구경을 많이 할 수 있다네.{nl}
Kamu akan menemukan banyak sesuatu yang menarik di sana.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Not too long ago, a lady that seemed to be a mage came to ask something strange.{nl}I think she was looking for a stone engraved with characters that glow blue or something?{nl}
얼마 전에는 마법사로 보이는 아가씨가 하나 와서 이상한 걸 물어봤었지.{nl}푸른 빛이 나는 글자가 새겨진 돌을 찾는다나?{nl}
Beberapa waktu yang lalu, seorang mage perempuan menanyakan sesuatu yang aneh.{nl}Sepertinya dia mencari batu yang bersinar berwarna biru atau sesuatu yang lain?{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I said I didn't know anything of the sort since I have never seen anything similar.{nl}She said something about going somewhere past Escanciu Village... I can't quite recall.
나야 그런 걸 본 적도 없으니 당연 모른다고 했지.{nl}그랬더니 에산치우 마을을 지나 어디로 간다고 했었는데.. 기억이 잘 나지 않는구먼.
Aku bilang aku tidak tahu, karena belum pernah melihat sesuatu seperti itu.{nl}Dia bilang ada sesuatu menuju ke Escanciu Village... Aku tidak begitu ingat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Rune Caster Master
룬캐스터 마스터
Rune Caster Master

Please select the user requiring a quest: Eh? Why am I sensing rune powers in you?{nl}
어라? 어째서 당신에게서 룬의 기운이 느껴지는 거죠?{nl}
Eh? Kenapa aku merasa ada rune powers dalam dirimu?{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Goodness! {nl}That is the Rune Stone of the first Rune Caster Master, isn't it?{nl}
이럴수가! {nl}그건 초대 룬캐스터님의 룬 스톤이잖아요?{nl}
Ya Tuhan! {nl}Ini Rune Stone dari Rune Caster Master pertama itu kan?{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: How did you manage to find it?{nl}I've been looking all over for it...{nl}
도대체 어떻게 그걸 찾은 거죠?{nl}그렇게 찾아 헤메도 발견하지 못했는데..{nl}
Bagaimana bisa kamu menemukannya?{nl}Aku telah mencarinya sekian lama...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: That Rune Stone... Could you give it to me, please?{nl}Although it may not mean too much to ordinary people, {nl}it means a lot to Rune Caster Masters.
그 룬 스톤.. 저에게 주시지 않겠어요?{nl}보통 사람들에겐 별로 소용이 없지만, 룬캐스터 마스터에겐 아주 특별한 의미가 있거든요.
Rune Stone itu ... Berikanlah padaku?{nl}Meskipun mungkin tidak berarti terlalu banyak untuk orang-orang biasa, {nl}ini sangat berarti bagi para Rune Caster Master.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thank you so much.{nl}The Rune Stone of the first Rune Caster Master is finally back in {nl}the hands of Rune Casters after hundreds of years thanks to you.{nl}
정말 고마워요.{nl}당신 덕분에 수백 년만에 초대 마스터님의 룬 스톤이 다시 룬캐스터에게 돌아왔네요.{nl}
Terima kasih banyak.{nl}Rune Stone of the first Rune Caster Master akhirnya ditemukan kembali {nl}Terima kasih banyak.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know if it is sufficient as a reward, but let me teach you a little about runic characters.{nl}While extremely rare, there are some books written in runic characters.{nl}
보답이라고 할 수 있을지는 모르겠지만 당신에게 룬 문자를 조금 가르쳐드릴게요.{nl}이제 거의 남아 있지 않지만, 가끔 룬 문자로 쓰여진 책들이 있거든요.{nl}
Aku tak tahu ini cukup atau tidak sebagai hadiah buatmu, tapi aku akan mengajarkanmu sedikit tentang runic characters.{nl}Meskipun jarang, ada beberapa buku yang menulis tentang runic characters.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Perhaps if your magic is compatible with the runic characters...{nl}You may be able to become a Rune Caster.{nl}
어쩌면 당신의 마력이 룬 문자와 잘 맞는다면.. {nl}룬캐스터가 될 수 있을지도 모르죠.{nl}
Mungkin jika magicmu berhubungan dengan runic characters...{nl}Kamu dapat menjadi seorang Rune Caster.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: No, I am certain that you will be able to become a Rune Caster.{nl}I think that the will of the runic characters led you here to me.{nl}
아니, 분명히 그럴거라고 생각해요.{nl}룬 문자의 의지가 당신을 저에게 이끈 것이라고 생각하고 있거든요.{nl}
Aku yakin kamu bisa menjadi seorang Rune Caster.{nl}Kehendak dari runic characterlah yang membawamu kemari.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Rune Casters can cast powerful magic through Rune Stones.{nl}However, it does take a long time to gather the required magic.{nl}
룬캐스터는 룬 스톤을 통해 강력한 마법을 구사할 수 있어요.{nl}단, 마력을 모으는 데 드는 시간이 길다는 단점이 있지만요.{nl}
Rune Casters mampu mengeluarkan kekuatan yang besar melalui Rune Stones.{nl}Tapi bagaimanapun juga membutuhkan waktu yang lama untuk bisa menguasainya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oh... Have I been talking too much about Rune Casters?{nl}My bad, but thank you so much for finding the Rune Stone.{nl}
아.. 제가 너무 룬캐스터 이야기만 했나요?{nl}어쨌든, 룬 스톤을 찾아주셔서 정말 고마웠어요.{nl}
Oh... Aku terlalu banyak bicara tentang Rune Casters{nl}Tapi terima kasih banyak telah mendapatkan kembali Rune Stone.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Come back to me if you wish to become a Rune Caster.{nl}
룬캐스터에 뜻이 있다면 꼭 저를 다시 찾아주세요.{nl}
Kembalilah jika kamu berminat menjadi seorang Rune Caster.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I don't know if you could call it a reward, but I will teach you some runic characters.{nl}Although quite rare, there are occasionally some books written in runic characters.{nl}
보답이라고 할 수 있을지는 모르겠지만, 당신에게 룬 문자를 조금 가르쳐드릴게요.{nl}이제 거의 남아 있지 않지만 가끔 룬 문자로 쓰여진 책들이 있거든요.{nl}
Katakanlah ini sebuah hadiah, aku akan mengajarkanmu runic characters.{nl}Meskipun jarang, ada beberapa buku yang menulis tentang runic characters.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: You may be able to obtain important information from long ago.{nl}Not a bad deal, don't you agree?
어쩌면 아주 오래전에 남겨진 중요한 정보를 얻을 수 있을지도 몰라요.{nl}나쁘지 않은 이야기죠?
Kamu akan mampu mencari informasi tentang masa lalu.{nl}Menarik kan?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Wandering Bard
방랑중인 음유시인
Wandering Bard

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ask an owl of the forest, and he will answer.{nl}Oh, birch tree, only the owls are there for you. {nl}Oh.... Only the owls...{nl}
그 숲의 부엉이에게 물어보게, 아마 부엉이가 대답해 줄 걸세.{nl}자작나무여, 답해줄 이는 부엉이밖에 없다네. {nl}아아.. 부엉이 밖에 없다네..{nl}
Tanyakan pada owl of the forest, dia akan menjawabnya.{nl}Oh, birch tree, owls satu-satunya yang ada di sana untukmu. {nl}Oh.... Ya satu-satunya...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oh, the youth. Oh, the beautiful...{nl}To introduce my poor self, I am a a mere dandelion seed wandering as the wind takes me.{nl}
젊은이여. 아름다운 이여..{nl}이 가련한 몸, 한 줄기 소개하자면 바람을 타고 방랑하는 민들레 홀씨랍니다.{nl}
Oh, yang muda dan indah...{nl}Memperkenalkan diriku yang apa adanya, Aku adalah seorang mere dandelion seed yang berkelana bersama angin yang berhembus{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: My song flows as the wind blows, as your soul glitters brightly...{nl}Do you have an interest in the songs of this poor bard?{nl}
살랑살랑 바람이 부는 나의 노래를, 반짝반짝 빛이 나는 당신의 영혼을..{nl}이 가련한 몸의 노래에 관심이 있으신지..{nl}
Nyanyianku berhembus bersama angin, seperti jiwamu yang bersinar terang...{nl}Apa kamu tertarik dengan lagu dari seorang bard kesepian ini?{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: But poor old me. {nl}Though I wish to tell you, your lonesome friend must soon leave. {nl}Farewell...
그러나 이 가련한 몸. {nl}흔쾌히 가르쳐 주고 싶어도 당신의 외로운 친구는 곧 떠나야 한답니다. {nl}그럼..
Aku si tua yang malang. {nl}Aku ingin mengatakan padamu, temanmu yang kesepian ini akan segera pergi. {nl}Selamat tinggal...

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hollow Thorn Forest Dungeon
공허의 가시숲 던전
Hollow Thorn Forest Dungeon

Please select the user requiring a quest: Hollow Thorn Forest Dungeon (Recommended Lv : 145){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Are you sure you want to enter?
공허의 가시숲 던전(권장레벨:145)으로, 당신과 파티를 맺은 플레이어만이 함께 입장할 수 있습니다.{nl}입장하시겠습니까?
Hollow Thorn Forest Dungeon (Recommended Lv : 145){nl}Hanya kamu dan anggota partimu yang bisa masuk.{nl}Kamu yakin mau masuk?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Blue Fortress Dungeon
푸른 요새 던전
Blue Fortress Dungeon

Please select the user requiring a quest: Blue Fortress Dungeon (Recommended Lv : 240){nl}Only you and your party members can enter together.{nl}Are you sure you want to enter?
푸른 요새 던전(권장레벨:240)으로, 당신과 파티를 맺은 플레이어만이 함께 입장할 수 있습니다.{nl}입장하시겠습니까?
Blue Fortress Dungeon (Recommended Lv : 240){nl}Hanya kamu dan anggota partimu yang bisa masuk.{nl}Kamu yakin mau masuk?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ancient Warp Magic Circle
고대의 워프 마법진
Ancient Warp Magic Circle

Please select the user requiring a quest: You cannot return once you enter.{nl}Do you wish to proceed?
한 번 이동 하시면 다시 돌아오지 못합니다.{nl}입장하시겠습니까?
Sekalinya kamu masuk saat ini, kamu tidak akan bisa masuk kembali.{nl}Kamu setuju?

Please select the user requiring a quest: It's all done!{nl}Now all we have to do is blow it up!
다 되었어요!{nl}이제 게이트를 폭파시키기만 하면 되겠네요!
Selesai!{nl}Yang harus kita lakukan sekarang adalah meledakannya!

Please select the user requiring a quest: And right before his eyes, the lead nugget prize let out a sparkle and in a moment clearly became gold. {nl} The old Alchemist now snickered, 'Now you owe me one gold nugget, be sure to bring it.' {nl} Modestas protested, but as much as he looked, what the old Alchemist now held was clearly no longer lead. {nl}
그리고 모데스타스씨가 보는 앞에서 수상한 빛이 나더니 황당하게도 납덩이는 순식간에 금괴로 변했습니다. 그리고 알케미스트는 뻔뻔하게도 이렇게 말했습니다.{nl}[이제 자네가 빚진 것은 금괴 하나이니 반드시 가져오게.]{nl}모데스타스씨는 항의도 하고 화도 냈지만, 가만히 따져 보면 알케미스트는 자신의 손에 든 그 물건을 정확하게 납덩이라고 명시한 적이 없었습니다.{nl}
Tepat di depan matanya, bongkahan yang berkilau dan dalam sekejap telah menjadi gold. {nl}Si Old Alchemist menyeringai, 'Sekarang Kamu berhutang padaku sebongkah emas, pastikan kamu membawanya.' {nl} Modestas protes, tapi seperti apa yang terlihat, apa yang old Alchemist pegang sudah tidak ada lagi. {nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Kupole Lhuta
큐폴 루타
Kupole Lhuta

Please select the user requiring a quest: Revelator, I've been waiting for you.{nl}Goddess Zemyna is hiding somewhere in this Earth Tower.
계시자님을 기다리고 있었습니다.{nl}이 대지의 탑 어딘가에 제미나 여신께서 은거하시고 계십니다.
Savior, Aku telah menunggumu.{nl}Goddess Zemyna bersembunyi di sekitar Earth Tower ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: After the day in which you humans call Medzio Diena...{nl}Goddess Zemyna has hidden herself from the human realm.{nl}
그대들이 신수의 날이라 말하는 그 날 이후..{nl}제미나 여신께서는 인간들의 세계에서 자취를 감추셨습니다.{nl}
Setelah peristiwa Medzio Diena...{nl}Goddess Zemyna mengucilkan dirinya dari kehidupan manusia.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The life of humans and the fertility of vegetation...{nl}Medzio Diena must have been a great woe for the goddess of fertility.
인간의 생과 초목의 풍요..{nl}대지의 풍요를 관장하는 여신께서는 신수의 날이 크나큰 고민이셨겠지요.{nl}
Kehidupan manusia dan kesuburan vegetasi...{nl}Medzio Diena merupakan bencana besar bagi goddess of fertility.

Please select the user requiring a quest: We Kupoles have asked for her presence as the humans are longing for her...{nl}But Goddess Zemyna is obstinately refusing to meet us.{nl}
여신을 그리워하는 인간들을 위해 저희 큐폴들이 뵙기를 청하였지만..{nl}제미나 여신께서는 이를 완강히 거부하고 계십니다.{nl}
Kami sangat merindukan kehadirannya..{nl}Tapi Goddess Zemyna bersikeras tidak mau menemui kami.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: To make things worse, the demons have started to attack the Earth Tower.{nl}It has become hard to even request a meeting with her because of the attacks.
게다가 얼마 전부터는 마족들이 대지의 탑을 공격하기 시작했어요.{nl}그 때문에 여신께 알현 요청을 하는 것 조차 힘들어졌습니다.
Para demon telah mulai menyerang Earth Tower.{nl}Gegara mereka jadi semakin sulit untuk menemui Zemyna.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Revelator, please find Goddess Zemyna.{nl}Maybe you will be able to change the goddess' mind.
계시자여, 부디 제미나 여신을 찾아주십시오.{nl}그대라면 여신께서도 마음을 돌리실지도 모릅니다.
Savior, tolong temui Goddess Zemyna.{nl}Mungkin dengan kehadiranmu dia mau berubah pikiran.

Please select the user requiring a quest: If it helps finding Goddess Zemyna...{nl}I'll tell you what I know about the Earth Tower.
제미나 여신을 찾는 데 도움이 된다면야..{nl}대지의 탑에 대해 제가 아는 것을 알려드리겠습니다.
Jika bisa membantu menemukan Goddess Zemyna...{nl}Akan kuceritakan yang kutahu tentang Earth Tower.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unfortunately, there is not much I can tell you about Goddess Zemyna.{nl}I am sorry.
안타깝게도 제미나 여신에 대해 말씀드릴 수 있는 부분이 많지 않습니다.{nl}죄송합니다.
Sayangnya tidak terlalu banyak yang bisa kukatakan tentang Goddess Zemyna.{nl}Maaf.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I pray that you will be able to meet Goddess Zemyna.
부디 그대가 제미나 여신을 뵐 수 있길 기도하겠습니다.
Aku berdo'a semoga kamu bisa bertemu Goddess Zemyna.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Relic Collector
유물 수집상
Relic Collector

Please select the user requiring a quest: They say that there are many artifacts from unknown periods in the Earth Tower.{nl}If you find something, how about exchanging for something I have?
대지의 탑 안엔 알려지지 않은 시대의 유물들이 아주 많다고 하더군요.{nl}혹시 뭔가 발견한 것이 있다면 제가 가진 물건들과 교환하시는 건 어떻습니까?
Mereka bilang banyak artifact dari periode yang tidak diketahui di Earth Tower.{nl}Jika menemukan sesuatu, kita bisa bertukar informasi?

Please select the user requiring a quest: There is someone who will want what we have even if the world ends.{nl}Our job is to supply it if there is a demand for it.
세상이 멸망해도 어디의 누군가는 우리 물건을 필요로 합니다.{nl}사겠다는 사람이 있으면 파는 게 바로 우리들의 역할이지요.
Ada seseorang yang menginginkan apa yang kita miliki, meskipun sampai akhir dunia.{nl}Tugas kita ada menyiapkannya, selama masih ada permintaan.

Please select the user requiring a quest: There is almost nothing known about the Istora Ruins.{nl}The fact that they were discovered thanks to being pushed up after Medzio Diena is about it.{nl}
여기 이스토라 유적지는 알려진 게 거의 없습니다.{nl}신수의 날에 지표면으로 밀려난 덕분에 발견된 유적지라는 것 정도일까요.{nl}
Nyaris tidak ada yang diketahui tentang Istora Ruins.{nl}Diketemukan setelah peristiwa Medzio Diena .{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Then some adventures came to know about the Earth Tower here.{nl}It won't even open unless you are a Revelator.{nl}
그러던 중 모험가들이 이 대지의 탑에 대해 알게 되었지요.{nl}계시자가 아니면 내부의 문이 열리지도 않나 봅니다.{nl}
Lalu beberapa adventure datang untuk mencari tahu tentang Earth Tower di sini.{nl}Tapi tetap tidak akan dibuka meskipun kamu seorang Savior.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: That's why we're making a living selling various of items to Revelators.{nl}Since only Revelators can carry relics from inside the tower.
그래서 요즘은 계시자들을 상대로 장사를 하고 있지요.{nl}저 안에서 유물들을 들고 나올 수 있는 사람은 계시자들밖엔 없으니까요.
Itulah kenapa kita menjual item-item khusus untuk para Savior.{nl}Karena hanya Savior yang bisa mengambil relic dari dalam tower.

Please select the user requiring a quest: One thousand and two hundred years ago...{nl}This tower has been built by the remaining vestiges of an ancient era forgetten by humans.{nl}
지금으로부터 천이백 년 전.. {nl}이 탑은 인간들의 잊혀진 고대의 기억에 남아 있는 잔재로 만들어진 탑입니다.{nl}
Seribu duaratus tahun yang lalu...{nl}Tower dini dibangun oleh vestiges of an ancient yang tersisa oleh manusia pada masa yang terlupakan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: A long time ago, the humans that lived together with the goddesses...{nl}They created the tower out of desire for the goddesses.{nl}
아주 오래 전에 여신들과 함께 살았던 인간들.. {nl}그들이 여신에 대한 그리움을 잊지 못하고 만든 것이지요.{nl}
Dahulu kala manusia hidup berdampingan bersama para goddess...{nl}Mereka membuat tower untuk para goddess.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: But time erased even the memories of the tower.{nl}A thousand years after the rule of King Zachariel, only Zemyna is hiding here now.
하지만 시간은 이 탑의 기억 마저도 지워버렸습니다.{nl}자카리엘 왕의 시대에서 천 년이 지난 지금에는 오직 제미나님께서만 은거하고 계시지요.
Waktu telah menghapus semua tower beserta kenangan-kenangannya.{nl}Seribu tahun setelah kekuasaan King Zachariel, hanya Zemyna yang tinggal di sini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It is certain that Goddess Zemyna is in the tower...{nl}But unfortunately, even I do not know where she could be.{nl}
제미나 여신께서 이 대지의 탑 안에 계신다는 것은 확실합니다만..{nl}아쉽게도 탑의 어디에 기거하시는지는 저도 잘 모릅니다.{nl}
Bisa dipastikan Goddess Zemyna tinggal di dalam tower ini...{nl}Sayangnya aku tidak tahu dimana dia berada.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: As Goddess Zemyna does not wish to see anybody...{nl}I assume she is in the innermost depths of the tower.
제미나 여신께서는 아무도 만나기 원치 않으시기 때문에..{nl}탑의 가장 깊숙한 곳에 계시지 않을까 하는 게 제 생각입니다.
Goddess Zemyna memang tidak ingin bertemu dengan siapapun...{nl}Aku kira Dia berada di tempat terdalam di tower ini.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Stories of battles with monsters and demons are always useful to the goddesses.{nl}Will you tell me a bit more?
몬스터라던가 마족과 싸운 이야기는 많으면 많을수록 여신께 도움이 되지요.{nl}조금 더 자세히 들려주시겠어요?
Cerita tentang pertempuran melawan monster dan demon akan selalu dinanti oleh para goddesse.{nl}Ceritakanlah sedikit padaku?

Please select the user requiring a quest: It seems you're still lacking.{nl}Will you tell me more stories later?
그걸론 조금 부족하신 것 같아요.{nl}나중에 좀 더 많은 이야기를 들려주시겠어요?
Ceritamu masih kurang.{nl}Maukah kamu menceritakannya lagi lain kali?

Please select the user requiring a quest: New monster stories?{nl}Will you tell me more about it?
새로운 몬스터 이야기인가요?{nl}좀 더 제게 자세히 들려주시겠어요?
Cerita tentang monster baru?{nl}Ayo ceritakanlah?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oh, they're all stories you already told me before.{nl}Will you come see me next time?
아쉽게도 저에게 이미 들려주신 이야기들 뿐이네요.{nl}다음에 다시 찾아주시겠습니까?
Ohh, semua cerita itu telah kamu ceritakan sebelumnya.{nl}Maukah kamu menemuiku lagi lain waktu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oh, you've been to a new region.{nl}Will you tell me about what it was like?
새로운 지역에 다녀오셨군요.{nl}그 곳은 어떤 곳이였는지 자세히 들려주시겠어요?
Ohh, kamu dari suatu tempat yang baru.{nl}Katakanlah padaku seperti apa itu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: You already told me about that.{nl}But if you go somewhere new do come and tell me about it.
이미 저에게 들려 주신 이야기들이네요.{nl}새로운 곳을 탐험하시게 되면 꼭 다시 들러주세요.
Kamu sudah mengatakan itu padaku.{nl}Jika kamu ke tempat baru lagi, datang dan ceritakanlah padaku.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Many places have changed after Medzio Diena.{nl}The information you shared will be very useful for everyone.
신수의 날 이후로 많은 곳이 예전과는 달라졌어요.{nl}당신이 알려주신 정보는 모두에게 큰 도움이 될 겁니다.
Banyak tempat yang berubah setelah Medzio Diena.{nl}Informasi yang kamu bagi sangat berguna bagi semua orang.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It looks like you don't have any new stories to tell. {nl}Come back if you get to explore any new areas.
아직 별 다른 이야기는 없는 것 같네요.{nl}새로운 곳을 탐험하게 되면 다시 들러주세요.
Sepertinya kamu tidak punya cerita untuk diceritakan. {nl}Kembalilah jika kamu mengeksplore tempat baru.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Because of the monsters we can't do anything the way we want.{nl}We used to go to Siauliai Woods to pick herbs, eat fruit from the trees or get some rest, {nl}but not anymore.
몬스터들 때문에 먹는 것도, 입는 것도, 쉬는 것도 마음대로 못해.{nl}예전 같으면 샤울레이 숲에 나가서 약초도 캐고 나무 열매도 따 먹고 쉴 수 있었는데 말이야.
Gara-gara monster kita tidak bisa bebas melakukan apa-apa.{nl}Biasanya kami pergi ke Siauliai Woods untuk memetik sayuran, makan buah-buahan atau sekedar beristirahat, {nl}tapi sekarang sudah tidak bisa lagi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Living in a place with these monsters running outside is driving me insane.{nl}But because of them I can't even dare to move somewhere else...
밖에서 몬스터들이 날뛰는 곳에 살고 있자니 미칠 것 같군. {nl}몬스터들 때문에 다른 곳으로 갈 엄두도 못 내겠고..
Tinggal bersama para monster di luar sana membuatku gila.{nl}Gara-gara mereka aku jadi tak mau pergi kemana-mana...

Please select the user requiring a quest: Lately I can't do so much as get a good night of sleep.{nl}All because of the monsters.
요새 꿈자리가 불편해 죽겠어.{nl}이게 다 몬스터 때문에 그런 거라고 생각해.
Tak ada yang bisa aku lakukan selain tidur semalaman.{nl}Semua karena para monster itu.

Please select the user requiring a quest: I want to know how my family is doing but I'm scared of the monsters so I can't go back.{nl}I really regret running away.
가족들의 안부가 궁금하지만 몬스터가 너무 무서워서 다시 돌아갈 수 없어요.{nl}집을 뛰쳐 나온게 너무 후회돼요.
Aku kangen sekali sama keluargaku dan ingin menengok mereka, tapi aku takut monster jadi aku tak bisa kembali lagi.{nl}Aku meyesal telah pergi.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Manual
설명서
Manual

Please select the user requiring a quest: Medicine on top organized from brightest to darkest color.{nl}Red medicine on the left contains dangerous ingredients.{nl}Ingredients at the bottom organized from heaviest to lightest.{nl}Report missing ingredients on the corresponding sheet.{nl}For other questions, contact Sarma.{nl}{S30} - Sarma, Head of Research -{/}{nl}
약품은 색이 밝은 것부터 위쪽에 정리한다.{nl}붉은 약품은 위험한 재료인 경우가 많으니 왼쪽에 모아둔다.{nl}다른 재료는 무거운 것부터 아래쪽에 둔다.{nl}빈 재료가 있다면 관리 문서에 적어둔다.{nl}그 외에 다른 문제가 있다면 사르마에게 문의.{nl}{S30} - 연구 관리자 사르마 -{/}{nl}
Obat-obatan di atas itu tersusun dari warna yang terang ke warna yang lebih gelap.{nl}Red medicine di sebelah kiri memiliki kandungan yang berbahaya.{nl}Susuan yang di bawah dari yang paling berat ke ringan.{nl}Laporkan bahan-bahan yang tidak ada pada kertas itu.{nl}Info selengkapnya hubungi Sarma.{nl}{S30} - Sarma, Head of Research -{/}{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Before you read this, please make sure no one else is around.{nl}I'm Gatre and I'm helping Sarma with his experiments.{nl}Sarma approached me saying he wanted to do research to get the forest's fruit trees back to normal.{nl}
이 글을 발견하셨다면 다른 사람의 눈을 피해 몰래 읽어주세요.{nl}저는 사르마씨의 실험을 돕고 있는 가트레입니다.{nl}사르마씨는 이 숲의 과일나무들을 원래대로 되돌리는 연구를 한다며 저희에게 접근했습니다.{nl}
Pastikan tidak ada siapa-siapa saat kamu menggunakannya.{nl}Aku menolong sarma dalam penelitiannya.{nl}Sarma memintaku dan bilang bahwa dia ingin mengembalikan buah-buahan di hutan ini menjadi normal.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: We had lost a place to live after the trees grew too big and we couldn't eat the fruits, so Sarma's proposal appealed to us.{nl}He offered to share food with whoever helped him so most people from my village ended up accepting.{nl}
갑자기 커지면서 먹을 수 조차 없게 된 과일나무들 때문에 살 곳을 잃은 저희에게 사르마씨의 제안은 너무 달콤했습니다.{nl}연구를 돕는 사람들에겐 먹을 것도 나눠주었기에 저를 포함한 대부분의 마을 사람들은 그의 연구를 돕기로 했지요.{nl}
Kami kehilangan tempat tinggal semenjang Pohon-pohon tumbuh terlalu besar dan buahnya tidak bisa dimakan, untuk itu Sarma memanggil kami.{nl}Dia menawarkan makanan kepada siapa saja yang mau membantunya.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: At first we worked hard to help him save our hometown.{nl}But then Sarma's research started to feel somewhat strange.{nl}It seems like Sarma's research has little to do with getting the overgrown trees back to normal.{nl}The experiments are mostly done on monsters, not on trees, and I've even fallen unconscious during one experiment.{nl}
처음에는 그저 고향을 되돌릴 생각에 열심히 연구를 도왔습니다.{nl}하지만 시간이 갈 수록 사르마씨의 연구에 이상한 점이 느껴지기 시작했습니다.{nl}지금 사르마씨가 하는 연구는 거대해진 과일 나무를 되돌리는 것과는 거리가 멀어 보입니다.{nl}나무가 아닌 몬스터를 대상으로 하는 실험이 많고, 그 실험에 참여했다가 의식불명에 빠지는 사고도 발생했으니까요.{nl}
Pada awalnya kami membantunya.{nl}Tapi kemudian ada sesuatu yang ganjil dalam penelitiannya.{nl}Sepertinya penelitian Sarma tidak difokuskan pada pengembalian Pohon-pohon kembali normal.{nl}Percobaan-percobaannya berhasil pada monster-monster, tapi tidak pada pepohonan, aku sedikit tidak bersemangat setelah itu.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I suspect Sarma is doing this to cover up for something evil.{nl}Since I have no proof, there's really nothing I can do.{nl}I can't ask you to trust every single word of mine,{nl}but I at least want to know if my suspicions are correct or if I'm simply overthinking it.{nl}
저는 사르마씨가 뭔가 나쁜 일을 꾸미고 있는 건 아닌지 의심하고 있습니다.{nl}하지만 증거가 없기 때문에 별다른 행동을 할 수 없는 상황입니다.{nl}제 말을 무조건 믿어달라고 할 순 없겠지요.{nl}하지만 적어도 저의 의심이 사실인지, 단순히 지나친 생각이었는지 알고 싶을 뿐입니다.{nl}
Aku menyangka Sarma melakukan ini karena untuk melindungi diri dari sesuatu yang jahat.{nl}Tapi aku tidak dapat membuktikannya.{nl}Aku tidak memintamu untuk mempercayai setiap perkataanku,{nl}aku hanya ingin memastikan apakah sangkaanku ini benar atau hanya aku yang sedikit lebay.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm being watched by Sarma almost constantly. {nl}Please understand that this is the only way I could communicate this to you.{nl}If you agree to help me, when you bring back this manual please say you did everything according to it.
저는 대부분의 시간을 사르마씨에게 감시당하고 있습니다.{nl}때문에 이런 이야기를 이렇게로나마 전할 수 없는 점을 이해해 주세요.{nl}만약 도와주실 생각이 있으시다면 이 설명서를 돌려주시면서 설명서대로 했다고 말씀해 주세요.
Aku mesti terus mengawasi Sarma. {nl}Mengertilah bahwa inilah caranya agar aku bisa berkomunikasi denganmu.{nl}Jika kamu mau membantuku, berjanjilah bahwa kamu akan melaksanakan semuanya dengan baik.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Discarded Document
버려진 문서
Discarded Document

Please select the user requiring a quest: For the experiment, we collected juice and seeds from the fruits of the overgrown trees.{nl}We were lost in despair, but now we feel hope again.{nl}I only wish this research will bring back our town...
실험을 위해 거대하게 변한 과일에서 씨앗이나 과즙같은 것들을 채집했다.{nl}그동안 절망에 빠져있던 사람들에게 희망이 싹튼 것을 느낄 수 있다.{nl}부디 이 연구가 우리 고향을 되돌려주길..
Untuk percobaan, kami mengumpulkan extract buah dan biji-bijian dari pohon-pohon yang tumbuh.{nl}Kami sudah pasra, tapi kini mulai ada harapan lagi.{nl}Kami berharap dengan penelitian ini kota kami akan kembali...

Please select the user requiring a quest: Sarma asked us to capture a weak monster.{nl}We aren't fit for fighting, but we did our best for the village and managed to catch a monster.{nl}Only a few people were injured in the process.
사르마씨의 요청으로 약한 몬스터를 생포했다.{nl}우린 전투같은 건 소질이 없지만, 마을을 위한 일이라 생각하고 최선을 다해 몬스터를 잡았다.{nl}이 과정에서 몇 사람이 부상을 입고 말았다.
Sarma memintaku untuk menangkap monster yang lemah.{nl}Kami tidak siap untuk bertarung, tapi kamu mencoba melakukan sebisa mungkin demi para penduduk.{nl}Beruntung hanya sedikit yang terluka.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Sarma was looking for a volunteer for an important experiment.{nl}We don't know much about magic or experiments, but he said anyone would do.{nl}This time, only he and Boldas, who volunteered, participated in the experiment.{nl}
사르마씨가 중요한 실험을 해야 한다며 도와줄 사람을 구했다.{nl}마법이나 실험같은 것을 전혀 모르는 우리가 무얼 도울 수 있겠냐고 했지만, 상관 없다고 했다.{nl}그렇게 실험에는 사르마씨와 지원자 볼다스씨 단 둘만이 참여했다.{nl}
Sarma mencari relawan untuk percobaannya.{nl}Kami tidak tahu betul percobaan apa, tapi katanya siapapun dapat melakukannya.{nl}Saat ini hanya dia dan Boldas, yang bersedia menjadi relawan.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Then, 5 days later... the accident.{nl}We heard a strange scream and, after following the sound, we found Boldas lying on the ground unconscious.{nl}Sarma said the experiment had failed and apologized.
그리고 5일 뒤.. 사고가 터졌다.{nl}마치 뭔가가 울부짖는 듯한 기괴한 소리가 들려서 쫓아가 보니까 볼다스씨가 의식을 잃고 쓰러져 있었다.{nl}사르마씨는 실험에 실패했다며 정말 미안하다고 사과했다.
5 hari kemudian … Celakalah.{nl}Kami mendengar jeritan, setelah mengikuti arah suara, kami menemukan Boldas sudah terbaring tak berdaya.{nl}Sarma berkata bahwa percobaannya gagal, dan dia minta maaf.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Yesterday I went inside the place where Sarma did the experiment.{nl}I didn't notice it when we were trying to save Boldas, but looking closely there were traces of a struggle all around.{nl}I also saw hideous monster corpses that seemed to have been melted by something.{nl}What kind of experiment could he have done with that?
어제 사르마씨가 실험을 했던 곳에 우연히 들어갔다.{nl}의식을 잃었던 볼다스씨를 구하느라 정신이 없어서 몰랐는데, 가만히 살펴 보니 무언가 날뛴 흔적이 있었다.{nl}게다가 구석에서 무언가에 녹아내린 듯 흉측한 몬스터의 시체를 발견했다.{nl}대체 무슨 실험을 했던 걸까?
Kemarin aku masuk ke tempat percobaannya Sarma.{nl}Saat kami ingin menyelamatkan Boldas, kami melihat banyak jejak tak beraturan.{nl}Aku juga melihat mayat monster seperti telah ditelah sesuatu.{nl}Percobaan macam apa yang dia lakukan?

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ingredients for Transmutation{nl}{nl}Blue Eldigo Blood{nl}Fruit Juice Crystals{nl}Overgrown Plant Leaves{nl}Aged Fruit Tree Sap{nl}
연성재료 목록{nl}{nl}초록 엘디고의 혈액{nl}과즙 결정{nl}과성장한 식물의 잎사귀{nl}과일 나무의 숙성액{nl}
Bahan-bahan untuk Transmutation{nl}{nl}Blue Eldigo Blood{nl}Fruit Juice Crystals{nl}Overgrown Plant Leaves{nl}Aged Fruit Tree Sap{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Ingredients for Solution{nl}{nl}Fruit Tree Seeds{nl}Giant Tree Branches{nl}Alemeth Foresth Grass Roots{nl}Watery Sap{nl}Fresh Blood
조합재료 목록{nl}{nl}과일 나무 씨앗{nl}거대한 나무 줄기{nl}알레멧 숲의 풀뿌리{nl}묽은 수액{nl}굳지 않은 피
Bahan-bahan untuk Solution{nl}{nl}Fruit Tree Seeds{nl}Giant Tree Branches{nl}Alemeth Foresth Grass Roots{nl}Watery Sap{nl}Fresh Blood

Please select the user requiring a quest: Gatre
가트레
Gatre

Please select the user requiring a quest: Oh... That's great!{nl}If the monsters are fighting each other, that means Sarma has failed!{nl}
아.. 다행이네요!{nl}몬스터끼리 서로 싸우는 걸 보니 사르마가 실패한 모양이에요!{nl}
Oh... Bagus sekali!{nl}Jika para monster saling menyerang satu sama lain, maka percobaan Sarma telah gagal!{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Go after him, quick!{nl}You need to catch Sarma!
빨리 쫓아가죠!{nl}사르마를 잡아야 해요!
Cepat cari dia!{nl}Segera temukan Sarma!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unconscious Person's Research Journal, Page 1
의식불명된 사람의 연구 일지 1장

Please select the user requiring a quest: First experiment.{nl}Administered product to monster.{nl}Grotesque transformation occurred.{nl}-{nl}Note: Unsure whether current experiment is helping the recovery of Alemeth Forest.
첫 번째 실험.{nl}몬스터에게 만들어진 약품 투여.{nl}괴기한 현상으로 변형됨.{nl}-{nl}특이 사항 : 지금 하는 실험이 알레멧 숲을 되돌리기 위한 일인지는 잘 모르겠다.
Eksperimen pertama{nl} Memberikan produk kepada monster{nl}transformasi Grotesque terjadi{nl}-{nl}Catatan: Tidak yakin apakah percobaan saat ini membantu pemulihan Alemeth Forest.

Unconscious Person's Research Journal, Page 2

Please select the user requiring a quest: Second experiment.{nl}Monsters used in experiment appear to obey Sarma.{nl}Seemingly unable to understand speech, but displays behavior similar to pack following a leader.{nl}Sarma suggests we proceed with experiments.{nl}-{nl}Note: Something seems to have gone wrong, but I wasn't able to disagree with Sarma's judgement.
두 번째 실험.{nl}실험에 사용된 몬스터들이 마치 사르마를 따르는 듯한 모습을 보임.{nl}말을 알아듣는 것 같지는 않지만, 마치 동족이나 무리의 우두머리를 따르는 모습과 흡사함.{nl}사르마는 상관없다고 하며 실험을 계속하자고 함.{nl}-{nl}특이 사항 : 무언가 잘못되었다고 생각했지만 사르마의 의견에 반대할 수는 없었다.
Eksperimen kedua.{nl}Para Monster yang digunakan dalam percobaan mematuhi Sarma{nl} Tampaknya tidak dapat memahami pembicaraan, tetapi mampu berperilaku seperti berkemas mengikuti pemimpin{nl} Sarma menyarankan kami melanjutkan eksperimen.{nl}-{nl}Catatan: Sesuatu tampaknya sudah tidak beres, tapi aku tidak bisa menolak keputusan Sarma.

Please select the user requiring a quest: Unconscious Person's Research Journal, Page 3
의식불명된 사람의 연구 일지 3장
Unconscious Person's Research Journal, Page 3

Please select the user requiring a quest: Third experiment.{nl}Using the transmutation circle to create an ingredient.{nl}Infusing magic in the circle releases nausea and dizziness-inducing toxins. {nl}Sarma insists the symptoms are temporary and harmless.{nl}Circle scheduled for activation tomorrow.{nl}-
세 번째 실험.{nl}재료를 만드는 데 연성 마법진을 사용하고 있음.{nl}연성 마법진에 마력을 주입할 때마다 나오는 독 때문에 머리가 어지럽고 구역질이 났음.{nl}사르마는 몸에는 별 문제 없고 일시적인 증상이라고 함.{nl}내일은 연성 마법진을 처음으로 가동해볼 예정.{nl}-{nl}특이 사항 : 아무래도 몸 상태가 이상하다. 내일 사르마에게 다시 한번 물어봐야겠다.
Eksperimen ketiga.{nl}Menggunakan transmutation circle untuk membuat bahan.{nl} Memasukkan magic kedalam circle yang melepaskan rasa mual dan merangsang-pusing serta racun.{nl}Sarma menegaskan gejala itu bersifat sementara dan tidak berbahaya{nl} Circle dijadwalkan untuk aktif besok.{nl}-

Please select the user requiring a quest: He created Rune Stones to allow people to easily use their power.{nl}His runes may have been common, but the best Rune Caster Masters have {nl}great respect for him, and have treasured and carried on his runes to this day...{nl}

Setelah itu, shepherd dan gadis itu sering bertemu dan bermain bersama.{nl}Mereka mengatakan gadis itu tidak banyak bicara dan hanya bisa mengucapkan beberapa kata sederhana.{nl}

Pertemuan{nl} Goddess Laima dengan manusia sangat langka dan begitu juga dengan blessingnya, membuatnya sebagai goddess yang kurang dikenal meskipun ia salah satu goddess utama dari para goddess lain.{nl}

오늘도 신수께서 내리신 가르침을 전하고자 여러분 앞에 섰습니다.{nl}신수께서는 오직 신수를 믿는 자만이 구원받을 수 있다고 말씀하셨습니다.
Sekali lagi aku datang sebelum kamu berbagi pengetahuan tentang Divine Tree.{nl}Hanya mereka yang percaya akan Divine Tree yang dapat menerima salvation.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The world was turned over by monsters... and who saved you?{nl}Was it the goddesses, who neglected you and then disappeared without a trace?{nl}
식물이 폭주하고 몬스터가 세상을 덮친 이때.. 누가 여러분을 구원했습니까?{nl}여러분을 팽개치고 자취를 감춰버린 여신입니까?{nl}
Dunia dikuasai para monster... Lalu siapa yang akan menyelamatkanmu?{nl}Para goddess, yang mengabaikanmu dan pergi tanpa jejak?{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Or, I ask, was it the monks, the liars who locked you in this monastery and then deserted you?
아니면 이 곳, 수도원에 여러분을 가둬놓고 도망쳐버린 거짓말쟁이 수도사들입니까?
Para monk kah, para pendusta yang menyekapmu di monastery lalu mengasingkanmu?

Please select the user requiring a quest: That's right.{nl}Only the Divine Tree can save you, and no one else.{nl}
그렇습니다. {nl}여러분을 구원할 수 있는 것은 오직 신수 뿐입니다.{nl}
Benar.{nl}Hanya Divine Tree yang mampu menolongmu, tiada yang lain.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Medzio Diena was but a warning to the arrogant goddesses.{nl}If we believe in the Divine tree and receive salvation, we will become one within the tree.{nl}
신수의 날은 단지 신수께서 오만한 여신에게 내린 경고일 뿐입니다.{nl}신수를 믿고 구원 받으면 우리는 모두 신수 안에서 하나가 됩니다.{nl}
Medzio Diena hanyalah ancaman yang tertuju kepada Goddess yang arogan.{nl}Bila kita beriman dan percaya kepada Divine Tree dan menerima pencerahan, kita akan menjadi satu dengan pohon tersebut.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Then we shall be blessed with eternal life!
그렇게 영생의 축복을 받을 수 있는 것입니다!
Lalu kita akan diberkahi di kehidupan yang nyata!

Please select the user requiring a quest: Why did the demons... This has never happened before!{nl}Oh Divine Tree... Please help us!
마족들이 왜.. 이런 적은 단 한번도 없었는데!{nl}신수님.. 제발 도와주세요!
Apa yang telah dilakukan para demon... Belum pernah terjadi sebelumya!{nl}Oh Divine Tree... Bantulah kami!

Please select the user requiring a quest: An unknown magic circle is drawn on the ground. It seems to exude evil energy...

Please select the user requiring a quest: Occupying Elgos Monastery{nl}-{nl}1. Free monsters in Nahash Forest to drive Paramesh Village residents into the monastery.{nl}-{nl}2. Make crops multiply to separate the villagers from the monks.{nl}
엘고스 수도원 점거 계획{nl}-{nl}1. 나하스 숲에 몬스터를 풀어 파라메스 마을 사람들을 엘고스 수도원으로 몰아넣을 것.{nl}-{nl}2. 엘고스 수도원에 식물 폭주를 꾸며 마을 주민과 수도사를 고립시킬 것.{nl}
Occupying Elgos Monastery{nl}-{nl}1. 1.Para Monster di Nahash Forest mengarah ke Paramesh Village residents menuju monastery.{nl}-{nl}2.Buatlah barisan tanaman untuk  memisahkan para penduduk dan para monk.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: 3. Make them think the monks ran away and abandoned the monastery.{nl}-{nl}4. Teach the hopeless villagers about the great deed of the Order of the Tree of Truth.
3. 수도사들이 수도원을 버리고 도망갔다는 생각이 들도록 꾸밀 것.{nl}-{nl}4. 절망에 빠진 마을 주민들에게 진리의 나무 교단의 위대한 뜻을 전할 것.
3. Biarkan mereka pikir para monk telah meninggalkan monastery.{nl}-{nl}4. Ajari para penduduk desa tentang keistimewaan dari Order of the Tree of Truth.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The grace of the Divine Tree has fallen upon you to save you from starvation!{nl}
신수께서 여러분의 굶주림을 달래주기 위해 권능을 내리셨습니다!{nl}
Divine Tree memberikan karunianya kepada kalian untuk menyelamatkan kalian dari derita kelaparan!{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: The power of the tree will multiply your crops and feed your people!
그 힘으로 이 식량을 모두 배불리 먹을 수 있게 늘려보이겠습니다!
Power of the tree akan membuat tanaman tumbuh semakin banyak dan dapat memenuhi kebutuhan orang-orang!

Please select the user requiring a quest: What are all these bugs...{nl}This must be the wrath of the Divine Tree!{nl}
신수께서 내린 힘이 어떻게 벌레로..{nl}신수께서 노하신 것이 분명합니다!{nl}
Serangga-serangga apa itu...{nl}Ini pasti kemurkaan Divine Tree!{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: Someone among us must doubt the might of the Divine Tree!{nl}Who, I ask, dares to think of such sacrilege!{nl}
누군가 신수의 권능을 의심하는 자가 이 곳에 있는 것 같습니다!{nl}누가 그런 불경한 생각을 가지고 계신 겁니까!{nl}
Seseorang diantara kita pasti meragukan kekuatan dari Divine Tree!{nl}Siapa yang berani berkata begitu!{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: ...Ever since they came the demons became difficult to control.
..확실히 누군가가 오고 나서 부터 마족들도 제어가 잘 안되긴 하더군요.
…Semenjak para demon datang, semua menjadi tidak terkendali.

Please select the user requiring a quest: It was you!{nl}You are the one who dares to doubt the might of the Divine Tree!
저 자입니다! {nl}저 자가 신수의 권능을 부정하는 불경한 자입니다!
Ya Kamu!{nl}Kamu yang meragukan kekuatan Divine Tree!

Please select the user requiring a quest: I was expecting you to come.{nl}The old abbot must have told you about the statues...{nl}

Aku sangat berharap kamu datang.{nl}Old abbot pasti bilang padamu tentang statue itu...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I knew you were a Revelator from the beginning.{nl}My mind control powers didn't work on you...{nl}
네가 계시자라는 것도 처음부터 알고 있었지.{nl}내가 사용하는 세뇌의 힘이 너에게는 통하지 않았으니까..{nl}
Aku tahu kamu adalah seorang Revelator dari awal.{nl}Kekuatan mind control ku tidak bekerja padamu...{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: But I was careless.{nl}I didn't think you'd break through my barrier so easily... You're no ordinary fool.
하지만 내가 방심했다.{nl}결계까지 그렇게 쉽게 뚫을 줄은.. 역시 여간내기가 아니였어.
Tapi aku ceroboh.{nl}Aku tidak mengira kamu menghancurkan barrierku dengan mudah... Kamu bukan orang biasa.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The curse to multiply the crops is ready.{nl}But I can't have you around and risk you ruining our plans.{nl}
이미 식물 폭주의 주술은 완성되었다.{nl}하지만 네 녀석을 더 이상 놔뒀다간 우리의 계획이 망가지겠어.{nl}
Kutukan untuk memperbanyak crops sudah siap.{nl}Tapi tidak bisa membiarkanmu disini dan mengancam rencana kami.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: This is the judgment of the Divine Tree!{nl}Be doomed, you and the monastery!!
이단에겐 신수의 심판 뿐이다!{nl}수도원과 함께 먹혀버려라!!

Please select the user requiring a quest: I may have failed once, but I won't be deterred!{nl}You just wait and see.
한번 실패했다고 해서 기죽을 내가 아니야!{nl}더 열심히 노력할테니까 지켜봐줘.
Aku mungkin gagal sekali, tapi aku tidak akan tergoyahkan!{nl}Kamu tunggu dan lihat.

Please select the user requiring a quest: This time... I know I received help but...{nl}Vaidotas... I really hate him...

Please select the user requiring a quest: I was definitely possessed by something...{nl}I felt like I was in a dream...

Please select the user requiring a quest: To think I spread demon blood all over the monastery...{nl}I need to help the monks clean it now...

Aku merasa aku menyebarkan demon blood di seluruh  monastery...{nl}Aku harus menolong monk membersihkannya sekarang...

Please select the user requiring a quest: Thank you for saving us from the Order of the Tree of Truth. {nl}The power of the goddesses was corrupted, they said; what a ridiculous idea...
진리의 나무 교단으로부터 저희를 구해주셔서 정말 감사합니다.{nl}여신의 힘이 오염되었다니, 이 얼마나 바보같은 소리처럼 들렸을까요..
Terima kasih telah menyelamatkan kami dari Order of the Tree of Truth. {nl}Kekuatan Goddess telah hancur, mereka berkata: ini ide yang konyol...

Please select the user requiring a quest: Lucienne helped us a lot, too.{nl}She was the one who released Dominikas.{nl}
당신 말고도 저 루시엔님께서도 저희를 도와주셨어요.{nl}도미니카스가 건 현혹을 완전히 풀어주셨지요.{nl}
Lucienne banyak membantu kami juga.{nl}Dia adalah orang yang membebaskan Dominikas.{nl}

Please select the user requiring a quest: I'm going to take care of the village now... and the monastery.{nl}There's really nothing I can say to the monks.
이제 마을도 다시 가꾸고.. 수도원 일도 도와야겠어요.{nl}정말 수도사님들껜 할 말이 없죠.

Please select the user requiring a quest: The crops never multiplied like Dominikas said.{nl}Did the curse not work?
